Summary: Was greeted by friendly staff, room was clean and well laid out. Breakfast was standard- rotated between two menus. Would have liked a little more variety as we stayed for 5 nights. Coffee was terrible- I learned from my last visit and brought my own pour over. Definitely will be staying again.

Great location and staff. The breakfast is a huge plus. If you‚Äôre going to Disney for more than two days, then do it. It‚Äôs close to the shuttles so you don‚Äôt have to pay for parking at Disney. It‚Äôs also within walking distance of restaurants and public transportation.

Hotel was clean and rooms were spacious and it was right across the street from Disneyland parking lot so we could go through security there and take the bus right into the park. Will definitely stay here again. Breakfast was free and hotel staff was nice.

Summary Heading: Excellent Value for a Disneyland Vacation
Summary: Excellent pillows, spacious room, the free water with being a Hyatt member was awesome, and we loved being a close walk to the Disneyland shuttle. It was an excellent value and would recommend to those who plan on visiting the Disneyland Parks.

My experience was working with the group sales team, Norea, Eduardo and Rittney. Their quick replies, customer service, organization and follow through was just amazing for the many cheerleading teams I had staying at the Hyatt Place Anaheim.

Great hotel! Comfortable beds, breakfast is included although they close earlier than before and the best part is we can leave our car in the covered garage and walk to the Toy Story lot and take the shuttle to the park. It‚Äôs also right next to Ruth‚Äôs Chris so we had to take advantage and drop by for some good steak after a day of walking at the park!

Summary Heading: Very decent, if basic, older Hyatt Place with refurbished rooms and decent staff
Summary: It's a basic, somewhat dated Hyatt Place, but the staff is friendly and the rooms are the typical "older Hyatt Place somewhat refreshed". It's quite a long walk to Disneyland but you can get an Uber to take you right there for $6 each way, and Ubers seemed to be plentiful and quick. Very pleasant if not really luxurious stay for a Disneyland vacation. Ample parking, there are a handful of EV chargers - we were lucky enough to snag one, but they do get filled up and some EV drivers use up a spot even if they're not charging (very, very annoying), but if you do get a spot the charging is free. Biggest downside is the shower water pressure in our room wasn't great, TVs didn't have ChromeCast like some newer Hyatts, etc. Overall I'd say it's a very decent place to stay. I personally

Summary Heading: Great hotel, walking distance to the parks and very family friendly!
Summary: The hotel was perfect location for our family's adventures at Disney. We loved the staff, they made sure we had a great room and were very accommodating when we needed a portable crib.  The room was clean and well laid out, breakfast in the morning was really good for a hotel breakfast and both my kids enjoyed it!

Perfect location, walking distance to the Convention Center and 5 min ride to Disneyland. Complimentary nice breakfast is a plus. Staff as always courteous and kind. I would definitely recommend it for my friends and family.

Quick check in. Big room, close to Disneyland parking lot so we could shuttle over. Breakfast was a bit crowded but that is expected. They have a bar open till 11 to grab a drink and a cold case with snacks that came in handy for the kiddos.

I had a pleasant experience at this hotel. I, along with several other parties, stayed here for our buddy's wedding. The staff was very friendly and the property was clean. Thank you to the front desk supervisor, Michelle. She made sure we were well taken care of.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay while visiting Disney!
Summary: The hotel was affordable & clean. The staff was friendly and helpful. The morning breakfast was filled with a variety of different choices and we loved that there was even food available for when the buffet was not in service.  The hot tub and pool area was clean with plenty of stocked pool towels. The beds were comfortable and rooms were roomy and nice. :)

Summary Heading: Great hotel close to Convention Center
Summary: The rooms were spacious and the staff was friendly.  It is very close to the Convention Center, so easy to walk in the morning and evening. I would recommend this hotel for anyone planning on going to the convention center.

The Hyatt Place is a nice price point for a clean, newer hotel that serves a good hot breakfast included in the price. It's easy to catch the Toy Story Bus across from the hotel or it's a 1.5 mile walk to the parks. There are nice restaurants on both sides of the hotel.

Front desk was fantastic‚Ä¶very hospitable and greeted us each time we walked by. The room was very clean and spacious.  We were there to visit Disneyland and they provided information on taking the shuttle across the street for FREE!  It saved a lot of steps as we still did about 30k per day or more. Breakfast was good and plentiful. It‚Äôs not a huge assortment but, was a nice start to the day. Would recommend the property 100%.

Summary Heading: Great location to stay with family, as a couple or friends!
Summary: The staff was so great here! Rittney, Norea and Eduardo were so accommodating - they made my stay and my room block for the wedding so easy to book. They have plenty of parking and not to mention, BREAKFAST! 10/10 would recommend this location.

Everything was perfect,  except for two things,  no microwave at room and you charged for parking and no ballet parking,breakfast really good, I give a plus to the workers at breakfast room. Rooms cleaned but we have to wait like till 4:30 to check in. But we understood because I booked 4 rooms and we wanted all together. Thank you very much.

Summary Heading: No Housekeeping - Clean your Own Room
Summary: Would have liked to give this hotel a better rating but I cannot. Only stayed for two nights and would have expected room service to clean the room, but when we returned to the room at 7:30 pm, the room was exactly as we left it. Called the front desk and was told that we had to request that they would come and make up the room when we checked in. We were never told anything like that at check-in. Would have thought that housekeeping would clean the room every day unless you requested that they not come. TRhis has to be a new low on how they can provide the least amount of service while charging you for almost everything else. Quite disappointed.

The staff was very friendly and attentive. The breakfast buffet was also really delicious. My family and I would definitely stay there again next time we visit. It was also walking distance to Disneyland

Checking in was pretty straight forward and the room was neat and clean when we arrived.  My friends and i only ate breakfast the first morning because the eggs and apple juice both tasted slightly off and had me sick throughout the day and i wasn‚Äôt able to eat anything for the rest of the day.  Other than that little hiccup is was a pretty good stay.

Stayed here for 6nights with 3kids in Jan23. Hotel was clean, good customer service, friendly staff and good housekeeping when requested. Less than 20mins walk to Disneyland. Heated outdoor pool and spa

Very clean and comfy rooms. We stayed in an adjoining room with grandkids for our Disney adventure.  Very impressed with the free breakfast. Lots to choose from!  I could have had the French toast sticks every morning!  Very safe and convenient location.

Very clean and spacious, breakfast was really good, accommodating staff, the only thing to complain about is paying for parking that tact on an additional $180 to our stay with 2 cars. Close to everything we went to Disney shuttle was easy to take and plenty of places to eat at. The hotel is also very safe !

Everything was perfect, we all had an Amazing time. The rooms were clean, Your staff was very nice and helpful. Breakfast every morning was a plus before heading to Disneyland and California Adventure. We'll be staying there again in the future. Thank you for a great experience for my birthday.

We had a very good time in the hotel and it‚Äôs an easy walk to Disneyland.   We were celebrating my daughters birthday and had a total party of 10 people.  Six of them shared a bunk room and the rest of us had 3 rooms. It was really nice to be able to gather for breakfast but a little challenging due to the size of our party but it all worked out.  At least we could gather in the lobby or just outside and all walk together to and fro.   We all had a Great time.

Very clean and very close walk to Pixar parking lot to catch the bus to Disneyland main entrance. You can also walk to the park like 3 to 4 blocks away. The complementary breakfast was a plus starts 6am. Mom-Fri. And 7am Sat and Sun. Very helpful and friendly staff.

It was good, but not great. We got the family suite with one king bed and a bunk bed in a separate room. Only one of the two doors separating the rooms closed, so my husband and I didn‚Äôt have privacy from the kiddos. The bathroom door had a large frosted window, so if someone woke up to use the restroom in the middle of the night the light woke everyone up, which was annoying. The breakfast was good, but again not great.

My family from outside USA and I came here to visit Disneyland. Priscilla was more than awesome helping us to take care of her rooms. We were confusing her and she was VERY patient with us. She is definitely an AAA associate. Thank you for making our visit fantastic, Priscilla!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay if you‚Äôre going to Disney
Summary: The workers here are super friendly and helpful. The rooms are spacious. Free breakfast is a nice perk. Breakfast includes eggs, sausage, potatoes, and much more. There‚Äôs also a free shuttle across the street that takes you to Disney. Would definitely recommend staying here.

Excellent Service, Hot Breakfast everyday, Wonderful Staff, Great Location close to Disney Park, Good overall experience! They made our stay very pleasant, Jenny and Sarah made it even more special, surprising our son with birthday goodies for his birthday! I highly recomment as Disneyland‚Äôs Good Neighbor Hotel! Thumbs up!

Nice and clean room. Customer Service is super friendly. First time we stayed in Hyatt. We were very impressed with the services. Thank you the Hyatt team. We are thinking to join World of Hyatt for our travels.

Clean and efficient hotel with plenty of space for families. Breakfast was pretty good with lots of fresh options. The pool area is pretty small. There is ample parking underground with an elevator that accesses the lobby and guest rooms.

We stayed in a suite with bunk beds and a separate room which was perfect for our needs. Our almost 3 year old needs her own space for a nap and night time sleep, and doesn‚Äôt fit in a pack and play, so having an additional room separated by the sliding doors and featuring a bunk bed with the lower bunk on the ground was excellent. The sliding doors are frosted, but we didn‚Äôt have too much of an issue with the light from the other room. The room doesn‚Äôt have blackout curtains like most hotels, just shades, so there was a good amount of sunlight coming through the sides, but we made the best of it by draping an extra blanket to block out the light so our daughter could sleep well. The breakfast buffet was tasty and fresh, with scrambled eggs each morning, several bread options,

Summary Heading: Excellent for family trip to Disney
Summary: Great Hyatt property. I was warmly greeted and check-in was efficient (Yesinia was very helpful). Room was clean. TV was a bit small for the large room size. Shower/tub was my only issue in the room-it was extremely tough to pull the diverter up, so I didn‚Äôt get full pressure in the shower. Towels were regular hotel style (thin, not fluffy). Room has a fridge and coffee pot. No microwave in room, but there was one in the breakfast area available for guests. Breakfast was nice. Eggs, sausage, potatoes, fruit, oats, yogurt, cereal, juice, coffee. Large assortment of Tazo tea, but no hot chocolate.    We walked to Disney one day (just under a mile). Another day we used the Toy Story parking lot shuttle across the street. We chose to use a rental car from the airport and see a few

Nice, clean and updated rooms. The grandkids had a great time in the pool and hot tub. The breakfast was good and the variety of choices was also good. The front desk staff was very helpful. The hotel is within walking distance to the Toy Story parking lot which made it a breeze to get into the park.

Great location right across from the Toy Story shuttles. You go through security so quickly there and skip it outside the parks! Breakfast was great, good variety but mostly the same day to day. Staff was super accommodating and being a world of Hyatt member gets you a few perks!

Summary Heading: Stop scrolling and book this hotel!!
Summary: I can't say enough wonderful things about this hotel. The staff was extremely helpful and kind. So clean. Amazing location. The breakfast was the best we've had at any "free breakfast" hotel. Truly. It was a wonderful experience. If we ever find ourselves back in Anaheim, I know where we will be staying!

The whole staff were welcoming and friendly. From the staff at the front desk to the staff in the kitchen. Our family had a great experience. It was my son‚Äôs birthday and the staff made his day by singing happy birthday and giving him a gift that was such a surprise. I highly recommend the Hyatt Place for a visit. The staff was also attentive and helpful when we needed something Or recommendation to dine. Thank you all for a great experience.

good place for disneyland trip also near the convention center and market a nd pharmacy such as cvs and 7 eleven, but especially disnelyland close from 5 min away  parking is avarage but safety and fast

Decent hotel but a little pricey. Could find a closer one for the price. I will say hotel was 4 blocks away from Disney parks which was great but elevator was broken down our whole stay! There‚Äôs also no laundry room.

Clean, close, and friendly staff.  I‚Äôve always loved Hyatts, but this one went out of their way to make us feel more welcome.  It was lasso nice to have a sofa bed (which most Hyatt Places do) for the extra members of our family.

Summary Heading: Spacious, pretty clean, great location for Disneyland shuttle.
Summary: For a family with kids, this was a great location, in close proximity to the Disney Shuttle. Our room was just about the biggest room on our floor, with kitchen type area (cabinets, sink, and a lot of counter space) a living area with separate TV and pullout sofa, sizeable bathroom with double sink, and 2 queen beds and separate TV from living area. Nice breakfast, and responsive service. Elevators kept having issues upon our arrival and departure and few or no baggage carts were returned to the lobby area of the hotel. Would‚Äôve been nice if customers returned them promptly or if staff searched for them on a regular basis to ensure there was always an inventory when guests arrived.

Clean and quiet hotel. Staff was very responsive to our request. Breakfast was good and had variety of hot foods, cereal, fruits, juices, milk , and breads. Walk to Disney wasn't bad. Approximately 10 minutes for 5 adults.

My family and I really enjoyed our stay here. The room was comfortable and met our expectations.  This is a hotel for families.  The free breakfast was enough to get our day going and a nice touch considering how much you will be spending at Disneyland.  I encourage you to sign up for the free loyalty program to take advantage of lower prices and the ease of online check-in.  Also, the free water bottles are at check in, not daily.  Conveniently located about a block away is a CVS and a Walgreen's where you can purchase more, if needed.  Please don't get upset at the staff who are simply following the guidelines they have been given. (I saw this happen)  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  My one complaint is not with the staff or cleanliness, but with corporate charging

From housekeeping to breakfast crew and especially Yesenia at the front desk‚Ä¶ Superb customer service. The room was clean, roomy and slept all 4 of us comfortably! We walked across the street to catch the free Disneyland shuttle to the front gate. Great price and great place! The only thing I could think of to increase the experience is pancakes or make your own Belgian waffle as an option for breakfast. Lots of families stay here before going to Disneyland and the kids really enjoy those options.

Perfect for Disneyland / California Adventure Park. Family rooms are great with bunk beds and separation. Breakfast was good. Service was attentive. Quick walk to the parks or to the shuttle stop as an alternative

Summary Heading: Walkable to Disney. Friendly Staff! Included breakfast
Summary: This was a great location to stay at for a trip to Disneyland. We loved the room sizes and how big they were. We also loved that breakfast is included as that saved us a lot of money and when we arrive to the hotel and the kids are excited I to have free hot chocolate. Would have appreciated daily room, cleaning service, which at this hotel is every other day.

Perfect for a family getaway and also a very convenient stay. So many stores and restaurants literally walking distance or a 5 min drive. Not to mention Downtown Disney and Disney Theme park is also right down the way at the most a 10min walk. Other than that to sum up my stay it was perfect. Room was very spacious and fit 6 of us comfortably. Thank you for the hospitality Hyatt Place never fails you guys never upset. Happy New Years too many blessed stays to comeü§ô. Also Thank you Rittney Kaluna on the great recommendation and taking care of our stay very much appreciated.  We be going through her too book my next stay as well.

A big Thank You to the Hyatt Family, especially Rittney Kaluna. Every aspect of our stay exceeded our expectations. Respectful staff, nice clean & spacious rooms & a plus on complimentary breakfast! I would definitely stay here again! Love that the staff always makes sure to let them know if we need anything.

We were greeted by friendly staff at 1 am in the morning.   The hotel is nice, modern and clean.   When getting in our car to head home we noticed we had a flat tire. Staff called maintenance and they fillled up our tire so we could make it to the tire repair shop.   The hotel exceeded our expectations. Customer service is an A+!   Please send this to staff for me   Rich

Amazing customer service. Super friendly staff. Very accommodating for our large group. The front desk staff were so sweet and helpful and kind. Only one draw back was one of the elevators was broken which made getting to our room hard and was kind of inconvenient.

Excellent stay with wonderful staff.  Very clean hotel, close to Disneyland. We needed a room for 5 people and had 2 queen beds with double bed pull out sofa for my 88yr old dad.  Handicap capable with large bathroom and walk in shower.

I do many stays with the Hyatt through out the year for work and leisure (60+ nights a year). While I am very pleased with the Hyatt Brand in general this locations sales staff went above and beyond helping book rooms and a meeting room for my teams end of year celebration. The staff allowed our day to go off without a hitch.   The location is very close to Disneyland and this property was completely slammed with guests. The on site staff provided excellent service during our stay even with the high volume.  I wouldn‚Äôt hesitate in booking again.

What you would expect on a family vacation to disney and for the value..beds need to be upgraded and elevators were broke while we were there but those did not detract from our vacation with amount of guests it handled

We had a wonderful stay at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center.  Our party consisted of 2 adults and 2 teens and the room was roomy for all four of us.  Beds were comfortable, sofa also comfortable, and bathroom nice and clean.  Plenty of draw and closet space.  The breakfast was delicious.  Consisted of scrambled eggs, alternate of waffles, French toast, and ham, sausage.  Oatmeal daily and variety of breads, fruit, and juices.  Staff is wonderful, helpful, and friendly.  Would definitely return and recommend to others.

The workers there are so friendly,nice and helpful‚Ä¶ there breakfast was amazing and hot. The room we had was very big and spacious and home vibesü§ç the only thing missing was room service but other than that we enjoyed our stay.

Excellent customer service, clean rooms, great location to catch Disney shuttle, or walk to convention center.  Would definitely recommend.  They gave us a complimentary upgrade, they offer free breakfast.

Summary Heading: Another great stay at this hotel
Summary: Another great stay at this hotel - our sixth visit and I'd happily stay again.  Great rooms, staff and good location for Disneyland.  The breakfast service has returned -plenty of choice and good food.  No complaints, highly recommended.

Location is great, close to convention center and walking distance to many restaurants and services. $28 per day parking was a surprise and is too high for hotel guests in my opinion. Hotel doesn‚Äôt offer coffee. Big negative for me.

Great staff and rooms, housekeeping was helpful. Breakfast  was very good and helps out on a busy  day. Everyone we dealt  with was very friendly. Loved the location, very close to dinning and also Disneyland parking lot.

Our first time staying at the Hyatt place, Me and my family will never stay there again. Pictures on website are false advertisement. We believe the pics are from another hotel. Terrible rude customer service . Our room was not clean. Bathroom sink was getting clogged. toilet wouldn‚Äôt flush right. Only reason why we stayed There was because the hotel we normally stay at was booked. we read the  reviews looked  at website pictures before we made reservations. That‚Äôs what caught our attention and why we chose Hyatt place. After checking out of our room, I went back onto the website. Read the reviews again noticed they only had the Great reviews up only .  I found a link I clicked on is when I seen all the bad reviews of people experiencing the same thing that we did Had we read

This place was perfect for our family.  Clean and close to everything. Walked to convention center multiple times for our dance contest. The workers were super friendly and kept the place clean all day! Complimentary breakfast helped our budget so we could spend on other things. I would definitely come back again when staying in this area.

Summary Heading: Hyatt Place Anaheim is the BEST!
Summary: Hyatt Place Anaheim has earned our loyalty! We booked a block of 60 rooms for our marching band and color guard competition. Norea, Eddie, Rittney, and the Hyatt staff were friendly, accommodating, and professional. They were always available before and during our stay. The rooms were clean and comfortable. The free breakfast was warm and delicious. Norea and her team made us feel at home. We will only stay at Hyatt Place when we return to Anaheim. Thank you for a wonderful visit!

Summary Heading: Made our Disney trip more magical
Summary: Upon arrival we were told room service would be limited. At our surprise we returned each and every day to a clean room and beds were freshly made. Counter clerks were super helpful and friendly. Breakfast was included in our stay and amazing. Definitely made our Disney trip more magical. Will definitely stay again.

Summary Heading: Price Value, Very Near the park
Summary: Like the other reviews nice and clean, good hot breakfast. only thing our other room wasn't ready until past 4 p.m. and found a dirty used stinky towel in the closet, which made us wonder if it was a rush clean or not. other than that nothing really stood out other than very nice staff, walking distance to the shuttle and a few stores around. no microwave in the rooms though just fyi,

This was our second time booking this hotel for our Disneyland trip. We booked the family suite with 2 bunk beds and it‚Äôs the perfect amount of space for our family. The walk isn‚Äôt too far from the park and the Toy Story parking lot is across the street making a shuttle ride easy. The staff is nice. There‚Äôs a buffet every morning. I don‚Äôt care for buffets in general so I didn‚Äôt try it out. But I saw alot of families enjoying it.  My only complaint is that there aren‚Äôt exactly blankets on the bed but really thin sheets that‚Äôs aren‚Äôt too comfortable. They should invest in comforters or something else. Also know there isn‚Äôt any housekeeping during your stay. Other than, it‚Äôs turning out to be my go to t hotel when coming to Disneyland.

I actually really like this space for the Park. It's a couple of blocks walking distance from the Toy Story which I took the shuttle to the park to/from. Breakfast Buffet on par with usual fair. Staff was super friendly. The single bed room was pretty spacious for what it was.  I was able to check in early, but I believe they will hold your luggage if you arrive earlier than check in.  Moderately busy, so the early wave of people parading through the halls were heard, although that is kind of expected being so near the park. Would recommend, sleep with ear plugs.

Nice clean property with a good hot breakfast.  Only suggestion is to include Housekeeping Daily and not have to ask for it.  Room was comfortable; beds comfortable.  Friendly staff & only 1.9 miles to Disneyland.  ART transportation system within walking distance.

Summary Heading: Convenient location for going to Disneyland
Summary: With only a 5 minute walk to the Disney Toy Story parking lot shuttle and about a 20 minute walk to the Disneyland front entrance, the location was very good.  Staff was very nice and responded quickly to any requests that we had.  The only issue that I had was the EV charger parking was very limited, it took me 4 days to get access to one of the three onsite chargers (2 Tesla & 1 Other Chargers).

Great place to stay for disneyland vacation. Disney Shuttle departs/arrives at nearby disney parking lot. Hotel has excellent staff, dining, housekeeping. Bonus is that it had a heated pool and jacuzzi for those times when you get back to the hotel early in the evening. PS: Dont take selfie stick, not allowedd for rides safety reasons,

It is located a block and a half away from the Toy Story parking lot. You can take the free shuttles to Disney parks there. If you travel with the kids, having the breakfast included it is a money and time saver. The hotel was confortable and the online check in and out processes very convenient.

Five minute walk to the convention center! Close to Downtown Disney and numerous restaurants. The hotel is clean, with helpful staff, no issues there. The only downside is the $28 a night parking; and it‚Äôs an open lot, no need to use the key to enter.

Great, comfortable hotel for families.  Walkable to Disneyland.  Happy they offered breakfast as part of hotel service and amenities.  We stayed at specialty, 2Q room with kitchenette and living area.  Very spacious and roomy.

We have never stayed at a hotel with better customer service.  I can't even begin to tell the story of how we ended up at the Hyatt Place Hotel with the characters I'm allowed, but I will not be staying anywhere else in Anaheim ever again.  This hotel is a gem and it's all because of the staff.

The hotel is only a few years old but seems very worn from last year.  The breakfast was average with eggs, French toast sticks, bagels, and juice.  It was very busy.  The day front desk is either bipolar or fake nice.  In one moment, there are uncooperative and say there are no rooms then seconds later they have rooms and become helpful.  After checking in a guest, they tell the next person in line no one can checkin until later.  They seem to enjoy control over the guest.  For some reason, the parking gate remained opened all day.  If you are charging a parking fee, then close the gates.  Slept well but rooms seemed very bare.

I would highly recommend this hotel. It was very quiet. It's located close to the Convention Center and Disney. The breakfast was not super fancy but did the trick. There is also a small bar for adult beverages.

Nice hotel and within walking distance to Disneyland and California Adventure Park. Room was large and comfortable. Our room had two queen beds and a small couch with a chaise lounge. There was a partition that separated the bed area from seating area. Good breakfast assortment, just wished there was coffee service throughout the day.

Very friendly and accommodating. Room was clean and spacious. Bathhouse water pressure was better than most places I have stayed. Breakfast was hot and very well prepared hotel was very clean. The available snack area at the front desk was nice.

The hotel is in a good location (about a 25 minute walk). The staff is friendly, including the breakfast staff. The breakfast is good, but can use a few extra food items (just saying), but still very much appreciated!!! The rooms, beds and pillows are comfy and clean. However, I believed the bathrooms should have some sort of suction fan for the moisture. Also, the pool is heated, so you can enjoy an evening swim! Overall, it was a good stay.

The room was really neat and clean. Hotel staff are the best!! Front desk made sure all our needs were taken care of. Service is quick!     We enjoyed free breakfast.  I enjoyed the street view from the room, very calm and peaceful. Parking is very secured. Disneyland is in walking distance. Thank you. I would stay again.

Definitely recommend, rooms were clean. Breakfast was great, lots of options, service was exceptional and the staff were all friendly and helpful. Absolutely no complaints, our family will definitely be booking any future stays here.

Great room and bedroom, very nice pillows, quiet place and great location with many good restaurants around. I would suggest an improvement in breakfast and a better deal for parking, All the staff very helpfull.

The facilities are well-kept and clean, and the staff is accommodating. The location is central to the convention center and other attractions. The location off the major street, yet far enough off the road to be quiet.

ove lall ok experience, good location ,friend staff. free breakfast but not many choice. The only bad is too noisy at night, can't sleep well at all. You can hear clearly  people talking in hall way, and bathroom ventilation fane from around, plus some wird sound.

This is a clean nice place to stay. Breakfast is better than average with lots of choices- fruit, bagels, oatmeal, different potatoes each morning, different main dish (French toast, French toast sticks), sausage, toast, steel cut oatmeal with toppings, yogurt with toppings. Clean hotel with comfy bed pillows and average beds. There‚Äôs underground parking (for $28) and a heated outdoor pool and hot tub my kids enjoyed. It‚Äôs across the street from the Toy Story parking lot which is nice but that‚Äôs still about a 10 minute walk (the buses park on the opposite side from the hotel).  But that parking lot has a security check point which means you can skip it (and the lines for security) at the Disneyland parks. The disappointing for us was the mini fridge had no freezer in it. We like

This is an awesome hotel if you plan on visiting Disneyland. The rooms are well kept, it's within a walking distance to the Disneyland parking lot (where you can go through security and not worry about the large crowd entering the parks), and the breakfast was very diverse! I can't recommend this hotel enough.

About a mile from Disneyland. Walking is possible, but younger kids didn‚Äôt enjoy it. You can take the Toy Story shuttle in a lot across the street, but it‚Äôs still a decent walk. Breakfast was just OK, but very nice to fuel up before Disney. Room didn‚Äôt have sufficient outlets for the kids to charge their devices in the bunk bed room. Room was clean and comfortable. Parking was quite expensive.

The Hyatt Place was very clean, the staff was attentive and friendly.  Breakfast was good, replenished as needed. Very close to Disneyland, could walk, even with a 4, 10, 15, and 17 year old. I would definitely stay there again.

Summary Heading: Clean, staffed and lots of beds.
Summary: They charge for parking but the hotel itself is clean,  quiet, lots of food for breakfast, easy access to the convention center and Disneyland.  Room had two tvs, three beds (bunk bed for kids) lots of hot water, clean carpet, sheets and towels.  Highly recommended.

Perfect for our family Disney trip. We booked a king room that had a bunk bed for the kids. Having a sliding door so we could put the kids to bed with lights out and let us stay awake later was so helpful. The breakfast was good and a perfect way to fill up for a day at the Disney parks. It was a little less than a mile walk to the parks so we didn‚Äôt need a car. We just shuttled to and from the airport. The staff was so helpful, friendly, and professional. Michelle at the front desk was especially helpful. She offered to let us borrow a stroller that had been abandoned at the hotel for our youngest. That made the long days and miles so much easier. Highly recommend this hotel!

I've stayed here three to five times in the past few years and the accommodations have always been great. From check in to parking to breakfast, the service has always been great. In my eyes everything runs effortlessly and with ease. I've never had an issue at this hotel and I would recommend to any friend traveling to Anaheim, CA. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Great Disney spot for the whole family
Summary: The rooms were spacious and cozy, great location near disney parks, food and dinning close bye, big breakfast spot, clean rooms, great service. A must to visit disney LA. If traveling with family is important, this is the spot to be.

Stayed here for 3 nights to visit Disneyland. Great hotel, though it is the furthest hotel we‚Äôve stayed at, if you‚Äôre walking bear in mind it‚Äôs a long walk on the evening back!! However, I can‚Äôt fault the hotel. Comfy beds, decent shower, complimentary breakfast every morning, which switch hot items around - breakfast was very busy but staff did their best to keep up. Housekeeping is on request only, which they didn‚Äôt seem like they really wanted to, but did. 2x bottles of water daily as a Hyatt member.

Service was very good.Hotel is across the street from Toy Story Parking Lot for Disney,so I stopped in and asked if I could park there and go to the park,and they were cool with that.Room was very nice and clean,shower was hot and had a massage function on the head.There is a Ruth's Chris Steakhouse next door,so had a yummy dinner.Included breakfast was just ok and standard,but it's free,so all good.All in all,very nice stay.

We enjoyed our stay at Hyatt Place Anaheim.  We had a good size room with two queen beds.  It was only a 20-minute walk to/from Disneyland.  We also found a wonderful place to have dinner at Puesto on Katella which is about a 10-15 walk from the hotel.  Enterprise car rental was only a 10 minute walk from our hotel.  The service was excellent and we were in and out in a matter of minutes.  Returning the car was a breeze as well.

Summary Heading: Double charged and hotel was not what I thought it would be
Summary: This was a family vacation. Hotel was clean and friendly but hotel walls were paper thin. Could hear conversations all night through the walls from other guests. Hotel doors slammed super loud all night long from other guests. Pool was not what they advertised at all. Super small. Breakfast was OK but some of it was cold and soggy.  Hotel charged me for the stay when I already had payed through WestJet Vacations. When I called the hotel because I noticed the charge on my Credit Card they did not apologize what‚Äôs so ever and just said yeah I guess we will reimburse you the difference of the parking fee which is outrageous by the way!! $28.00 USD per night plus taxes and extra parking fees ridiculous!!!! Check your Credit Cards to make sure they don‚Äôt charge you twice because they

I can't say enough good things about my family's stay here. The staff was pleasant, friendly and personable; we felt very welcome here.  Our room was spacious & clean, plus the beds were comfortable! The staff made sure we had what we needed and even left a lovely welcome letter & surprise for our kids!!! It's a short walk to the Toy Story Lot shuttle or about 15 min to the park entrance. I will always stay here when we visit Disneyland. We left feeling happy and grateful for our stay at the Hyatt Place.

I went with my family for the Disney trip. They have pretty good service but not to thorough. My first day there, I told them I have a car, they charged me and told me the access method but they forgot to give me the sign to display on my car. Luckily I saw another person got a ticket then I started asking and the other front desk lady was surprise that I didn‚Äôt get one.   The place was clean. The sheets were not great. I‚Äôm sure they washed it but there were lots of stains and I had to ask them to change it couple of times.   The breakfast was not bad. My family enjoyed it, of course do not compare it to restaurants. The walk to Disneyland was a bit far but they do have shuttle service 5 mins from their hotel. I think I will come back.

Summary Heading: This Hyatt Place will ALWAYS be our Disneyland hotel!
Summary: The front desk staff was extremely helpful throughout our stay. I would like to recognize MELI as she drew a map for us to get to the Disneyland tram and was very helpful with all my other questions. Everyone we came in contact with was terrific including the Facilities maintenance person who helped us with our broken wine opener. He easily fixed it & was laughing with us as he said ‚Äúhave a good night‚Äù. Such a kind man.   We agreed this Hyatt Place is our Disneyland hotel from now on and we absolutely will tell our friends!  Thank you for a wonderful stay!  Trinda

My wife and I stayed here for 2 nights while on a Disneyland trip. The location was great, hotel was clean, rooms were spacious and modern, and breakfast was great! We would definitely stay here again.

Michelle at the front desk was fantastic. Clean rooms, walking distance to Disneyland, great amenities. Stones throw to the Anaheim Convention Center. Fast food restaurants near by include: Roscoes and Jack n The Box. One hour car ride from LAX.

Jocelyn checked us in, she was super helpful and friendly! The room and hotel were clean and comfortable, and the complementary breakfast was a plus. Overall amazing service and staff, we will definitely be returning!

The staff went above and beyond in welcoming our group and making check-in a breeze.  The hotel was well maintained and the breakfast was one of the better we have had.  We will be back next year.  Excellent all around.

We‚Äôve stayed here so many times before I didn‚Äôt think twice about booking this hotel for our family trip. We were finally Checked in after 4. Got into the room and noticed the beds seemed damp like the sheets weren‚Äôt thoroughly dried. My toddler needed to nap and having already been told there were no other rooms we just stayed in the room given. The elevators weren‚Äôt working properly our entire stay so we needed to take the stairs. With kids and a stroller this was frustrating. All the front desk said to us was that it wasn‚Äôt their fault it was a kid who spilled something in the elevator?  The breakfast also wasn‚Äôt very good so we didn‚Äôt bother to try it again the next day. After checkout I noticed the hotel charged the incidentals three times and the parking and room charges

Summary Heading: Not what I expect from a Hyatt Hotel
Summary: I usually enjoy all my stays at Hyatt branded hotel expert for my recent stay at the Hyatt Place at the Anaheim Convention Center. The customer service at the front desk was unhelpful and the shower was broken in my first room assigned to me. This hotel also needs a refresh as it feels old.

It was great! Close by Disney. It didn‚Äôt break the bank to Uber. Comfortable room and breakfast in the morning. The staff is very nice. We could have walked to Disney but we wanted to save our feet for the park.

Summary Heading: Amazing customer service - thank you Jennifer and Crystal!
Summary: Months ago I booked this trip for our first disney vacation as a family. My husband and I are big Disney fans but because of COVID we hadn't travelled since our son was born July 2020. We made note of this because they asked if they was anything they could do to make our stay special.   After checking in, which was easy and fast. About an hour later we got a knock on our door with a special gift for my son. It was such a small gift but the thought and gesture was so memorable and really set our trip into such a great place! Thank you so much Jennifer and Crystal!   Otherwise, the hotel was great. Very clean! Lots of space, we had a king+sofa. Plenty of room for your things.  Parking was easy, not hard to find spots It's $28USD per night. If you are only doing Disneyland, you

Stayed here for 2 weeks at the end of August, visiting from the UK.   Hotel is great, absolutely no complaints. We had a family room with the bunk beds for the kids on the 5th floor. Room was spotlessly clean & had everything we needed, room service was every 3 days. Staff were friendly & helpful.  Breakfast is included and whilst it gets busy we didn't ever struggle to find somewhere to sit, the choices are more than adequate given its free - Cereals, Fruit, Bread & Bagels + toaster, sausages, eggs and Waffles/French Toast/Breakfast Potatoes rotate daily. Juices, Milk, Hot Tea & Coffee.  As a family of 4 and bearing in mind we spent $97 + tip on breakfast at iHop on Day 1 the hotel breakfast saved us an absolute fortune. Parking is usually $28 + taxes per night but as we were

My room wasn't ready upon check in. And when you check out I had to walk down to the parking lot because you can no longer use the key card for the elevator to get to the garage when you check out so that's dumb. The front desk girl had an attitude upon check out

The hotel was really nice and super clean, the staff was super friendly! I enjoyed my stay here and will definitely be coming back every time I visit Cali! The area the hotel is located in is very nice, there's so many restaurants around, there's even a walgreens down the street! I recommend staying here.

Summary Heading: All the Staff are really friendly, with excellent work ethics
Summary: All the Staff are really friendly, helpful and also with excellent work ethics, only concern that we have is if you or your family is staying for more than 3 nights is the complementary breakfast which me and my wife are always looking every time we book a hotel, they could at least change the menu or at least have more selection for the kids, for a hotel that is being around the Disneyland resort you will expect for more family checking in with their kids that is ranging 4-12, like I said they could do a better job on the menu and selection, overall experienced was excellent

This hotel is quiet with no loud running in the hallways nor loud hustle and bustle outside. A little bit of traffic hum but not bad - barely cou ld hear fireworks at night from Disneyland. Definitely wouldn't say this is not a hotel walking distance from Disneyland if that's your choice on location. I needed to switch my booking last minute and hotel staff was extremely accommodating and helpful. This place has a real hot breakfast with good coffee, sausage, eggs. They also had a large yogurt and oat milk spread which was nice. My only real complaint is they need to reassess comfort. While the room was extremely clean and the mattress not being a boxspring, the pillows were definitely not for someone with a bad back or neck. They want to be fluffy but they fall flat. Out of the

The hotel and the hotel room was nice and clean. Great breakfast. The front desk staff was really polite and accommodating. We arrived early for check- in and the front desk girl was really polite and  gave us a room fast at no extra charge.

We had an awesome stay!! Thank for all you guys did. The front staff was awesome. They helped us with all our needs and help we needed. Definitely stay with you guys again. Wish more Hyatt Places we this friendly and accommodating .

We really enjoyed our stay, it offers free EV charging for guests with underground parking. Walking distance from Disneyland but be warned that the walk back to the hotel might seem much longer when your feet hurt from a full day at the park.   Breakfast is complementary and very tasty, would love to visit here again.

We had a nice stay. Didn‚Äôt really know or was aware of the parking garage. Today we went down for breakfast at 8:30, as that‚Äôs a responsible time to eat breakfast! However, they were cleaning up and we ended up not getting to eat breakfast before checking outüò°

The staff were welcoming and friendly, and the physical plant is excellent. And if you‚Äôre going to Disney, you couldn‚Äôt ask for a better location in proximity to the entrance to the parking lot for the Park.  Overall, the value delivered was outstanding.

We took a couples vacation to Disneyland with another couple. The hotel is very clean and our room was as well. Normally I am not a fan of the complimentary breakfast hotels include, but this was probably one of the best ones I have had. I'm also very picky on hotel beds and pillows. This hotel had very comfortable beds and pillows which is a plus for me. The hotel is close to Woody's parking lot where you can catch the Disneyland buses that will take you to the front gate and also back to the hotel at night. Overall it was a nice stay and we would stay here again.

We had a great 5 days stay at this hotel  - bunk bed for kids - spacious rooms - very clean  - breakfast - hot available, almost same choices every other day which i didn‚Äôt like it :) - walkable to Disney toy story parking lot for shuttle - small pool for quick fun with kids - great customer service

We initially stayed at the Cortona next door because we got a great deal through the credit card, but the move to the Hyatt Place halfway through our vacation was the best idea. Breakfast (free) changed each day and was perfect each time, the room was phenomenal, front desk was super gracious with our need to get there super early (refunded our early check-in request when they couldn‚Äôt fulfill it), and the pool/hot tub made for a great hang out time. Highly recommend this spot! It‚Äôs also only a 15 minute walk from Disney!

I was delighted with my stay. I recently stayed at this hotel for the second time on a work trip, and I was blown away by the level of service provided by Rittney and Eduardo from the Sales Department. Upon checking in, Meli kindly greeted me at the front desk and thoroughly showed all the amenities that the hotel has to offer. Rittney, Eduardo, and Meli addressed all of my questions and concerns, making my stay a breeze. They checked in with me during my stay to ensure everything went smoothly, which was deeply appreciated. Since the hotel was at total capacity, I could not locate an idle EV charging spot. However, when I reached out for assistance, they communicated with the valet and hotel staff to locate a vacant EV spot for me to charge my car. My experience was amazing,

The staff was great and customer service was impressive. I had an issue at check-in and the manager was very accommodating. The room was clean, and the breakfast was good too.  Overall, this was a good hotel to stay at.  Will stay again.

Summary Heading: Disney trip to end a 2 week road trip from SFO.
Summary: We thought we would splash out on a hotel close to Disney for the end of our 2 week California Road Trip and decided to book the Hyatt Place mainly due to the closeness to the Disney area but also after reading some of the reviews.  We spent a fair amount on this hotel so was expecting a lot only to be disappointed.  Although the location is great, 20 mins from Disney the hotel itself was a let down. Expensive parking, dated rooms, noisy AC so you could have it on through the night, slow elevators so long queues to get to your room, constantly noisy in rooms and down the hotel corridors, front desk staff weren‚Äôt particularly helpful, no free coffee in the lobby outside of breakfast hours but by far the worst part was breakfast. If you aren‚Äôt down by 7am you have no chance of

Front Desk Staff was excellent, they went above and beyond to make sure we were taken care of as I flights home were getting cancelled, they made sure we had rooms so we could stay extra days until our flights got rescheduled

During my stay I was treated with excellent customer service by the front desk. The staff at the front desk is the best I have ever had the pleasure of working with at a hotel. They were very helpful, very positive in all of our interactions, and remembered small details about my stay that I‚Äôve never experienced before. They are top notch

Summary Heading: I'd do it all over again...
Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights to celebrate my daughter's birthday at California Adventure and Disneyland. Have to say we were pleasantly surprised to how big the room was. Our room was clean spacious. Checking in and out was a piece of cake! Hot Breakfast and two free waters daily was nice. Also liked the fact that they had elevators that went straight to your floor from parking garage. So convenient!  The location was awesome! Close to Disneyland, Great Wolf Lodge and close enough to Knotts Berry Farm. So many places around to eat by walking or driving. If you need to buy clothes, toiletries, or anything else you might have forgotten, there's a Target just down the street.  Our only qualm was on the last day, we were getting ready to check out and kids just needed to jump in the

Excellent customer service and very clean. We would definitely return to stay here with our next visit to CA.  Every staff member was friendly and acknowledged their guests. Parking was an additional fee so plan to include in your daily budget.

Friendly staff and decent breakfast made getting up and going to Disneyland very easy and convenient.  The pool was quite small (and crowded) but aside from that, the hotel served its purpose rather well.  There was a rule about not getting the beds turned over because we were not staying more than 3 days, which was a bit disappointing, but it didn't ruin the experience.  Friendly staff greeted us with a smile each day we were there.  Walking distance to Disney (about a mile).  Would recommend for a family wanting to save money from the big resort hotels.

I would have to say that this by far has been the best hotel I have stayed at. We were here for a 3 night stay. Unfortunately the first night we did not get a good night rest. The room we were in was one of those that had a connecting room. The family that stayed next to us was really noisy and with the connecting door the noise level was even louder. Although the hotel was fully booked the front desk was able to accommodate us and move us to a room that has no connecting door. The staff was super friendly and welcoming. This will definitely be the hotel we stay at for our next Disneyland trip!

Summary Heading: Great one bedroom suit with wonderful breakfast!
Summary: We got 1 bedroom with king bed and sofa bed outside + kitchen all are great and comfortable! Amazing breakfast with lots of varieties. Food are fresh and counter very clean! Just hoping the swimming pool can little more clean (possible the night before had a big party)

Summary Heading: A safe & comfortable option for your family's Disney vacation
Summary: Great choice for Disneyland resort as it is close to the park. Even closer to Anaheim Convention Ctr. You can catch a free shuttle to the Disney resort across the street at the Disney parking lot. You'll pay less but get more staying at this hotel as compared to the Disney Hotels. Lots of great restaurants around. Mi Casa was an excellent Mexican restaurant within walking distance, but lots of chain brands around. Parking is $32.76/night and underground with elevator to hotel. If full, valet is free. Breakfast is free and hot with lots of options. Room has good sized frig, but no microwave. Avoid getting a room with a connecting door to minimize noise from other guests. Pools is nothing special but nicely shaded in the afternoon. Staff is friendly & helpful. Safe & family

Got to hotel early, they told us they‚Äôd call/text when room was ready. Never did so showed back up at 3pm and staff was complaining about other guests staying there. Called for more towels didn‚Äôt get them. Had to put our trash cans and dirty towels in the hallway outside our room because they won‚Äôt clean/Service the room until the 4th day. Didn‚Äôt put trash can liners in trash cans. There is no microwave in the room, there is a community one in the lounge. The pool is super small and had a TON of hair in it. The hot tub jets didn‚Äôt work/ very weak. I would never stay here again.

Summary Heading: Great hotel clean rooms friendly staff
Summary: The front desk was amazing and helpful. We arrived early and our room was not ready they gave me a place in a conference room to pump and store our bags so we could come back and check in later! Super friendly! The employees made the stay 100 percent worth it! It‚Äôs a little bit of a walk to the park so we choose to take an Uber each way it was super cheap only $7 or less each ride!

Summary Heading: Great employees and a nice hotel
Summary: Stayed at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim for a few days and the employees are Great. Specifically Jocelyn, who was a fantastic front desk agent,she made my stay amazing!! The hotel is also great and the rooms are super nice and modern,would definitely stay here again. Customer service is always a big deal for me so I wanted to leave a review more so on how great the service was and Thank Jocelyn on making my stay fantastic.

Summary Heading: Friendly staff but less recognition to elite members
Summary: I enjoyed my short stay. The breakfast was good but missing fresh berries and strawberries we use to see before COVID. there was less recognition than expected of elite Hyatt world members . The gem is under equipped and has a very bad smell and not ventilation

Hotel staff was very friendly. Breakfast was good with a variety of choices. The hotel was one mile from Disney(15-20 minute walk) right down harbor street. An uber would probably cost less than 10 bucks and might be worth it after a long day at Disney. There were restaurants on either side of the street with some pretty good options. We flew into John Wayne airport which was about 15-20 minutes away driving. The 2 queen room we got was very spacious and could hold 5 people since it came with a seperate couch. Overall we had a nice stay at the Hyatt.

Summary Heading: Kathy one of the best employees of this place
Summary: The attention of each person on the front desk in the lobby it was really good since we arrived but especially a girl her name was Kathy in The Breakfast the next day she was awesome she had a really really good attention with us and all people which she got a great attitude all the time

Summary Heading: Extremely rude staff, don‚Äôt expect them to clean your room or give you clean towels
Summary: Extremely rude staff, don‚Äôt expect them to clean your room or give you clean towels. Front desk staff act as though asking for help with additional towels/pillows/trash pick up is inconvenient for them. Parking is a nightmare and so EV charging stations are being used as regular parking spots. If you approach the staff about this they will tell you ‚Äúit‚Äôs not my problem‚Äù. Response from management is only offers for points for their internal ‚ÄúWorld of Hyatt‚Äù club. Would not recommend.

Was overcharged for parking and it took multiple calls to Hyatt and the property to get refunded.(still waiting)globalist status does not mean much to this property. The supervisor who I spoke with on the third try was offended at the way I was talking and hung up on me. The supervisor also refused to give me the managers details as they were not there at the time. If and when they respond to this email stating how much they care, rest assured they do not.

This hotel was literally the best stay we ever booked. The staff were so friendly and incredible to us. We went there for a concert nearby and they all immediately took interest and chatted with us about it. They also went above and beyond for us during our stay and was just fun overall. They upgraded our room with no extra charge seeing we accidentally booked a family room with kid beds. All the receptionists were fun to talk to and just made us feel welcomed and homey.

Front desk staff have a warm welcome for each person entering or returning. They were kind and helpful with the shuttle service to Disney - a great bonus for free! It‚Äôs a short 7-10 minute walk from the hotel with air conditioned comfortable buses - a great benefit after walking all day in Disney. You go through security there and get to bypass it at the park where lines are much longer. The free breakfast is simple and plentiful. Get there early if you want all choices - it gets busier the later you go and guests take extra to pack along for the day. Breakfast staff are attentive to cleanliness and serving guests. This hotel is very clean, rooms are large and comfortable, and staff are awesome! Guest services and front staff were extremely helpful when we lost travel documents

convenient and clean.  the parking is under the hotel and reachable from elevator the amenity is god, pool, fitness, etc.  excellent breakfast with great drinks, juices, coffees, toast, fruit, ham, potato bites, eggs, oats, etc

We chose this hotel for the proximity to the ACC and they offered comp breakfast. Great location, was very clean and staff was extremely helpful. Very quiet no hallway noise No microwave hence 4 stars.

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, decent breakfast, good rooms for this class
Summary: The staff was very friendly and helpful, as has been my experience with Hyatts. The room (2 queen) was decently sized, we managed to comfortably fit 5 adults using the pull-out sofa bed. Not a lot of frills other than a mini fridge, coffee machine, and USB-A ports, but the room felt modern enough and seemed appropriate for a category 3 property (Hyatt classifications go 1 through 9). It was quiet even though it was ground floor and had a window facing the parking lot. The hot bar breakfast had a decent selection of the usual stuff: eggs, sausage, hash browns, French toast, fruit, yogurt, oatmeal, cereal.  The hotel is about a mile from Disneyland, but it was only a $10 Lyft/Uber ride. Busses are theoretically available, but we waited around at the nearby convention center stop

We stay at 5th floor and the water pressure for shower is really bad. Hard to get a relax shower after the long walk at the Disneyland. Everything else was good and have very good service. The breakfast were delicious too.

Arrived at the hotel and check in was a breeze. The family suite with bunk beds was more spacious than a regular room. Definitely need the space with two teenagers. While I was at a conference, my family enjoyed the pool. This location is very close to the convention center.

After checking in at 11am and told our room was clean but still  needed to be approved by supervisor we came back 5 hours later. Lady at front desk at that time was very unfriendly and informed us our room was still not ready even though it was well past check on time. Also walked into a dirty room that we waited 5 hours to be checked by housekeeping supervisor.  We were very disappointed as we paid for a room that was not available well after check in time. .

I had a great staying at this hotel. everything was very clean and cozy and the pool was great. I would love to see some vegitarian and vegan options for breakfast, but other than that, I had a good time. I will be choosing this hotel for my future stays!

Excellent hotel, easy check-in and out, helpful staff. Enjoyed a room with divider. Chromecast available on both TVs. Breakfast included. Easy walk (0.3 miles) to Disneyland resort transit (free). Also Anaheim Resort Transit (ART) buses stop nearby and you can ride to other attractions for $6 all day!

Overall I had a great experience at Hyatt Place at Anaheim. The room was clean and comfortable, and the amenities were great. The staff are great and the breakfast was delicious! Would definitely recommend.

I was pleasantly surprised by my recent stay which was also my first stay. The hotel is small compared to the two conglomerates that are nearby. It is in a great location for walking to two great steakhouses and the convention center, I was there for a big conference and was surprised at how well appointed the accommodations were. The lobby is tiny in terms of where you check in, however, they have a pretty large space dedicated to eating. During my stay, I met with my team of 6 staff members and another group of over 20 met nearby. The space allowed us to spread out and neither of us were competing with the other. It is a long trek through the hallway to my room which was right across from the stairs. I opted to take the stairs down each time I left my room but when I got to

Summary Heading: Great Stay for an Academic Conference
Summary: I had the pleasure of staying at Hyatt Place last month while in Anaheim, CA, for an academic conference. The Hyatt Place staff were so welcoming and accommodating with the large group needs--we needed to store our luggage since we arrived prior to check-in, as well as at check-out as the conference extended after the check-out time, the front desk personnel did so without hesitation and a smile. The amenities are also a highlight, my group was able to spend time at the pool, use the gym, and partake in the complimentary breakfast for each day of our stay. Lastly, the location is centrally located to Disneyland, California Adventures, Downtown Disney, a variety of other eateries, and the Convention Center was only about a 5 minute walk.

Very near to the convention center and walkable to Disney. Great breakfast. The ice machine will be off during night which is very good.  Two bottles of water were given daily. The parking is underground and it is good to use it during summer.  As a member of Hyatt, I am very happy I have free nights.

Each hotel staff member was pleasant and aimed at meeting all of my needs. The room and entire hotel was very clean. Spacious rooms and aplenty of space to spread out. The breakfast variety was nice and had plenty of protein items to eat. This is vital for my diabetes. A quick walk to Disneyland or the shuttles to the park.

Summary Heading: Check Ahead If Using a Business Card
Summary: This was a conveniently located hotel that was in nice shape with spacious rooms.  The breakfast offered was great with hot and cold offerings.  The only hiccup was the policy of getting an approval for using a business card.  This policy was unclear and left my team using their own personal cards to cover the rooms.  Many were new teachers without the resources to put the room charges on their personal accounts.  It would be helpful if that policy were more obvious or more explicitly stated in the pre-arrival communication that they sent a couple of days before our stay.

I was delighted with my stay. I recently stayed at this hotel for the first time, and I was blown away by the level of service Rittney and Eduardo provided. They addressed all of my questions, making the check-in process a breeze. I was greeted with a warm welcome by Edward and Ritney. They went above and beyond to show me where to park during a crowded day and provided thorough personal recommendations around the Anaheim area. They both accommodated my necessities and the many guests checking in that day. I would highly recommend this hotel.

We reserved two nights two months prior to arrival. We are a world of Hyatt member. We arrived at 8pm to check in after a long day at Disneyland and were told that the hotel was overbooked and there was no room for us but "luckily" there was room at the hotel next door. They compensated us for one night at the hotel next door $250 (which was less than what our cost would be at the Hyatt - $325 including parking.) The next day we told the Hyatt we wanted to stay as planned at their hotel that night. They said they had a room for us, but we had to check out of the hotel we stayed in at 11:00am and were not able to check into the Hyatt until 3pm and so with three kids in tow we had to find things to do for four hours.

Summary Heading: Nice, comfortable place to stay in Anaheim!
Summary: Great place for individuals and families to stay in the Anaheim area. We were on a business trip and busy exploring the area to use most of the hotel amenities but the staff was kind and friendly! They were helpful with our few special requests.

2nd trip to Disney with family at Hyatt property in last several years.  Compared to Hyatt House down the block, this hotel is further walk, has inferior breakfast, and subpar pool.  Positives were clean room, bunk room (great for kids), and staff very friendly.

This hotel was okay a few years ago when my family and I stayed here during our Disneyland trip. This time around the staff was very unprofessional, uneducated on the hotel‚Äôs policies. The bathroom smelled horrible!! Like dirty sewer even after they came and cleaned it. Housekeeping even took my sons blanket and didn‚Äôt get it back until the date of our departure. At the same time I was complaining about the blanket another guest was complaining about a missing phone after their room was cleaned.

Nice hotel, across the street to the toy story shuttles. Not alot of food within walking distance, and nothing in the hotel for food after 9 am. Actually walked 15 min each way to the other Hyatt that had a blaze pizza.

The hotel staff was friendly and attentive to our needs. The check-in/out process was speedy quick despite the large groups arriving/leaving at similar times. The hotel was clean and the room was spacious and comfortable.

After a long day of fun, came to a nice and clean room ready to sleep. If we needed anything, the front desk made it happen. Even if we forgot something, they looked for it after checking out and kept it for when we returned.

We stayed here for a total of 4 days and 3 nights. The staff were truly kind and attentive. Michelle the front desk supervisor was so kind, professional and attentive to the needs of my family. She greeted us and went above and beyond to make our stay enjoyable.  I highly recommend this location. It had everything we needed to make our family vacation special. Thank you.

I want to thank you. It was a pleasant stay and hospitality and all the staff were very helpful The whole family was grateful for the food and the good treatment and I want to especially thank you Mr. Richard AGM, Melisa Jessica and Michelle Front Desk Supervisor.

Summary Heading: Clean Hotel with friendly staff in a safe location close to Disney.
Summary: We really enjoyed our stay. The front desk staff was extremely helpful and nice. Overall would stay here again and would recommend staying here. It‚Äôs a close walk to Disney in a safe location. The pool could area is ok with a small pool doesn‚Äôt really show in the pictures.

Summary Heading: Clean & next to shuttle at toy story parking lot.
Summary: Everything was great!!! Clean, close to a shuttle. What‚Äôs nice is that it‚Äôs in the Disneyland Toy story parking lot so you can get checked for security at that point before boarding the shuttle. Left off 1 star because cleaning service was not offered daily. They had a breakfast but we did not try it. Our room had a cool little couch area I liked. I would return. Great trip to Disneyland with my daughter .

Enjoyed the stay, property was nice with breakfast included. It is about a mile walking distance to the park. Toy Story parking lot is across the street. We used the free buses available there to get to the parks, still a good walk, but it cut the walk distance in half. I would stay again and it will be on the top of my list to book for future trips to Disneyland.

Loved this hyatt location and the hotel. The staff was great. Everyone was great. We will definitely be booking another stay. Our expectations were met beyond an explanation. This hotel is perfect for a nice getaway!!

Large Breakfast selection, wonderful staff, comfy beds, nicely sized rooms, 15 minute walk to Disney, lots of kids :) We took Uber from Hyatt Place to Disney guest drop off zone. This cost our family of 4 $6. + tip.  Super easy!

Summary Heading: Great hotel and great location but $$$ parking
Summary: The hotel and staff are excellent. It‚Äôs a great location, very convenient. The only marks against it are that the ‚Äúbreakfast included‚Äù is quite lackluster. The space is small, the food isn‚Äôt great, and it runs only until 9am. Yes it‚Äôs ‚Äúincluded‚Äù with your stay, but you pay for it in the price. And parking is expensive. After taxes and fees, it‚Äôs $32/ night.

Our room and the main areas were clean.  Check in and check out was a breeze.  The breakfast was well stocked and the room for breakfast was spacious.  It was walking distance to many things, including Disney Land.  Staff was friendly and helpful.

We stayed there for 3 nights, super convenient for my son volleyball tournament at the convention center, 5 minutes walking.  Close to everything, restaurants, Disney, etc. Everything was perfect, specially the staff!!

We‚Äôre very happy with the service received.  The staff was friendly and willing to assist us in finding places to visit around the area.  However the hotel not near beaches or other tourist sites but near Disneyland

The hotel was clean and the staff was very attentive and friendly.  Plenty of staff to help at the front desk and with housekeeping.  The free waters everyday were a nice added bonus.  The breakfast was average, but it was pretty much what you expect with a free breakfast.  Short walk to the convention center.

This was my second start at Hyatt Place in Anaheim. Both trips the staff were excellent and treated us like royalty. The rooms were clean and the breakfast was well above average. Michelle in particular, was super helpful in accommodating us. Another plus was the close location of the Disneyland Toy Story  shuttle lot right across the street.

We stayed here with our family.  They were very friendly and helpful. Food was great and it was never packed.  Walking distance to many places or of driving super close. The hotel was clean. But over all the staff was amazing.

My husband & I enjoyed our stay at Hyatt Place. The rooms were very clean & comfortable. The breakfast offered a good variety of selections, both hot & cold. The neighborhood is safe & convenient. We were able to walk to many stores & restaurants.  I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone traveling to Anaheim. The employees were all very helpful, friendly & courteous!

Great location, easy access via shuttle or walk to Disneyland & freeways, close to delicious food areas. Free breakfast and water bottles daily with free membership, lots of underground parking away from the heat, later check out at noon than other hotels, and you can leave the car there until midnight on day of check-out. The staff was EXCELLENT! The best service I've had in years from a hotel.

Location was great for Disneyland. Within walking distance. My only reason for not having a five star experience is how dirty the common areas were. Also, the doors to the rooms automatically slam shut and sound like a gun going off through out the night so it‚Äôs a terrible design.

The Hyatt Place Anaheim is a great location l for visiting Disneyland. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Rooms are spacious. Breakfast is pretty basic but filling. It‚Äôs a doable (1.2mile walk) to Disneyland entrance. You can also take the Toy Story parking lot shuttle and cut the walk by about half. The pool is small but refreshing. And the hot tub super relaxing. Highly recommend this hotel for Disney visits.

Great stay. The only drawback was the air conditioner vent was only in one room. So one room was frozen and the other hot. Located near Disneyland. Would stay here again. Limited parking even with the lower level. Luckily we were given valet parking free of charge.

We arrived for a late check in and were pleasantly surprised at such a nice hotel.  We enjoyed the suite, since we needed the third bed.  Great breakfast options included eggs, sausage, country potatoes, cereal, bagels, pastries, milk, juice and coffee.  We will return again!

Hotel was in a good location to shuttle to Disneyland.  Rooms were nice and daily breakfast was broad enough to satisfy everyone. Staff were friendly and check in was very quick.  Parking on site but extra charge.  I had two rooms and one car but got charged twice for parking, it was fixed after I called.

Summary Heading: Hyatt Place, at Anaheim Resort and Convention Center
Summary: The Placery self service restaurant staff was very friendly and so helpful. We ate breakfast there twice. Great food., especially loved the The French toast but the second day featured different items, and I asked the waitress, Katy Guarddo if she could get me some French toast for my girlfriend who was sleeping in. She got the manager, Karla Rios, who was so friendly and helpful and she found some French toast made me a nice plate covered in foil to keep it warm to bring back to my room.

We had an awesome experience at this hotel.  Staff was GREAT and the rooms where clean and comfortable!! They offer FREE BREAKFAST with some pretty good options that we got to enjoy during our stay.  We also enjoyed the underground parking that kept our car cool and secured!  The hotel is only two blocks from Disneyland so we did not have to move our car and the walk to and from the park was an easy one!

Summary Heading: Perfect for Disneyland visits and other nearby entertainment.
Summary: We found the hotel convenient and comfortable.  The cleanliness andwere like at home. The service was awesome. Close to restaurants Parking was easy andsecure. Wouldn't hesitate to book a room there again.

Great staff and AMAZING location. Very easy walk to the parks (about 20 minutes). Straight shot down! Had enough time to enjoy the free breakfast, grabbed a cup of coffee, and still got an excellent spot in line to rope drop!

Family accommodations are awesome here. The room we booked out a king size bed a pull out couch and twin bunkbeds. Plenty of space for our family. Also, the resort is very quiet and they provide breakfast in the morning. This is not just a continental breakfast, but eggs, HBDs, ham, sausage, bagels, cereal, pastries, toast. We will definitely stay here again!

The stay was amazing! The staff was great! The breakfast was very decent‚Ä¶ The valet parkers were extremely friendly and helpful the campus was clean and well-managed‚Ä¶ The night Staff was simply amazing

Staying at Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center was an easy and comfortable experience. From the welcome to the goodbye, the staff was friendly and helpful. The room had everything I needed during my stay. I was there 7 nights and had 2 room services after the 3rd & 6th nights. I was at a convention at the Anaheim Convention center and its convenience is immeasurable. Hot breakfast each day helped fill me up ready for the start of the day. Definitely would stay at this hotel again.

The real measure of service is how a hotel reacts when something goes wrong. It was a jam packed weekend, every hotel was overflowing, and my son was struggling with a bad cold. Michelle R took pity on us and despite the situation extended our check out a couple of additional hours so he could rest before heading out to our flight.  Separately that day my husband, who was in the lobby by himself. was sad he missed coffee service, and Michelle made him an Americano on the house!  It‚Äôs service like this that makes us as loyal to Hyatt as we are. Give the lady a raise.

The staff at Hyatt Place are exceptional & made our stay. We had previously stayed at another Hyatt property but this one is superior and with the extra 6 min walk. Breakfast is above what you‚Äôd expect (my only complain is that the eggs are standard big batch scramble & texture isn‚Äôt quite right). The pool is secluded and we were always the only ones there. Rooms are well maintained & nicely equipped - fridge held a full size milk and food for lunch & dinner for 3 days stay. Will happily stay here again for our next trip in the fall!

People watch you're credit card statement. I was almost charged double for my stay. I had payed in full my stay at the hotel thru my job program for a lil savings. When I checked in they charged me for may stay again. When I checked out the charged me again now I am just watching out for my credit card statement.

Great place overall with clean rooms and a great staff! The only thing I would complain about is the water pressure! It‚Äôs was truly awful and could barely take a shower in it! But other than that it was a wonderful stay!

Nice hotel for a family of 5 or 6, close by Disneyland with free shuttle a few blocks away. Also visited several restaurants around Orange County.  Huntington Beach with it long pier was enjoyable to see people riding their surfboard and fishing.

Overall 5 stars.  Decent breakfast. Clean rooms. And great service. Jennifer at the front desk really went above and beyond. There was some issues at the bar and she was able to resolve the issue quickly and did in such a way all parties were happy. Thanks

Everyone was great and so helpful! Rittney, Eduardo, Reina and Rae were so helpful! The hotel is a short walk from Disneyland and the convention center which is super convenient. Overall, it was a great stay and I will be using the Hyatt Place in Anaheim for future stays when traveling to the Anaheim Resort area!

Clean, quiet, family friendly and super convenient to Disney parks. Very nice front desk welcoming! Loved our stay would recommend for all travel types. Walk or bus to Disney. Complimentary water and reasonable parking fee of 28$ convenient late night pickup from parking.

Hotel: I checked into this hotel at 1am and had such a great experience with Jan at the front desk. Even though it was late, they were incredibly helpful, detailed and kind and I couldn‚Äôt be more grateful! I also got upgraded because I am a Hyatt Discoverist member and the room was amazing! This hotel also serves breakfast in the morning. I didn‚Äôt eat it but they had the standard scrambled eggs, sausages, assortments of breads, cereals and etc.   Disneyland: I found that it was very convenient that the hotel was a 5-8 minute walk from Disneyland‚Äôs Toy Story Parking lot.
