This was our 10 month old‚Äôs first trip to California and we were initially a bit anxious. I want to thank the staff of this Hyatt Place for their extra efforts to make our stay comfortable. Richard Rosales and Allen Andrade were absolutely fantastic and incredibly accommodating. I hope that they receive this ‚Äúthank you‚Äù from a family on their very first vacation!

This place was amazing in cleanliness, hospitality, and friendliness of the staff. The only reason for the 4 instead of 5 star rating is because the walls are thin and I could hear the upstairs habitants stomping and running around all night, which kept me up for a while. Loved the family suite, and the kids wanted to stay longer.

Summary Heading: Excellent and very clean . I will stay the next time
Summary: I will review to my friends. I think  i come back in the next time and stay longer. Thank you!! The staffs are very nice and enthusiastic. The room is very clean. I love it. But about the breakfast i think the menu is different is better than

Perfect location for our visit to Disneyland. The staff were wonderful and I was thankful that they were able to put our two rooms next to each other since we booked separately. After a long day at the park, it was nice to come back to a quiet, clean, spacious hotel room.

Masks required in hotel lobby area, check in and check out was smooth. It Very nice and clean! Loved the family suite! To go breakfast bags were convenient. Each bag had a juice, muffin, fruit and yogurt. Coffee also available. Water pressure in the shower was strong and beds were comfortable.

Joey was a wonderful host.   He answered all of my questions when I phoned the hotel 4 times in one day and remembered my name when we checked in for our stay.  He is a wonderful ambassador for the hotel.   My congratulations on a super employee.  Judy Harris

It was a very busy weekend. There was not enough parking and people were told to park in the disabled spots and any free curbside. It seems like the hotel was running at full capacity. Breakfast was very lackluster. You got an Apple, muffin, juice and yogurt in a little to go bag. No hot breakfast items. Me and multiple family members staying in other rooms expressed concerns about bug bites.    There was a serious incident one morning where a car double parked behind me and I was stuck for over an hour and half. It wasn‚Äôt until about an hour into waiting that the manager got involved and finally agreed to call a tow truck. Luckily the other person finally moved their car but it was such a huge waste of time.

Summary Heading: Very clean rooms and excellent front desk service
Summary: The stay was very pleasant. The room was very clean and the front desk staff, specifically the gentlemen that checked me in, (I think his name was Joey but I could be wrong) was very polite and accommodating. Their breakfast was hassle free, you just go down and pick up a pre-made bag. Check out was smooth. Overall a great experience.

A warm welcome, super clean hotel and truly accommodating staff day and night. Convenient location and parking for our Disneyland trip. I was surprised for a place that has a lot of traffic that it was so well maintained and well staffed. I will stay there again 100%.

My whole family stayed the night before Disneyland and the beds were very hard not comfortable the breakfast was a joke two hard boiled eggs and a packaged bagel with some coffee we just stayed at another place that was half the price and they served hot breakfast and a wide variety of other things for the kids this place could‚Äôve done a lot better

Little less than a mile walk to park. Once Toy Story lot opens, you can cross the street and catch the tram.   We loved it. Very friendly staff. Great place. Would definitely stay here again had three kids ages 13, 9, and 6.

We stayed for two nights because we were going to Adventure City. It‚Äôs in a great location. It‚Äôs literally minutes from Disney, Knott‚Äôs and Adventure City theme parks. There‚Äôs a lot of places to eat nearby. Staff and room were absolutely awesome! Our kids loved the family suite. It felt like a home away from home. We will definitely be staying again!

I definitely recommend this place.  Super close to Disneyland and California Adventures.  They suggested a private driver for an affordable price which made traveling to and from the parks easy and stress free.  I would just say that they need to fix the hot water.

Amazing customer service, felt safe and appreciated with the staff. Hotel followed CDC guidelines and the room was clean and spacious. Special thanks to the operations and front desk team of Richard, Brania, Tatyana, Brittany, Jessica and Alan. Will definitely stay at the hotel again for future visits in the area.

The staff were caring and thoughtful of our special occasion and went the extra mile for us! The property is in great condition and in a good location. The breakfast was grab and go, but delicious. We absolutely love Hyatt!

The staff here went above and beyond during our stay. They helped make our trip to Disneyland so special and memorable for our three kids. Every request of ours was met easily and wonderful attitude. We cannot say enough positive things about our stay and hotel staff. All the hotel staff during our stay were amazing, we remember the names Joey, Tatiana, and Allen we can‚Äôt remember the rest but again everyone was great! We will definitely be staying here again and recommending to family and friends!

Exceptionally clean. Very quiet. Staff is extremely friendly nice and courteous. Very spacious room. Loved the set up and the view.  I only wish the bed was bigger and fluffier but over all it was a great restful stay. Will definitely  stay here again. Last thing, it‚Äôs $22.00/night for parking. At least it‚Äôs safe.

We love this hotel for our stay at Disneyland. Perfect for families.  It's clean and new and has bunkbeds that my kids love. There are also sliding doors that divide the king bed from the kids room. We will for sure stay again.

We got the family room with a King size bed and separate room. The separate room had a couch. TV, desk and bunk beds. The First room had the bathroom, tv, closet space and another are that had closet space by the bathroom. There was also drawer space with the cabinets under the tv. There is a mini fridge and a coffee/tea maker. Clean atmosphere. And Covid guidelines in place. We enjoyed our one night at the facility

I came as a family of 7 to this hotel and it was great! We asked for 2 rooms and we got them conjoined(even better) the room was clean and they are doing good things with COVID! Masks at all times!(except in your rooms) the staff were incredibly nice amd helpful, the pool was open to a limit of 30 people at a time and they provided us with pool towels, all you have to do is ask! They also serve breakfast but it‚Äôs not a hot breakfast. It includes one muffin, one fruit, a chocolate granola bar, and apple juice. Let me just say, it was pretty good considering it‚Äôs a cold breakfast! 10/10 will come again. Also the couch that are in the 2 queen beds pulls out to a bed!

Summary Heading: Free breakfast and close to Disneyland
Summary: There were 3 main reasons why I chose to stay at Hyatt Place Anaheim: location, room amenities and breakfast.  The hotel is located across the street from the Toy Story parking lot, which provides a free shuttle to the main entrance of Disneyland.  The rooms are spacious and have the same modern look and feel that you can expect from almost every Hyatt Place hotel.  The breakfast changes slightly each day, and provides a number of hot breakfast items as well as fresh fruit and juice, and best of all it‚Äôs free!

I checked out of another hotel nearby because it was not clean. I was lucky to be able to get a room here for my family and I and I was so thankful because it was kept up well and clean, plus the bed was comfy.  The breakfast was good too!

Summary Heading: Pleasant enough stay for Disneyland holiday but terrible soundproofing...
Summary: Our family of 4 with 2 adults and 2 kids (aged 11 and 5) stayed in a King Family room at the hotel for 4 nights for a Disneyland stay.  Think the price worked out around $290 a night plus taxes etc. so definitely not a budget price.  We chose the hotel especially for the set up of the family room which had a separate kids bedroom area with bunk beds separated by a sliding screen for the adult sleeping area.  It is about a 15 minute walk to Disneyland so a very convenient location.    The room was fine and clean and the room set up worked well apart from the fact that the kids had to walk through our sleeping area to get to the bathroom and that all the A/C units were in their section which could be a problem in summer!  The main issue with the room was the lack of soundproofing

The hotel and rooms were very clean. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The hotel has an exceptional good hot breakfast. There was a huge selection and was maintained by several staff, so the area was kept clean and well stocked. We stayed here during our visit to Disneyland. It is a not the closest hotel to the park, but is manageable. Probably wouldn‚Äôt book it if I had little kids and wanted to walk back and forth from the park several times during the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving feedback for us, Zlatkus! We are very glad to see everyone had a good time during your stay! Excellent point! I wanted to mention that we are also lucky enough to be very close to the Toy Story shuttle parking lot, where Disney provides a complimentary shuttle for guests! That might be something worth checking out on your next visit! Thank you again, Zlatkus, we hope you will consider us again in the future!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel with our child for a 4-day vacation to Disneyland. It was a safe, walkable distance to Disney, which was nice. The size of our room was great - 2 queen size beds and a sectional sofa. My only issue was the pool (really cold) and hot tub (dirty and not nearly not enough). But other than that it was excellent. Very good service.
Manager Response: We would like to extend our gratitude to you for staying with us and providing us feedback. We hope that everyone was able to enjoy their experience with us. Additionally, thank you for pointing out any issues you found during your stay because this will help us to improve! Thank you for always helping us stay at our best, amymiller2!

Summary: My family enjoys this hotel very much. It's very close to the parks where you can either walk (about 2 1/2 long blocks), or jump on the Disney tram from the Toy Story parking lot across the street.  They do have a "bar" in the lobby, which I didn't experience myself, but did see groups of people enjoying it.  They also serve hot food throughout the day, but didn't get to experience that as well since we were out most of our stay.  Breakfast is great. They offer the typical hot food items, such as eggs, potatoes, sausage and waffles, which I think varies slightly daily. Nothing spectacular, but still enjoyable and tasty.  The pool area is a bit small, but was great for my young kids since it's more on the shallow side.  The jacuzzi was very relaxing, especially after 2 full days
Manager Response: Thank you so much for providing us feedback and for sharing your experience and tips for us and our potential guests, Go657752! We are very happy to see you were able to join us for our enhanced breakfast each morning and even take advantage of our jacuzzi! We know those walks at Disney are no joke! We look forward to getting to know everyone in your family so that we can provide an even better stay!

Summary Heading: Walk to Disneyland after a hearty breakfast
Summary: Have stayed here many times with family and friends, staff are friendly and courteous, very good free breakfast spread and a good night's sleep in nice rooms, all with a daybed sleeper sofa for an extra person.  Easy walk to the park or use the shuttle buses from the Disneyland parking lot across the street.  Join World of Hyatt and book directly for the best price and the free breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us feedback for your most recent stay, davidburnham2020. We are so appreciative of the kind words you have left here for our team and the service we provide. We, sincerely, hope to be able to accommodate you again really soon!

Summary: Clean room & friendly staff. Overall a great experience! Came here for Disneyland trip & requested late checkout without an issue which was at 1pm! Most hotel checkouts are at 11am usually but Hyatt check out is later.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to accommodate you during your stay in Anaheim! We know how important it is to our guests to soak up every moment of Disney while here, so we hope that complimentary late check out allowed you to do just that. Please think of us again, JOhnthanh, for your next visit and feel free to always ask if late check out is available!

Summary: We really liked this hotel and will likely stay here again.  The check-in was very pleasant.  The blankets in the room were very thin so we had to request more, however they quickly brought more up to our room.  Breakfast was hot, fresh, organized and delicious.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us, IreneCeee. I, sincerely, hope that our team was able to provide a memorable stay for your family! We look forward to your next visit to our area!

Summary Heading: Excellent at some points subpar in others.
Summary: As a Hyatt Rewards member we all Enjoyed the excellent breakfast and service received while there! We did an early pre/check in which was good. At this time I requested early check in. It was noted. At some point another young lady took over the assignment process and changed our booking to another room with out asking us for approval first.  This was not appreciated.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your loyatly to Hyatt, nenap76! Your Hyatt membership is greatly appreciated! We are happy to hear we were able to pre-register you early for the next available room. I am sorry that we did not confirm the room switch with you prior to making the change, we definitely should have confirmed this with you and your party! We hope you will consider us again in the future so that we can provide you with an exceptional experience!

Summary: We chose this hotel because if the value and proximity to the Disneyland resort. The family rooms a great and the walk to the parks is only about 15-20min. Staff here are outstanding and would highly recommend this place for anyone staying in the LA area.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us a review for your most recent stay! We hope everyone was able to enjoy breakfast each morning- we know how hectic Disney can get! We hope to provide you and your family with another exceptional stay soon!

Summary: Very Good... keep up the good work... the friendly atmosphere is commendable and the location is just right, not too close or far from the significant places of interests. There were a lot of healthy choices at breakfast. Kudos...
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write such kind feedback, reyes924. One of the best things about hospitality is hearing back from our guests about their experience with us. We hope you will consider us again in the future!

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at the Hyatt place new Disneyland.  We were able to check-in a little early at 1:30pm, which is very helpful when you have kids.  Also when we requested to change rooms they were very accommodating and quick.  We took the shuttle the first day from the Disney parking lot across the street.  But my kids were stressing me out walking across the busy street and in the parking lot.  So we ubered the next day and it was very cheap $9 for the bigger uber as we are part of 5. The hotel also put us and our friends on the same floor.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us, tmxkey!  We are so happy to hear we were able to meet your needs to provide an exceptional experience. We hope you and your family enjoyed your time with us and think of us again in the future!

Summary Heading: A little farther but an easy walk to Disneyland
Summary: I came with family visiting and we were debating cost versus proximity to the park entrance especially with the current rise of the resistance virtual queue challenge. Considering the walk is another 2 blocks compared to Hyatt House- Hyatt place was worth it. The walk is a straight path, about 15-20mins. The breakfast and service were wonderful and everything we needed. Overall, wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Well, Krizelda, we hope you were able to enjoy our enhanced breakfast each morning despite the demands for the new attraction at Disneyland! It is such a nice walk to the park in the morning with family, we hope you enjoyed your time with us! We look forward to the opportunity to accommodate you and your family again!

Summary: Great hotel with large clean rooms. Staff was friendly and helpful. Breakfast was tasty with lots of options including: eggs, meat, potatoes, toast, cereal and Starbucks coffee. About a 15 minute walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to review your most recent stay with us, craighoward4. We are so happy to hear you were able to join us for breakfast- we know a lot of our guests have been heading to the park early for a chance at the new attraction. We hope you will consider us again when visiting our area!

Summary: Wonderful Experience and Helpful Staff!  Our family usually stays at another hotel when are in town but ended up booking a room here because our usual place was fully booked over President's Day weekend and week.   We were not disappointed. The lobby was clean and modern and upon check in we were given two complimentary bottles of water. Our 5th floor room was also very nice and clean with a great view.  The next day we were all set to go to Disneyland and happened to talk to Ken at the front desk, who was a goldmine of information having had worked at Disneyland. He gave us so many useful tips we ended up saving a lot of time at the park and seeing things we would have otherwise never known about. We felt so lucky having a Disney cast member in the house! He was also a great
Manager Response: We would like to sincerely thank you for sharing your experience with us, teenabelina. I am so pleased to hear that Ken and the rest of our team was able to create such a memorable experience for you and your family! I would encourage checking out the World of Hyatt Rewards program, as well, in order to collect points for your room nights, if you have not already enrolled. We look forward to getting to know everyone in your party even more so in the future! Welcome to the Hyatt family!

Summary Heading: Not as good as it used to be in the past...
Summary: We used to spend at least two nights a month at this hotel, but this last visit was a very disappointing one. We requested the - KING FAMILY ROOM in order to have two sleep areas but the doors didn't work properly in fact they were falling down (maintenance helped us the best they could).  The room conditions were really poor (not the great condition we are used to have in this hotel). King size mattress was not comfortable at all, it was a very old mattress no the usual ones in this hotel. The shower was running or really hot water or really cold water (we reported to the front office but they did not do anything at all).
Manager Response: I want to thank you for letting us know about the issues that occurred during your most recent stay, Fearless67952259612. I hope that your past experiences with us have shown you that this is by no means the norm. We cannot apologize enough for this regrettable experience you had with us. Your loyalty is very much valued, we hope to see you again in the future so that we can make your next stay a memorable one!

Summary: Excellent customer service. Rooms were extremely clean. Breakfast was amazing. My husband and I were tired from a long day at Disney and were able to enjoy the soothing atmosphere of the pool area. We sat in the hot tub and enjoyed relaxing. My family and I enjoyed our stay and will definitely come back.
Manager Response: We say it often when responding to reviews, but it is so true- one of our favorite things about hospitality is being able to create those memorable experiences with our guests, then hear how our guests felt we performed afterward. So thank you again for sharing your experience, we hope to be able to exceed your expectations in the very near future!

Summary: The customer service stands out here. You are always acknowledged. They are also very quick with needs. We ordered towels and got them right away! I requested early check in and received an answer very promptly.
Manager Response: jlynn20202020, our team would like to sincerely thank you for recognizing our team's dedication to our guests. We hope to be able to provide another exceptional stay for you and your family in the future!

Summary: We had a lovely stay at this hotel while visiting Disney.  The rooms were lovely, the breakfast was fantastic, nice little pool.  Only complaint about the rooms was the doors to the rooms closed way too fast and way too hard!  Thankfully no fingers were broken!  We utilized the free Disney shuttle from the Toy Story parking lot which is about 10 minutes of walking.  We also walked to Disney which took about 20 minutes.  We enjoyed our stay but would stay closer to Disney for the convenience next time.  We missed being able to pop out of the resort to change wet clothes or have an easy break during the day.  If cost is a factor then this hotel was a very affordable option.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback and experience with us, BonniethequeenB, it is greatly appreciated. We will be able to make room improvements based on your review. We are glad to hear you were able to enjoy both the walk to and shuttle to the Disney parks! We look forward to accommodating you and your family again in the future!

Summary: I was fortunate in staying at the Anaheim Hyatt Place/Resort Convention Center.  I was there on business and everything met and even exceeded my expectations.  Friendly Staff and pleasing atmosphere.  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us detailed feedback regarding your stay, Katee414. We hope you were able to take advantage of the shortcut that is available to the convention center from our hotel! We look forward to being able to provide you with another exceptional stay very soon!

Summary: About a 20 minute walk to Disney but loved staying here! The rooms were much cleaner then the Red Lion (where we were originally supposed to stay and left). I recommend Hyatt, Marriott or similar. The customer service is great. Breakfast is standard hotel buffet but nice. Dinners were okay for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us, Jrae888888888, your feedback is important to us. We are glad to see you were able to take advantage of how close we are to the Disney parks during your stay! We hope to be able to provide you with great customer service, our enhanced breakfast, and directions to the shuttle Disney provides nearby!

Summary: This is a great place to stay when going to disneyland. We always enjoy the breakfast and we either walk to the park (~15 min walk) or go across the street to the Disney Parking lot and take the shuttle from there. Staff is very nice and our room is always clean.
Manager Response: It is so great to hear you were able to take advantage of our enhanced breakfast, and enjoy the walk or shuttle ride to the Disney parks throughout your stay with us. Our team hopes to be able to provide you with another exceptional stay!

Summary: Good location for Disney land and the convention center. The rooms were quiet but the only downside is the air conditioning system.  I would prefer to be able to open up the windows.  I shut it off for my whole stay and was very comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback, davidthomas2020. Your feedback will help us to improve our amenities and services. We are very happy to hear you were able to take full advantage of how close we are to the Anaheim Convention Center and Disney parks. We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: I stayed here with my family and it was wonderful! We had a couple rooms for myself the kids and grandkids. It was a little bit of a hassle getting checked in, the receptionist was bland and looked bored not my favorite.  We stayed four nights and I have to say the breakfast is divine! Become a world of Hyatt member it‚Äôs worth it and I did not have to pay a thing!  But the best thing this hotel has to offer was the front desk worker Julian. She‚Äôs the sweetest little thing in the world. She made my husband some coffee with a touch of cinnamon as we like it  and we also ordered a cheesecake from her and she drizzled caramel sauce all over it and topped it off with whipped cream and a handful of strawberries and blueberries.  It was so good we ordered it again but from another lady
Manager Response: Thank you, Roseann-mc, for your detailed feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We are very happy to see that Julian was able to help create a memorable experience for you and your husband. We will have to let her know what an exceptional interaction she was able to create for you both. And we love to hear that our guests were able to take part in our regionally enhanced breakfast with their World of Hyatt membership! We hope to be able to accommodate you both again very soon!

Summary: Very clean room and facility with kind compassionate staff! Everyone I encountered, from the front desk employees, housekeeping staff and the bussers at the breakfast welcomed me and my family.  The morning breakfast was great. I would definitely stay here again. Just a short distance away from Disneyland as well.
Manager Response: Thank you, huffkla, for your review and recognition of our team's dedication to delivering exceptional stays to each and every guest; time and time again. We are glad to hear you were able to enjoy our regionally enhanced breakfast! We hope you will come back soon!

Summary: Wonder hotel experience with a super fast check in, had no reservations so it made it an even better time, room was spotless and extremely spacious, super quick access to Disneyland and the underground parking is a nice thing to have. Will definitely come back next time.
Manager Response: Our team would like to thank you for leaving a review for us. It puts a smile on our face to see that our guests were able to take advantage of the location of our hotel in relation to Disneyland and their complimentary shuttle. We hope you will return soon to experience the breakfast we offer for World of Hyatt members!

Summary: Officially my favorite hotel in Anaheim. Clean, really friendly staff, they even remember your name when you walk in for breakfast in the am... I've got over 30 years of attending the NAMM show and this is my home when I'm there!
Manager Response: willy370, it was an honor to be able to accommodate you during the 2020 NAMM show. Thank you for always greeting everyone with a smile and being so kind throughout your stay. We sincerely hope to see you again for NAMM or even a trip to Disneyland!

Summary: This hotel is so accommodating and clean. Breakfast was delicious and the nearby shuttle (free) was great. This hotel and staff made our Disney vacation that much better. I‚Äôd highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review, ckflower36. it is great to hear you were able to take advantage of our enhanced breakfast and the Disney shuttle that is so conveniently located nearby us! We hope to be able to accommodate you and your family in the future!

Summary Heading: Convenient, Clean, High Quality Service, Great bed!
Summary: I attended a three day convention and needed a quiet, good bed to retreat to and got it Hyatt Place. Nice breakfast options too and helpful staff. I'll go back here next year again- been here three times.
Manager Response: Our team would like to sincerely thank you for always returning to stay with us! We are very happy to hear we have been able to provide you with an exceptional stay time and time again. We look forward to seeing you again, pbutler2020!

Summary: Staff was very pleasant to deal with and helpful. Check in and out was quick and painless. Room was clean and spacious and location was perfect for us. We love staying at Hyatt place everywhere we travel but the staff at this particular location was exceptional!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your loyalty to Hyatt, Jet43084. We are truly grateful and honored to be your choice of hotel whenever traveling. We hope to be able to accommodate you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Had to find a place for a whole volleyball team plus parents and family.
Summary: For my 30th year I have taken girls club volleyball teams to the American sports center and other college locations near Anaheim. The last few times we‚Äôve stayed at the newer Hyatt place in Anaheim on Harbor Boulevard. Our parents have been there a couple times and enjoy the family type atmosphere.  They have a small bar downstairs both for coffees lattes food and drinks. And a great breakfast in the morning which all the players and families were able to eat a little early in order to make it to the tournament. The staff was incredible taking care of all our needs getting the food out as soon as they could and I must say the food was very good. We will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you so much, Jack R, for always considering us for your stay when visiting the venues nearby and taking the time to leave us feedback. One of the most rewarding things for our team is seeing familiar faces and having the chance to create another memorable experience for our returning guests. We hope for the chance to accommodate you and your family in the near future!

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at Hyatt Place Anaheim.  The rooms were clean, spacious, and well organized.  The was complimentary coffee and tea every morning and for members complimentary breakfast.  The breakfast had a great variety of items from scrambled eggs and delicious bacon to hot and cold cereal.  They replenish the items consistently with fresh.  It was a great start to our day.  Everyone was customer focus with a ‚Äúyes‚Äù every time I made a request.  We have to give a special thank you to Ken at the front desk.  He greeted us with a warm good morning and asked it he could help in any way.  We asked him about our day at Disney and asked if we could see everything in one day.  He took a lot of time and with us asked us some questions about what we like and don‚Äôt care for.  He
Manager Response: We want to thank you for leaving us such kind and detailed feedback, Sue and David. One of our absolute favorite things about Hospitality is having the opportunity to receive detailed feedback that lets us know how our valued guests felt about their stay with us. We will definitely let Ken and John know what an exceptional job they did creating a memorable experience for you and your family! Thank you again, Sue and David, we hope to be able to accommodate you again in the future!

Summary: A great Hotel if you have any business at the Convention Center. It's a bit of a walk to Disneyland but it's doable. Very nice staff. Room was clean. Had a refrigerator. No safe. Used the fitness room, excellent machines: towels, water and headphones are supplied. I did not use the outside pool or spa but it's available. Breakfast is superior. Hot and cold items for you to choose. Expresso is available (24 hours) as well as some pastries but at an additional fee.Nice menu for lunch/dinner/late-night, wine and beer are available too, I plan to return.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and leaving us feedback, MacnQ. We are very happy to see you were able to enjoy our amenities such as breakfast and the fitness center. We look forward to accommodating you in the near future, MacnQ. Thank you again for your loyalty to Hyatt!

Summary Heading: A Great Stay and Experience at Hyatt Place At Anaheim Resort/Convention Center
Summary: A wonderful experience at the Anaheim Hyatt Place.  Warm, welcoming staff that went out of their way to make my staff a fantastic experience.  This was a business trip and the location of the hotel was more than walkable and convenient the the Anaheim Convention center .... plus the facilities were as good as they get!.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us, bkolstein. It is always so rewarding for us to hear back from our guests about their experiences with our team and the complimentary amenities we have to offer here at Hyatt Place. Moreover, it is always nice to see a smile on our convention center bound guests when we show them the shortcut to get there! We hope you will consider us for your next visit to the convention center!

Summary: Very close to Disneyland, about 1-2 blocks from their tram .Very clean, spacious room , hot water! I mentioned to the check in staff it was my birthday. After coming back from Disneyland there was a surprise treat for me and my hubby. Cookies, brownie, blueberries and strawberries along with a card and some balloons, This was a nice treat for me. The buffet was pretty good, eggs, bacon, a sausage dish, fresh fruit, and cereal.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, Diana D, and taking the time to leave us a review. We hope you had a great birthday! Thank you for spending the time with us! One of our favorite things about hospitality is, of course, being able to accommodate our guests and their families, but also to hear about their experience with us after their stay. So our team would like to thank you again for sharing your experience. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Exceeded my expectations in every respect.  If you need anything talk to Joey at the front desk... he's awesome!  The space is fantastic and the location if perfect for Disney.  The breakfast is a step up from the usual hotel breakfast.
Manager Response: Well, DonHigdon, it was a pleasure to accommodate you and your lovely family during your visit to Disneyland. We will definitely let Joey know how highly you thought of his service, thank you! We hope you will come stay with us soon, DonHigdon, it is always nice to see familiar faces!

Summary: I stayed at this hotel in early January when my eight year old daughter and I came for a 3 day Disneyland visit. We ended up having a really good time at Disneyland and the adjacent Downtown Disney, in no small part because we could afford to stay for a while at this very comfortable, convenient and nicely-priced hotel.  Price:  I'd call this a mid-range hotel, in between the expensive on-park resorts and budget motels. I think the Hyatt Place was exceptional for this category. The price was on the lower end, measured against comparable hotels.  Location:  On foot, it's a 20 minute walk from the hotel to the front gate, about a mile according to Google maps.  If you prefer a shuttle, one of the Disney parking lots is just across the street, and you can take the shuttle bus from
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed feedback, nadirkiyanclar. We are glad to hear you were able to take advantage of how close to Disneyland our hotel is and join us for our breakfast. We hope to be able to accommodate you and your family again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Great Stay! Convenient to Convention Center & Disney Shuttle Parking
Summary: Overall our stay was great. Our room was large, beds were comfortable. Front desk personnel were very helpful and acknowledged me as a Hyatt Rewards member. Location is great, walking distance to the Convention Center and right across the street from the Disney Shuttle. Only complaint I would add is we were a bit disappointed in the breakfast selections. Have stayed at Hyatt Place locations with a better selection. They do not offer complimentary coffee or tea in the reception area past breakfast as well. Last of all, parking at the hotel is expensive and they have limited number of parking spaces. Not sure what you would do if they were all gone. We pulled in one evening and literally took the last space.
Manager Response: Good morning Robyn J, thank you so much for recognizing our team's dedication to delivering outstanding service to each and every guest. We appreciate your detailed feedback regarding your stay, the information provided will help us to better accommodate guests in the future. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great place to be with your family or business...
Summary: I really enjoyed my time at this hotel. It has a great environment and the amenities are excellent. It‚Äôs nice and clean and it‚Äôs very close to the Convention Center and restaurants. I have been to other hotels around but I really recommend this hotel. I‚Äôm not sure about parking garage facilities because I didn‚Äôt drive over there so I cannot give my opinion about it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience with us during your stay. We are so happy to hear you had a great stay and hope that you consider Hyatt Place again when visiting the area.

Summary: Well done everyone on staff!  friendly and helpful!  great place to stay for family events and business at the Convention Center and I imagine Disney visitors love it too.  I have no hesitation recommending this hotel as your place to stay in heart of Anaheim.  Close to so many restaurants and amenities.
Manager Response: Thank you, Michael Z, for recognizing our team's commitment to delivering exceptional service here at Hyatt Place. We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: NOT A GOOD HOTEL FOR DISNEY
Summary: This hotel is not a real Hyatt. It has NO GROUND TRANSPORTATION AT ALL TO DISNEYLAND OR ANY NEARBY POINTS OF INTEREST. If you ask for transportation anywhere they will get out a map and show you how to walk. In addition, I wanted to pay up front in cash for the room and just put the damage deposit on my my card. They would not accept cash!  We stayed 4 nights at over $300 a night. The room was clean and spacious. But the staff was way less then helpful. I could not even get ground transportation to a car rental .5 miles away to pick up our car on our last day. Showed me how to walk on a map. I‚Äôve been visiting Disney with my family for 33 years once a year. This hotel was the biggest disappointment I‚Äôve had in all that time. So my advice based on years of experience is avoid
Manager Response: Tcollins1960, we want to thank you for taking the time to leave detailed, honest feedback regarding your stay as this is very important in our efforts to improve. Communication is a top priority for us and it definitely looks like you have found an instance where we could learn and improve from. We hope that you will consider us again in the future so that we can show you what we are really all about here at Hyatt Place.

Summary: The stay and amenities were great. There was a heated pool and hot tub. The hotel was very clean and the staff was so helpful. The Continental breakfast was great and had a lot of variety. The room was cleaned everyday and the towels were restocked. It was also very close to Disneyland and if you took a cab to the park, the fair was very low.
Manager Response: Well, we would like to thank you, mishav422, for staying with us and providing feedback on your stay. It is always great to hear back from our guests about what they loved about their stay. We hope to see you again very soon!

Summary Heading: Another really good stay at ths great hotel
Summary: Just back from another good week at the Hyatt Place and I can't recommend it enough.  It's conveneiently located a couple of blocks from Disneyland - 15 minutes walk.  The staff are great, the complimentary breakfast is first rate and the rooms are clean and spacious.  It's the third time we have stayed here.  Please ignore the previous review, it's nonsense.  Let me take each bit of the review piece by piece. "Noise all hours of the night."  No no no!  Just not true. "Free breakfast means craziness with no rules to anything."  Well that's people for you.  Sometimes they are horrible.  We were there and had no problems.   "Garbage thrown at the elevators from people‚Äôs fast food meals. Loud trashed people coming back from Disney."  Nonsense - but het yes people are awful. "The
Manager Response: AntandNeil, thank you so much for always choosing Hyatt Place when visiting the area. One of the best things about hospitality for us is the opportunity to create memorable experiences for our valued guests time and time again. And it gets even better when we get to hear about it in our guest reviews, so thank you! We hope you are able to come back soon!

Summary: This place is terrible having almost exclusively stayed at many Hyatt properties over the past two years. I used points for this place and well I guess given the location most come here to go to Disneyland. There is no other way to describe this place other than a place where guests who have no respect or courtesy for others.   Noise all hours of the night. Free breakfast means craziness with no rules to anything. People stealing your chair right from under you. Women who think they literally can throw a piece of bread over your shoulder to toast their bread because they don‚Äôt want to wait their turn. Grabbing plates in between your legs as you get food at the counter. Leaving dirty plates on the tables. Kids running around unsupervised. It‚Äôs chaos at breakfast.  Garbage thrown
Manager Response: Thank you for investing time into leaving us feedback for your stay. We want to thank you for letting us know about the issues that occurred during your stay with us. Please know that this is by no means the norm and I cannot apologize enough for the inconvenience. We want to thank you for staying with us, WinGlobal88, we hope to be able to accommodate you in the future to show you what Hyatt Place is all about here in Anaheim!

Summary: I would highly recommend staying here. Stayed here 2 different times and never had a problems. Staff is great and super friendly. Close to the parks and easy to get to them. Food is good and has a variety of different foods.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to leave us feedback regarding your most recent stay, Tammy T. We are all very happy to hear that your multiple stays with us have been exceptional. Our team here at Hyatt Place loves to see familiar faces, so we hope to see you and your family very soon! Thank you for your loyalty to Hyatt!

Summary: Overall, the Hyatt Place is a good choice when visiting Disneyland with or without little ones. They are top notch on customer service and the cleanliness of their hotel. The free breakfast buffet needed a little work but when using the word free, naturally my expectations go down. Even still, I found the stay enjoyable and had no real issues.
Manager Response: AZJBDogg, we want to thank you for recognizing and acknowledging our attention to detail, and commitment to creating memorable experiences for our guests and their families time and time again. We hope to be able to accommodate you and your family again soon!

Summary: All the staff were very friendly and professional! Very clean hotel, good breakfast and close to Disneyland. My family and I enjoyed our stay here and would stay here again. Can‚Äôt say enough about the staff there, they were always helpful!
Manager Response: First and foremost, thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback, disneyvacation2019. Thank you for complimenting our team's performance. We work diligently to ensure we are able to provide what our guests need to be at their very best while staying with us. We sincerely hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: This was my first stay at this property but it won‚Äôt be my last. Excellent location, close to shopping, restaurants and of course Disneyland. The rooms are spacious and very clean but the highlight for me was the parking garage. Well lit, clean and always had spaces available no matter how late you drive in. Having the gated lot ensures the space you are paying for will be there when you need it, unlike other properties in the area.
Manager Response: AuntieFunky, we would have to agree. We also believe our hotel is in a prime location for guests traveling to the Anaheim area, whether it be for a convention, show at the Honda Center, or Disneyland. We are very pleased to hear you were able to utilize our hotel's prime location during your stay. We want to thank you again for taking the time to leave us feedback, and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Another excellent stay at Hyatt Place
Summary: My family and I love staying at Hyatt Place! The rooms are spacious and comfortable. The staff is so friendly and welcoming. This is my first hotel choice when staying overnight in Anaheim, excellent service at a reasonable price.
Manager Response: Escape49531466044, we are honored and thankful to be your first choice when choosing hotels in Anaheim. Your loyalty to Hyatt is everything! To show our gratitude, we promise to always put our best foot forward when accommodating you and your family to ensure your stays are always beyond exceptional. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: There was a lot of space with the bunk bed and pull out sofa room. Great service at the front desk and delicious buffet breakfast was part of our reservation. We enjoyed the service in our room each day. Everyone was professional and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you very much, Brooke W, for leaving us feedback and mentioning some of the things you liked about your stay. The joy we feel when we hear our guests were able to enjoy the amenities we offer reminds us why we chose a career in hospitality. Thank you for sharing your unique experience, we hope you will be back again soon!

Summary: Beautiful place with large rooms and delicious breakfast. Nice lighted underground parking for a few but close enough to walk to Disneyland. We stayed several nights so ended up using Uber and it was very cheap.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us feedback, Travel672378. Our team is so happy to hear we were able to provide an exceptional stay for you and your family of five! How exciting! We hope everyone was able to take part in our breakfast, and enjoy the Disney parks! We look forward to the chance to accommodate you and your family again soon!

Summary: Would recommend this place.   Was close to Disneyland and had shuttle services at the door.  There were eating places just down the road and also a pharmacy that were all open late so we walked there after Disneyland closed.  The pool area and spa was awesome after a long day if walking and exploring.  The fitness room is adequate for a quick workout...not that we needed it after all our walking we did. We enjoyed it very much
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us feedback on the amenities you were able to take advantage of during your stay with us, duckbartle. We know how busy our guests are so it is great to hear you had some time to enjoy the amenities we offer. We hope to be able to accommodate you again in the near future!

Summary: Awesome place, friendly and caring team specially Eric and Rosana. You guys have stood out for your compassionate hospitality. Breakfast was nourishing and 5 stars to chefs behind the scene and Bertha you are such a smiley person and thank you for looking after us and kids. Much appreciated all for our wonderful stay and accommodating us with smiles.üåü‚ú®‚≠ê

The staff couldn't have been better.  They accommodated my needs for an extra late check out.  Totally willing to go the extra mile. I wanted lemons for my water and sure enough they accommodated my request!

Great stay here for my daughters birthday and trip to Disneyland!!  Some friendly staff, especially Ken, Jesus in the Restaurant, Joey and Oscar!!  Ken was very helpful with lots of information about Disneyland, and he was very thoughtful and got my daughter a birthday present!!  So sweet!! Jesus was exceptionally helpful in the breakfast room, so kind and friendly and attentive. A very nice and hardworking guy!!  Joey never stops smiling, extremely friendly and nice!!  Oscar also was very nice.  Clean rooms, good breakfast, and great location. Ken was so knowledgeable about Disneyland. Extremely polite and courteous. Beds were very comfortable. A great place to stay for a trip to Disneyland!!

Summary Heading: IMMACULATE! HOTEL ROOM FIT FOR A GODDESS!
Summary: Rooms are immaculate and sparkling clean, and I mean sparkling clean! Did I mention clean? Super clean, clean clean! Never have I ever seen a room as clean as this, except in Tokyo Japan at this one super expensive hotel.

The stay was very good but was not expecting a $50 hold on my card per night for incidentals. That's entirely too high and there was no prior notification of such a high hold per night. I was there 4 nights and had $200 held from my card. Based on that I probably won't stay in a Hyatt again.

We have Disney Season passes, and occasionally combine attending the park in the evening, staying the night, then attending the following day until the crowds become too much. So, we've stayed at a number of the local hotels over the years. This was our first stay at Hyatt Place, and we were very impressed. Excellent customer service, beautiful facility, the most spacious and comfortable room we can remember staying in near the Disney resort. Advertised as a 12 minute walk to the park, which it was. We will be returning customers, and highly recommend Hyatt Place to others.

This hotel is near everything! Freeway, Stores, Shops, Restaurants and of course DISNEYLAND... Great location! The hotel staff was very friendly and was a VERY quick check in. I had check in on line with a courtesy email beforehand,, which is nice! Parking was 20 dollars for the night, but that is the going rate for these places. Free breakfast downstairs was great. A little disappointing that there was not a Starbucks in lobby like I had thought, but no big deal. Room was clean, spacious. I would come back to this location and hotel.

Nice hotel, courtesy and friendly staff. The scrambled eggs were not the best. Otherwise, I have no complaints. I would definitely stay there again. I would also recommend this hotel to friends and family.

We enjoyed our stay at the Hyatt. Excellent customer service and very clean rooms. We will be back and highly recommend this hotel. The service was quick to tend to needs we needed (such as fresh clean towels).

We walked 1 mile to the Disney Parks from this hotel. Hotel was spacious and breakfast was good. Having to pay $25 parking per night was pretty expensive, but all the hotels near the park charge for parking. Overall we were pleased and would stay there again.

We didn't get to have breakfast as the hotel stopped serving at 9am. At check in there was no reminder of breakfast and time. There was a lot of activity in hallway early in the morning. People were yelling and running.

Great value for family visiting the parks.  Nice clean rooms, friendly staff and plenty of options with breakfast offerings.  Our suite had plenty of room for whole family at an affordable price, we‚Äôll be back!

We got upgraded for free to a king bed with bunk beds for my kids it‚Äôs was so nice having some privacy on the same room. The walk to the woody parking lot was so short making it super convenient. The daily breakfast was a plus and so helpful too, it saved us a lot of money :)

Summary Heading: Great Disney option for large families
Summary: Loved the king room with bunk beds, great option for large families. The location was great, convenient for parks and area events. The breakfast was outstanding, plenty of seating for as busy as the hotel was. We were pleased with room, it was clean and accommodating.

Summary Heading: A great option with friendly staff when visiting Disney...
Summary: Two night stay for a quick Disney weekend getaway and Hyatt Place delivered for us...  Lobby & Front Desk:  The staff was very friendly and efficient during check in.  We were greeted with a smile every time we entered the building throughout our visit.  Excellent.  The lobby decor is contemporary and clean.  There's terminals should you need to check in or print a boarding pass in the lobby as well.  Rooms:  Our room had two queen sized beds, a sitting area with a couch and ottoman.  The couch also housed a fold out bed.  There was a desk work area, refrigerator and TV worked fine.  The bathrooms were clean and housekeeping did a great job when they stopped by to turn the room.  Amenities:  The complimentary hot breakfast was a nice surprise as the eggs, sausage and potatoes

Summary Heading: Great place and location for a Disney excursion.
Summary: We have stayed at the Hyatt Place a couple of times now.  The rooms are  clean and neat.  The staff is friendly. Complimentary breakfast is great. The hotel is a 5 min walk to the Toy Story shuttles for Disneyland.  We‚Äôll be back!

This stay was one of the very best that we‚Äôve ever had when it comes to friendly staff.  Welcomed by Ken, who was very informative and got us checked in quickly.  Did I mention Kind?  The morning breakfast staff? Accommodating and KIND.   This hotel staff gets it right.   Thank you Hyatt Place Family. You folks are truly amazing.  LM

This hotel is our favorite to stay in every time we come to California on vacation, really close to Disneyland, also very close to all types of restaurants, and the staff here are very friendly and very helpful

This Hyatt Place hotel is quiet and comfortable. While there is no bell service, the staff is extremely accommodating and friendly.  It is close to the Anaheim Convention Center as well as Disneyland. Buffet breakfasts are plentiful and yummy.

I experienced a problem upon check-in, and the staff was incredibly helpful and kind. They took care of it very efficiently. Every staff member, from hosts to cleaning to breakfast crew, were really friendly and helpful and efficient. The hotel itself was all right. It would probably be fantastic for families with children. For a single person trying to attend a conference for work, it was a bit loud - the walls are very thin, and there are a TON of children who were either excited early in the morning or really upset at the end of the day. I get it, but it was hard to sleep through or work during. The windows don't open, so no fresh air, but the AC was great and the rooms and hotel itself were very clean. I might stay here again, but if I found a better deal elsewhere, I would

Summary Heading: Clean, modern rooms/facility and friendly staff
Summary: We had a great family stay over the Veteran's Day Weekend to Disneyland. The breakfast was perfect for our family with 3 kids and grandmother in tow. The room was clean and functional for our family with the sofabed. Walk to Disneyland wasn't bad at all, approximately 15 minutes to entrance gates.

Ok hotel, ok breakfast, clean rooms but does need extra toiletries like the Hyatt Regency provides. Shuttle service is with everyone else who parks at Disney parking lot, its free but across the street. Was not impressed. Overall nothing to write home about experience. Especially for the price per night.

Stayed with my young son to visit Disneyland over two days.  Initially I was worried about the distance to Disney but the Arts bus route is a very short bus ride from the park so it was quite convenient and the hotel was quiet so we were able to rest well.  The full breakfast was an added bonus.

Summary Heading: Pool is the size of a postage stamp and is in a totally blocked off courtyard no sun
Summary: All in all a nice place but don‚Äôt expect to take the family for a fun day at the pool. Breakfast was very nice, staff was very helpful. Pool was tiny, and a half mile walk to get to any regular dining. Nice walk to convention center.

Would highly recommend Hyatt Place as a place to stay when visiting Disneyland.  Great room, breakfast and location.  Toy story parking lot shuttle 10 min away and Disney about 25 min walk.  Restaurants/amenities close to hotel.

Such a wonderful place to stay! Check in was offered online. Staff was very friendly and eager to help. Rooms nice and clean with large sitting area. The breakfast was included in our package and it was very good, which was a pleasant surprise. Would recommend this to everyone! Hyatt understands travelers. Perfect place to stay!

We have a big family and booked one of the suites. We were welcomed with a big smile and very clean room! We got the 2 room suite . It would have period this room had 2 bathrooms, but we made the space work! I have to say cleanliness is a big deal for us. We cannot get comfortable if the room feels dirty. This room was VERY clean! House keeping was on point!! Everyday we came back to a sparkly clean room! They even made the beds with out blankets we brought from home! I would stay at this property again for the housekeeping experience alone!

Summary Heading: The perfect hotel to stay at one going to Disneyland
Summary: I truly appreciated the staff at this hotel. The cleaners, front desk, and dining area staff were all attentive and professional. Jesus in the dining area would remember my preferences each morning, and offer to get things for me, as well as carry-on a great conversation. The showers have soft water which is really nice to have in Southern California where the water is usually quite hard. The rooms are big, and the sheets and mattresses are soft. I definitely recommend this hotel if you‚Äôre going to Disneyland because of it being across the street from the free Disneyland buses that will take you to the park each day.

We honestly didn't make extensive use of this facility. We were there to visit Disneyland and that is where we spent most of our waking hours. That said, the hotel was very nice. The rooms were clean, the beds were comfortable, the beakfast was good and the staff was very courteous and helpful. We used Lyft to get back and forth. The entire trip was fun, comfortable and easy. I will definitely stay here next time.

In a world today with so many options you need to be truly great to succeed. Exceptional is probably an understatement for this hotel and their staff. My family visited this hotel last Wednesday as we were taking my 2 year old daughter on her first trip to Disneyland. We absolutely loved every minute of our stay there. Above and beyond is how I would describe the service. John Rozatti in Guest Relations was phenominal. I can not speak more highly of him. Kind and knowledgable and seemed to be as excited to have us there as we were to be there. His personal touches made our stay extraordinary. The hotel is extremely close to Disneyland. John recommended we take the shuttle across the street (toy story parking lot).   The hotel itself is very new and modern. The rooms are massive

We stayed here on a quick visit to Disneyland. The park was easily accessible, both on foot and by a tram that ran from the Toy Story Parking lot nearby. Buying Disney tickets at the front desk also added to the convenience.

This hotel is very affordable. It was clean and the staff was friendly. The breakfast was AMAZING and fresh. Our beds were very comfortable and it is only a 15 minute walk to Disneyland. The Art picks up just down the street.

Mariana and the front desk staff were very helpful and accommodating. We had a few issues that would have impacted the business trip, however Mariana and the staff were able to facilitate the necessary actions needed for our group.  I appreciate their professionalism and assistance during our business trip.  We highly recommend staying here either for business or vacation travel.

Took several attempts to get our key to work, only to have someone try and enter our room that evening.  Only to find out after several attempts that they put us in the wrong room.  Then when we went down to dinner it took a very long time to get our Burger and fries only to find out that the burger had a very foul off taste to it.  They did give us the fries free, because it took forever to get our food because our waitress said the chef was on break... 45 minutes???  I would never recommend the hotel menu... The funny thing is my wife and I were the only ones in the restaurant.  I would find another Hyatt hotel if back in this area...

Summary Heading: Good location, clean hotel, great customer service.
Summary: Everything about my stay was excellent. Check in and out was very simple, staff was very nice and helpful, and the room was very clean. Great location for the convention center and Disney land. Overall the quality of stay surpassed the price.

Stayed on a few Hyatt rewards nights to go the Disneyland and was very impressed. We normally stay at the Hyatt House just up the block since it is closer. Check in was very easy and great people working the counter. They told us about the shuttle from Disney's parking lot just up the street and saved us a lot of walking. Rooms were very large and good size bathroom. We stayed on the inner part of the hotel away from the street and it was very quite. The breakfast was very good and had many options. I would recommend staying here.

My daughter booked this hotel for a trip to Disneyland.  Initially I was hesitant since my grandkids are 3yrs and 7yrs and it seemed like it was going to be a LONG walk to Disneyland.  But I was pleasantly surprised that it was only like a 15 minute walk on a sidewalk.  Even the 3 yr old was able to do it.  The breakfast that is served is definitely a few steps above every other hotel 'included' breakfast. There was fresh fruit, eggs, potatoes, sausage, juice, milk and cereal. Perfect for a meal before going to Disneyland.  The rooms are also much larger than your regular hotel room. It was nice to have a couch that was able to function as extra bedding also providing extra space in the room.  Plenty of 'paid' parking. All staff were courteous. AND if you happen to need a

Front desk staff Joey very friendly and informative. Breakfast option was great with healthy options and naturally sourced meat (bonus). Room could use better cleaning, remote control sticky, hair on pillows and light switch dirty. Housekeeping staff not so friendly. Overall good location to Disneyland, 15 minute walk.

We have stayed here about 3 times over the last couple years. Each time the staff has been so friendly, polite and helpful. It's nice to be welcomed and acknowledged by everyone. The rooms are  clean and spacious. And the beds/pillows are the best we have experienced.  Towels are plentiful, bathroom amenities as usual, but if you forgot to pack something, just ask Guest Service. They might have what you need. The breakfast area was kept clean, even when busy, and the food well stocked. We will definitely stay here again.

I'm a big fan of the Hyatt Place line of hotels.  When the opportunity to visit Disneyland for a day came up, I looked at Hyatt first.  There was a choice between the Hyatt House a little bit further north on Harbor, or Hyatt Place.  Hyatt Place was a little bit cheaper, it was just me and I was only staying one night, so I opted for it.  It was a great choice.  I would say that this is the edge of reasonable walking distance to Disneyland.  It's about a mile from the hotel to the park entrance.  The Hyatt House is about a block closer and cuts that down by about a quarter of a mile, which may not seem like much, but after walking many miles in the parks all day, having a slightly shorter walk back to the hotel would be nice.  Since it's a Good Neighbor Hotel, you can cash in on

Maria, the housekeeper, made all the difference to us on our stay. Woderfully considerate and respectful, we would stay again just for her. Wonderful hotel. Close to Disneyland. Worth the coat for amenities.

These hotels are the best!  For what you save by not being right next to the park, you can easily cover the cost of a quick Lyft to the parks. This hotel also has a free breakfast, which in this area is incredibly valuable if you are traveling with kids.  Pool and hot tub is clean.  Free water bottles each day before heading to the park for World of Hyatt Members... Highly recommend!

This is our second time at this hotel and our stay was great both times. They are at a fantastic location, less than a mile walk to Disneyland. The staff was always helpful and answered all my questions. The room was really clean. And the breakfast was yummy each day we stayed. My family really enjoyed our stay!

We had a wonderful stay at this hotel. The rooms were nice and clean, beds were very comfortable, breakfast was great. Hotel was extremely close to free Disney shuttle parking. Front desk associates were warm, friendly, and very helpful with restaurant suggestions. Front-desk associates told us about the Disney shuttle which was a short walking distance from the hotel. Highly recommend this hotel!

We had 2 nights stay at Hyatt. One day one the coffee cup had coffee marks on it. It felt gross! Obviously they were from previous guest and which means the hotel folks did not clean the room properly.

The rooms are gorgeous! And the security is top notch. To access the hotel rooms, you must swipe your room card. I felt very secure staying there alone with my daughter. And the staff was so friendly, which was a bonus.

This is the 3rd time we came back to this same location whenever we make a trip to Southern California. It‚Äôs location is great to most restaurants and points of attraction. For a morning or evening exercise walk, you feel safe walking around the block. The service and assistance we received during our stay is impeccable and our housekeeper, Amada, keeps our beds and room tidy and clean. Thank you

I work on the road a lot and my stay here for the OC auto show was great. Oscar, Alyson, and Amanda were great host. Awesome hospitality and attentiveness to detail from these individuals. I would stay here again if I got people like them.

The property was clean, the staff was courteous, breakfast had a good variety of hot and cold dishes (scrambled and boiled eggs, sausage, pancakes/waffles, fresh fruit and yogurt, cereal etc). Very close to Disney. Shuttle option available across the street at the Hilton/Marriott hotels for cheaper price than parking at Disney. Only downside was the shower temperature. It would go back and forth between lukewarm and boiling hot to where you constantly were adjusting the shower faucet back and forth to try to get it right (and never doing so). Only downside of an otherwise awesome property location wise.

Implementing paid breakfast. Not Issue with HVAC in breakfast area. Appears to be an ongoing issue.  Multiple stains on ceiling tiles.  Management not keeping up with wear and tear. Staff friendly. Limited bar area. Convenient for business and Diseyland

Ken...you are a rockstar! We can‚Äôt thank you enough for always being there :-) We stayed with you guys for a week and we‚Äôve come in very late most nights and Ken is always there, with a real big smile on his face asking us how we are... making sure all of our needs and wants are not only met but are exceeded!! He is taking care of things even when we‚Äôre not even asking because were so f'n tired üòù lol You‚Äôve made our stay extra special Kenny, hope you have a wonderful week and we really look forward to seeing you again down the road. Whoever is reading this, if you‚Äôre the one in charge of signing Ken‚Äòs check, please do him right!! He's a major team player, take care of him so he can take care of his family. Cuz that's exactly how he made us feel ü§òüèºü§òüèº  Rich #twinslife

Extremely nice and helpful staff assisiting with everything with a big smile.  Big and clean room with a nice breakfast served. Walking distance to restaurants and convention center. Will come back again.

We stayed at this hotel to be near Disneyland.  We had High King room.  Bed very comfortable and liked that we had sofa in our room.  Everything updated and very nice.  We enjoyed breakfast each morning since we were memeber.  Catching the bus across the street was very easy and convenient and there was a bus aways waiting.  Really enjoyed our stay and we stayed 7 nights.

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel and very close to Disney
Summary: My wife, some friends and I went recently to Anaheim and stayed in Hotel Hayatt Place for 3 nights, and I can say without hesitation this is a great option if you are planning stay near Disney, it's well located since it's only 15 minutes walk, clean and quiet. Bedrooms are quite spacious and the beds are very comfortable (which is something very important if you spent the whole day walking). The staff members are truly friendly and helpful, specially John. Last but not least breakfast is included in a nice area with a lot of sits and the underground parking is OK and easy to access.

Everyone on staff was very friendly and helpful. My room was very clean and comfortable. The breakfast for Hyatt members was delicious ! Plenty of choices . Fresh and yummy ! Love this place . Especially I love how clean my room was . I will stay with Hyatt again !

The Hyatt Place Anaheim was the perfect hotel for conducting business in Orange County. Well located, clean, available parking, easy in/out, knowledgeable and friendly staff and a crisp, fresh brand.It is also very convenient to the Disney resorts if you want to incorporate some entertainment into your business travel.

Enjoyed our stay! Clean room, quite atmosphere. Nice location right down from Toy Story parking to cat h shuttle to Disneyland. Food is great, and as a Hyatt member it's included. We only stay here when we come to Dland!

I expect quite a bit from Hyatt. This expectation comes from being a frequent guest. This Hyatt Place met and exceeded my expectations.  The breakfast area was quite busy, but was well serviced keeping it very tidy.

Good breakfast and helpful service . Room was clean and place was close to Disneyland . They got us checked in early and was able to get a great room. Had a light out and they fixed it right away. Overall good stay and will book it again

We just docked from a Cruise and needed a hotel for 1 night so that we can go to Universal Studios. We were pleasantly pleased on our room. The room was very roomy and clean we had a great stay. We would highly recommend

Great location. Excellent staff. 7 minute drive to Disneyland parks parking lot. Very clean and bright room with a delicious breakfast for Hyatt members.  Very accommodating with special requests. Would definitely stay here again :)

Staff was helpful and friendly.  Location is great.  Food is average, more options would of been nice.  Also, add security in the halls to control noise level. A couple next door were in a domestic abusive argument.  The hotel did nothing about it.  The police should of been called.

Summary Heading: Amazing experience during our family trip
Summary: My wife and I brought our daughter to Disneyland for her birthday and stayed at the Hyatt Place. The staff was very courteous and welcoming and Oscar and Claudia were amazing and truly made our daughter feel like a princess, thank you and definitely returning!

Summary Heading: Good for family trips to Disneyland
Summary: We've stayed here at least one or two times before; rooms are clean and the staff is always very nice. The breakfast is good (much better than the Best Western down the street we stayed at once!!) and the breakfast staff went out of their way to make sure we had what we needed. It's a bit of a longer walk to/from the park after a long day, but it's a short Uber/Lyft ride (about $5-7).

I‚Äôve written many reviews about this place, said it all, clean, close proximity to Disneyland, eateries within walking distance Cvs, Walgreens down the corner parking clean safe well lit, breakfast selections great, something for everyone, hard workers in the breakfast room.  Housekeeping on top of it, rooms clean, replenished with clean towels never had a stained sheet, pillowcase or towels, tubs, toilets always clean, floors vacuumed, smells great when you walk into the very inviting lobby.  Also you can rent DnR mobility scooter through hotel and it‚Äôs dropped off and picked up for you there, prices better than Disneyland.  You can ride that scooter all the way into the park and back, with a lot of battery still left, ask for Davey or Rita, The hotel will call or give you

Super nice staff willing to make my stay as pleasent as possible and the facilities exelent.  The breakfast was fresh and delicious, the pool, bussiness center and gym fascilities were clean and smelling fresh just like i like it

Was very satisfied with our overall stay. Hotel was nice and clean and staff were very pleasant and helpful. Our only suggestion woul be ty o have more of a variety at breakfast (main course) side selections were nice

Great customer service from every employee I encountered! 20 minute walk to Disneyland, 5 minute walk to toy story parking structure shuttles, which are free. Breakfast was fresh, room was clean, all in all a great experience will stay again for my next Disneyland trip.

Very nice hotel. Location is great. Right next to Anaheim convention center. It is a very short walking distance to the Anaheim Conventions Center. Super nice staff members especially at the front desk.

Great location to stay if visiting Disneyland with all the amenities just right at the doorstep of the hotel. Supermarket, Starbucks, and also lots of restaurants within walking distance. Breakfast can be improved.

Was a great stay. We had the king bed with bunk bed for the kids. It was great as there was a sliding door to separate the two areas and enough room for them to play. Clean and good bathroom size. Buffet was standard American.

Summary Heading: A nice hotel within walking distance of Disneyland
Summary: My family of 3 stayed here for 2 nights. The staff is very friendly, hotel is very clean. Rooms are spacious enough for 4 people, with a small fridge and coffee maker. Beds were comfortable. It's about a 20 min. walk to Disneyland with a toddler in tow. Pool is small, elevator requires room key to access floors. This became tiresome after a 2 night stay of coming and going. But we appreciated the security of it. Otherwise, a very pleasant stay.

If you're looking for a relatively close location to Anaheim Convention Center, then this is the spot.  However, do not expect the same amenities as you would at a Hyatt Grand / Hyatt Regency.  As far as I was aware of, there is no Valet service, no Bell Hop, and lastly, no room service.    Other than that, if you knew all of this going in, you will be fine and well-satisfied with everything else a Hyatt hotel has to offer.

I booked this hotel because of a great pre-pay offer, proximity to Disneyland and I'm a Hyatt member. I was please by the friendly staff, free shuttle bus at the Toy story parking lot and was pleasantly surprised by the great breakfast buffet included in my room rate. I will definitely return for a future visit.

Summary Heading: Great location Super nice staff and clean rooms
Summary: Love the location of this property as well as the amazing staff.Just 5 mins from convention center and many restaurants.As well as the property is super clean.Will definitely stay here for future trips.

I usually choose Hyatt because if it‚Äôs cleanliness and how they keep up to date.  This time they added the casting feature to your stay.  You can now cast from your phone to tv.  Breakfast was great with a great assortment of foods to choose from.   I love that it‚Äôs close to the Anaheim convention center and you can walk to Disneyland if you want to too.  We also received complimentary parking and breakfast because they had charged our room incorrectly, so great job of service recovery.

Was not clean. Had stains on sheets, walls and chairs. Bathroom was not  clean. Would not stay there again and do not recomend this hotel. Neighborhood  was not very nice. Although it was close to Disney.

I stayed here for a conference at the convention center and the location was excellent.  The room with two queen beds was comfortable and spacious and the entire hotel was extremely clean.  The staff should be congratulated on maintaining the hotel in such spotless condition.  The breakfast was delicious and I had other meals there which were excellent.

We enjoyed our stay at Hyatt Place Anaheim very much.   Room was clean and service was great.  The property is beautiful and gets you in a relaxing mood.  Breakfast was delicious.  We will come back again...

It was an amazing experience with a lovely staff. Was treated with the utmost respect and dignity. Thank you to all that assisted in the amazing experience. It was one of the best hotel experiences I have ever had.

Great Family Vacation with family and friends.  The location was ideal for a multi-city convoy.   we were able to access all the recreation attractions we intended to visit. The accessibility to highways and roadways was an added value.

This review is based on the room only. The beds were comfortable, room & bathroom was extremely clean. We only stayed for 1 night, but we‚Äôve stayed at other Hyatt Place‚Äôs before and so everything was as expected-clean & comfy. The only thing I didn‚Äôt like about the room was the bathroom door, it was somewhat see through. Other then that, everything was great. We will definitely stay here again next time.

The rooms are spacious and well appointed, staff are friendly and helpful, breakfast is fabulous! There were 5 of us in the room and it was not crowded. The large sofa pulled out to a comfortable bed and the room and there was a divider between the 2 beds and the sofa providing a level of privacy for all. The room ( on the 3rd floor) was very quiet and the quality beds and pillows meant we had a good nights sleep. Location is excellent. Several restaurants close by and even Target( to buy snacks / drinks etc) is just a few blocks away. The shuttle to Disney is across the street and there is secure parking at the hotel.

Very unhappy stay and extremely unsatisfied with how it went. The front desk was very rude upon check in, no one helped take the 5 different luggage‚Äôs we carried up to our room, and the front desk watched us struggle to place them on the Dolly‚Äôs ourself. House keeping didn‚Äôt even visit the room the first two days there, we had to ask them to stop by our last day there. And upon check out, we called the front desk to ask if they could bring up a dolly and they said we have to go downstairs and grab them ourself. I will never ever stay here again.

Summary Heading: Good choice for a visit to Disney
Summary: All Hyatt Place have the same layout and we spent two nights here as the location was close to Disney.  Pros: - Close to Disney - Clean and customer service was very good  Cons: - Premium over other Hyatt Place...
