I trust this is because of its location (Disney) - Breakfast is literally 90% same as other Hyatt Place - Overnight parking was expensive - Walk to the Disney bus was ok... but after a long day, it felt like a long walk with two kids  Overall, it was a nice stay.  For my next stay in Anaheim, there seems to be plenty of choices and may consider another location.

Summary Heading: Excellent Choice in a Convient Friendly Hotel
Summary: Super customer service staff was extremely helpful and patient considering the time of night we were most active. The rooms were in great condition in and the amenities were a a helpful perk in between all the activities. The galley being open 24/7 really came in handy with the late hours while the breakfast was filling and varied enough to satisfy everyone in our group. Always seem to enjoy our stays in Hyatt Locations.

Summary Heading: Good choice for a short vacation...
Summary: Friendly staff, clean rooms and a good breakfast...all together a great value for a short vacation with friends. Close proximity to other restaurants, bars and nearby shopping, as well as freeways and the airport.

The hotel is everything expected from a Hyatt Place - large room with a sofa, basic hot breakfast, smooth check-in and check-out. Hotel seems to be associated with another hotel next door. You need to take a shuttle bus to Disneyland, but we took Uber and it is just a few minutes.

Generally I find the Hyatt Place brand consistent, clean, and well appointed.  We certainly enjoyed the free breakfast.    BUT BEWARE.  This location charges $50 for nightly parking where other locations around the park only charge $25.  This was a bummer.

Hotel is ok. Front desk did not the most helpful or nicest, specially at check in, (my experience only).  Hotel is nice, fairly clean. We had he bunk bed family room with king bed, bunk bed and pull out sofa bed (room for 6 people). Had a refrigerator but no microwave. Parking is $22 a night, breakfast is only free if you sign up for Hyatt rewards member. Pool is very small and freezing cold. It is walking distance to Disneyland and other restaurants, so that was good. Stayed for 3 nights, was over $600. For the money I paid, I wouldn't stay here again unless I'm going to Disneyland. I do recommend the hotel, but it just wasn't the best for me with all the other choices around.

Summary Heading: This place was OK for one night
Summary: After a long day at Disneyland we booked a close Hyatt. I was disappointed with the cleanliness of these rooms. My husband and I try to stick with Hyatt's when we need to find a place to stay and most are very up to date and clean. This one just felt like it was used A LOT. The window had a bright light shining in right by the bed all night (We like DARK rooms) and the curtains could not cover this bright light. Also, We walked down to see the breakfast offerings and there were SO many people grabbing breakfast you just couldn't fit! We just wouldn't stay here again.

I was so impressed with the comfort, cleanliness, and staff friendliness that I will make Hyatt my go-to resort every time!  I was at the resort for business, eveything that I needed was there for me to travel to and from the work-site with a great breakfast and a good night sleep!

Was in town for a few days at Disneyland with the family. The hotel is close and there was a shuttle close to get to the park. The room was clean and the beds were fine. The fold out sofa was hard to sleep on. The hotel staff was friendly and greeted me every time I came in the hotel.  Parking does cost extra and a few times it was hard to find a spot and had to drive around a few times to find a spot.  Make sure you join the Hyatt rewards program to get the free breakfast in the morning. The food was ok and they were extremely busy every day but kept up with the food , both hot and cold.   I would stay again if in the area.

Excellent customer service, all very clean, quiet, safe area, good location, parking with easy access, very good rates, excellent buffet, shopping stores and restaurants nearby, very close to Disneyland, 100% recommended for price, service and location.

Summary Heading: Big Group Stay at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort / Convention
Summary: A clean and spacious place to stay near Disneyland, and it is surrounded by many restaurants. Stayed here with about 21 teenagers, and 3 other adults for the World of Dance competition.   Staff were friendly and accommodated the group's request to be assigned adjacent rooms, and they were even close to the function room which served as the group's training area. Rooms good for 6.  Pleasantly surprised that just by signing up as a World of Hyatt member, breakfast was already complimentary. Made up for the "higher" room rates compared to other hotels in the area. Hotel cafe food was good and plentiful, reasonably priced. Still, they allowed food delivery from outside restaurants, no hassle, no fuss.   No laundry area, but they directed us next door to Cortona Inn which had one.

Overall, our family LOVES Hyatt Place hotels. The room setup accommodates our family of 6. The breakfast is fabulous and the staff are lovely. However, at this particular location, our room cracked and freaked ALL night long. Not sure if it was because we were too close to the elevator or what. Most terrible sleep at a hotel ever.

Summary Heading: Awesome hotel at a great value!
Summary: We stayed at this Hyatt Place at the peak of the summer season. It was a five minute walk to the Disney Toy Story Parking lot which was a godsend after a long day at the parks. Loved the breakfast, but the best part of the stay were the comfortable beds. I have never stayed in a hotel where the beds were so comfortable. Great staff and great experience overall. Highly recommend!

Even though they confirmed my request for feather-free bedding, it didn't happen before I checked in. I believe they are understaffed. But the property is very nice and great for families going to Disney.

I would stay here again! The staff was so friendly and went above and beyond to make sure I had everything I needed including a toothbrush, water, and a stamp to mail my letter! Great location to walk to Anaheim Convention Center and a bit of a walk to Disney.

Nice hotel, very friendly and helpful staff. Breakfast is good, big selection and plenty of time so you dont have to rush. The only downside to this place is they charge you $22.00 a night to park in the hotel lot/garage. That is the reason for the ding in Value

The staff were friendly, the rooms were clean and tidy, and the breakfast is great! There‚Äôs a short walk to the free shuttle that takes you directly to the gates of Disneyland and I like that there are many restaurants to choose from in the area just outside the hotel.

Summary Heading: Great hotel to stay if you are visiting Disneyland walking distance to the free Disney shuttles.
Summary: Overall this was a great place to stay. The staff was really friendly, and the location was just walking distance to the free Disneyland shuttles. The only problem I had was the mini fridge was not working. I did ask the front desk about it and they said to give it sometime to cool and if it didn‚Äôt they would send one of there device guys. But I never called back because I forgot about it. Overall great place to stay with your family.

Ken at the front desk was so helpful and friendly. He knows everything about Disney and gave the best suggestions for entertainment! He was quick to greet me and smiled the entire time. It makes a difference!

Summary Heading: C.R.E.W California Trip Transition Program-Shane Thomas
Summary: Staff was amazing! The Manager Dawn was so helpful with accommodating with meeting space and Richard was so helpful with assisting with meals while as guests. Because of this, I will definitely recommend this hotel to anyone I come across.

Overall we enjoyed our stay. The staff did an amazing job and for the most part everyone was friendly and welcoming. The was were cleaned every day. Close proximity to every thing we needed within walking distance which was an absolute plus. We were able to joke with the staff and had fun interacting with them. I would definitely stay here again.

The staff was great at Hyatt Place and location was perfect and very close to Disneyland and great restaurants. A free shuttle was just one block away. We will be back to this location and we highly recommend.

This was my third stay at this property. This time I was attending an event at the Convention Center.  It's an easy walk to and from.  The rooms here are well appointed.  Two queen beds, and an sitting area with a fold out sofa, really gave us lots of room to move around.  A refrigerator is including in the room as well as a small safe.  Water press in the shower was fabulous and the noise level was really low, which was surprising since the hotel was fully booked. Breakfast was good for buffet style. The usual fare, eggs, bacon, potatoes, variety of breads, cereals etc.  All in all a good representation of Hyatt's less expensive properties.

My stay here was great! Esmeralda and the guest services were extremely friendly and welcoming! The rooms were very clean as well. Parking is tough to get during busy times in the area. Other than that, everything was great!

We thoroughly enjoyed our 3 night stay at the Hyatt Place. The room was perfect for our family of 4. Beds were comfortable and we had plenty of space. The breakfast was typical of what you find at a Hyatt Place, and it was a perfect way to start our days. I would recommend becoming a World of Hyatt member in order to get the breakfast for free. Otherwise, I wouldn‚Äôt pay for it.  The hotel is a pleasant mile walk from the Disneyland resort. We never minded the walk. But we jokingly said, that the walk got longer every time we made it. But, if the walk is too much, the toy story parking lot is just down a block and across the street where you can easily catch a shuttle directly to Disneyland. And from our observation, they have trams running constantly, so shouldn‚Äôt be a long

no surprise. kitchenette, sofa bed, free breakfast, bbq stove, small pool are the standard of hyatt place.  one thing i realize is they now offer 250 hyatt points if chosen to skip room service per day.  lets see if i really get them later.

Lunch buffet are only for meat lovers! Chef add meat to vegetable salad, serving meat sandwich, nothing for vegetarian. Chef serve almost same menu for 3 days. Tomato soup is delicious! I am glad no meat was added! Customer service were very helpful and attentive to our needs.

Overall pleasant and the amenities for World of Hyatt members are very rewarding. Room was very spacious and comfortable. Room had everything we needed. The free breakfast is a great plus and the free water bottles and snacks really sweetened the experience.

Breakfast was average but syrup containers made everything everyone touched sticky. Not enough tables in breakfast area. Had to call for blankets for bunk beds. This hotel isn‚Äôt bad just isn‚Äôt the best.

Nice hotel close to Disneyland. Free hot breakfast for the kids and easy tram access to the park. Sad the pool was closed.  It was something our family was looking forward to. Maybe if I knew prior I would have stayed elsewhere.

Summary Heading: Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort was amazing
Summary: From the modern look of the rooms, to the free breakfast, and the helpful staff, we were so impressed.It was also within walking distance of Disney. I would go back there again! They staff went out of their way to answer our questions and accommodate our needs.

We greatly enjoyed our time here.  Our room was clean.  All staff were friendly and helpful, and we really enjoyed our breakfasts each day.  We also used the gym, and found it clean and nice. We would definitely stay here again!

Summary Heading: Perfect, magical visit for our family of 5!
Summary: The room gave us plenty of space (not easy for a family with 3 teenagers!), the desk staff was welcoming & helpful, the housekeeping staff accommodated our extra needs (towels, pillows) perfectly, and our room was clean and well-kept. We all loved the breakfast offerings...different options on the 2 mornings we were there. One of the Disneyland parking lots is diagonal to the hotel, requiring a 5-6 minute walk to the boarding area of the bus/shuttle (which was always ready for us).  From there, another 5 minutes and we were at the security gates. I was very pleased with Hyatt Place and would most certainly stay there again!

Our room was clean and housekeeping did a great job making sure of this every day. Oscar made check in a breeze and was so welcoming. The other staff were nice as well. We were always greeted when we returned. Excellent breakfast. Walking distance to Disney and a straight shot there.  My only complaint is they need to update their WiFi. It was slow and you couldn‚Äôt really access it.

Summary Heading: Very Easy Access to Disneyland via the shuttle close by.
Summary: I like to stay at newer hotels and this was fairly new.  Clean and well kept.  Was unsure of the distance to Disneyland but the price was right for what I wanted to pay.  We found out the hotel is almost across the street from the Toy Story parking lot that has a free shuttle to the security and ticket area on the east side of the parks.  This was very convenient and easy both directions.  We did walk in one morning and that was enough.  The free shuttle is much easier.  The hotel staff was very helpful and attentive.  There are some food options around the area.  Overall it met my expectations as a hotel and exceed them for convenience to the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so pleased to hear that we met your expectations! We hope you choose Hyatt Place next time you are in the area!

Summary: We stayed three nights at the Anaheim Hilton and the following week three nights at the Hyatt Place Anaheim. They're about 1/8 mile apart. The Hyatt was cleaner and in better condition. The room was cleaner and the bed was much more comfortable in the Hyatt; and it was at a much better price. No brainer, pick the Hyatt Place in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review! We are so happy you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Stay somewhere else dustmites. There were too many people in the hotel. A religious group was staying there and it looks
Summary: like they put 10 people to a room. There were friends of theirs coming into hotel to eat that were not even staying in hotel. I found dustmites and reported and Manager acted like if it was a friendly pet. Did not care or know the importance of it. The young girls at desk were nice but not the women who accompanied the manager. They were upset i pointed and showed them the dustmite. They must be use to living with dustmites.

I was really glad we stayed here.   Closely located to the convention center and disneyland, and very well taken care of.   Have stayed at other hotels nearby and this was by far the best.   Plan to return for Disneyland in the summer
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to seeing you during your next trip to the parks!

Summary: You need to train your front desk staff. Girl had attitude after needing to fix my 2 night reservation that was under my name and the other under my husband's name. First of all, when I initially checked in, I already explained that I did not want to have to check in and then check back into the same room the next night. Staff said they were going to handle it. But, then did NOT explain to me clearly that I had to present my room key again for re-activation the next day. Staff the next day then had ATTITUDE with me when I expressed my confusion!

Summary Heading: Great location and Great hotel staff
Summary: I came to Anaheim to meet friends for my birthday dinner at Ruth Chris (which is right next door).  The hotel is very clean - almost seems like it's brand new.  Room/Bed very clean and comfortable.  All of the staff are very helpful and friendly.....great service.

The resort is great.  Rooms are very nice and spacious.  Breakfast is included and wonderful.  The parking is horrible however.  They charge $20 per night to park and yet only have one floor underground parking.  There are not enough spots for every room on site and by the evening people are double parking, blocking cars in or making spots where there really arent spots thus limiting the flow of traffic out of the garage.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We appreciate all feedback and will use it to improve our hotel. We hope you stay with us again!

Summary: Thank you Oscar and Rittany for being so accommodating and making our stay wonderful. We really appreciated the water in the morning! We will be booking again next June when we need to come back again.  Thank you, Anna
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing our hotel! We are so happy to hear that you will be returning and we will share your kind words with Oscar and Rittney! We look forward to your stay next year!

Summary: Eric the front desk gentleman and the other colleague was more than exceptional! (I believe his name was Oscar) I‚Äôm horrible with names! From the moment we walked in we were promptly greeted and had a warm welcome! Didn‚Äôt feel robotic felt genuine. We had some drinks after our long day and breakfast is amazing! Even the housekeeper lady Olga was very kind and always greeted us walking through the hallways asking if we need anything! They truly care! We always come to Disneyland and have stayed at other Hilton or Hyatt properties but we found our home in Anaheim! Thank you to the two gentlemen working front desk to the housekeeper and even the people during breakfast! Amazing can‚Äôt say enough!
Manager Response: Thank you for your awesome review! We appreciate your kind words and will share them with Eric, Oscar, and Olga. It is our pleasure to be your home away from home in Anaheim, We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: This hotel illegally charged my card almost $2k dollars when it was only supposed to be charge $50/day for incidentals. The supervisor Brianna and rep Laura were both very rude, unhelpful and careless in processing my refund.   I was supposed to be reached out directly from a member of an executive team because of the piss poor service and no surprise no person has reached out to me.   Here‚Äôs the kicker. They offered to give me a 1 free night stay yet they charged 6 nights = almost $2k. I told them if that‚Äôs all and I still haven‚Äôt received my money back on my debit card. They can keep the 1 night stay I would never stay again.   Requested to have the GM call me who just happened to be unavailable. Major two thumbs down and as of now all future trips for my company and even

Our trip was great, everything close and convenient including the Anaheim convention center where our tournament was. Room; great and clerks hospitality was off the charts. They completely catered to all our requests.  Thank you Hyatt!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: FABULOUS Place to stay for a Disneyland trip
Summary: We have stayed at Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort in March and June of 2019 for trips to Disneyland and were very pleased with our accommodations. The property is small enough that you don‚Äôt have to walk too far to get to your room which is a bonus after a long day at the parks.  We loved the free buffet breakfast included with our room and it wasn‚Äôt just continental breakfast. They had eggs, bacon or sausage, potatoes, waffles, fruit, cereals, oatmeal, toast and bagels. Everything was fast and delicious. It made it easy for us to grab a healthy breakfast before heading to the parks. The rooms were perfect with extra room to sit and relax on a couch and even space in the refrigerator to put our food and water bottles.  The location of the hotel made for an easy and quick walk to
Manager Response: Thank you for your awesome review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our hot breakfast buffet and we will celebrate your kind words with Joey! We look forward to your next stay!

Summary: My family and I looked at various different hotels before booking at Hyatt Place. We were a little bit skeptical at first based upon the three star rating however after checking in and being treated as well as we were we would definitely recommend this place to friends and family. From the moment we came in ‚ÄúJoey‚Äù  at the front desk went above and beyond to make us feel welcome to. Truth be told we normally stay at four-star hotels or above and the reality is that this three star hotel should probably be rated a little bit higher.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Your kind words will be celebrated with Joey! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope you chose Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center next time you are in the area!

Summary Heading: Can‚Äôt go wrong at a Hyatt place. Staff are incredible and for a smaller venue the food is incredible.
Summary: I took my sports teams again to the Hyatt, normally they will start breakfast early so they‚Äôll have a warm free breakfast. Although it appears to be a small restaurant inside it‚Äôs excellent food and excellent drinks all of my families really liked it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review! We are pleased to hear that you and your team enjoyed your stay with us! We hope to be your top choice next time you are in the area!

Summary: Cons: The time and I don‚Äôt stay in particularly super nice five-star hotel. I was expecting a little more from the Hyatt. The tools made regular, weird chugging sounds, the air-conditioner made a loud clunking when it would turn off and the window covering would suction when the air came on and would smack the window and the tv flickered on and off continually (that was fixed). I did let the hotel know about these situations twice. Ohhhh...and you can hear EVERYTHING on the other side of the wall. The first morning I listen to someone having a very gassy bowel movement next door to me. Made me nervous that they could hear every movement and sound I made in my room.   Pros: The hotel is in close proximity to the convention center. About a 10 min walk (5 blocks or so). The staff
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We take all feedback seriously and will use it to improve our hotel. We hope you stay with us next time you are in the area!

Summary: Hotel was very very clean and the style was updated. Hotel is about 20 minutes from the park. We only walked the first day. Room has plenty of space for a family. Breakfast buffet was nice. Free WiFi.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing our hotel! We appreciate your feedback and hope you stay with us next time you are in the area!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Anaheim
Summary: I was in Anaheim on business for a conference being held at the Anaheim Convention Center.  The Hyatt Place is located for an easy walk to/from the Convention Center.  The service was very good during my entire stay.  The front desk staff, the housekeepers and the rest of the staff were very polite and helpful.  The breakfast buffet is the best free hotel breakfast I have ever had - lots of selection and good food.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you next time you are in the area!

Summary: We were a family of 6 and we had a great time. Graet costumer service Oscar take good care of us. He take his time to explain everything to us all the time with a smile. And he speak Spanish that's a big plusüëç! Beautiful quiet and clean rooms!! A Big thanks to the housekeepers for taking care of us The breakfas was delicious we all love itüòã And is just a 15-20 minute walk to the parks and all kinds of restaurants just a cross street. I recommend this hotel to everyone! Definily will come back...
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! We will share your kind words with Oscar and our housekeeping staff. We hope you stay with us again!

Summary: We are out of state Annual Pass holders for Disneyland and we are here at least every other month if not every month. This means lots of hotel stays. I continue to stay here at the Hyatt Place because of the customer service. I‚Äôm loyal to Hyatt properties and have stayed at all 3 near Disneyland but hands down the customer service at the Hyatt Place is superb. Every time Samantha is amazing. A few days before this most recent trip I called to add an extra day because I wanted to make it a longer get away for my boyfriend‚Äôs birthday. It was Samantha that took the call and when I told her it‚Äôs my boyfriend‚Äôs birthday, she said she wanted to do something special. We just checked in and there were balloons, chocolate, wine and a card signed by all the front desk staff. It‚Äôs little
Manager Response: Thank you so much for such an amazing review! We will share your kind words with Samantha, Allison, and the rest of our staff. We strive to make sure that every guest feels special and has a memorable experience here at Hyatt Place! Thank you for making us your number one hotel choice in Anaheim. We look forward to your next stay!

Summary Heading: Always great! Always a super value!  Wonderful Team
Summary: A huge thank you to the Hyatt Team. Always clean, always friendly and incredibly wonderful staff. I want to especially thank Samantha for helping me solve an early check out issue. Solved 100% and I thank you all.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy that Samantha was able to help in resolving your issue. We hope you choose Hyatt Place next time you are in the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Great room for a Disneyland trip
Summary: My family of 6 stayed here for 2 days for a quick Disneyland trip. The room was very clean. The breakfast was excellent - a good variety of foods from cereals to eggs and bacon/sausage. The hotel sits across from

I stayed at this property for a conference being held at the Anaheim Convention Center. From the moment I arrived the staff was friendly, the hotel clean and well kept and the breakfast excellent. It is so convenient to the Convention Center, just a short 5 minute walk. But what really blew me away was the support and service I received from Samantha, a front of house supervisor.   The evening prior to my flight out of LAX I had purchased an art piece for a friend celebrating a birthday. I was sure it would fit in my luggage but when I returned late that night to pack for the trip the following morning at 7 am, I discovered it would not fit. With all the shipping places closed until after my flight would depart I was frantic trying to figure out a solution. When I mentioned my
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing our hotel. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and especially delighted to hear that Samantha was able to come up with a solution to get your art piece safely to your residence! We hope that you choose Hyatt Place next time you are in the area!

Summary: Just like the many Hyatts I've stayed at, this place does not disappoint. The room was clean and accommodated our family of 3 without any problems.  The breakfast wasn't too bad it was good enough to make sure we had a good hearty meal to start the day.  The plus is the Hyatt is located less than 10 minutes from Disneyland

Summary Heading: Great for stays that are longer than a weekend
Summary: We stayed here for about a week in July 2018.  Tons of great restaurants w/in walking distance (Blaze downstairs and the Mexican spot across the street were favorites).  Walgreens is also right downstairs.    The kitchenette and small living room were very comfortable for both lounging and working remotely.  The entire room was spacious for our family of three and all of our daughter's dance costumes in tow.  Breakfast buffet offered a good variety and the dining area was large enough that we never had trouble finding a place to sit.  Walking distance to Anaheim Gardenwalk, convention center and Disneyland, but I wish the hotel offered a shuttle to Downtown Disney.  My daughter and I were able to walk there one day, but it was July and VERY hot/humid.    The fitness center is

This was a nice oasis from Disneyland. During the day we played and at night and in the mornings we could rest without the craziness. Staff was great. The rooms were nice and large meeting our needs (a family of 4 include 5-year old twins). Walking to the offsite parking for buss transport to Disneyland was quick and easy. I will for sure book again for the next Disney vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and hope you choose our hotel for you next Disney vacation!

Summary Heading: Had to come back for a third night!
Summary: Room was clean, kids enjoyed the pool, breakfast was great good selection. close to so many stores and dining areas and super closed to Disneyland. Stayed 2 nghts then came back to stay a third night . Front desk was great!

My stay was right inline with the normal Hyatt place stays. Amazing. I will o ly stay at Hyatt place due to the quality,  value, and hospitality. Not to mention that the location of this Hyatt was perfect for a trip to Disneyland. The stay was only made better by the fact that you could buy tickets at the front desk, rent a scooter for the handicapped, and the available parking. Even if I did have to pay extra for it.

Stayed here with my family and the room's use of space is very smart. Room is cozy and modern, it feels like home. The big couch is a plus. The lighting at the couch and bed areas are very relaxing and beautiful. Hotel is near Disney Land shuttle.

Talk about a stark difference between the three Hyatt properties by Disney. This one by far is the poorest. I did not sleep as my room faced the hotel entrance and at night there are bright lights that, due to poor installation of blinds, fills your bedroom with light ALL NIGHT. Evening staff seem uninterested or just burned out in their job. Thankfully the room was clean and nicely setup. I'll spend the few extra dollars and stay next time at the other properties.

Summary Heading: Business or pleasure DON‚ÄôT hesitate to book this property!
Summary: Start with Esmeralda, sales coordinator extraordinaire! She is kind, so helpful and will remember your name. When we first arrived we were trying to locate packages that our company sent ahead, she had them set aside and treated us as if she‚Äôs been waiting all day just for us!! She said,‚Äù When you love what you do, it‚Äôs soo easy!‚Äù After a long day of work at the convention center, we came back to night crew of Eric, the newly promoted manager (and for good reason). He displayed a wisdom and poise beyond his years serving us dinner, taking care of the front desk and always checking in to make sure we were OK. Alyson and Oscar were there as well and together they worked as a team who‚Äôd know each other for decades. I know I spent a lot of time on the people but trust me when you
Manager Response: Thank you so much for reviewing our hotel! We will share your kind words with Esmeralda, Eric, Oscar and Alyson! We are so happy that our staff went above and beyond to make sure your stay was memorable. Please choose Hyatt Place next time you are in the area!

Summary: This Hotel was a great stay for our family. It was clean and the staff was pleasant. The breakfast was great! I would recommend this hotel for a great nights stay. We went to the Angels game right up the road.

I went for a Disney family vacation and I stayed at this Hyatt Place and the staff of the Hotel were outstanding especially Samantha, Rittney, and Esmeralda were Very accommodating and very outgoing to make sure my stay was Pleasant.
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review! We will celebrate your kind words with our staff! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I would refer this hotel to any of my family and friends.  It was a clean beautiful room.  Lots of space to relax.  Quiet.  Near ice dispenser.  Everything was nearly perfect.  Slow internet but free.  Parking is a little high, but not for that location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your awesome review! Please send all of your family and friends to us! We are more than happy to serve them, and we hope you stay with us again soon!

Summary: Stayed in the Family room, could not have asked for anything better! It was clean and so spacious and to make things eve easier, Disneyland was about a 7 minute drive! We also had the breakfast buffet and they had a really good selection.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We are so happy that you enjoyed our spacious and clean hotel!  The short commute to the parks is always a plus! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Great hotel option if you are visiting Disneyland.  Very clean, well maintained and friendly staff.  The room was spacious, and fit our family of four easily.  The breakfast for Hyatt members was great too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review! We are so happy that our hotel accommodated your family comfortably and you enjoyed breakfast! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The restaurant is absolutely horrible! Room service food was horrible as well. The hotel is clean. Staff is Wonderful, helpful and friendly! Love the hospitality and services offered at this location! I would recommend staying here!  But DO NOT eat there.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We appreciate all feedback and will use it to further our training and service. We hope you come back to stay with us again!

Summary: My girlfriend and I stayed at this hotel for our trip to Disneyland. It's about a 20 minute walk from the park entrance which is still doable for most people. The staff was very polite and helpful and check-in was easy. The hotel was very clean and there is basically nothing bad that I can say about this location.   Definitely a good place to stay if visiting Disney parks
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are so happy that our hotel met your expectations. Please come back soon!

Summary: From check in, to the bar service, breakfast, and the room everything was simple and easy.  I would definitely stay here again for work.  Future trips to Disneyland I would not hesitate to bring my family.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay! We hope to see you and your family in the near future!

Summary: This Hyatt Place is a perfect option for Disneyland vacations.The rooms are beautiful, spacious and comfortable.The staff are always friendly helpful.The free Toy Story shuttle to the parks is a block away.
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind review and we are so happy that you enjoyed your stay! We hope to see you next time you are in the area!

Summary: Hotel was great!!  Location was a great place with Disneyland being only a few blocks away within walking distance.  House keeping staff were amazing.  Keep up the great work!!  Very friendly!!  Front staff very friendly as well!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The hotel is totally synced up with Disneyland. Tickets are available and a free shuttle can be caught right across the street, drops you right in front of the parks. Breakfast was good, hot and continually refreshed. With all the families that stay there, the hotel has quiet hours from 10pm until the next morning. The beds were comfortable, best hotel pillows I have ever used. Adequate and clean workout facilities and pool. The staff is very accommodating and want to please. There are many food offerings nearby for every palate, many can deliver to the hotel. I highly recommend this Hyatt for families or business travelers.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your amazing review! We appreciate your kind words and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Very nice hotel and close to Disneyland. However rooms were not quiet so you won‚Äôt get much rest here. You can here every footstep above you and if someone is sneezing or coughing the walls are so thin it sounds like they are in your room! The plumbing for the water is also very loud. You will hear every shower taken

My family and I became Hyatt members last summer, and this recent visit to Anaheim made us so grateful that we did!   We were here for 10 days and nine nights - and every single one was absolutely beyond our expectations! This was an epic vacation!  This staff here is incredible and kind. We met each desk person hired here over such a long stay, and every one of them had the most excellent customer service. We felt like we were at home here, and we credit that to the staff. So friendly and intentional. They went way beyond the ordinary to treat us well, and we appreciate them very much!!  The breakfast is so good too - become a Hyatt member just for that! We looked forward to breakfast each morning. The dining staff were excellent also. On top of it all, our room was beautiful
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your amazing review. We will celebrate your kind words with our staff! We are looking forward to your future visits with us!

Summary: We chose this hotel because of past experiences with other Hyatt Place hotels, and it was convenient to the Anaheim Convention Center.  ACC was an easy walk from the hotel.  5-10 mins easy.  After the business part of my trip ended, we stayed extra to visit Disneyland.  We're walkers, so the 15 min walk to the park was nothing.  Great location for both ACC and Disneyland.  Room was clean, as expected.  We had a high-floor king on floor 5.  We were pleasantly surprised with the size of the bathroom.  Other Hyatt Place hotels we've visited had smaller bathrooms, so that was a plus.  The front desk staff was very helpful and friendly.  We bought our Disneyland tickets right there at the hotel (we just needed 2 days, so you can't find good discounts on just 2 days).  They also
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay! We hope you'll make this your go-to hotel for your future business and leisure trips!

Summary Heading: Great stay and a great value
Summary: This hotel is exceptionally maintained and the staff are so friendly and professional. The queen bed high floor room was large and quiet. possibly the best rest I‚Äôve had in a hotel. The breakfast is real food with many choices.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy that you enjoyed our stay. Please come back soon!

Summary Heading: Fantastic find and great value for your money
Summary: We were there 3 nights for a 4 day Disney trip for my daughter's birthday. We arrived Sunday morning and the staff was accommodating in getting us settled before their official check in time of 2pm. The room was clean and updated. Much, much better in every way aside from the convenience of being next to the park than the Disney California that I stayed at the year before.  The hotel is within walking distance to both the complementary Disney Toy Story bus line as well as the much fast Art buses which runs every 10-15 minutes. It's also next to Morton's and Ruth Chris which provides much better meals compared to the sit down restaurants within the parks themselves.   My best recommendation for this location is that we'll be back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your future stays with us!

Summary: The staff and breakfast are outstanding. The rooms are what you expect for a Hyatt. Overall a great value and would recommend to anyone going with a family to Disneyland and restaurants surround the location.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Great stay at a great property!
Summary: The property is clean and the staff are friendly. The quality of food is very good. The fitness center is maintained very well and has pretty much everything you‚Äôll need for a good workout. Ashley at the bar is very friendly!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We will celebrate your kind words with our staff! Please come back to see us soon!

Summary: The hotel was overall very nice.  Breakfast was excellent.  Room was clean. The bunk beds in the family suite worked out great for our family.  This hotel is a mile walk from the Disneyland which was very easy to do, even after a long day on your feet.  My only complaint is the rooms are not well insulated, so you hear every little noise from your neighbors and the hallway (reason I gave a poor sleep quality-a little melatonin did resolved this)

We enjoyed our stay the room was very clean and comfortable The staff was very helpful from the time we arrived till we parted the hotel. Would stay there again if in the area and would tell friends about the hotel. Very close to walk to Disney for the family.

This is a very convenient hotel to Disneyland.  The rooms are spacious and the beds, even the sofa bed, are super soft and comfortable.  It's nice to have the mini-fridge, but there is no microwave, which would be even better!  The breakfast and coffee bar are fresh and delicious, but stay away from the lunch/dinner menu.  The food is very disappointing.  Lots of restaurants nearby.

The rooms were very spacious and always clean and the staff was attentive.  I took a group of students here for a conference and they were all very impressed with their rooms and the breakfast provided.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy you enjoyed your stay and hope you return for the next conference!

Summary: Our queen room was spacious, clean, modern and well lit. I was expecting it to be bigger coz of the reviews but good enough. Good size tv, many channels. Carpet is good- not that soft Curtains are not traditional, there are two , One is total blackout and the other one is a little sheer. U can choose either or put down both of it. Ac is very good, cool but makes some noise esp if its in auto mode. Bathroom is good and clean, bathtub available And lots of towels Water pressure can be improved, this is one of the things i didnt like here, i hope water pressure was stronger so shower experience would be better. Good parking, it‚Äôs safe in the basement so car doesn‚Äôt get too hot outside during the day. Elevator takes u up on the room levels with room key only, keyless on lobby and

The dining area is small but the staff is great to keep up with the volume of people with food and cleaning available place to sit!! Really is a place to stay couple blocks from Disneyland! Staff is excellent...food is good...no complaints from me
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review! We are so happy you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Hyatt place is always a home away from home. The rooms were clean and the breakfast service is excellent. The location is perfect for Disney with $5 - $7 Uber ride to Downtown Disney and on to the parks.

Everyone was so friendly,  so helpful. I really enjoyed my time there. The girls were so kind they would accommodate all my requests. So very happy with the service they provided me through my whole 4 day stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy you enjoyed your stay! Please come back soon!

Summary: Can‚Äôt complain about the room because it was great. Clean showers, beds, carpet, and windows/mirror. No bugs anywhere.  Staff was okay, very nice but not acomodating or great at solving problems. Wish there was a directory of things to do in the hotel. Breakfast was good but some parts were great (potatoes and OJ = supper yummy)
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing our hotel. We appreciate all feedback and will use that for further training. We hope you'll return next time you are in the area!

Summary: The room is good and the breakfast is so so delicious. Thank Hyatt. Parking lot is so convenience and safety. Only the first day, the shower room drain water is locked and difficult to unlock. Other than that everything is ok. Thanks
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary Heading: Poor Service from the get go
Summary: friendliness- poor  The first hotel I‚Äôve been that ignored quests and I had to ask where the front desk is.  Not a hello nor smile nor welcome!  I apparently interrupted them in some type of training. Is this how you treat your paying guests?

Rooms are excellent. Clean, spacious, bright and amazing beds and bedding. The rest of the hotel is just okay. Didn't use the pool. The breakfast was good to have, and the food was okay, but I didn't love it. If you have kids, you'll be so grateful to have it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy that you had a comfortable stay! We hope you'll stay with for your next Disney trip!

Summary: I am happy to write a review for Briana, Oscar, and Eric. These three young professionals have delivered four days of genuine kindness, helpfulness, and smiles to all who enter the Hyatt Place. It is comforting to visit a new place and be welcomed as these three individuals have done for my group. I appreciate their service as a teacher and my students have enjoyed their trip more because of the courtesy of Briana, Oscar, and Eric.  Job well done.    Patrick Smith King City High School
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review! We will celebrate your kind words with our staff! We look forward to your future stays with us!

Summary: This is the second year we have stayed at this Hyatt property for a student leadership convention that welcomes 7,000+ members and guests. Esmerelda in the group sales department and Eric who is part of the front desk staff are The Best. Reservations are seamless, check-in a breeze and Eric also assisted with reserving rooms for us at a nearby Hyatt property so we could get a head start on travel home. We look forward to bringing our students back next year and will be sure to reserve rooms at this hotel! Highly recommend Hyatt Place if you‚Äôre visiting the Anaheim area!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Your feedback is truly appreciated and will be celebrated with our staff! We look forward to your future stays with us!

Summary Heading: Hyatt over promised on check-in, highly disappointed on delivery
Summary: As a World of Hyatt member, I was looking to get an early check-in for my two rooms. After an early start at Disney, I find it to be a good family strategy to get some rest during the hot afternoon and go back in the evening. It was hot, we were tired, even a half hour earlier check-in would have made a world of difference.   I called in advance and the front office person Ken noted that this was possible and that he would leave a message - he said one room would likely be ready, but we may need to  check in about the other one.   I arrived at about 1pm and was able to check in early on one room, however the other (a king suite with bunk beds) one wasn't ready yet. I asked Samantha if they could accelerate it a bit since my family was needing some rest in the afternoon. She said

I will always stay at this hotel when I‚Äôm in Anaheim!  The rooms are gorgeous, the staff is very friendly, and the continental breakfast is amazing! I wish the parking fee wasn‚Äôt so much, but I‚Äôll get over it!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for reviewing our hotel! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your future stays with us!

Summary: Great staff and service friendly and caring they take the time to make sure you are satisfied  The rooms are very clean. The location is great when visiting the Disneyland attractions I would highly recommend staying here
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. Please come back soon!

Summary: I recently stayed again at this hotel March 24. Everything was great as before. This time we had a king standard room, the bed was really comfortable. My only suggestion would still be that I wish they would add blackout curtains to their rooms, but everything else is great. Breakfast good as usual with hot breakfast options. Our only issue was resolved as soon as I called the hotel. We used the hyatt app to check out (first time using their app) and a few days later I realized the hotel had charged a different night rate than the original rate I had reserved it for. I still had copy of my original confirmation, so they quickly fixed and credited back the difference. I think it was an app glitch, because then again few weeks later had an issue with app, I had reserved for Easter

We are a family of four and stayed at the Hyatt the beginning of March. Our room was the family suite with bunks.  Pros:  - Close to park. About a 20 min walk. -  Complimentary and good quality full breakfast. Had free coffee to go and the option of purchasing Starbucks as well.  - Parkade, which always had spots available. - Maid service was excellent.  Cons: -Breakfast items were very limited - Pool was closed during our stay and was very small. But they did offer the pool at the next door hotel for their guests to use. - Rooms were small. I would hardly call the room a suite. It had silly glass French doors that separated the sleeping areas. So if anyone was watching tv, it lit up both rooms. The bathroom had the same glass door too. Pretty annoying. - All mattresses in the

We stayed here one night after spending the day at the parks. The convenience of being directly across the street from the Disney parking lot is very good. Staff was friendly and helpful. Room clean and beds extremely comfortable. Breakfast was amazing-hot items as well as cereal and fruit. So good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to welcoming you next time you are in the area!

Summary: will not stay there again; need curtains in rooms, lights shine in rooms; also need to communicate to customers if there is a problem with credit card, this was a business meeting and was suppose to be set up by my company.

Summary Heading: Where to stay if not on-site!!
Summary: Always a pleasure staying here and the value is great! Super short walk to the free toy story shuttle so unless I'm shooting the big bucks to stay on site at either the Disneyland Hotel or The Grand Californian- this is where my family and I stay
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay! We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Friendly staff. I felt they tried to accommodate to our needs. Room was clean with plenty of space for the 5 of us in the room. Location was close to Disney and offered where to get free shuttle. I stayed at a Hyatt Place in Ontario CA which gave me the idea to stay at this one. It was the best hotel out of the three we stayed at on our trip. Quiet and peaceful.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. Please come back soon!

Summary: The rooms were large and clean and the staff was very cordial.  The bed was so comfortable, it was by far the most comfortable hotel bed that I slept in. The hotel is about an 8 minute walk to the concevntion center and a 15 minute walk to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are so happy that you had a comfortable stay. We look forward to your future stay next time you are in the area!

Summary: From checking in to the time we left was a great experience. Check in was easy and very welcoming.  Before we left to dinner we received a phone call from the staff asking if they can bring a gift for the kids after over hearing we were celebrating their birthday.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel! We hope your kids had a wonderful birthday! Come back and visit us soon!

Summary: Convenient location and place was clean.  However, check in was not so smooth and not everything was working in the room.  Food included the basics but did not have the variety I‚Äôve experienced in other Hyatt‚Äôs.  Food options were the same every day.  Not totally disappointed but just expected more for Hyatt and the cost of the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel!  We are always looking for ways to improve and we appreciate your feedback.

Summary: My two daughters and I were just at this hotel a couple of weeks ago. We had nine nights here. Our stay was fantastic. Incredibly friendly staff, who were always very helpful, and gave good advise. Breakfast was lovely, pretty much anything you could think of was laid out in a really nice buffet. Our room was spotless. It only took us about 10 minutes to walk to the gates at Disneyland. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone. We really enjoyed our stay! Thank you. Hope to stay again in the future :)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay! Please come back and see us soon!

Summary: Great hotel with an awesome breakfast every morning. Took the train up from dan Diego to stay the weekend for WonderCon (our 3rd year in a row staying here). Soooo close to the Anaheim convention center and usually the cheapest out of the 4 hotels so this is our go to, and it has free breakfast. Love this place!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel! We are thrilled to hear about your stay! We look forward to welcoming you next year!

Summary: Great location, good distance to Disney and outdoor pool was perfect for the kids, not too big, not too deep. Room was clean and included breakfast was ok. There was no place to park upon arrival which was pretty late but I just could not understand why there isn't sufficient parking spots. The service was great, no complaints there. My wife loved the house wine and kids loved the bunk beds. Over all a great stay!

This Hyatt Place is a little different from couple others at other locations. Of all the people who worked at the front desk, most of them were new and so were on training. When we had special situations they didn't know how to handle them correctly.  First it happened at check in. There was only one person, a brand new employee on duty. The line was getting long. After waiting for quite a while it finally was our turn. Yet someone cut us off and walked right up to the counter, instead of informing the man he needed to get in line, she served that guy immediately. We didn't want to make a scene but we felt your hotel could have trained/prepared your employees to handle things like that more professionally.  Another incident was when we were trying to rent a scooter through a

Summary Heading: Great Lattes by the front desk
Summary: We went for a family trip. We wanted something close to Disney so we would not have to rent a car. We used Uber from airport and there were free Disney shuttles right down a block from the Hyatt place hotel/ The rooms were clean and we had the amenities we needed. The room was ready when we arrived. We had a good nights sleep it was quiet and nice and dark. The breakfast was good and there were a few different options. Overall was a good place to stay close to Disney. I would stay here again

Excellent stay. Everyone there deserves a raise. The price was on the high side, but that is to be expected for the location. Breakfast was good quality, so take advantage of it. Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We greatly appreciate your kind words and they will be celebrated with the staff! Please come back and stay with us soon!

Summary: Hotel is moderate, very clean and excellent staff. Free breakfast was a bonus and overall very good. 15 minute walk to Disneyland or a 5 minute walk to the Toy Story parking lot to use the complimentary Disney shuttle. Overall would recommend it to families looking for a reasonable hotel with large rooms and complimentary breakfast.

Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort always provide clean spacious rooms and superb customer service. Breakfast is delicious as well. The option to check-in and out online make the process go quick and smooth.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay! We hope you come back to visit soon!

Summary: After reading so many great reviews we thought we couldn't go wrong. Although the hotel was clean and the staff was friendly the breakfast was minimal, and the rooms could use some help. They were nice, but the shower drains very slowly and the beds are very hard. Plus, after "taxes" parking is over $23 a night. Again,  it's a nice location, and it was a clean hotel but with so many choices in the area we would likely not stay again for the price.

Spent 6 days here.. room was always clean and well kept and the breakfast was always well stocked. The staff seemed young but helpful, knowledgeable, and positive! Obviously a Disneyland hotel so tons of families are there but it‚Äôs handled well! Parking is tight but adequate. Short walk to the convention center is nice. Especially nice are the thick walls - I rarely heard any noise and that was from the hallway! That alone is worth 5 stars in a Disney hotel!! The water temp rarely varied and is very hot - I would stay here again and highly recommend it for a convention center visit!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Great stay for families visiting Disneyland. Clean and comfortable rooms. Free breakfast for world of Hyatt members. Close walk to Toy story parking lot where you can catch free shuttle bus to the parks. Only thing is you do have to pay for parking which can get a little pricey. But overall great place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us! Please come back soon!

Summary: To have major tourist attractions and be a tourist favorite destination; racism is still alive and well. I have a bi-racial family and my wife wanted to say something to several people multiple times about looking at me like I had a tail growing from my forehead.

Very friendly staff.  Breakfast was not quite the same as other Hyatt place, but definitely acceptable.  Heat was not working in the room and did not want to switch rooms, but staff brought temporary heater to the room till the maintenance staff fixed it the next morning.

This hotel was great to stay.  We had 5 of us and plenty of room.  The breakfast for members is wonderful.  The hotel is conveniently located close to the Disneyland parking lot so we just walked over every morning to the parking lot and road the DL shuttle in free of charge.  It was a great place to stay for a Disney Trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay! Please come back soon!

Summary: Great room options with bunks for children, so no fussing!  Sitting area makes it a step above others!  Breakfast for members a great bonus in this setting/park activities. Parking handy as well as transportation to park reasonably close proximity.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay! Please come back soon!

Summary: Great location, great service, great staff. Breakfast could use a switch up and not have the same thing each day. I was not happy paying a transient fee of $34.00 each night to have Transients sleeping on the sidewalk in front of the hotel.

Overall great stay.  Friendly staff. Clean room.  There was a noise at night that was somewhat annoying, maybe construction.  Free breakfast if you have membership.  Pool, spa, gym.  Close to Toy Story parking lot that provides shuttle to disneyland park.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for families and convenient to all nearby attractions
Summary: The hotel is a great choice for family vacations.  Clean with an amazing staff.  Very helpful.  Will definitely stay again. The views were also nice and parking was very convenient.  The breakfast was a good bonus that got our day off to a good start.

The need to work on customer service. A very bad experience for my family and I.  The parking is a RIP off. By the end of my trip with them I paid 74.00 for parking each time you leave the property you had to pay 6.00

This hotel is located within walking distance to a CVS, Walgreens, and IHOP. We were also able to walk to the Woody Toy Story Disneyland parking lot, then hop on a shuttle to the main entrance to the parks. Check in and parking were easy and breakfast was included!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay! Please come back soon!

Summary: The rooms are great! Everything is spotlessly clean and the desk people are pleasant. The location is great too. If you're here for a convention, Disney, or checking out the local breweries (fanatstic!) this hotel is located near it all! I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we can't wait for your return!

Summary Heading: Great place for a family Disneyland stay
Summary: We had two family suites for eight of us which served us very well. The hotel seems fairly new and very well maintained. I felt it was an excellent value when compared to other properties in the area. I would definitely stay there again with the next group of grandkids we take to Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy that you and your family enjoyed your stay! We hope you visit soon!

Summary: The entire experience was wonderful from check-in to check-out.  the breakfast was excellent.  The staff incredibly helpful.  This was our second time at this location and we were very pleased.  The standards are excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are especially happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay! Please come back and visit soon!

Summary: This hotel was perfect and convenient but parking is horrible. I suggest you get there early and Lyft/Uber if it‚Äôs not in walking distance so you don‚Äôt have to loose a spot. It is convenient as it is walking distance to the park (about 3 blocks) and right across the street from the Disney Parking lot that provides free shuttles.

The pillows has bugs , my wife get rash in  here face  its call ,,,,demodex ,,,  and i got rash in my hand and my face too , and same thing with my kids ,,,,, never rent again , i should get my Money back

Very good service and helpful staff.  doors were a little loud when closing in the hotel but that was the only issue on a very nice stay. Will be staying again when in the area. Good location to Anaheim Convention center and Disney Land
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We appreciate your feedback and can't wait to see you next time you are in the area!

Summary: Everyone was wonderful! The breakfast was great. The staff exceptional and the rooms large and clean! Great value and close to everything. I thought Leticia, one of the kitchen staff, treated us like family and did her best to make sure everyone had what they needed for breakfast. She was working hard the entire time. We stayed their six days and loved it. Definitely will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review! Your words will be celebrated with our staff! We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Based on other reviews, Hyatt Place was our choice for a trip to Disneyland.  It did not disappoint!Clean rooms, friendly service, morning breakfast and easy access to the Toy Story parking lot shuttle.  to the parks.  Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We chose this hotel because others in our party were going to be staying there.  We were very pleasantly surprised at the size of our room and the amenities of the hotel.  The breakfast bar had a nice variety of selections and was different each day of our stay.  The only drawback is that the hotel does not have its own Disneyland shuttle.  It's a 5 minute walk to the Toy Story parking lot shuttle across the street.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay! Please come back and visit us soon!

Summary Heading: Hair on bed and in the bathroom
Summary: When we first entered the room, there was hair in the bed. Also hair in the bathroom. Very disgusting!!! Do check your bed sheet if you choose this hotel.  The AC is the very load. Make sure you keep it on or turn it off during the night. If you switch to "AUTO", you will be waked up by the noise.

Only drawback for this hotel for our quick Disney trip is that the beds are quite firm which is not our preference, but that's a reasonable issue to deal with when you have a nice facility, spacious room, super friendly and helpful staff and GREAT location to catch the trams to the park.

Summary Heading: Great Stay for Families Going to Disney
Summary: What an excellent location!  Located less than a mile from the park entrance, we walked to and from everyday of our visit. The hotel and the room was super clean. Breakfast was hotel breakfast nothing special, but fueled us up for the full days ahead. The seating areas was pretty full, so they opened up one of the meeting spaces for overflow seating. We ended up just taking ours back to the room. There are parking fees, but I believe worth it to keep park visitors from taking up the spaces. Every employee we encountered was super nice. We were greeted or said have a nice day to every time we walked by. The only minor complaint is the bed was a little hard for my taste. When we decide to come back to the park, we will be staying here again.

This hotel is in a great location. You walk across the street and you are at the Toy Story Parking lot where you can catch a shuttle to Disney.  Do yourself a favor and reserve a room with the breakfast rate. You will not be disappointed! The food was fresh and there was plenty of it!  The rooms are very quiet. The only downside is the bedding is very noisy.

My wife and I stayed at the Hyatt Place and were able to walk to Disneyland. The breakfast selection was good, too, and much better than your average hotel breakfast. We enjoyed their coffee, fresh fruit, and yogurt selection.

This is an excellent hotel to stay at if you plan on visiting Disneyland or nearby attractions.  The staff was great and helpful.  You get free breakfast if you're a World of Hyatt member.  I didn't like staying on the ground floor but it turned out fine - just a little noise at the hallway.  Overall, great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I was there for business and thought the stay was fine. It was quiet and the breakfast was quite good. The only thing that I was a tiny bit disappointed in was the size of the fitness center. There were four of us in there and it was pretty crowded. All in all a great stay though.

The staff was very polite and hopeful very attentive and courteous to everyone including They found my cellular in the room I left it behind and they called me immediately to let me know to pick it up from the front desk
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay.We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: For Quality & Consistency STAY AT THE HOMEWOOD SUITES across the street
Summary: We attend an annual event in Anaheim and first stayed here 3 years ago, when we had a nice Specialty Queen room.   Last year, I booked us back into this hotel. Our stay was a disaster, as the Specialty Queen Suite we had reserved 6 months in advance, was not available for the 1st night of our stay, so we had the inconvenience of having to change rooms after the 1st night.   NOTE: It is very in convenient, when living out of suitcases, to not be able to fully unpack and settle in, especially food and toiletries. Then, to add insult to injury, the bed sheets in our substitute room were wrinkled and appeared to have not been changed, so we moved to yet another room. The following day, we had to interrupt our day to move into our Specialty Queen room. Yes, management offered to move

Rooms were exceptionally clean and the morning breakfast was very good with a wide variety of options. Staff was friendly and courteous. Location was great; a five minute walk took us to the Toy Story parking lot where complimentary shuttles to Disneyland were available.  Room rates were reasonable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope you choose our hotel for your next vacation!

Summary: Took two managers for a business trip. We were very happy with the quality of service, cleanliness and breakfast. Could not have asked for more. We would have no problem recommending this property and will stay here again with out question.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you the next time you are in the area!

Summary: I stayed with two friends - we found the hotel clean and the room was comfortable. Overall impressions:  ‚Ä¢ One thing we noticed that there were a lot of advertisements of bacon at breakfast - but there was none.   ‚Ä¢ Parking does not have a turn around for Taxi/Ubers - it has the arm right there and no way to turn around or get picked up.  ‚Ä¢ Walkable to the Disneyland parking lot across the street where you can catch a shuttle to the park.  ‚Ä¢ The elevators are very slow- over 5 min waits since we were on the top floor.  ‚Ä¢ We appreciated that the staff knew we were there for a private end at Disneyland.

Sleeping rooms are spacious and comfortable, good layout. Light  canceling window coverings were fantastic! Breakfast was quality and good selection, and all staff members were friendly.  Parking was easy.

This hotel was amazing! The staff is exceptional, we lived that we were able to get food 24/7 and breakfast is great! The hotel is about a 15-20 minute walk to Disneyland but it was perfect for my older children. You could use Uber or Lyft for a quick ride as well
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We hope you choose to stay with us next time you are in the area!

Summary: We were a party of 5 adults and one child. All fit comfortably in one room. As a Hyatt member, we all received free breakfast. Wonderful breakfast buffet, with delicious real potatoes, chicken sausage, fresh fruit plus other items. A short walk, less than 3 blocks, takes you to the Disneyland parking lot with a free shuttle to the entrance of the park. You can keep your car in the hotel garage while at Disneyland, so you don't have to pay for Disneyland parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay! Please come back next time you are in the area!

Summary Heading: Confirmation numbers may not be honored
Summary: Decent clean rooms even if overpriced for the size you get. But will they have your reservation? We made reservations on the hotel‚Äôs website the evening of. When we arrived later that night we were told the hotel was fully booked. The lady at the desk said they knew there was something wrong with their website that caused the website to sometimes give confirmation numbers that weren‚Äôt real. Then she tried to put us in a more expensive room with a price break. (If you‚Äôll recall this conversation started with the assertion the hotel was fully booked.) The happy-ish ending to the story is that she eventually found us a room at less than the rate we expected to pay but not before we almost walked out to try to find a different place to stay late at night.

This hotel has very nice spacious rooms.  Their specialty room with 2 large rooms including a dinette and small kitchen area is wonderful when with children.  Their breakfast fare could use some sweet rolls, but otherwise it is very good.  Everything to eat is quite fresh.  Would like to see it open earlier than seven however.  Rooms are made up early and kept very clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! We hope you choose to stay with us the next time you are in the area!

Summary: Very helpful staff, comfy, spacious and clean rooms. It‚Äôs about a mile from Disneyland. Good walking distance for adults, but would think twice if with kids. Overall my experience in this hotel was exceptional.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are so happy to hear that we met your expectations. Please come back next time you are in the area!

Summary: I stayed here for 4 nights on a business trip and stay at other locations as I travel frequently.   Check in was quick and efficient.  I was put on the 5th, top, floor.  The hotel has some outdated features but is well maintained.  The room was a good size and spotless.  There is a mini fridge and a single cup coffee maker.  There is no microwave.  There is a separate but small area for sitting, a desk and closet.  Bathroom is a good size with a single sink.  The breakfast was okay but it would be nice to see some variety from day to day.  The staff is very good. The one big suggestion I would make is to have the 5th floor as a quiet floor.

Summary Heading: Perfect choice for a Disneyland visit
Summary: We recently stayed 4 nights and loved the location (2 blocks and an easy walk to Disneyland even for my 4 year old!) and close proximity to many eating options across the road at Garden Walk or even Blaze Pizza on the ground floor made great pizzas! And a small Walgreens on site for any incidentals needed.   Staying in a studio room the layout was great - a small kitchen, living area and two queen beds which where super comfortable.   My daughter loved that the pool was heated to a temperature she could swim in even on a particularly cold LA day and I loved the hot tub.   Catering breakfast to the masses all wanting to eat in time to get to Disneyland could be a challenge for some hotels but the Hyatt has this down to a fine art - not the most amazing breakfast but well
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time review our hotel. Your kind words will be shared with our staff! We hope you come back to stay with us!

Summary: Big breakfast area with lots of seating. Breakfast served promptly on time. Underground parking spots spacious and easy to access. Room meets the excellent standards of a Hyatt Place. Only downside is when your neighbors upstairs wake up at 4am to get ready for Magic Hour.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope you come back soon!

Summary Heading: CLEAN, WELL PRICED HOTEL CLOSE TO PARKS
Summary: We thought this Hyatt property was in reasonably close proximity to the Disney parks. It was about 2 blocks to the 'Toy Story' parking lots, which then offers free shuttles every 5-10 minutes to/from Disney. The hotel is clean & offers free breakfast buffet to Hyatt members. Bar menu is primarily appetizers. Restaurants within walking distance are pricey.

Great staff, close enough to walk from Disneyland, excellent breakfast. Bed was a little hard for my liking but that‚Äôs it.  They made out stay amazing! The family room is a great option with the bunk beds.   Pros: staff Food Location  Room size   Cons: Bed

First time staying at Hyatt Place for our Disneyland trip and was pleasantly surprised.  The free breakfast in the morning was a great selling point.  They do charge $20 for parking, but it's a standard for hotels in the area. Disneyland is in walking distance, but it's a pretty far walk after being on your feet all day.  Uber is only around $7 and the Toy Story shuttle is across the street.  Would definitely stay again.

Summary Heading: Awesome Hotel for the Family Disney Holiday
Summary: Our family of five were well accommodated in a spacious and well appointed room. The room was exceptionally clean with two very comfortable double beds and a great pull-out bed that was more than satisfactory for a child. Located within easy walking distance to the Disney parks (about 1.4km or a 20 minute walk) or there is the option of walking 5 minutes to the Toy Story Car Park and getting the free Disney bus. This hotel was everything we could have hoped for at a great price
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay! Please come back and stay with us soon!

Summary: This is a great hotel if you are travelling to Disneyland. The rooms are great and the service is second to none. Great location, only 2 blocks from the free shuttles to Disney. The bunk bed suites were perfect for the kids and the buffet breakfast every morning was outstanding.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The Hyatt impressed with a spacious room for our family of five at a great price. The room was very clean and serviced daily. The two double beds were comfortable and the pull out bed was more than adequate for a child. The hotel is close to a good variety of family friendly restaurants and an easy walk 20 minute to the Disney Parks or there is also the option of the free bus from one of the Disney carparks (5 minute walk)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We hope to see you and your family next time you are in town!

Summary: Great family hotel for visiting Disneyland.  The room was well arranged with bunk beds for the kids.   The pool and spa were both used a lot by our kids - spa was nice and warm and the pool refreshing.  We also made use of the small but well equipped gym.
