If I can provide any assistance, please contact me directly.  Best regards,  Alfredo Sanedrin General Manager Hyatt Place at Anaheim

Summary: Good hotel for Disney visitors - close proximity to park and attractions. Beware if you are not patient with families and kids because that is what the hotel is geared towards. Great staff and comfortable, well appointed rooms.
Manager Response: Dear T6828KIkathleenm:  Thank you, for taking the time to write this wonderful review! We love to read that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and appreciated our proximity to Disneyland, and I'll be sure to forward your comments to our staff. Again, thank you for the recommendation, and we hope to be able to welcome you again soon!   Best regards,  Alfredo Sanedrin General Manager Hyatt Place at Anaheim

Summary: Good location close to lots of places mostly friendly service, good breakfast..when we requested a microwave they made it available...I wish they had a coffee bar 24/7 the pool was heated the gym was open anytime and they have a quiet courtesy policy after 10....I would come back but would request a carpet cleaning
Manager Response: Dear mariaoD8061KG:  Thank you for completing our Guest Survey regarding your recent stay at our hotel. Your compliments regarding our location and the value it offer are greatly appreciated I apologize that your experience  on our carpet was anything less than satisfying. Feedback such as yours assists us in improving our service and property. In addition, please know that your comments and issues will be addressed.   It is our hope that you give us another opportunity to serve you. Again, I apologize for the inconvenience during your stay and hope to see you during your next visit. If I can provide any assistance, please contact me directly.   Best regards,  Alfredo Sanedrin General Manager Hyatt Place at Anaheim

Summary: Staff was very courteous and  great customer service given as soon as I checked in. Room is very clean and in order. I found everything that I need. I have enough towels and pillows . The only area that's not very impressive is the food service . The spinach n the salad line is not thoroughly washed . You can taste it. Overall, I highly recommend this place to anyone especially on the ones on a business trip .
Manager Response: Dear Maria H  Thank you very much for your wonderful review! The staff and I truly appreciate that you took the time to share your experience and views. I will make sure to share this with the staff and we hope you are able to return and stay with us again in the future. I apologize regarding your salad. Feedback such as your assists us in improving our service and property. In addition, please know your comment and issues will be addressed.  We look forward to being of service to you in the near future.   Best regards,  Alfredo Sanedrin General Manager Hyatt Place at Anaheim

Summary: Staff went out of their way to make the family feel welcome (Disney pictures, large plate of warm cookies). Add on top of that a great location (5 minute walk to Disney parking lot shuttle), nice breakfast buffet and a good pool. This may become our go-to place when visiting Disneyland.

Our stay here at the Hyatt Place was great! The staff know how to take care of their guests. Breakfast was included in our stay and it wasn't just cold food. They also had hot breakfast items and Seattles Best coffee which is owned by Starbucks. VERY GOOD VALUE!!!!

Summary Heading: Great alternative to Disney owned hotels.
Summary: Great hotel.  Priced well. Walking distance to Disneyland.  The pool area is lacking. But all in all a very nice hotel with very good service, food, location and very clean. We had a room with a king bed and bunk beds for the kids.  Two TVs was very nice as kids could watch in their portion of the room.

We found this place online after searching for one room to Accommodate our family of 4.  The room gave everyone their space without being crowded. The service was excellent and the availability for food at anytime astounding.  A quick walk to the Disney parking lot to catch a shuttle was a bonus but you could easily walk.  Surrounding area was lively and felt safe.

Rooms could accommodate up to 6 with the sleeper sofa. Outdoor pool and jacuzzi. Great morning breakfast option. Best of all located 1 block from the Disney shuttle. Only major negative I felt was the fee charged for parking.

Enjoyed a three night stay. Central location worked well for Us. Staff is helpful and friendly. Clean and well equipped rooms - comfortable. Will definitely visit this hotel again when visiting Orange County.

Summary Heading: Great location for conferences or Disneyland
Summary: Super convenient for our conference stay. Check in was fast and friendly. Hotel is contemporary and room was spacious.  AM breakfast had a lot of good options.  After housekeeping cleaned, she only left one washcloth. Other than that, all good!

I really like this hotel. They're very friendly and the room is really nice. I like the free breakfast and all the other stuff they offer. Jamie at the front desk is also very sweet. 10 out of 10 I recommend if you are going to anywhere in this area.

It was cool best place ever recommend you come if you don't come here you're crazy and if you did you made the best decision of your life service is the best you will probably will or ever get and the staff is the best

Nice clean hotel, very friendly staff. Close to and within walking distance of Disneyland. Vehicle parking charge in a area where there is no on street parking or parking without a charge, this is not a reasonably priced hotel because of the location so charging for parking is like the airlines charging to check a bag, just a extra money revenue grab. Good breakfast bar, lots and lots of items! Should you be a biscuits and gravy fan, don't! The gravy is either made there or if from a purveyor it is watered because it is thin and flavorless.

Came here for a family vacay to Disneyland and simple words: clean, affordable, accommodating to kids, good complimentary breakfast and short walk to shuttles to Disneyland. Friendly staff as well. Only one small negative I would have liked that the room had a microwave. But overall would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Hello Vinnyv549, Thank you for taking time to post your review on TripAdvisor.  We appreciate hearing from you and sharing your experience.

Summary Heading: Hyatt Place continues to amaze us with their consistency and value pricing
Summary: This is the second Hyatt Place we've stayed in the past 6 months (last visit was in Reno, NV).  We are fans of the Park Hyatt's for our luxury travel (last visit was to Milan), not so much the Regency's (not sure why we are always disappointed).    We needed a "value" hotel for single night stays and wanted to use our Hyatt points.  One thing that I will rave about is how fair Hyatt is on claiming points for rooms.    We went with high expectations for this location based on our positive experience at the Reno property (you can see my review of Reno).  We were not disappointed in Anaheim either.  What is consistent is the property is in excellent condition, even when compared to 5 star Hotels.  On this trip we stayed at the Disneyland hotel for several days while we were at the
Manager Response: Hello ro953, Thanks for posting your comments on TripAdvisor.  We are pleased to see that your stay was very pleasant and that you found everything to be to your ultimate satisfaction.  And thank you for your Hyatt loyalty.

Summary: This hotel is located within easy walking distance to the parks. There are good restaurants also within walking for the family. The room had bunk beds for the kids that they would love and a divider to separate them from parents.  If I was there on a family vacation I would look to stay here for all those reasons. Good breakfast and clean secure parking as well.
Manager Response: Hi Barry, Thank you for your five star review.  We are pleased to see that your stay was most enjoyable and that you were completely satisfied with the Hyatt Place.  We know there are many hotel choices in Anaheim and Hyatt Place is an outstanding choice for sure.  If you have plans to bring your family to Anaheim please do let us know.  Thanks again!

Summary: I stayed with my family at this hotel from February 19 to February 22. We found the rooms very tidy and clean.  The environment  of hotel  was very friendly  and professional.  The food  was also good and served well. The attitude  of staff was very friendly.  The front desk staff especially Ms Jamie is a wonderful  lady who guided us very well about different places to be visited around. Indeed Ms Jaime helped us a lot to make best use of our visit. Me and my family are grateful to her for all her assistance.  Overall it is a very nice place very  close to Disneyland and we will like to come  and stay here again
Manager Response: Hello Akhtar, Thank you for your review.  We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you found our staff to be most accommodating, friendly and helpful.  And thanks for recognizing Jaime for her outstanding customer care.  Her care and concern for all of our guests is always top on her mind and in this case it shows.  She will be pleased to know that your stay was all the more pleasant as a result of her helpful attitude.  Let us know when you plan to return.

Summary: Staff went out of their way to post Disney character pictures on the walls and put a huge plate of warm chocolate chip cookies in the room. Great staff who are there to help. Hotel is 5 minute walk to Disneyland parking where you can easily grab shuttle to the park.
Manager Response: Dear briane208, Thanks for your review on TripAdvisor.  We are pleased to see that your stay was enjoyable and that you enjoyed the cookies and the excellent care provided by our staff.

Summary: Stayed 5th floor facing street. A little noise but nothing to worry about. Couldn't see fireworks bc there only happen on the weekends off peak season.  Hotel felt new and clean and I'm very picky about cleanliness. Love bedroom separate from LR/kitchen. Wonderful housekeeping service - place was immaculate every day. Used laundry on 5th flr very convenient. 2 washing machines and many dryers. i think it was 1 dollar or 1.50 per machine. quarters at the front desk. Breakfast was excellent and the breakfast staff was on top of it and very friendly to the kids. Lots of cut fruit grapefruit, oranges, melons, pineapple.  Kind of a long walk to disneyland but I would stay here again given the value of this place.  Disney channels on the 2 tvs in the suite. Walgreens just downstairs
Manager Response: Hi Karen, I believe your review may actually be for the Hyatt House at the corner of Harbor and Katella.  If you are able to re-post to the Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center I am sure they would appreciate it. Thanks!

Summary: We enjoyed our stat at the Hyatt Place in Anaheim.  We were in town for a convention but also extended our stay for vacation.  The hotel was in good condition and the room was in good shape.  Our only complaint was some stains on the sofa cushions.  Staff were all very friendly and attentive to our needs.  The breakfast bar is really very nice every day and it helps offset the cost on a family trip.  We would definitely stay at this location again.
Manager Response: Hello Adam, Thanks for your very nice review.  Happy to see that our staff was most helpful and that your enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: We had a good time staying at this Hyatt. The only issue we had was missing towels at the beginning of our stay. It is close to Disneyland so we walked every day to the park. Good breakfast and friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  And our apologies for the missing towels in the beginning of your stay but glad that everything ended well and that your enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Had the best experience at this hotel, they go way beyond to help you out with everything. We were served by Christine who was absolutely amazingly helpful as we had just had a nightmare flight and issue at the airport! Cannot thank Christine enough for all her help! She was our angel for our stay! Definitely be back soon! Thankyou for everything!
Manager Response: Hi Cachia L, Thank you for taking time to share your comments about your recent stay with us.  We are pleased to see that you really enjoyed your visit.  Let us know when you plan to visit again!

Summary: In town for a convention. Katie at front desk went above and beyond to make most welcome. Room nice and wonderful breakfast.  Room was booked with incorrect information and Katie used her expertise to resolve issue in minutes.
Manager Response: Thanks for your excellent review.  We will be sure to give Katie a high five in your honor for her excellent customer service.

Summary: Rooms condition excellent, just as shown in their pictures, decor, furnishings etc, all as shown on their website. My only complaint is that rooms appear larger in pictures than in real life. It is basically the size of a normal hotel room (is not the size of a family suite) beds are full size beds as well as the pull out sofa is full size. So it serves the purpose of sleeping 6 is you needed to, but it does feel cramped and you would not have privacy. Also you better be confortable if you are staying with extended family in the same room because the bathroom door is glass/frosted, so for us sharing a room with another couple sister & brother in law, was a bit of an inconvenience. We were only using the room to spend the night after a day at Disney & would be leaving the next
Manager Response: Thanks for your excellent review.  We appreciate your comments and happy to see that you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Their family suite is the best! very spacious. We really enjoyed our stay with a 7 month infant and a 5 yr old. The complimentary breakfast was the best! Totally recommend if your going to Disneyland. It's very near and it's a $6.60 cab ride to the park.
Manager Response: Hi, Thank you for sharing your stay experience at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort.  We appreciate your comments and are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: Kudos to Peter and Cory.  We went for a Disney trip.  We walked to the Toy Story lot, located across the street.  It may have been quicker to just walk to Disney. About 10 minutes.   Great breakfast and overall service.  Loved it and will be back.
Manager Response: Hi Dave A, Thanks for your excellent review of the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center.  We are pleased to see that Cory and Peter were helpful during your visit and that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Let us know if we can welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Not a great place to stay
Summary: I used my reward night to stay in this hotel. Overall, i feel it is not a worth for money spending to stay in this hotel. I would not recommend to friends and family to stay this this hotel. The only plus with this place is its proximity to disneyland.

Summary Heading: It's the Little Things that Matter!
Summary: My family and I found this hotel online via TripAdvisor and wow so glad we booked here. We were only staying for a night and headed Ron disneyland the next day so the stay was short but one of the best hotel experiences I've had in my life. I've stayed at resorts, hotels boutique and commercial and for the cost Hyatt Park Place is a steal!!  Extremely positive review of the property and most staff! Stand outs include: Jamie- A+, 5 Star, AAA 5-diamond Customer service. She interacted with my family and was so patient and kind to my daughters. She even sent up a birthday cheesecake for my daughter I was blown away and so was my wife and daughters. How kind, considerate and thoughtful. It literally went beyond our expectations of a hotel experience.   Mitchell- there was a spill in

Great value hotel...outstanding friendly service, good food, 15-20 min walking distance to Disneyland, free shuttle to Disneyland located a block away, and clean rooms! Special thanks to Jamie (front desk) for your exceptional service in helping us with everything we needed! I will definitely come back again!

The perfect place to stay when visiting Disneyland, you can catch the tram right across the street. Very close the the convention center. Rooms a roomy and very clean. Nice hot breakfast included in your stay.

Summary Heading: Excellent option for the Disneyland area
Summary: We frequently stay in the Anaheim area for weekend trips to Disneyland and after staying at a few other hotels in the area, decided to give this Hyatt a try.  Self-parking was simple and valet offered as well for the same price. Check-in is painless and they even had a room ready for us a few hours early. Breakfast the next morning was surprisingly good and heading to Disneyland with a full stomach is the only way to go!  What I liked most about this hotel was how quiet it was. No slamming doors, no screaming kids in the hall, no thin walls - just a great place to spend the evening.  We walked to Disneyland in a casual 15 minutes but if you prefer transportation, walk across the street to the Toy Story lot and take a free bus to the Disneyland entrance.  Staff is very friendly

I stayed just one night for a trip to Disney, and I think is a great option because is really near from Disney, the rate is not bad, and also include the breakfast, so with that, you save at least 20 bucks!  The beds are really comfortable, everything looks new and clean. Also great service from staff!

I stayed here for a conference and my family came along to enjoy Anaheim.  The rooms are very spacious.  We had two double beds and there was a sectional sofa with a pull out bed.  Perfect for a family.  Breakfast was great.  Several hot options and they change it up daily.  Easy access to the convention center (5 min. walk) and to the Toy Story shuttle to get to all things Disney.

It's a very good and nice hotel it's near Disney land!! It's very nice and modern the rooms are beautiful and comfortable, love it!!! The breakfast it's good, delicious very recomendable!! The gym need new stuffs like mats.

Quite basic hotel close to Disneyland, walk to Disney parks took about 15 min.  The hotel is clean and they serve complimentary breakfast, what was really good. Theres lots of parking space where to park. Rooms were quiet and sleep quality good.

This review is long overdue and beyond deserved!  I've had a note sitting on my desk for almost 4 months saying "write about Hyatt!" It is important that I share my thoughts....so here goes!!  My family and I stayed at a local competitor of the Hyatt while visiting Disneyland for a week last October, 2016.  We had reached the end of our stay only to find out that our flight(s) might be cancelled due to a huge unexpected storm that was hitting Oregon (where we are from).  My friends met us at Disney for the previous week and they stayed at the Hyatt.  They RAVED about it.  We were so unhappy with our hotel :(.  After we realized that we may not be able to go home...we kinda panicked.  Based on what my friends had told me, we drove down the street to the Hyatt.  I walked in,

Quiet. Good restaurants within walking distance, clean rooms. Comfortable beds. Breakfast was good with good variety. Close to  free bus to Disneyland. Would stay there again and recommend to friends. Did not use pool or spa area.

Summary Heading: Most amazing, magical memories made here!
Summary: We came her for our son's 3rd birthday since its location is prime, being so close to Disneyland. The staff went above and beyond to make my son's birthday memorable...upgrading us to a suite, gave him a free chocolate cake and even met us at the pool to sing him happy birthday with gourmet cupcakes! We will never forget this trip!! Thank you Hyatt Place!

The hotel was nice and the staff was friendly.   Check in was quick and easy.  Check out was also easy.  The free breakfast was different every day.   It was very conveniently located near Disney land and the convention center.

Summary Heading: Great new hotel - perfect location for Convention Center and Disney
Summary: I stayed 5 nights as part of a business trip at the Anaheim Convention Center.   This was my first stay at this location, but won't be my last.  PROS:    -  spacious, clean rooms    -  staff was very friendly    -  rooms are quiet    -  5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center    -  large, clean eating area - lots of seating options (great for families!)    -  limited room service menu, but available 24/7 and at reasonable prices    -  parking garage is underground, and was never full.  Easy access to garage from elevators.     CONS:    -  check-in process could be improved.  There are only two attendants at the front desk, which creates quite a bottleneck if convention groups are checking in/checking out.   That is a minor negative given the staff was always courteous and

Hotel was clean...courteous staff...great breakfast...easy parking...great location.  Nicely appointed and really a great value to be so close to Disneyland and yet not have to stay "in the park"!  Very nice lobby for chatting and enjoying beer or glass of wine also. Lots of restaurants(if you want a full meal) if you don;t mind walking just bit...not too far for any of them.

I had never stayed at a Hyatt Place before and was pleasantly surprised how nice it was given the reasonable rate.  The room was very large with the added couch area, exceptionally clean, very comfortable beds, and a decent breakfast.  I was kind of sorry our stay was so short.

Traveled to Anaheim for a Disneyland trip with family.  The Hyatt was an excellent place to stay.  Convenient to the park.  Room was very comfortable and quiet and full breakfast was a treat.  Really appreciated the security features in place.  Highly recommend.

We have stayed here many times. Staff is always friendly, check in process has always been easy, clean rooms, breakfast is great.    We often come back From a long day at Disneyland and the dinner service is good and our kids love the food.

We stayed here while visiting Disneyland.  We were able to walk across the street into the Toy Story parking lot and catch the free shuttle to Disneyland.  Super convenient.   Nice clean room.  Good breakfast buffet with good gluten free options.

We stayed overnight in a family suite with grandma, grandpa, our kids and us. The room was roomy and we appreciated the sofa bed for the kids. We would enjoyed our stay and loved this location. It was a bargain for all of us to stay and the best HOT hotel breakfast we've ever had!

Had a small issue at check in with my room being ready.  That being said, I was actually checking in before the official check in time.  The staff was accommodating and friendly.   The hotel was clean and quiet and the location was excellent, allowing me to save some money and attend a conference at an adjacent hotel.

The Hyatt Place was absolutely outstanding. The rooms were very clean and the beds were great. The staff was always so friendly and helpful. Whenever we returned we were always greeted with a smile and a "welcome back!"   The complimentary breakfast was simply the best I have ever had at a hotel that was included with the stay. Everything was always hot and the quality was great. Eggs, bacon, sausage, pancakes, french toast, breads, and juice every morning. You could tell the items were actually cooked and not just microwaved like at some other hotels.  My wife and I walked to Disneyland every morning and it was an easy 15 minute walk and there were lots of other families making the walk as well. If you don't want to walk it you can go to the Toy Story parking lot and catch the

Hotel was great. We flew into Long Beach around 9:30 pm and got luggage, car and drove to hotel. It is easy to find on googlemap. We have stayed at many Hyatt Place hotels. First time we needed to pay for parking but Anaheim seems to get to charge in all the hotels because of its proximity to Disneyland. Parking was $17. Hotel was clean, rooms were nice, with sofa area as always in Hyatt Place. Breakfast was tasty and lots of choices. Cookies were offered for free if review is written. The absolute best cookie I have ever eaten.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center.  We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. BTW, Long Beach Airport is one of the best kept secrets for those coming in to our area.  Smaller airport, no lines, no waiting and just about 18 miles away.   Thanks again for your review.

Summary: My wife and I planed our first Disneyland vacation without our kid in 20 years. Our stay at The Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center was 5 Star, from the time we checked in till the time we checked out. The Hotel has everything you need for a great vacation. I would especially like to thank Adilene at the front desk. She is an asset to the Hyatt resorts. We will definitely stay here on our next visit. A big thank you to all who work at the Hyatt for a very clean, comfortable and friendly hotel.
Manager Response: Dear John l, Thank you so much for your very nice review.  We are most pleased to see that your stay was very pleasant.  Adeline is a true gem and we are very fortunate to have such a caring and attentive team member.  She is in for a big "Thank You" from our entire team for your recognition of her customer service.  We look forward to your return.  Thanks again!

Summary: Very nice place to stay. Spacious room. Staff was very nice and helpful. Very close to attractions, convenience store, restaurants and Joe's Italian ice cream.  Hearty breakfast. Every thing was great.
Manager Response: Hello Amy G, Thanks for your review.  We are pleased to see that your stay was enjoyable and that our staff was friendly and helpful.  Nice to see that you also enjoyed our free hot breakfast.  It is quite a nice spread of popular breakfast favorites.   Thanks again!!

Summary: Close walking distance to convention center. Stayed in the upgraded King suite with the couch and desk. Rooms, hallways, stairways and breakfast area all clean. Not sure how busy it gets as this stay was at beginning of week. Pleasant and helpfull front end staff. Quick walk to Target and a couple of expensive/inexpensive take out/sit down places. If your not looking for the other high end chains you will enjoy it.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience.  Pleased to see that you found our staff to be helpful and attentive that you enjoyed the clean and quiet surrounds of our hotel.  If we can be of service to you again soon please let us know.

Summary: This is a nice place to stay. It is walking distance to the Disney Toystory parking lot, where you can catch a quick free shuttle. The hotle is comfortable, convenient, and clean. The staff is great full of tips and advise. Happy to ask about your stay and any needs. Breakfast was nice and the coffee great!
Manager Response: Thanks for your review.  Very glad to see that your stay was enjoyable and that our Gallery Hosts and hotel staff provided you with excellent customer service.  We look forward to the opportunity of welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: We had a phenomenal stay! It was one block from a shuttle to Disney.  The staff even left a birthday cupcake in our room for our daughter.  I would book a room at this hotel everytime we go back!  The rooms were clean and the breakfast was good.
Manager Response: Hi Chamu217, Very nice to see that you and your family had a wonderful stay.  As you know, our staff is more than welcoming and does everything possible to ensure that our guests are made to feel welcome, help with any special occasions and most important ensure that you are comfortable and satisfied with your hotel stay.  We shall look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Stayed in family room with bunk beds for 4..... Couldn't ask for more! Breakfast, staff, room, cleanliness.... All great!   Close to Disneyland, quick and easy walk. Bought tickets at hotel, and staff was perfect.
Manager Response: Hi Tackleshep, Thanks for your review.  We are pleased to see that your stay was enjoyable and that we were able to assist you with your Disneyland Park Hopper ticket purchase.  Its a huge time saver when you purchase them at the hotel and allows you more time to enjoy the two parks.  Also, helps to be as close as we are to Disneyland.  Thank you for recognizing our staff...they always take the opportunity to ensure that our guests are happy and enjoying their stay. Thanks again!!

Summary: I travel for business, and this hotel is my first choice!  Staff members are courteous, professional, and go out of the way to make sure my stay is comfortable.  There is a nice workout room and there are a lot of options for breakfast. If I'm in the area, I wouldn't dream of staying elsewhere!
Manager Response: Hi debrasX3487NX, Thanks for making the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center your home away from home.  We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed your visit to Anaheim and that you really enjoyed your stay with us.  Please let us know when your plans call for another visit to Anaheim.  We look forward to welcoming you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great hotel walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: We booked this as a last minute idea to stay the night before we headed to the park. Room was a great size, clean quiet, comfortable and best of all we could park there for our stay and for the day we went to Disney. (For a fee of course but it was cheaper than the Disney parking) We walked the 15 minute walk to downtown Disney had a nice dinner explored the parks the next day. Walked back to our car and were in our way. Very convenient. One issue was the breakfast wasn't what we are used to at other similar Star hotels (quality), but we were still able to have a little something. We would stay again!
Manager Response: Hello Tellinatellina, Thank you for your review.  Nice to see that you enjoyed your stay.  Let us know about your breakfast experience.  Always looking for guest feedback on ways to make something great even greater! Thanks again!!

Summary Heading: Ok for a business trip to convention centre
Summary: This was good, I guess.  Travelling with 2 teen girls so had a double double room with large bathroom and an extra pull out sofa bed which was great.  The room was large, quiet - clean - comfortable no complaints just a little sterile.  I also thought we were getting a mini kitchen but really all it was a fridge and coffee machine, not really usable for making meals.   Reception staff were a little robotic, smiling but felt insincere maybe this was a LA thing but it got on my British nerves. The lights are on but no one's home.  Breakfast buffet welcome but repetitive if staying more than a few days.  Overall in the many many hotels around this area it was an OK stay - a bit sterile really but can't really complain.  But it wasn't cheap.  I really expected a bit more.  The area
Manager Response: Hi runaways79, Thank you for sharing your comments about your visit to NAMM convention in Anaheim and your hotel experience.  A bit of constructive criticism is good and helps us to understand what we can do better to ensure that our guests are as comfortable and happy as possible.  Perhaps next time you will have a chance to visit more of our local dining establishments at the Garden Walk, as well as those in Downtown Disney and as you found, surrounding areas. Thanks again!

Summary: We stay here during our annual industry trade show.  The price for value is excellent.  It is close to convention center, clean, and the staff is outstanding.  You can tell the management is top notch because the entire staff really seems on board with the friendly service-oriented culture.  Unless something crazy happens with the price, I'll be staying here every year.  They went above and beyond to fix a billing mistake which was probably due to a lack of communication on my part.  They took care of me I'll be back!  Also, the beds are very comfortable and clean and the rooms are giant.  The staff greeted us every time we walk in the front door...it's a little thing, but again...culture.  These people really get it.
Manager Response: Dear Michael G, Thank you for your view kind comments and wonderful observation of our staff.  We all take an interest to ensure that our guests are made to feel welcome and that they have a most pleasant stay.  Thank you for recognizing our team for delivering to you excellent customer service.  When you plan to return please let us know. Thank you!

Summary: This hotel is close to shuttle stops and is clean, comfortable, and quiet. They have a great, friendly staff. Plus, they offer a nice, free, breakfast buffet with hot food.  This hotel is a great value.
Manager Response: Hi elissat2017, Thanks for taking the time to post your review of our hotel.  We are pleased to see that we met with your complete satisfaction.  If we can be of service again soon please let us know. Thanks again!!

Summary: My brother and I stayed here from August 22-27 while I went to Disneyland for four days. Walking from the hotel to Disneyland took about 20 minutes if you walk pretty quickly. Check-in was very quick and easy. The room was spacious with two queen beds, a couch, and a large bathroom. The only problem I found with the room was that the door to the bathroom allows light to pass through, so when going to the bathroom at night, my brother and I used or phones as light so that we do not wake each other up. The wifi worked well and quickly, and could be accessed from basically all over the hotel.  The first day, since we weren't going to Disneyland, we chilled by the pool, which was small but the other people we met there were fine with having fun so we threw around a small football
Manager Response: Hi Cherie R, Thank you for a very nice review of your stay with us.  We are pleased to see that you and your brother had wonderful time and enjoyed the hotel.  And thank you for recognizing our staff for the excellent customer service they provided you.  Let us know if we can welcome you back again soon.

Summary: The Hyatt Place was very clean, room was spacious, staff was friendly and breakfast was delicious!  You can defiantly walk to Disneyland, but we did use Lyft a couple times which only cost $7.  I would stay here again!

This hotel was in a perfect location for the convention center and Disneyland. It was about a 7 minute walk to free shuttle to Disneyland. There was lots of restaurants in area and not far from other activities. The hotel was really clean, very spacious rooms. I had 2 queen room and it had a seperate seating area with sofa bed. Perfect for 3 adults and 2 kids. The breakfast was good and stocked and had a nice assortment of options. The staff was friendly. The parking fee was steep but comparable to all the other hotels in area. The parking was nice in an underground garage with in/out access. Overall, I was impressed with my stay and would recommend to anyone.
Manager Response: Hello akmelissa2017, Thank you for sharing your experience at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center.  Happy to see you found our hotel to your total satisfaction.  Should you plan to return, give us a call. Thanks again!!

Summary: I absolutely love Hyatt and have been a Gold Passport member for sometime. This hotel has it all: spacious rooms, morning breakfast, great location and awesome customer service.  A nice perk was that they also sell tickets to Disneyland at the hotel, so it saves you some time if don't want to buy them at the park.  Small charge for parking.  My only gripe was during my first night's stay, there was a mix-up with my room (apparently, someone with the exact same name as me had a reservation as well and the rooms got mixed-up!) and the security pounded on my door close to 1am, waking us up.  We couldn't fall back asleep until after 2 and we had a an early morning planned for Disneyland. When I inquired about it to the manager the next morning, he was very attentive and was able to
Manager Response: Hello denjimenez, Thanks for your review.  Sorry for the disturbance but happy to see that we were able to turn that around for you so that your stay was entirely enjoyable.  Next time you plan to visit let us know.  We'll make sure your are 110% satisfied.

Summary Heading: Great employees, comfortable rooms - poor bathroom door design
Summary: We spent a night at the Hyatt Place recently so that we could spend a day at Disneyland. During check-in, we mentioned we were taking our daughter to Disney just before she turned 3 the following week (Disney is free under 3) and they gave her a free cupcake as an early birthday present, which was a nice gesture. All the other employees we encountered during our stay were equally friendly.  The room (unit 449) is an end unit, so that was nice as there were no neighbors to one side. It was generously proportioned with 2 queen beds, plus a large sleeper sofa. Unfortunately, soundproofing at the hotel isn't fabulous, so we heard the people upstairs running down the halls and also any particularly loud cars on the busy street outside (spouse didn't notice a thing, of course, but I

My wife and I have an 11 month old son. Upon checking in I asked the concierge if we could get a quite room for my wife and baby. Our room ended up being located at the front of the building with a bright flood flight aimed right at our window (room 333). We did not notice the flood light until we shut off all the light to go to bed. By that time we had been settled in and did not want to change rooms. The hotel, staff, and room were nice but staff failed to put me in a room where we could sleep easily. Thus the low score for "tranquility of guest room." We would like some sort of voucher or credit back for the dissatisfied stay.

Nice rooms, friendly staff and good breakfast.  Location was very convenient for Disneyland.  Our room was quiet and large, bathroom was nice.  Breakfast had good options and overall the staff was very friendly.

We were staying one night here but decided to stay 3 since we were going to Disneyland. And liked it so much we changed it to 5 days and the staff was very flexible and nice.  Room is pretty spacey and clean. Also new.  They have small but nice workout space with machine,nice little pool. Pool is pretty shallow but there's also a hot tub so that was cool.  There's a Disneyland parking lot near and free shuttle bus every 5minute!  Over all, I enjoyed my stay very much and if I had a chance to, will definitely come back.

Too much competition in the area for a property like this to stop trying...  Getting a great a price on a room is just the beginning. It's the total service from start to finish that justifies the expense. Hyatt started off with a wonderful, quick & easy check in. Once in, the money was collected and the service stopped!  If you're looking for a non Disney priced property, with a family friendly budget, Hyatt should be the perfect fit, but not this time.

Every thing went well except for parking space and price , check in girl was rude and not helpful , other than that the hotel is nice clean and roomy , clise to disney downtown and close to the stores .

Summary Heading: My new favorite -- that's not right across the street from Disneyland
Summary: This is an outstanding property -- plain and simple! Awesome service from the get-go from Adiline at the Front Desk, and a very welcoming staff overall! The breakfast is top-notch as far as complimentary breakfasts go. The selection and variety of dishes is by far the freshest I've had in recent memory. The staff keeps everything stocked even during the busiest times and the tables are wiped clean as soon as someone is finished. There is a cafe/bar next to the lobby for late night cravings, as well. The rooms are spacious for the price and the sitting area for TV viewing is a plus so that you can watch without having to sit on the bed. This property is very clean and well-maintained throughout. Parking is available underground for $17 per night. It's a healthy, but reasonable

I really enjoyed my stay at the Hyatt place! The breakfast and amenities have met my expectations and higher! If you are staying for a convention I highly recommend the Hyatt place! Everything has been super nice and the staff is really friendly.

We will stay again. Convenient location. Good breakfast. I love this Hyatt Place location. Close to everything. My grandson enjoyed the pool and the jacuzzi. Enough parking at the basement of the building.

Summary Heading: So Close to Being a Great Hotel!!!!
Summary: Be aware of a few things before selecting this hotel for your stay. Parking costs you $19 dollars a day which is rediculous. The front desk personnel is understaffed and half were awesome and the other half were rude. There is no room service and if you have kids, there isn't a game room and the pool and hot tub are small. The rooms were clean and well laid out and it is close to Disneyland. There are definitely better choices in Anaheim but if they just did a few small things, this hotel would be awesome! One last comment...the breakfast was awesome!!!!

Great updates in this hotel compared to other Hyatt Places we've been to.  We've been to about a dozen across the country.  I liked the color scheme & materials. Nice to have a heated pool in January!  Breakfast was plentiful & a lot of hustling going on to get people fed.  Drink choices were good.

Summary Heading: Great location and very family friendly
Summary: This is my families go to hotel for our trips to Disneyland. We visit about 3-4 times and year and have had great experiences each time. Definitely recommend to families planning their trips to the happiest place on earth!

Great family suites with bunk beds. Clean hotel. I wish they had a shuttle to Disney. There is a shuttle across the street in the Disney parking lot, but even that is far. They offer breakfast which is convenient.

The room was clean people were friendly besides the person that check us in, our heater was broken in our room for 2 days. Breakfast was average but on time and made the kids happy. Late night snack was great as well.

Very clean, well-appointed but no frills, free breakfast and wifi - great bargain for anyone who doesn't necessarily care about a high level of service. A much better option for a family on a budget who still cares about quality and cleanliness!

Summary Heading: Amazing hotel with amazing and helpful staff.
Summary: Excellent hotel,  wonderful and very professional service. Loved staying at this hotel. Will always recommend to family and friends. Value for money.  Walking distance to Disney land.  Lot of food joints at a walking distance.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disneyland, I would recommend it to everyone with family.
Summary: I recommend this place , A good place for family vacation. We stayed here to go to Disneyland for New Year 2017. Rooms are Big, with sitting are, Very Clean, very cleans and oversize bathrooms, 5 Stars.******

Thank you Hyatt Place for being such a fun, friendly, clean hotel. Your breakfast was yummy! Your pool clean and your rooms cozy. The front desk staff was exceptionally friendly!! I will be back! It made our Disney trip memorable:)

Very good hotel. One of the few that has good ratings and offers free breakfast. Close to the parks and a great hotel for Disney. Very good service. Clean rooms and good room service that is quick. All and all a well rounded hotel with no complaints.

A huge shout out to Cory M, Taylor Y, Maddie V, Dominique L and all the rest of the the staff that made my stay incredible. I highly recommend Hyatt Place ....Rooms clean ( as you can tell... Very important to me from past reviews)...And the Staff willing to always go above and beyond. My home away from home! THANKS HYATT PLACE .....A++++++

The room was ideal for a small family with a separate king sleeping area and bunk beds in an adjoining room. it also had a cute sectional that was a sofa bed that we didn't use but was great. The very best thing was two separate tvs in each area so we could be together but all watch our own entertainment. While there wasn't a kitchenette you still had a mini fridge and access to snacks and drinks all day in their restaurant.   The hotel was super clean and up to date.  The breakfast was mediocre and a mad house but it was free so can't complain.    It was a great stay. We usually stay at the Disneyland hotel so I was skeptical of this option but we are happily going to stay there again for another getaway to Disney. It's super close to Disney - not truly walking distance like

The Hyatt Place rooms are large, with high-quality linens and towels.  The rooms are very quiet and very clean.  There are no adjoining rooms at this hotel.  The free breakfast had a wide variety of options and the staff worked hard to keep the food stocked during the breakfast rush hour.  Lunch options are very good, with high-quality ingredients and many healthy options.  We walked to Disneyland in the mornings and rode the free Disneyland shuttle to Disneyland's offsite parking across the street from the hotel.

We came in late from a flight and went to the hotel we had reserved, it was less then satisfactory so we decided to find somewhere else to go and the Hyatt place had availability!! So we booked a room and my family was very pleased with the cleanliness and comfort! We stayed 4 nights!

Love this place Great hospitality and location. They were so nice and the rooms with the bunk beds are definitely a plus! I highly suggest this hotel to anyone visiting the Anaheim area and will definitely come again.
Manager Response: Hi mevina1, Thank you for your nice review.  Glad you enjoyed our Family Suite with bunk beds.  They are spacious and fun for the kids!  Let us know when you plan to return.  Love to welcome you back again!

Summary: Just returned from our family trip to Disneyland. This is the second time that we have stayed at the Hyatt and if staying off site, it is very hard to beat. Location is great and is close to Disneyland but so too are many other hotels. What I really like is the fact that the hotel has its own shuttle that runs to and form the park. For $6 per day, one can ride the shuttle to and from the parks an unlimited number of times without stopping at any other location. That is HUGE, as many other shuttles will stop multiple times before arriving at the park. Also, rooms are nice. We had a normal room with two queens and the coast was approximately $600 for three nights. There is also a Starbucks in the lobby of the hotel which is nice for early mornings. The hotel also has a town car

This hotel is a Hyatt by name only, just not the quality you expect from a Hyatt property. Staff was not what you come to expect from Hyatt. Hotel rooms were not kept up to standard everyday. There seemed to be a shortage of towels throughout the hotel.

For a family of 6, we are so happy with how Hyatt Place handled all our needs. Nice place, clean room, fresh towels everyday, and breakfast buffet rocks! They are always ready to assist you with all your needs just make sure to ask them. The Disney shuttle parking is only a block away from the place so it's an easy ride going to the park. We would definitely go back to Hyatt Place given the chance we'll be able to visit Disney again! üòÄ

Great location! Close to Disney. Very clean, great staff, friendly! AWESOME breakfast!! We came here after staying at the California Grand and the cleanliness and professionalism of the staff does not compare.

Great place to stay for Disneyland.  Very clean, large rooms, great staff, and included full breakfast which was very good.  You can catch the bus to Disney from their parking lot across the street from the hotel.

Hotel was excellent, walking distance to Disney (or if you have kids suggest catching the shuttle service no.3 around the corner in front of Clarion hotel - buy tickets at the hotel as the shuttle only accepts 1 or 5 dollar bills).

Family of four including two teenagera were comfortable in the roim. Room was clean, comfortable and reasonably  priced. Pool and jacuzzi were clean and warm. We had a great stay and would stay again. Didn't use the shuttle to Disney  - took a cab that the front desk arranged for us daily- cab ride was only $10- bargain at the end of a long day of walking ! Breakfast buffet was great too.

This hotel was central to all the locations that we were going to visit.  Staffs were super helpful!  Breakfast was delicious, room was clean, the decor was modern.  Will definitely want to stay here again!

I stayed at Hyatt Place in other cities, so we decided to try the one in Anaheim on our visit to Disney. They didn't disappoint. My reservation was originally made through the Hyatt Gold Rewards phone line, but they messed up the dates, and I neglected to check the confirmation email carefully. We got there a night "early" on the Christmas holiday! I could have paid for the "extra" night, but the desk manager, Adeline, took the time to call the Rewards Line to fix it. I was impressed with her professional expertise and communication. This is the type of service you usually receive only at 5-star hotels. Gotta love these guys at Hyatt Place, The room was great, the food excellent. Great value for the price. A 15 min. walk to Disney.

Much nicer than hotels we've stayed at previously.  10 minute walk to Disneyland parking lot where you can hop the Toy STORY buses for FREE. Big perk. Nice room. Very clean. Gave us extra blankets and towels and pillows. Enjoyed the free breakfast. We would definitely stay there again
Manager Response: Hi Armandor808, Thanks for your nice review and good tip about the Toy Story bus.  Nice to see you had a wonderful time when you stayed with us.  That's what its all about.  Let us welcome you back again soon.  Best wishes for a Happy New Year!

Summary Heading: Nice property, didn't care for the hot breakfast.
Summary: The room and property is nice. We didn't try the pool or gym. The one ding is the comp breakfast was not the greatest. Pancakes were hard like cardboard and waffles over cooked, oatmeal was watered down, bacon swam in its own fatty oil.
Manager Response: Hi 878drew, Thanks for your review.  Our apologies that our free breakfast did not meet to your satisfaction.  Will make recommendations to the kitchen team to ensure that our breakfast is always plentiful and delicious.  Thanks again.

Summary: Really lovely hotel, clean, tidy, spacious rooms, free breakfast was all what was needed for a full day at Disneyland.  Pool and spa area was lovely and the hotel was really conveniently located to Disneyland (about 2 km walk) to main entrance so that you could actually come back to your room (for a swim or downtime) during the day from Disneyland.  Hotel staff were amazing, very helpful and courteous.
Manager Response: Dear dancam06, Thank you very much for your review.  Glad to see that your enjoyed your stay with us and that your found our free breakfast to your satisfaction.  Let us know if we can welcome you back again soon.  Happy New Year!

Summary: Stayed for 4 nights in December 2016. originally booked for the Cortona Inn and Suites but transferred to the Hyatt. We couldn't have asked for better.   Check in was excellent, quick, welcoming and informative.  We agree with the review before, everything was excellent.  And additional the coffee station and the gym were outstanding.  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Hi Laura J, Thank you so much for allowing us to coordinate your accommodations at they Hyatt Place.  We are most happy to see that you found everything in order and the change in accommodations to be swift and seamless.  Glad you enjoyed your visit with us.  Have a Happy New Year!

Summary: First time here.... Loved it!!!   Travel with my daughter and grandson we called on our way and trquested adjoining rooms they said they didn't have any left . A couple of minutes later they returned our call saying someone who had adjoining rooms had cancelled and we could have them.  Very much appreciated üòä Free breakfast in the morning was delioous  plenty of options . I would definitely stay again rooms were spacious with a nice sitting area

I have to say my family and i weren't planing to stay the night in Anaheim but after a long day in Disneyland i didn't think driving 4+ hours back to vegas was a good idea. Checking in was verry easy and fast i had a really low rate compared to what was near,room and service was great ! Definitely recommend it!

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel a short walk (10 mins) from Disneyland Resort
Summary: Stayed for 5 nights in December 2016.  Had originally booked for the Cortona Inn and Suites but when we arrived we found we had been transferred to the Hyatt.  We couldn't have asked for better.    Check in was excellent, quick, welcoming and informative.  The room was like a suite, very spacious, clean and tidy with large TV, free Wi-Fi fridge, phone and en-suite facilities.  Daily maid service was excellent.  The location was perfect, obviously depending on how much you like to walk and how fast you walk, it's not too long to Disney but it's also close to Anaheim Gardenwalk, Target, Dennys and iHop  Main advantage however was the buffet breakfast which was really good and included fresh fruit, oatmeal, toast and bagels with a change of main every day - sometime sausages,

From the time we checked in the staff was very friendly and willing to help! The room itself was amazing and we enjoyed our breakfast which had a large selection! Thank you for the amazing experience we will definitely be back! üòÅ

Taylor and the front desk team were super friendly and gave excellent service. Room and hotel lobby were amazingly clean overall great experience! Great place to stay if you're visiting the park,I would highly recommend staying here!

The room was clean and spacious; beds very comfortable and so quiet.  We never heard our two little grandchildren next door.  It was nice to have a working guide with the satellite TV.  Good, varying breakfast selections each day and even gluten free bread.

Hyatt Place has consistently met my expectations whenever I travel to Anaheim to meet up with friends and enjoy the Disneyland resort.  I used points for this comp stay and I was treated the same as my paid visits, which is appreciated. (Yes, I've experienced otherwise at other properties.)  Highlight of our stay was Peter at the front desks/host area. I had a Bloody Mary for the first time, at my friend's insistence, and Peter was the best bartender to convert me. Delicious!  All around comfortable stay.

Stayed here on a recent visit to Disneyland.  Mitchell who was working the front desk when we checked in was extremely personable. The Hyatt is within easy walking distance to Disneyland/California Adventure, but knowing we were going to be doing a lot of walking within the Parks we choose to follow Mitchell's suggestion and walk into the Toy Story Parking Lot (5 min. walk from the hotel) and take the Disney Shuttle. This saved us both money (local shuttle costs a few dollars) and many 'steps'.    The Hyatt Place doesn't have an airport shuttle so we used Karmel Shuttle to get us to and from John Wayne Airport.  Cost was $30 each.     Breakfast is provided each morning with selections I felt were adequate (eggs, bacon or sausage, pancakes/waffles/french toast, oatmeal, fruit,

Fridge didn't work.  No room service. No bellhop. No dollies for luggage. Over priced food. Not even compliments for coffe or teas. So if you don't eat and stay in your room and have no luggage then fine this is great.
Manager Response: Sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your stay with us.  Although we do not have a dedicated Bellhop, our staff is always more than happy to assist our guests with their luggage.  We also have on hand several luggage trollies as well as airport style luggage carts to ensure that our guests can help themselves should they prefer to handle their own luggage.  Our 24/7 Guest Gallery and Market offers a selection of delicious food options and is designed for quickness and can be ordered from your guest room or while in our lobby.  If you are not able to pick up your order, a Gallery Host may be able to assist with a delivery.  Also, our free hot breakfast each morning is served from 6:30am until 9:00 am each day and includes many delicious breakfast options including coffee, tea, juice and milk for a casual breakfast experience in our guest gallery.  Our Coffee to Cocktails Bar is also a nice option for guests who may prefer a Starbucks beverage any time of day or a cool beer or glass wine in the evening hours.  Let us welcome you back again so that you can experience the many fine amenities and services that we offer.  Thanks again!

Summary: The hotel is mediocre at best. It's a spruced up La Quinta with a Hyatt name. Hyatt should stay in the 5 star hotel because their attempt in this category is a fail. The beds were ok, pillows felt old and comforter is decent. Breakfast was a pleasant surprise; eggs and southwest style eggs, bacon as well as cold cereal and juice n pastries. No fault of Hyatt but $16 to park on top of over $30 in taxes and fees. Our $169 a night turned out to be $220. No acknowledgement of being a Hyatt passport member. Should have stayed at best western down the street.

Summary Heading: Hyatt Place Great Place to Stay
Summary: Our family of five, including children 2 and 4, stayed at the Hyatt Place during a short trip to Disneyland. It was perfect--great accommodations, bunk beds for the children, great buffet breakfast, and a very friendly and accommodating staff.  We'll be back to this Place!

Definitely an above average hotel for the price. Would definitely stay again. Only about a 10 minute walk to the Disneyland and California adventure parks which is very convenient. Great staff and hospitality.

Friendly stuff, nice accomodations, close to Disneyland Resort and Anaheim Convention Center. Complimentary full breakfast is a definite plus. Easy check in and out. Recommended for business and pleasure!
Manager Response: Hi N9324WUmarinak,  Thank you so much for your feedback! We are so glad you enjoyed our proximity near Disneyland,  complimentary breakfast and the most important accomodation with us. We work hard to provide excellent service to our guest at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim. We look forward to having you back again in the future.

Summary: Great place to stay with families! Staff very friendly, clean hotel, delicious breakfast and 10 min walk to front gates of Disneyland! We will stay here next time too! There's a complimentary shuttle to the park as well. Their cookies are amazing too!
Manager Response: Hi Carolyn, Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Clean hotel, decent price, clean room, clean bathroom. Breakfast buffet is ok for free food but not anything I would want to eat allot of. Staff were hard to find at front at times and there is no bell hop or help with your bags. There is no shuttle to Disney land so prepare to ride city bus or walk about 20 minutes.
Manager Response: Hi T2761QVericj,  I am so sorry for your experience  not finding our staff at front at times. That is certainly unacceptable and we will follow up with our front desk team to ensure that this not occur again in the future. At Hyatt Place at Anaheim we want our guest to feel we are always here for you. We really appreciate your feedback and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: The overall quality of the hotel was excellent including the food, room amenities and the customer service. However we were disappointed to find that our room still wasn't made up well into the afternoon.
Manager Response: Hi William J,  Thank you for the wonderful feedback and I do apologize regarding your room not being made on-time. That is certainly unacceptable and we will follow up with our housekeeping team to ensure that this does not occur again in the future. We really appreciate your feedback and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: great place to stay for going to any amusement park in Anaheim. nice people to good food the hyatt place is a great place to stay. room was clean and nice the tv remote is just like the mine at home the beds were nice and comfortable.
Manager Response: Hi Timothy D, Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. I am ecstatic that you enjoyed our hotel and the value it offers. Thank you so much for the positive feedback and your kind compliments. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Inviting, clean, comfy, & close to the convention center and Disney parks.
Summary: A very friendly and attentive staff seem to be genuinely enjoying their jobs. The facilities are very nice, modern without being overly trendy and comfy--from the beds to the sofas in rooms and lobby.
Manager Response: Hi Artieron, Thank you so much for your wonderful review about our hotel and hotel staff! I am so happy our staff was able to accommodate you for your stay. Our staff strives to provide excellent service, and it looks like they did a great job! We look forward to your next stay, and providing you with all that you need to make your stay enjoyable!

Summary: Our family of 3 adults and 3 children travelled 24 hours from NZ via Sydney, Australia and stayed here for 9 nights as we had gotten 10 day passes to visit the parks.   After flying for a whole day, we arrived to the hotel exhausted at around 9am however check-in wasn't until later in the afternoon. The hotel Manager Adaleine checked us in and acknowledged without any prompting from me how far and long we had travelled and advised my family and I to go and have breakfast which was still on while she arranged for a temporary room to be available ASAP so we could rest - what a lifesaver because by that time, my children were absolutely shattered!  The rooms are spacious, beds were always tidied, entire room cleaned which was always nice to be greeted with especially after a long
Manager Response: Hi jaybel1, Thank you for the wonderful review! Nothing makes us happier than reading that you and your family enjoyed your stay.   We'll be sure to recognize Adiline, Taylor, Madi and Maria for a job well done. We hope to welcome your family  again soon here at Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Good amenities and close to Disney. Did not like the daily parking charges. The service was good and breakfast bar was elaborate. Had great family time. Kids enjoyed the view from the room. Security has been taken care.
Manager Response: Hi Vamsidhar, Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us  and our proximity to Disneyland. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We are currently staying on site for a 7 night vacation visiting Disneyland with two children (ages 5 and 9).  The hotel is within walking distance; however we have been driving to site with grandparents. There is also busing available just a short distance (across the street) to take you to the main gate if preferred. The rooms are very generous in space, and are equally modern and updated.  The breakfast is amazing - lots of choices (from toast and bagels to hot items including eggs, bacon, pancakes) that change daily. Tonight we used the pool and hot tub and it is kept clean and warm.  The only criticism I have is the beds. I am used to a very soft bed, and these are more firm; however, no one else in my party has complained.  Overall, the stay has been great. Would
Manager Response: Hi Leanneyantz, Thank you very much for your wonderful review! The staff and I truly appreciate that you took the time to share your experience and views. I will make sure to share this with the staff and we hope you are able to return and stay with us again in the future. Guests like you are the reason we love what we do at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort.

Summary Heading: Hotel was good parking charges was rip off
Summary: I believe it was ridicules charging $16 a night this shouldn't be profit center for places like this it's obvious if someone going stay for week they will have car so we had guest didn't given any options
Manager Response: Hi Hafeez, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We always appreciate constructive comment. We have taken your comment seriously and made sure that it is addressed. At the Anaheim resort all the hotels charge either parking fee or resort fee. We hope we can prove ourselves to you on your next stay and if you can please call me directly to make your reservation.

Summary: I love staying at Hyatt Place! The room was clean and roomy, very consistent with other Hyatt Place locations. The complimentary breakfast was very good!  Downside: $16 parking fee. Unfortunately it's become standard for the area üôÅ.
Manager Response: Hi Steve R,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us. At Anaheim resort all the hotels either charge you resort fee or parking fee. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Very clean, spacious, and comfortable. Less pretentious than other hotels in the area while having all the same perks. Beds were very comfortable. We got a complimentary upgrade to a king suite at check in. Had bunk beds and sofa bed in the sitting area, and a king bed with pocket doors for privacy. Two TVs, two closets. Full, hot breakfast. Will stay again.
Manager Response: Hi Y6522VAjenniferm,  Thank you so much for providing your valuable input. Your compliments regarding our rooms, breakfast, and cleanliness are greatly appreciated. We hope to welcome you and your family back soon.

Summary: Spent 3 days at Disneyland and stayed at the Hyatt Place.  Loved every minute of it and the staff and hotel were excellent!  Room was clean and well taken care of.  I was very impressed and will definitely return!
Manager Response: Hi Y182ZSenriquem, Thank you for your positive review of our hotel. I'm happy to hear to your comments on our friendly and attentive staff, the cleanliness of the hotel and amenities. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Trip to Anaheim & hotel is still very nice.  Being so close to Disneyland, the majority of guests are families with children...breakfast becomes quite challenging navigating the multitudes.  Consequently we stayed away from the free breakfasts.  Still a top choice for the area

Summary Heading: Perfect Location whether for Business or Leisure
Summary: Decided to stay in Anaheim for a night, on a spur of the minute theme park stop. Hyatt Place delivered. I have stayed at several Hyatt Places, and this one did not disappoint. The location is perfect, whether you are visiting Disneyland or going to a convention. Nominal parking fee, which is less than it's competitors. Breakfast is included, which is a bonus, when traveling with family.
Manager Response: Hi 364tamaraw, Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us, specially our location being near to Disneyland and the convention center. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Clean, homely, high-quality, roomy for great low price!
Summary: Clean, homely, high-quality, roomy for great low price! The room was very large and was very cheap, compared to hyatt regency or andaz. I booked my stay 2 hours before checking in, which was very early 8am. most places don't let you in until around 12. so thankful for that! continental breakfast with seattle's best coffee included. I will be definitely  staying here again especially on my next disneyland trip. please keep it up!
Manager Response: Hi tatlor1211, Thank you very much for your wonderful review! The staff and I truly appreciate that you took the time to share your experience and views. I will make sure to share this with the staff and we hope you are able to return and stay with us again in the future. Guests like you are the reason we love what we do here at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Good hotel however it wasn't what I was expecting, it looked dated and the decorations from the 70's. Very good customer service, they help with the transfer to the airport and was very useful. When we arrived took a bit long to have the room ready and our kids were very tired as we traveled from Australia. Lovely people.
Manager Response: Hi Nat203, Thank you so much for providing your valuable input. Your compliments regarding our team members greatly appreciated. I apologize when you arrived the room was not ready for we were sold out the previous night. We hope to welcome you and your family back soon.

Summary Heading: American Sports Center for bball tournament
Summary: So good that I was compelled to write the review within hours of our stay.  As a Hyatt platinum member, I do appreciate great service and that is what you receive here.  The onsite manager, Adelene , was a gem since check in ( also gave complementary cookies and water). She had also assisted us at the bar and given us great recommendations for dinner.  Rooms were clean and large enough for the family. Definitely returning. Thank you so muchüòä‚ù§Ô∏èÔ∏è
Manager Response: Hi Live_Aloha2014, Thank you for the wonderful review and being Hyatt platinum member! Nothing makes us happier than reading that you enjoyed your stay.   We'll be sure to recognize Adilene for a job well done. We hope to welcome you and your family again soon.

Summary: Thanksgiving getaway since all three of our kids had plans of their own. Great experience, from the complimentary breakfast to the 24 hours bar and grill and the free WiFi.  Liked that three Ross had both sleeping and sitting areas. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi  Tom M,  Thank you for sharing your Thanksgiving getaway with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you had a great experience with us and enjoyed our amenities. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: This hotel is very conveniently located.  It's close to Disneyland and walking distance to the Toy Story parking lot where you can pick up a shuttle.  The staff is also very friendly.  They have specials for Disney Annual passport holders as well.
Manager Response: Hi Lori Y, Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: I arrived late because of holiday traffic after check in it was about 2:00 am and I felt hungry and tired. then the manager Adilene let us know the hotel has 24 hr. Cafe' available. Great that help, I decided quick had my late night meal. The foods was great it's surprise me. I didn't expect such Warming and thoughtful outstanding service. Thank you ,my daughter and me really enjoyed it.

Stopped here because it was convenient rather than as a choice. But the food was really good and the service excellent. Would recommend any time. The steak frite was delicious and decent kids choices. Come again

This was our first time at a Hyatt Place and this property was EXCEPTIONAL!  Excellent Staff!  Fabulous room!  Clean, beautiful hotel, wonderful free hot breakfast and close (easy walk) to Disneyland.  We highly recommend this property to everyone!  Staff helped us navigate area, got us tickets for the park, all were friendly and welcoming - it was a great stay!

Summary Heading: Right in between convention center and Ruth Chris
Summary: Nice hotel not too big been here three or four times very convenient location not as close to Disneyland as Hyatt house but they are close its right next to Ruth Chris if you want to go there.  Rooms are clean and close to the elevator.

Great accommodations,  clean, modern, extremely roomy, borderline huge.  Loved it!  First time staying there.   Usually stay at the Hilton or the Disney Hotels.  Done with those.   This is our new place.   Great bar area.   Wonderful  breakfast selection FREE, and best of all...complimentary coffee is available at 5 AM!!  Huge plus if your on Eastern time.

I never write negative reviews but this is necessary. I opted to stay at Hyatt Place instead of a friend's house, so I could get some work done. However, the wifi was incredibly slow and I missed an important deadline. When I called the front desk, I was told it could be due to the "location of my room." Finally, the lady said the modem would be reset. That didn't work and when I informed the her during check out, she basically said nothing...not even an apology! All this after they tried to give me (welted) iceberg lettuce in a salad that was listed as having romaine. The guy was actually arguing with me that it was indeed romaine! Overall, the hotel was clean and comfortable but the service was not the best.

The hotel staff went out of their way to take care of me and even remembered me by name. I will continue to stay at this property whenever I'm in town. Between value and service this property ranks second to none. It even has parking available for my oversized truck.

Summary Heading: A gem hotel within walking distance of the convention center.
Summary: The staff, the hotel, the room, the free breakfast were all first rate. I regret that I don't remember the name of the manager who checked us in on Thursday, November 17. She was so incredibly helpful and friendly. She went above and beyond. Me, my wife and my brother were all blown away by the overall experience. 5 stars!

My wife and I recently stayed here for just over a week while she attended a conference. We had a double queen room which was clean and spacious. The beds were comfy but as somebody else pointed out the pillows are a bit flat. We are not buffet people and the restaurant was able to cater to our dietary requirements.  The hotel is about a 15-20 minute walk to Disneyland which does not bother us.  There is ample car parking, and valet if you want. Also on the occasions we ordered room service it was very prompt. Check in and out was very easy. Overall the staff were friendly and willing to assist,

Great modern hotel walking distance to Disneyland, with an excellent continental breakfast. Downside is the $16 parking, which upon checking in, the Hyatt takes your original parking ticket, and gives you one of theirs - to which tax is added, so parking is really $18/night.

excellent hotel with bunk beds for kids.  really quiet rooms and good quality beds.  hot breakfast every morning that was good and had choices.  20 min walk to Disney but I would recommend taking the bus.

This is a great hotel. Breakfast buffet was wonderful each day. Unlike other hotels, this buffet was properly staffed, never out of food and had more than enough dining space. The hotel is a 5 minute walk to the Disneyland Toy Story Parking lot which saved us parking fees for Disney.  We drove directly to Disneyland on day one so the online hotel check-in was perfect. The staff here is wonderful. We accidentally locked our room keys in one day, no problem, the front desk fixed it in minutes. Later after checking out we realized our car battery had died. Andrew and Antonio from Maintenance saved the day by offering to jump start our car. Top Class customer service!

With our 2 full size bed room, it had a pull out sofa bed, flat screen TV, minifridge, free Wi-Fi, and free continental breakfast. There's a high speed Ethernet cable. This place uses NFC cards as keys to the room. Yes, no more having to fumble with metal keys or inserting the key card several times into the door to unlock. There were a surplus of charging ports next to the beds. No USB ports so bring your own charging bricks for your phones. Our beds were clean and comfy. It could have been less firm and more soft. The pillows were a bit flat. The bathroom was bright, modern, and spacious compared to other places I've been too. Despite its spaciousness, the shower tub was smaller than average. They did not provide lotion, just a bar of soap, shampoo, and conditioner. What I

Summary Heading: Very comfortable and convenient to the Convention center
Summary: The Hyatt place is steps away from the Anaheim Convention Center. It lies within a cluster of hotels and is both convenient and comfortable. The Hyatt's staff was very attentive and the room and amenities very high quality. I highly recommend the Hyatt Place for conventions or for a family trip to Disneyland.

The staff were great. The king suite with bunk beds was large and perfect for the family. The breakfast was a great addition and delicious. After a long day at Disney the walk back can be a bit much but we appreciated the quality and were willing to walk a little more.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, Easy access to Disneyland
Summary: Although we live somewhat locally, we've stayed here several times in conjunction with visits to Disneyland or for several RunDisney races.  The staff at the hotel is always super friendly.  The rooms are comfortable and inviting.  There are plenty of choices for the free breakfast, and there are other food choices available around the clock.  My only complaint this time?  We were promised hot coffee and some cold breakfast items would be ready at 4:00 a.m. before we headed over to the race start line ... and there seemed to be a miscommunication with the staff, so that was not available.  But that was the only minor disappointment in an otherwise very pleasant stay.  We'll definitely be back!

I stayed at this hotel for a conference. The room I stayed in had two queen beds. The room was clean and spacious and included a lounge which was a nice addition. The hotel is close to the convention centre (about 3 mins walk). There are other hotels right next to the convention center, but they charge a premium and the rooms are nicer at Hyatt Place (my friends stayed at the Hilton and I had a quick peek at their room). I would recommend paying less and staying this hotel instead.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel but not worth the price
Summary: Hotel was nice, however pics are deceiving was not as nice as I had expected/hoped.  So we were disappointed.   Pool was very small.  Staff was nice especially Maddie - she was very helpful before and during our stay.   Location was great close to Disney and restaurants.  Overall a good hotel.

The overall cleanliness of the establishment surpassed anything I had previously experienced.  This combined with the friendly staff and excellent food made this an ideal location to attend Blizzcon.  What more could you ask for?  Being within a few minutes from the Anaheim Convention Center allowed us to save gas and mileage on our rental car thus resulting in saving some change overall.

Loved it!. Excellent service, minutes away from Disneyland. And the breakfast was outstanding.......delicioso ....could not ask for more. House keeping ....speechless . Very well maintained. Enjoyed the location, attention , service,

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a family
