Summary: We stayed one night for a short Disney trip. The room was spacious enough for our family of 5.  We stayed in a room with 2 doubles and a sofa bed. There was also a mini fridge available.   There is a free breakfast in the morning, which is OK. Basic eggs, sausage, pancakes, oatmeal and pastries. The cut fruits are the frozen type and not very tasty. Their eggs are also very bland. We usually do not enjoy the breakfasts at Hyatt Place. They do serve Seattle's Best, which I prefer over Starbucks. And they had a large selection of teas and juices.   Suggestion to the management team:  do not use prepackaged utensils. I saw most of everything unused and thrown in the garbage. Not everybody needs a spoon, fork, and knife. And since there are napkins on the table, people were using

Stayed here for 8 nights while visiting Disneyland and attending a conference at the Convention Centre.  Staff were all friendly and helpful.   Room was a good size and clean.  Breakfast buffet was included and has a good selection which varies slightly by day. It can get a little busy at breakfast time but there is plenty of seating.  It is about a 15 to 20 minute walk to Disneyland (or you can take a bus instead).  Would definitely stay here again.

I love this quaint little hotel it's terrific it's well located it's very quiet and superclean this is a good price especially during relative to the other convention prices. I would give this in a rating thank you support staff for making this a great day and thank you for having quiet neighbors. I love the look of the Hyatt Place bathrooms what a cool design and comfortable feeling

Trip during Blizzcon at Hyatt Anaheim convention center. Very close and convenient as well as clean.   Stayed at the King kids suite with the bunk beds and made use of breakfast which was good ( actually ate the veggie eggs and added sausages )

A great place to stay if you are in Anaheim.  Either for when visiting Disneyland or attending a conference, this Hyatt Place is conveniently located.  The hotel is very clean and efficient.  Our room was extremely spacious.

We stayed at the Hyatt Place Anaheim for two nights at the end of October.  We arrived at the hotel a little early but it was no hassle at all for the front desk who checked us in right away.   The lobby area is a great little space, front desk is right next to the gallery where you can order food and drink from any time of the day.    The rooms are quite large and spacious,  it was really pleasant to have a sitting area to relax instead of lying on the bed only.   Free WiFi as always is great for foreign travellers. We only had the breakfast skillet once while there, it was plentifully and covered most of your morning munchie needs.   All in all a great stay and only a 15 to 20 minute walk to Disneyland made the location perfect.    Enjoy üòâ

Summary Heading: Stop looking at hotels in Anaheim, just stay here !
Summary: It real simple, normally don't take time to write a review but I need to on this hotel. Front desk staff are amazing, very helpful and always have a smile. Rooms are comfortable and always very clean. Stop looking at other hotels - you want to stay here !   15 visits this year, all at this hotel

Summary Heading: great hotel but the security guard was prejudice
Summary: Everything is great in this hotel, the rooms are very clean, most of the staff are nice with the exception of the security guard that can be prejudices and harass you at all times that you are in his sight, you also may feel that he can try to get in trouble for no good reason! Please just walked very fast into the lobby and check in before he gets you! Enjoy your vacation..

Great staff and overall experience in this hotel. Staff remembered myself and my family and greeted us every time. Any questions or issues that came up, they were ready to accommodate and correct to problem.

As much as I enjoy staying in a Disney property, Hyatt Place staff are awesome in every measure of the word!  Great rooms and location across from a Disney parking area.  I plan on staying here each time I visit!

We have stayed at this particular Hyatt Place several times while in the Anaheim area but will not return.  The beds were so uncomfortable that neither my daughter or I had a good nights sleep in the 3 nights we were here.  The pillows were large and rock hard too.  We like the great location, like the size and layout of the room, like the friendly staff.  Complimentary breakfast is not great for those of us vegan and gluten free.  I spoke with the staff on the way out and explained the bed situation, that we had never felt like that before but unfortunately would not be returning...and we are Hyatt Platinum members.  I'm not sure if the beds have just already had so much use they are already uncomfortable or what but we need sleep.

We had a very enjoyable stay. The hotel was very quiet and had  large and clean rooms  The buffet breakfast was good..  All the staff were very polite and helpful,  It was a. great location for visiting Disneyland.

This location is exactly what I would expect from the Hyatt name and we will definitely be returning. The rooms were clean,  comfortable and quiet and the free breakfast was delicious!  The staff was extremely friendly and helpful.  If you have the pleasure of being assisted by Peter at the front desk, you will certainly feel welcome and know that everything you need will be taken care of.  Wonderful place and location all around!

We love staying at the Hyatt Place in Anaheim - we have stayed here twice.  The staff is always helpful and the free breakfast is awesome!! The rooms are clean and comfortable and the beds are very soft.   Hyatt Place is within 1 mile of the front gate to Disneyland perfect walk - we always felt safe.  The other thing that we really liked was that cars entering the parking lot have to have an access card.

Summary Heading: Great location for convention center access
Summary: Great stay. Easy access to convention center, lots of amenities in walking distance. Hotel was clean and the staff were great help to us and our infant travelling us. Good value compared to the other chains nearby.

Summary Heading: First stay at this hotel and we were not disappointed
Summary: First stay at this hotel and we are always nervous about trying new accommodation. No need to worry this was a lovely start to our trip. Large clean fresh room, smashing breakfast and very handy to visit the mouse.All the staff were very friendly and seemed genuinely keen to make your stay lovely. Well done!

Great facility with terrific service, thank you! Great location of you're going to visit Disney & very family friendly. Greeted us with cocktails after a LONG flight & a very sweet delicious honeymoon surprise in our room waiting for us mmm.

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, good location for the conference
Summary: The room was large and clean with a nice seating area.  The location is very close to the convention center where I was attending a conference so that was an important factor. The staff very exceptionally friendly!

Great rooms & proximity to Anaheim convention center. Attentive staff, full and excellent breakfast plus cafe dinner menu and quiet bar. Walkable to Disney too! Damonique is the best! Would definitely stay again

Handy to convention centre and Disneyland.  We had a family room - King bed and bunks for the kids. The room was spacious, quiet and clean.  Lots of places to eat in easy walking distance. Breakfast was included, but pretty basic.

This is a nice hotel that caters to both business and families. They were very helpful with transportation and the breakfasts were good. My 7 year old thought it was great and since we were there for his birthday, it meant a lot that they really catered to families.

The staff at the Hyatt Place was fantastic. Adeline remembered my name, and treated my group with supreme courtesy and graciousness. It's an easy walk to the convention center. Only downside to the experience: the walls are paper thin.

What a fantastic hotel.  The free hot breakfast buffet was incredibly well done... especially for free.  The staff was helpful and friendly.  The location is perfect for Disney families or for business purposes at the convention center.

Summary Heading: Fairly new room with comfortable bed
Summary: Fairly new room with comfortable bed in good location with easy access to Disneyland.  Many restaurants around the hotel for your conveniences.  Complimentary Wifi and Breakfast during your stay.  Overnight parking fee is a bit expensive.

Summary Heading: Unfriendly staff, sirty rooms, disgusting breakfast
Summary: A plethora of issues with this hotel. This is not a resort. Awful staff, dirty room, gross breakfast. Weve stayed in several hotels in that area and have had better experiences. We will not be returning to this hotel again.

All the staff is super friendly, super helpful, it's close to all the attractions and the convention center, and the breakfast bar is top notch!  Would definitely stay here again if I'm ever back in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: I love staying at this hotel!
Summary: I have never had an issue staying at this hotel. We stay here every time we are in town for Disneyland. Its just around the corner, and within our price range. One suggestion I recommend, is the request a room that is not close to the service/maintenance elevators. It tends to be a bit noisy around those areas when they are beginning their work. Other than that, this place is great! and I will continue to keep staying here!

We stayed at the Hyatt House for 4 nights and I was pretty pleased with our hotel choice. Overall the hotel was clean and the room (studio) was clean. It had plenty of room for one adult and two teens. Good location to Disney and good spread for morning breakfast. Daily housekeeping could have done a little better refreshing the room but overall still okay.

Lisa was awesome when I came in with checking in and the entire staff was great. Maddie was also very great for checking out. Highly recommend coming here! I'm definitely coming back the next time I'm here for a conference

First off, the purpose of our trip was to celebrate a birthday at Disney.  The hotel is about a 15-20 minute walk from the Disneyland entrance which was certainly a plus having 2 young ones in tow when we needed to return for a nap. Our room was clean and met our expectations based on website. We even got to check in early after a 7 hour drive from N. Cali.   Beds are comfy and plush but if you plan to use pull out sofa bed, it's typically not comfortable for an adult. Complimentary breakfast was great to start the day(hot/cold options and lots of drink options). What made our stay exceptional was the staff. Everyone we came across was friendly and helpful.  They even made our birthday girl's day even better by decorating our room while we were away with streamers, decorations,

We just got back from a 4 night stay at the Hyatt Place Anaheim hotel.  There was good and bad from our stay.  The good:   - nice location, close to Disney  - very good breakfast and free !  - beds comfortable  - staff was good to deal with  - can catch Disney shuttle across the street at Toy Story parking lot.  Now the bad , and unfortunately a deal breaker for us staying there in future , is the fact that the bathroom has no door on it. We were in what is kind of a one bedroom suite although no door between bedroom area and the sitting room. The bathroom is right off the bedroom and the double sink area is open to the bedroom. The toilet and shower does have a sliding barn style frosted door but does not close fully and certainly provides little in the way of privacy. Now if

Stayed here for a family vacation to Disneyland. This was a great hotel for a family of 4. Two queen beds, a sitting area and great hot breakfast in the mornings. The staff in every aspect of the stay was fantastic. The bellman/valet, front desk and the cleaning staff was helpful and friendly throughout the trip. The pool was well maintained and was heated which was a plus since it rained during our trip.  If you're going to Disneyland this hotel does not have it's own shuttle but they do sell tickets for the ART shuttle which picks you up a block away in front of the Clarion hotel. The only thing preventing this hotel from getting a 5 star rating is that the wifi is very spotty. You constantly have to reconnect to the wifi.

This is a great place to stay very close to the convention center and very easy access to Disneyland.  The ART shuttle is very close to the Hyatt place and also you could walk to Disneyland but after walking in the parks I think it is a little far!

Stayed here for a week recently for work then some vacation time. Had a very lovely room on the third floor. No problems at all, just make sure to pack earplugs. This is near Disney Land, of course, so this hotel will have plenty of children who love to scream and run around. Ear plugs were a lifesaver for me, a light sleeper.  Only complaint I have was over the course of the week my key card didn't work 3 separate times, which was extremely annoying.

Summary Heading: This is the place to be!!!
Summary: Walking distance from Disneyland resort and Anaheim Convention Center. Clean and spacious rooms at a reasonable price. Friendly staff from the housekeeping to management.  Complimentary hot breakfast.  This is a hidden gem surrounded by a sea of hotels along Harbor Blvd. A must stay for anyone who needs to be near the Convention Center or Disneyland Resort.

Loved the hotel!  Staff was very friendly and accommodating.  We stayed in a Kids Suite, which was perfect for our situation.  There were 2 rooms separated by glass french sliding doors.  Each room has a nice sized tv with cable (I think it was Direct TV) and lots of channels.  The beds & pillows were very comfortable & there was plenty of space to put our clothes away in drawers & closets.  I loved that there was a big shelf underneath the bathroom vanity to store our bathroom items so they don't have to take up all of the counter space.  The only slightly negative thing was that the door to the bathroom was frosted glass so when you're asleep but someone is in the bathroom, you can see the light on through the door.  Otherwise, pretty close to perfect.

I was very pleased with the hotel & staff.  Check-in process was quick, staff was very friendly and accommodating. We were in a Kids Suite, which was perfect for our family.  Beds & pillows were very comfortable.  If there is anything that was slightly negative (minor complaint) is that the door to the bathroom is frosted glass so when someone is in the bathroom and others are asleep, the light shines in the room.  Other than that, it was a wonderful stay.  We would definitely stay here again.

This was hotel was the perfect place for us to stay while attending our conference.  Within walking distance to the convention center.  Great breakfast with many options to choose from!  Very attentive staff.

The location is perfect for visiting Disney, the shuttle bus into the park is a short walk. The staff are friendly and overall the hotel is very clean. The breakfast staff are very attentive, constantly refreshing items and clearing dishes and there was enough variety to find something to start your day.  The rooms are large and well equipped with the sectional sofa, desk area, large tv, etc. and friendly housekeeping staff. Plenty of parking in the underground garage, it is $18 but you don't have to pay to park at Disney or the Convention Ctr and it's a little less than other hotels in the area.  Cons- my review would have been higher but there was an overwhelming mildewy, musty smell in the room. I travel with essential oils and put lavender on our pillows to sleep and that

Great hotel. Great staff. Very clean and food was great. Breakfast every morning and food to order through out the day from menu. I would definitely recommend this hotel to friends and family in the future!

Came up to Anaheim to celebrate my 1 year anniversary! Hyatt Place is amazing. The rooms are incredibly nice, the staff is helpful and sweet, and it is perfect distance to Disney. It is one of the best deals in the area especially with breakfast included in the rate. Will be back!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this Hotel.  The staff were amazing - friendly, efficient and helpful.  The room was clean, spacious and really well appointed.  The pool area was great - spa for the parents/kids and good size swimming pool for the whole family.

Nice, clean room. Friendly staff diligently worked out a corporate billing issue without disruption to my trip. The complimentary breakfast buffet was fantastic! Close to convention center, good parking!

Really enjoyed our room that had 2 Queens & Queen sofa sleeper, room #318 included mini fridge. Hotel is really close to the Toy Story parking lot where we would catch the complimentary shuttle to/from Disney. We appreciated the microwave and computers in the lobby area that allowed our kids to warm up late night snacks and I was able to check emails and print our boarding passes for our departure flight. I would recommend this location for anyone looking for great value in price with high quality service. The Hyatt Place is a very convenient and ideal location for families. Definitely üëç

Everything was great. The staff was friendly. Adilene was very helpful. The breakfast had good variety. I would recommend people to stay in this hotel. Walking distance to Disneyland was 15 minutes. There is a CVS 5 minutes walk from hotel. Lots of restaurants close by.

Summary Heading: Don't stay here if you on your honeymoon and want some pampering
Summary: If you want pampering on your honeymoon then you go to a better hotel. Was clean, staff was friendly but there was no vending machines for drinks. No one available at the front desk for 24 hour service, there was no room service. The beds were the only upside to our stay.

It was a very comfortable stay, I found it to be very relaxing, I would love to come back again. The Staff Was great, they were always friendly. The people in the front desk were very helpfull, also the people serving the breakfast always had smile on there face which made my stay at the hyatt excellent.

Our hotel was not across from Disneyland but it was worth the little walk!  It was clean and nicely furnished.  There was no lack of towels or anything else we needed. The complementary breakfast was great! Healthy choices for a picky Mom.

I stayed here for 5 days. Excellent rooms. Comfortable beds. Room service was poor. Had to walk down and pick my own order up.  Cable tv was down for 24 hrs. Those were my only two gripes. Best hotel I have ever stayed in other than a Hilton.

This is a great hotel with a fast service, there is no loud noises for a great sleep. It's so close to restaurants, pharmacy and corner stores. The beds are so comfy, and the rooms are so gorgeous. Every time I left the hotel when I came back my room was cleaned up just great service.

This hotel was wonderful!  We had two adjoining double Queen rooms and it worked beautifully.  The swimming pool is small, and in an odd location (in the parking lot almost), but we still visited it daily and had LOTS of fun!  Great outdoor Jacuzzi, too.  They have room service if you like and also provide you with a long list of nearby restaurants that deliver!

Surprised my girls with a trip to Disneyland.  The Hyatt was a great hotel.  Clean and quiet.  Great morning Buffett    A little bit of a walk to Disney but we are all very 'energetic '.  The pool was a ok.   The desk staff were very helpful with any questions and it concerns.

The only downfall was that the Pool was too small. The Breakfast was decent, lots of options. The kids enjoyed it. The room was big and spacious, we had the bunk bed suite, and it was bigger than I expected and very clean.

This is a very clean hotel. Free breakfast is very good (would even be worth money), and the coffee that comes with it is awsome! This was an awsone hotel experience ce.  It is a shame that my vacation was soured by the consistant 45 to 60 minute wait times to get on rides at Disneyland.

Me and my family enjoy staying at this hotel because of their customer service, amenities, hot breakfast buffet, parking, convenient walking distance to different restaurants and also Disneyland. Most of all the professional staff!

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel for a Disney visit
Summary: Our family of 4 thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Hyatt Place Anaheim. It is a modern, clean and comfortable hotel which is an easy 10 minute walk from Disneyland. There is a Walgreens and CVS just a block down the road, which was very handy. The restaurants of the Garden Walk are also 5-10 walk away.  The room was well designed and roomy with a very comfortable couch seating area. The bathroom was clean and modern.  The buffet breakfast was fantastic, with a wide variety of choices including eggs, bacon and pancakes, pastries, toast and bagels, yoghurt and fruit, cereal, juice and oatmeal.  The gym is small but has everything you need for a workout.  We would most certainly stay here again when visiting Disneyland.

Summary Heading: ALWAYS A JOY TO STAY AT HYATT PLACE
Summary: The Hotel and rooms are so clean and spotless. I never have to worry when I stay at Hyatt Place Anaheim about finding a room that I do not enjoy. The staff if great and always goes out of their way to help in every way possible. Thank you Scott, Maddie, Peter, Mitchell, Jamie, Lisa, Christine, Adilene Jorden, Brittany, Blanca and Alma for creating such a wonderful hotel experience. The Staff truly will do anything possible to make sure your stay is great!

I was here for a conference. Only 3 mins walk to convention. Rooms were clean and next to I-5.  Close to major highways and 15 mins from John Wayne airport. Parking is $16/daily with the ability to enter multiple times. Hotel also located next to Disneyland. The stadium is also nearby. Plenty of dining options with reasonable prices all within walking distance.

Summary Heading: Nice place to relax after a long day of Disneyland!
Summary: Beds were comfortable, wished the frigs in the room had a small freezer in them. Parking was $16 a DAY!!!  I didn't want to buy the parking lot!!  But, walk no more than 1/4 mile and catch the free bus to DL... go left out of parking lot to the first light, cross over to your right, walk along the tall hedges until you see the Toy Story buses and climb aboard, they're free! I would definitely go back, the complimentary breakfast was more than I ever expected, hot, healthy (for the most part) and very yummy!

I always stay at this site for DISney. It is close enough but you can take the shuttle and not feel like you need to walk. A perfect compromise. You can buy your Disney passes there and enjoy a coffee at Starbucks or a full meal in the restaurant. Perfect choice.

I had a great stay at the Hyatt Place in late September. Very nice size room with plenty of room to work. The staff was very helpful and delightful to talk to. It's nice to stay someplace where someone says "Welcome Back" at the end of a long day.  The breakfasts were good, the 24/7 food service helpful and the hotel was clean and well-maintained. I think the staff really did everything possible to make my stay comfortable. That's why I hesitate to make the criticisms below, but I think the first at least is very important.   Although this may be a corporate decision,  a Hyatt hotel, especially one catering to business travelers, should absolutely have some kind of secured, password-protected wireless network available. If they don't want to make it free, at least provide the

Summary Heading: just your average hotel. Nothing spectacular
Summary: The hotel itself was just ok. For the price we paid for the two nights there you would probably expect more. The front desk wasn't the friendliest upon check in.  The bathroom had a non slip mat your supposed to put in the tub. It that was filthy. We didn't even want to touch it. The room was pretty dusty too!

We enjoyed our stay here. Clean and comfortable rooms, good breakfast with a good selection of hot and /cold items and good location. We walked to/from Disneyland. The room decor was beautiful. The only thing missing in the room was a microwave.  And they have the best chocolate cookie I have ever tried.  We will stay again when back in Anaheim.

Great location on Harbor Blvd.  Plenty of onsite parking.  Near convention center.  A little far from Disneyland but within walking distance.  Great complementary breakfast, with cold and hot food options.  Easy check in and checkout process.

Room was spacious, had a sitting area. Hotel was clean and parking was secure. Staff was accommodating. Breakfast was hot and tasty. Less than a mile from Disney. My family goes to Disney annually and the Hyatt will be where we stay.

My daughter and I were taking a weekend getaway to Disneyland. We drove up Saturday morning and arrived about nine-ish and requested early check in. It was a little bit too early so they checked us in and told us they would call us when the room was available. So we walked over to Disneyland which was about a 20 minute walk and later received a call about 11:30 AM that our room was ready. The room was clean spacious and modern. The following day we went down to have breakfast at the hotel offers for free and it includes eggs, sausage, toast, bagels,fruit, yogurt, cottage cheese, oatmeal and cereal. They had coffee juice and milk to drink. We were able to come back to our room and get a little more rest as they allow check out at 12 PM. The staff was friendly and we would

Summary Heading: Location great, hotel nice, bit pricy
Summary: If you want to be near Disney you have to pay for it I guess... nice Hyatt, clean rooms, standard breakfast (although sausage served as well as sausage gravy -- two different meats would have been nice as I don't eat sausage). About $200 for the room with taxes and another $18 for parking. I used points to stay. 12k. Would stay again.

My son  lost his tooth while staying at the hotel.  The front desk sent up a special treat and certificate from the tooth fairy.  It made my sons day.  The staff went above and beyond the entire time.  We greatly enjoyed our stay!

While not a high-end Hyatt, this hotel was comfortable and convenient for our Disney vacation. The Disney parking lot is across the street, and you can catch a free shuttle bus from there into the park. Breakfast was also appreciated in the morning. Only gripe was having to pay for parking.

Summary Heading: Good location and lovely hot complimentary breakfasts
Summary: Staying at this hotel was very convenient for a Disney vacation, especially if you walk across the street to the east side of harbor and catch the toy story lot parking shuttle that drops you off at the Disney main gate. However I hate paying extra for onsite parking which seems to be the standard around here,

All staff were professional! Amazing breakfast! The room was perfect and spacious for a family of 4 adults, a 3 year old, and an 8 month old.  Will definitely be visiting again! Less than 15 minute walk to Disneyland.

This is one of my favorite hotels. I love that they offer complimentary breakfast and always have apples out for guest. The design of the hotel is very nice, I will totally recommend this hotel to other guest. Here in Anaheim it's walking distance to all the restaurants, downtown Disney, etc.

This hotel was well positioned for our visit to Disneyland with a short 15 minute walk. The staff were very friendly and accommodating. The rooms are modern and clean and fit our family of five well. The ability to close off the area into separate rooms was great. The bonus free hot breakfast each morning was delicious and had good variety. Loved the free parking included in our package, saving us further. They let us keep our car parked after check-out as well on the last day.

It is hard actually, find a Hotel to match a perfect vacation, this Hotel have it all, spacious, clean and modern rooms, the buffet breakfast so delicious, but most important to be noted, the staff, polite, so friendly and looking just to help, i am so grateful to all, my top priority when visiting Anaheim again, looking forward to enjoy it another time.

Wonderful stay. Couldnt ask for anything more. Close to the Toy Story Parking lot. Room was made up when we returned for a nap at 2pm. Good breakfast. Bar and room service available. Room was very clean. Staff professionalism was exemplary.

We had booked into a nearby hotel (different chain) and unfortunately when I arrived to check in with my 6 yr old and 8 yr old at 8:30pm, was told they had a water main break - had no water or AC... Obviously couldn't stay there so I quickly checked nearby and found the Hyatt Place.  Upon arriving, Adilene at the Front Desk couldn't have been kinder or more understanding of our situation (aka mom and 2 little girls, tired and without a bed!). She quickly assigned us a room that would be quiet, offered the girls something to drink and made herself available until the end of the shift, should we need anything else. Through the remainder of the weekend, we were thrilled with the staff - all incredibly kind and helpful -  and accommodations - which were very clean and spacious.

Perfect location with a $5 uber ride over to downtown Disney. Clean spacious rooms.  Nothing at all to complain about, my new go to hotel for Disney. Parking is $16 for underground parking with an elevator that goes right into hotel.

Once again Hyatt Place in Anaheim was a wonderful experience. Great room, terrific staff and wonderful location. My family has tried several hotels in the Anaheim area in the past, since staying at the Hyatt Place in March of 2016 and again in September we're done trying to pick the right hotel.  Hyatt Place in Anaheim, one less thing to worry about for a family vacation.

Summary Heading: Superior room, service, just need microwave.
Summary: Excellent hotel.  They probably have the  most welcoming staff, housekeepers, servers, and front desk I have experienced in a hotel.  I also like their dress code. The only complaint is that the room does not have a microwave.

Had a good time . Very clean and nice rooms . Not a bad walk to Disneyland. very friendly staff. It was nice getting back to the hotel and having a drink , nice and quite. I would return back to this hotel.

I loved this place. They were clean and modern. The only thing is I would have liked some extra pillow and blankets. We liked the free breakfast, it was really good actually. It saved us a ton of money so we didn't have to spend as much in Disney.

This is at least our 3rd stay at this hotel; it's our favorite for visiting Dland.  It's a Hyatt Place, so not high-end, which is the only reason I give 4 instead of 5.  But for the location, cleanliness of hotel, price and what's included, it's best of category, in my opinion. So if you assume we aren't rating it against luxury hotels, this is 5 star. Rooms are consistently very clean, breakfast is good, plentiful. Beds are comfortable and it's easy to get to & from Disney via the shuttle. I've stayed at many places around the Disneyland park and this is the favorite.  Only one complaint this stay. Called down for a taxi as we were headed out. They had an expensive high-end vehicle waiting that was quite a bit more expensive. Considering the airport we were flying out of was 20

Summary Heading: A VERY GOOD HOTEL TO STAY IN ANAHEIM
Summary: I stayed in the hotel for a convention. Everything is good. Room is clean and spacious. Washing room is nice and nicely renovated. Every staff is very friendly and helpful. They are ready to help you for any question about the hotel and the city. I am always greeted by the staff with smiles.The hotel is very close to Anaheim convention center. There are plenty of restaurants in walking distances.  I would like to stay in the hotel if I visit Anaheim again.

This place is definitely affordable and a great price for your stay here near Disney. I stayed here with my 4 boys. The breakfast was just what we needed to get our day started.  Just across the street was a parking lot we could catch the Disney shuttle. The shuttle takes you to the Disney parks, so no need for an ART pass.  It worked out wonderfully.

This is a great hotel we stayed here with our 2 boys really enjoyed the family room with the bunk beds. The room was terrific with a seperate area for the kids to sleep. The perfect hotel if you have kids and visiting Disneyland.

Great selection for breakfast. Clean and quiet rooms. Staff is friendly and helpful.  Great location. Some advice: Keep your lock latch on if you don't want the cleaning crew to walk in on you. They may forget to knock. Remember there is a $16/day parking fee.

The staff was amazing and very polite. My favorite part of the stay was the breakfast! Not many hotels do breakfast like HYATT Place! Quiet hotel and clean. Overall we enjoyed our stay and would definitely book another stay.

This was a great hotel.  Breakfast was good and the kids suite was perfect for our family.  It was easy enough to walk to Disneyland or jump on ART.  Even though parking was $16 per day it was nice and seemed secure enough.  We had a great time and will plan to use this hotel again.

Nice large clean rooms, good service, nice fresh breakfast with many choices each morning.  Good location downtown with short walk to Disneyland shuttle.  Would stay at a Hyatt Place again at this Latin or another.

Summary Heading: Like new and affordable with great service
Summary: I was really impressed from the moment I walked in the door.  Spacious and very clean rooms. Refridgerator and lounging area. Pretty comfortable beds.  Quiet. Very fast service when I asked for a foam pillow.  Front desk was very helpful and nice.  Breakfast had a very good variety, even for me being gluten free.  They offered a little variety in their hot breakfast offerings throughout the week too.  Gym equipment was in good condition. Never used the pool.

Summary Heading: Sleek & modern accommodations, and great service
Summary: A colleague and I shared a room at the Hyatt Place in Anaheim for a conference just a few doors down at the Marriott.  We enjoyed the amenities and accommodations - and I chose a Hyatt Place in particular because of positive experiences I've had in the past at other locations.  I especially want to give recognition to Jorden at the front desk.  He made it a point to accommodate our needs and went above and beyond to provide us with friendly service, an early check-in, and took the time to answer our questions.  Keep up the great work and continue hiring more great folks like Jorden!

im very pleased with this hotel. Its close to the attractions we visited, and the rooms are always clean and inviting. We booked our room last minute, so we got a family room with a bunk bed which worked out perfectly for my nephew.  We had to request to move to another room because that room was located next door to the containment/cleaning/utility storage, and it was a bit loud. But they put us in the same room on another floor, chichi worked out fine. I will continue to stay at this hotel when we are in town :)

Stayed here for about a week and a half.  Overall the hotel is great.  It's mostly convention or Disneyland goers.  Good sized rooms.  Free wi-fi.  Small bar in the lobby that has a couple of TVs and serves decent food 24/7.  The pool is tiny but there is a hot tub.  My biggest complaint is that the water temperature in the shower has a tendency to fluctuate quite a bit which can lead to a not so pleasant experience.  Caught me off guard the first time but I learned after that.  I would be happy to stay here again if I am ever back in Anaheim.

Clean, modern hotel with amazing staff and yummy free breakfast buffet! Best hotel for our family! We really liked our double queen room that has a little divider between the sleeping area and the sofa.

I really enjoyed my stay here. This is very much "resort style" rooms/hallways. The room smelled so good!! It was clean and pleasant to the eye. I would definitely stay here again and recommend to my friends and family.

Love the super friendly and very accommodating staff. This hotel always maintain cleanliness. Decent breakfast, and fast service from receptionist and server.  The pool is designed for kids which is our preference.

Summary Heading: Clean and spacious, but that's about it.
Summary: Loved the rooms in the Hyatt. They are clean, roomy and bright. HOWEVER: we travelled from Australia and requested about 4 months ago for a high floor away from the elevators. What we got was a 2nd floor room overlooking the carpark a room away from the elevators. Disappointing. We were told by our check in person that there are only a few speciality rooms and they cannot accomodate everyones requests. My family are light sleepers. The walls are really thin. All outside and noise above us can be heard. We can hear conversations, walking flushing, showering, everything. Our boys woke up 3 times overnight as a result. The air conditioning is also noisy. If you want space and cleanliness this is your hotel. If you want a quite accomodating hotel, go somewhere else.

The place is very clean and the staff are very helpful. The queen bedroom suites are lovely and spacious. We stayed there for 6 days. The staff really can't do enough for you. The only negative things were the gift shop was very over priced but you have to expect this in a hotel. They have a Starbucks coffee shop based within the hotel and the staff seem to be quite young and I think they need a lesson or two in customer service.   I had bought one coffee from there and it was horrid so I advised the staff and no offer of a replacement drink.   My husband bought me another 1 and this was also disgusting. The staff seem to be messing around more than trying to be helpful. Would recommend this coffee shop at all. I was very disappointed as I normally enjoy going to Starbucks.
Manager Response: Hi Niall030598,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your  6 days stay with us on Trip Advisor. We appreciate you letting us know how you were pleased on the spaciousness of our queen bedroom suites  and the cleanliness. We'll sure to recognize our staff for being helpful. I will make sure to address to the appropriate department regarding the customer service in one of our outlet. We look forward to your families return when you are in the area and look forward to exceeding your expectations.

Summary: It was gross. There was a green "something" stain on the sheets under the pillows. When I made the front desk aware of it, they promised to send housekeeping right away. 20 minutes later, a hispanic dude shows up at the door and practically throws sheets at me. "You complained about the cheets?" "Yeah um.. thanks." So they mess up, and apparently now I work for the hotel and have to make up the bed. On my vacation. That I'm paying for.  There was an "unknown" stain on the lampshade I didn't bother reporting it... who know what they would have made me do for that.  No towels in the pool area. At all. On a Thursday. The hot tub was super foamy which means dirty or wrong chemicals. It was also either blazing hot or lukewarm within a few minutes.  I went to tell the front desk about

The whole trip was great. No problem checking in or out.  The breakfast was amazing and made me often skip the convention breakfast.  Staff was friendly and even showed me how to check my flight status as well
Manager Response: Hi angelalL781WJ,  Thank you for taking the time to write your wonderful review on Trip Advisor.  We love to read that the whole trip was great and  enjoyed our breakfast selections. Our staff strives to provide excellent service, and it looks like the did a great job! We look forward for your next group convention.

Summary Heading: Spacious Room reminds me of a bachelor pad
Summary: I really like this hotel. The lobby and rooms are very spacious and everything was very clean. The rooms had two double beds with a tv that could swivel to the bed side or couch side. It had a kitchen space and a sizable bathroom. There is a nice pool area with lounge chairs and a hot tub. In the morning there was a free continental breakfast including cereal, pastries, hard boiled eggs, and oatmeal. We stayed here for one night after staying at the Disneyland Hotel to still be close in proximity to Disneyland and Downtown Disney.
Manager Response: Hi ThePaperCrown,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and the amenities we have in our hotel. We hope to welcome your family back again soon!

Summary: Stayed at Hyatt Place for 2 nights in August. Frankly we didn‚Äôt spend that much time inside hotel but from what we‚Äôve experienced I‚Äôd say it‚Äôs a pretty good choice. The room was nothing fancy, but clean and spacious. Bathroom was a bit on the small side but well-maintained (no mold or stain). The selection and quality of buffet breakfast (included in the room rate) was pretty good. Staffs were very friendly and ready to lend a hand at any time.   Some reviewers mentioned that the parking lot was shared with another hotel and therefore spaces were very limited. Maybe we were lucky but we had no trouble finding parking space.   Others mentioned the distance issue between Hyatt Place and Disneyland. Well I guess when you‚Äôre all hyped up in the morning, walking 20 minute there with
Manager Response: Hi Sabrina,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon when you and your family go back to Disneyland!

Summary: Extremely pleasant stay, they definitely know the hospitality business. I strongly recommend this Hyatt location, we are Hyatt Gold Passport members and this has been our best experience and we have visited some very nice and more expensive resorts but the service here was exceptional.
Manager Response: Hi S5416URjuana, Thank you very much for your wonderful review!  and thank you for being a Hyatt Gold Passport member.The staff and I truly appreciate that you took the time to share your experience and views. I will make sure to share this with the staff and we hope you are able to return and stay with us again in the future. Guests like you are the reason we love what we do at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim.

Summary: This is a very nice hotel with wonderful service. The rooms are clean and spacious. The two restaurants were decent. There is a nice bar. It's a family friendly hotel, of course given its close proximity to Disneyland. Overall a very nice hotel. You and your family will love it.
Manager Response: Hi Anthony L, Thank you for sharing your positive comments about our friendly hotel on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed our restaurant , bar and specially the close proximity of our hotel to Disneyland. We hope to  welcome you back again soon!

Summary: I wanted to review the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center. Upon check in I realized,  that as always, the service is outstanding! My room was impeccably clean as was the entire Hotel. I want to thank Peter, Derek, Jorden, Jamie, Mitchell and Maddie for always a kind word and welcoming me back, by name, each day I stayed. I was there a week and everything was perfect--- from the breakfast to the dinner....from the personal greetings to the room cleaned to perfection each day.  I also want to thank Adilene and Scott. It was great seeing the Management work side by side...doing what was needed. I firmly believe a strong Management Team will be the example for the employee and that will progress to a happy guest.                                                This Hyatt
Manager Response: Hi Colby101105,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review! Nothing makes us happier than reading  that you enjoyed your stay. We'll sure to recognize Peter, Derek, Jordan, Jamie, Mitchell, Maddie, Adilene and Scott for a job well done. Our staff strives to provide excellent service and it looks like they did it. I am delighted that you find our hotel impeccably clean. Your kind words are greatly appreciated.  We hope to welcome you back home again soon !!!

Summary: We stayed here two nights while visiting DisneyLand. Hotel was nice and clean service was good too! The only reason I gave it four stars was because the pillows were so hard :/ and the noise outside you can hear everything at night, also the Ac is so loud in the room, maybe they can improve that? Other than that we had a good stay.
Manager Response: Hi KSam88,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience. We will make sure to forward the appropriate department regarding your concerns. We have taken your comment seriously and made sure that it is addressed. We hope to earn your 5 star rating on your next stay and exceed your expectations.

Summary Heading: Looking For A Memorable Stay? Stay At The Hyatt!
Summary: I played in the largest volleyball tournament over the Labor Day weekend, and to my surprise, stayed at one of the best hotels in Anaheim also! They made my weekend in Anaheim one to remember.  They have a nice clean and modern interior.  They do a great job at keeping the place immaculate to ensure a good experience for the guests.  The amenities were great, free breakfast bar in the morning, and the service was beyond par.  The staff at The Hyatt was vey accommodating to all my needs and really just made me feel special.  They do their best to take care of all their guests and help in every way possible.  I had multiple friends from the tournament stay at this hotel as well, and they all agreed that it was the best they've experienced.  I almost forgot to mention how great of
Manager Response: Hi HannaH, Thank you for taking time to write this wonderful review! I'm happy we made your stay memorable. Thank you very much for the positive comments and your kind compliments. We look forward to welcoming you back home!

Summary: Great location.  Convenient to everything:  Disneyland, Anaheim Convention Center, Downtown Disney.  Was in town for a volleyball tournament at the American Sports Center and that was only a short 5 min drive away.  All the staff that we came across greeted us with a smile and were very helpful with questions.
Manager Response: Hi Sophia L,  Thank you for staying at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim on your recent volleyball tournament. We appreciate your positive comment with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed the proximity of our hotel and our friendly staff. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Really solid property for visiting Disneyland
Summary: The family had a great stay. Shuttle stops were super close, but we just walked. Staff was great, and the hotel was in great shape.  If you need a softer pillow, check the closet, or call the front desk, as the standard down pillows are pretty stiff. The bed was very comfortable, though.  The kids loved it, and we did too.
Manager Response: Hi zofodraziw,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your family stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you had a great stay with us and we hope to welcome your family back again soon!

Summary Heading: Best hotel I've stayed at thus far
Summary: I participated in one of the largest volleyball tournaments in southern California and had the pleasure to stay at the Hyatt. This hotel had excellent customer service, short waits at check in, and enough elevators to decrease the wait time getting in and out of your room. The Hyatt was central to all my needs, close to disneyland, downtown disney, restaurants, clubs and it's walking distance to the CVS which I needed. Staying at this hotel made my weekend that much better. It was quiet, clean, and convenient. The rooms were spacious and it fit 4 volleyball players perfectly.  Definitely gotta stay here.   They also have a complimentary continental breakfast, BONUS!!!
Manager Response: Hi Ching L,  Thank you for staying at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim during your volley ball tournament. The staff and I truly appreciate letting us know that we are the "BEST HOTEL" and  you took time to share your experience  on Trip Advisor!  I will make sure to share this with my staff. We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to welcome your TEAM  back again soon!

Summary: Very clean, close by Disneyland, friendly staff, great customer service, I would definitely come back next time and recommend all my friends that's traveling around the Orange county to stay here! Great job!
Manager Response: Hi J9664OLtonyc, Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us. We'll sure to recognize our staff for a job well done. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Very clean, nice staff and good location!! Stayed here this past weekend and loved it. About a 20 min walk to Disneyland and Downtown Disney. Very close to restaurants and convenient stores. Would love definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Hi nancytang1122, Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and like the location of our hotel. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: I stayed at this hotel while playing in the NACIVT volleyball tournament in Anaheim. I had a wonderful experience. The facility was clean and the employees were all kind and helpful. The location of the hotel was great for access to tourists attractions in Anaheim and it was surrounded by great restaurants. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hi Melanie V,  Thank you for sharing your awesome review about your stay with us on Trip Advisor during your NACIVT volleyball tournament! We are delighted that you enjoyed  the cleanliness and friendly staff . We hope to welcome you back again soon on your next tournament!

Summary: It was ok! They advertise a King Bed we definitely did not have a king bed.  They forget to mention the shuttle to Disneyland is at another hotel across the parking lot. The food was very generic.  The rooms were not clean I can honestly say I didn't feel like I walked into a clean room.
Manager Response: Hi ritaal9501CT,    Thank you for staying with us and for recently completing our survey.  We apologize for the inconveniences that occurred during your stay.  We advertise different kind of room types in our websites. We try to accommodate each guest based on the preference and we can not guarantee room types.  Our goal is to provide every guest with a comfortable and defect free stay and I ensure you this will be brought to the attention of   our housekeeping and food and beverage department   Please feel free to contact me directly should your travels bring you back to our property and I will personally oversee your accommodations.

Summary: This hotel has one of the most nicest staffs I have ever met, I had an unfortunate accident and the staff went out of its way to make sure I had everything I needed or always asked how I was doing, especially the front desk area.  Hotel rooms are large, breakfast and WIFI, what else do you need?  Cleanliness, no problem, parking easy enough.
Manager Response: Hi jack2go,     Thank you for the wonderful review! Nothing makes me happier than reading that our staff took care of your needs during your stay. We'll sure to recognize them for a job well done We are delighted that you enjoyed the cleanliness of our room and our amenities . We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: Hotel was fairly good. Clean and tidy. We had the room with the bunk bed and sofa bed, loved that there was a door I'm between to split the rooms and two tvs.  The interior is not too notch, but it's quite nice and simple.  Bring your own shampoo as the one the hotel provides wasn't the greatest.  They have great complimentary breakfast, nothing fancy, however eggs, waffles, pancakes on different days with sausages. Bagels and toast, fruits and yogurts. Variety of juices and milk.   The pool and gym are quite small, so if you are looking for that, it wouldn't be the best place to stay.   Overall it was a nice hotel. Minimum daily cost of 5 dollars for a bus shuttle to Disney with the hotel next door.  Lots of restaurants near by.
Manager Response: Hi noboston, Thank you for your positive review of our hotel. I'm happy to hear your comments on the cleanliness of the hotel, amenities, and of course our great breakfast. I do apologize on the size of our gym but it coincides with the number of our rooms and same with the pool. We look forward to your return when you are in the area, and look forward to exceeding your expectations.

Summary: I booked Suite for my family. the room was amazing contemporary designed, fresh, new full with storage, refrigerator, free channels, auto controlled room temperature. Comfortable beds, no back pain in morning, USB port is available with alarm system which helped me to charge my phone. nice wide screen LCD display with free channels. Complementary Free wifi & breakfast.  wonderful view of morning as window was east facing. Bar was open till 12 midnight.
Manager Response: Hi Keyur S,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your family stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed  our amenities, our bar hours and had a restful sleep experience. We hope to welcome your family back again soon!

Summary: A really nice and customer friendly hotel near the Convention Center and Disneyland.  The staff was super friendly, the rooms nicely appointed and clean, and in a very cental location in Anaheim.  They serve a wonderful breakfast in the morning, with fresh food and plenty of space to eat.  They have a small bar area next to the guest desk.  They have fruit out front and a nice cold water fountain in the lobby.  A small but important feature is they have 3 computers available to use including printing of boarding passes.  Parking costs with both underground and street level parking.  Good location, and reasonably priced for the area.  Worth a stay if you in the area.
Manager Response: Hi Too Poor 2, Thank you so much for your wonderful review about our hotel and hotel staff!  Our staff strives to provide excellent service, and it looks like they did a great job! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience. We look forward to your next stay, and providing you with all that you need to make your stay enjoyable!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, not so nice customer service
Summary: The hotel itself is a nice property, clean rooms. The swimming pool could be updated. I loved the room layout with the kids separate room, but wish the pillows were a bit more comfy. It felt like the pillows had small plastic pellets in them. The televisions in the rooms were awesome size!
Manager Response: Hi Monica R,  Thank you for sharing your comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We have taken your comment seriously and made sure that it is addressed. We hope we can prove ourselves on your next stay , and look forward to exceeding your expectations. Please call me directly to make your reservation.

Summary: The hotel provide excellent services and nice room condition. Staff cares about us during our visit. Free breakfast is a great bonus and the quality was great. The only drawback is the AC unit seems running too long at night even temp has been adjusted to higher. Other than that the room is great.
Manager Response: HI Eddie L,  Thank you, for taking the time to write this wonderful review! We love to read that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel, and I'll be sure to forward your comments to our staff. I will make sure to address the A/C issue to our maintenance department. Again, thank you for the recommendation, and we hope to be able to welcome you again soon

Summary: Had a great stay at this lovely hotel. Spacious and comfortable rooms. Good breakfast. 20 minutes walk to Disney. Helpful staff. 16 dollars to park, which seems to be the going rate for this area.Highly recommended. Would certainly stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi alrock2010,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about our lovely hotel on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: ¬Ω mile to Disneyland, which is located on the same side of the street.  Rooms are very clean liked the walk in shower.  Lots of storage space.  Easy walk to nearby resturants.  Staff is very friendly and knowledgeable on inside info on Disneyland and Calif Adventure.  Don't go for the pool it is very small but the hot tub is nice for adults.  Small workout room. Dining area is very spacious. Good for small family or couple.
Manager Response: Hi 668gaylek, Thank you for the wonderful review! Nothing makes us happier than reading that you enjoyed your stay. I am delighted that you liked the storage spaces and walk in shower. We'll be sure to recognize our staff for a job well done. We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: Great hotel. Definately would recommend to others. About a 15 min walk to the Disneyland park. Breakfast was included, and only average, but convenient overall. Room was comfortable and clean and family oriented. Recommend king room with separate bunk beds. The bunk beds were separated by pocket doors and kids had their own couch area with own TV.
Manager Response: Hi Claire M,  Thank you for sharing your outstanding comments and kind words with your fellow travelers. We're so glad you had such an all-around great experience...clean, comfortable, convenient, and mostly importantly family oriented. We really do appreciate you, and your patronage, and we hope you'll come back  your family sometime soon.

Summary: As a Hyatt rewards member this was my first stay at a Hyatt Place and I was delightfully surprised it was better than I expected.  If I‚Äôd had to compare it with the same brand level of Marriott Courtyard or Hilton‚Äôs Hampton Inn, Hyatt Place was much nicer with modern design.  Although we never went to Disneyland, location wise it‚Äôs great, only 1.5 blocks from the Magic Kingdom, but it is a long block, and lots of restaurants and shopping nearby in walking distance.  With the Disney crowds I could hear kids a floor up at times and the lobby was always busy and noisy.  We picked this location because it was the most convenient location to my daughter‚Äôs college other than renting a house and was one of the better hotels close by with large sized rooms.  We booked the double queen

Summary Heading: Modern hotel, spacious rooms, great breakfast
Summary: Check-In was quick. We were all tired after a long day at Disneyland and the staff was very friendly and efficient. The guest rooms are very clean and spacious. I loved the sectional couch and ottoman. The complimentary breakfast was delicious and there was a great selection. Only disappointment was parking - $16 is a little pricey. Should be included in the cost of the hotel.
Manager Response: Hi Erica T,  Thank you for the positive review regarding your stay in Trip advisor. It is always gratifying to our team to hear that we provided friendly and efficient service. We appreciate that you loved our room amenities and our great daily breakfast food selections. We will address your concern, but FYI all hotels near Disneyland  charges  parking fee. We look forward to your return.

Summary: Excelent for a King size bed with pull out full size bed. Excelent breakfast and convinient basement parking. Easy check-in and check-out. Easy safe no worry parking with elevators going to your room floor. Easy in and out parking too.
Manager Response: Hi jnnejz,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed our convenient parking and our amenities that we have in out hotel. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice, clean and close to Disneyland
Summary: Nice hotel within walking distance of Disneyland (15min). Clean rooms. In fact, we were very impressed by the housekeeping staff. The only drawback would be that there is no laundry facilities, which was important for us since we were there for a while. They share one with Cortona that is next door (and pretty awful, if you like clean environment), or much nicer one that is across the road in Hilton.  It would be nice if there were more options in the breakfast buffet. Maybe more vegetarian options as well.  Front desk staff is very nice and helpful. I love that there were bunk beds for the kids.
Manager Response: Hi L S,  Thank you, for taking the time to write this wonderful review! We love to read that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel, and I'll be sure to forward your comments to our staff. Again, thank you for the recommendation, and we hope to be able to welcome you again soon!

Summary: It was so Terrible over all wouldn't stay there hotel manager so rude including his staff and when you have a complain he doesn't want to even to hear you out even since you are his guest now how rude is that
Manager Response: Hi ElizabethD4632UQ,  Thank you for staying with us and for recently completing our survey.  We apologize for the inconveniences that occured during your stay. We fell short based on your comment, please allow me to correct it. Our goal is to provide every guest a comfortable and defect free stay. Please call me directly to discuss.

Summary: The hotel was exactly what we needed. Great beds for our family of 4. Bunk beds for the kids. Free breakfast everyday. a $5 uber ride each way or a 20 minute walk to Disneyland. Pool and hot tub were refreshing.
Manager Response: Hi drgaryandthekids  Thank you for sharing your outstanding comments with your fellow travelers. We're so glad that your family  had such an all-around great experience...great bed, excellent selection of breakfast everyday, convenient, and mostly importantly you felt welcomed and appreciated throughout your stay. We really do appreciate you, and your family, and we hope you'll come back and see us again sometime soon.

Summary: Both my boxes ticked. A good room and a good start to the day. I'd never had such a big room.... Maybe all hotel rooms in the USA have 2 double beds and a lounge area.  Perfect for the convention centre
Manager Response: Hi Sipickles, Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed our room size and the lounge area which is different from other hotels in our area.  We hope to welcome you back again soon during convention!

Summary: It has been a very long time since I've stayed in a hotel and was truly blown away.  William at the front desk had truly exceptional customer service.  Everything from the lobby to the hotel room to the pool to the training center was spotless and very accommodating.  The room was so spotless and spacious it was amazing.   My wife and I loved it so much it was sad leaving.  I feel that I have interesting perspective because the following morning we drove to Santa Barbara and stayed at the Hyatt centric which did not compare at all.  Our stay at the Hyatt place in Anaheim was so wonderful that our trip in Santa Barbara felt greatly below average. I would highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Hi Aaron S,  Thank you for sharing your outstanding comments with your fellow travelers. We're so glad you had such an all-around great experience...clean, comfortable, convenient, and mostly importantly you felt welcomed and appreciated throughout your stay. We really DO appreciate you, and your patronage, and we hope you'll come back and see us again sometime soon.

Summary: My husband came down last minute to visit our friends and Disney Cast Member who was visiting the Anaheim Disney location. The hotel is absolutely beautiful and a great location for visiting the park and Downtown Disney as we pleased. Our only discomfort was the location of our room- we were right next to the elevator and a service door. I was kept up for most of the night from loud hotel guests, however I understand these types of things cannot always be controlled. In addition, being pregnant also has made me quite the light sleeper, so should anyone else have this challenge, a room right next to the elevator may not be the best idea. Overall, a great experience!
Manager Response: Hi Mary Renee C, Thank you so much for your wonderful review about our hotel ! I am so happy that we were able to accommodate your last minute visit in Anaheim. Our staff strives to provide excellent service, and it looks like they did a great job except your room being beside the elevator. We look forward to your next stay, and providing you with all that you need to make your stay enjoyable!

Summary: Had a wonderful stay, rooms were extremely clean and staff was always friendly. Location to Disneyland great.  Very comfortable beds. Breakfast was convenient. Would definitely stay here again.  Very small pool, so if you are looking to have the pool to be part of your stay it might be disappointing.
Manager Response: Hi Josette V,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We have always had pleasant experiences at our Hyatt Place stays but I was let so let down this time, I had to write a review. Had just stayed in the Hyatt Place in Ontario so was expecting the same great experience. Unfortunately, we were disappointed. Front staff needs some training in hospitality, as they were not very warm or inviting from check in to check out. Okay correction, there was one nice young gentleman next to the person checking us out. Booked here last minute for a Disneyland visit, even after I read that there was a parking fee each day and that there was no shuttle to Disneyland. Although this is a newer hotel, walls were VERY thin. We could hear the people next to us....TV and ALL their conversations. Housekeeping woke us up one day as they OPENED the door at
Manager Response: Hi jymart,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review.We apologize for the inconveniences that occured during your stay.  Our rooms and housekeeping department take daily measures to prevent situations like the one you experienced before they arise and unfortunately we fell short based on the comments in your survey.      Our goal is to provide every guest with a comfortable and defect free stay and I ensure you this will be brought to the attention of the appropriate departments. Please feel free to contact me directly should your travels bring you back to our property and I will personally oversee your accommodations.

Summary Heading: This is the place to stay if you're visiting Disneyland
Summary: We stayed here for three nights and had a two day hopper pass to Disney and California adventure land with our three children. The hotel was clean and close to the parks and the restaurant offered good food. We played tennis on the rooftop and roasted smores in the fire pit and watched the sunset.

This review is long overdue.  I stay at this property very frequently.  At first it was primarily because of location but it is the staff that has set the property apart.  Jorden C. recognized me as a return visitor and established himself as the point of contact.  He made sure each stay that all expectations were met.  Other staff such as Peter who works the front desk / bar recognized me and always made me feel welcome.  In addition to the staff, the hallways and guestrooms are larger / wider than traditional Hyatt Place's I have stayed.  I love staying at this property.  Even though I am a business traveler, I don't feel like I am at Disney despite the hotels close proximity.
Manager Response: Hi BossHog0113,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you always enjoy your experience with us during your business trip. We'll sure to recognize Jorden C, Peter and all the staff for job well done. Guests like you are the reason we love what we do.  We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: My over all experience at Hyatt place in Anaheim was outstanding, I landed quite earlier than I was supposed to and still Hyatt staff helped me to check in without any extra fee and also offered me free breakfast, I was amazed, very friendly staff and comfortable place to stay. Thanks
Manager Response: Hi Amit D,  Thank you for sharing your outstanding experience with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed our food and our friendly staff. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Hotel was clean. Room was spacious. Free hot breakfast included. Close to Disneyland, Convention Center and American Sport Center. Easy check in and check out. Friendly staff. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi Donald D,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We really enjoyed our time here! The hotel is modern, new looking and clean and the front desk staff are exceptional, especially Jordan. The complementary breakfast was among the best we've had when traveling. It is a straight run to the Parks and it took us, an average family with a stroller, between ten and fifteen minutes to walk along a very safe and clean street with lots of restaurants and stores along the way. Uber cost $4.50 if we were to tired to walk! Ample parking (cost is extra) at the hotel and nice breakfast area seating both indoors and out. Only disappointment was the pool area.  Very tiny and sparse. Only three lounge chairs and a row of regular chairs lined around the very small pool deck. Not a pleasant or enjoyable pool for a resort area. No on site
Manager Response: Hi NJDels,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and specially our breakfast. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Service was great, room was very clean and comfortable.  A very good alternative to other hotels by convention center.  The food was good. Wi-fi in room was weak.  AC in room was a bit loud.  I was disappointed that a hotel built  during the drought did not have low-flow shower heads.
Manager Response: Hi Steve P, Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and  we will make sure to look into some of your concerns. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: This property is a no frills hotel with a basic breakfast, a tiny pool (like tiny tiny), and a bar that serves pre-mixed drinks.   Pros:   Spacious rooms with decent beds Good wifi Reasonable price Close to Disneyland Close to conference center  Cons  Tiny tiny pool Terrible bar drink choices Breakfast is pretty basic   If you are going for a conference and just need a decent room with reliable wifi, this is fine. If you are coming with kids who are going to want to spent a couple hours each day splashing around in a pool, this is definitely not a good choice.
Manager Response: Hi aussietrek,  Thank you for sharing your pros and cons comments during your convention on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us. We will make sure to address the drinks choice we have on our bar and this will be brought to the attention of the appropriate department.We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Chose this hotel because it is walking distance to Disneyland shuttle buses.  Great staff! Very helpful and courteous. Rooms were neat and organized.  Beds were comfortable and sheets were clean.  Enjoyed the free breakfast daily.
Manager Response: Hi Gilbert L,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and the proximity of our hotel. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We had a great experience here. Staff very kind. Kids loved having thier own room with tv and bunkbeds. We just would like a bit bigger pool and pool area. Breakfast was good some better choices than other places. Close to disney tram.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing that you had a great experience with us on Trip Advisor. We'll sure to recognize our staff for a job well done. I am so happy that your kids enjoyed our room with bunkbeds and how your family loved our food choices. We hope to welcome you back again soon !

Summary: This is very close to the convention centre. I needed to stay very close to that area and could not find anywhere else. This room was clean and the bed comfortable with new furnishings.  The staff efficient and helpful enough but no particularly courteous. Breakfast is plentiful and of sufficient quality in a help-yourself, buffet- style sort of way. The internet works well. The restaurant service which is outsourced is rather slow and of basic quality. Overall I paid over 1900 dollars for 5 days which I believe is completely overpriced for the type of ambience, service and facilities. The towels and toiletries again rather basic, no body lotion even if I asked for it. The swimming pool and swimming pool area is motel-like, the outdoor space is tiny and is basically a car
Manager Response: Hi Alex J, Thank you for the very positive review and for your feedback. We're happy to learn you enjoyed the property and that you received great service during your visit. The hotel was priced with in the price range of the hotels in Anaheim during peak season due to conventions in the area. We'll look forward to your next visit and hopefully we would be able to exceed your expectations.

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel! Very convenient to Disney and restaurants!
Summary: Even though I was there on other business Disney was about a block away. Great location. Was able to watch the fireworks from the hotel at night. Great restaurants in the area. Ruth's Chris, Morton's Steak house, etc.
Manager Response: Hi Chris S,  Thank you for sharing your outstanding comments with your fellow travelers. We're so glad you had such an all-around great experience during your business trip and enjoyed the proximity of the hotel. We really DO appreciate you, and your patronage, and we hope you'll come back and see us again sometime soon.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 11 nights on our recent trip to California. We've stayed at other Hyatt places but this one was exceptional. Spotlessly clean and everyone we encountered was super nice and helpful. On the days we went to Disney we walked the .8 mile back and forth with our two kids and it really wasn't a big deal. We had a family room with a king bed and bunk beds for the kids. There were sliding doors separating the room which was nice so that we were still able watch tv after the kids went to bed and not disturb them. The breakfast was delicious! We definitely enjoyed our stay here and would most definitely recommend this hotel to anyone traveling to Disney or the surrounding area.
Manager Response: Hi mom2zackanrack,  Thank you for a great review and recommendation on Trip Advisor! We appreciate that you find our hotel exceptional from the rest. We'll sure to recognize our staff for a job well done. We hope to welcome your family again soon.

Summary: Stayed for five nights due to a convention. Nice and quiet, very warm and professional staff. Rooms are well kept, clean, nice beds, litle noise - slept well. Other colleagues stayed at Hilton and Marriot close by - more noise, more expensive, lower value for money. Good for business-travel, but pool is small, gym is rather small as well. But equipement there worked well.
Manager Response: Hi Bendik S.  Thank you for sharing your positive comments  during your convention on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and slept well. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Review of the Hyatt Place in Anaheim, CA
Summary: You will not find a cleaner room, a better breakfast, and a more cordial staff than found within the confines of the Hyatt Place in Anaheim, California.   Walking distance to the Convention Center and Disneyland.   Prompt and friendly service.
Manager Response: Hi Craig,  Thank you for the wonderful review! Nothing makes us happier than reading that you enjoyed your stay.   We'll be sure to recognize our staff for a job well done. We hope to welcome you again soon .Guests like you are the reason we love what we do at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Stayed here to be close to Disney, tookabout 25 minutes to get to the park entrance. Room was a King which was a good size and modern and clean. Bed was comfortable, room had a fridge. Breakfast was average. Parking was availble and easy to enter and exit throughout.
Manager Response: Hi Finn_Freya  Thank you for your positive review of our hotel. I'm happy to hear your comments on the cleanliness of the hotel, modern  amenities, and of course our comfortable bed. we look forward to your return in the area and exceeding your expectations, we would like to turn the 4 star rating into a perfect 5!

Summary: The staff were helpful when I had little issues to be solved. They heated up my late-night snack (they asked me, not the other way around). Breakfast bar food was good quality and varied.  Only issue was getting a cab.  This hotel is a little smaller than its sister Hyatt hotels so it had no steady stream of cabs waiting for customers.  The cabs did arrive within about 5 minutes. Don't get into an anonymous black car at the entrance to this hotel thinking it is a cab.  These are gypsy cabs and charge you more than cabs. I would like the hotel manager to shoo them away.
Manager Response: Hi Sharon,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us  and enjoyed the food quality of our breakfast. We will make sure to address the cab  situation. We hope to welcome you back again soon

Summary: Stayed only one night, but hotel was well located to area attractions and was very comfortable.  Hotel has all the expected amenities and check-in/check-out was a breeze.  Parking charges are a bit steep for onsite self-parking.
Manager Response: Hi sas8294, Thank you for sharing your positive comments regarding our location and  how comfortable your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience and check in /out was a breeze in our hotel. We charge lower than the average overnight parking fee in Anaheim Disney Area. We hope to welcome you back again soon and earn that perfect 5star.
