Summary: I stayed at this nice hotel for a running event at Disneyland.  Parking was secure in the garage underground.  My room was located on the first floor which was very convenient for me.  The room was very large.  I had space for guests in the sitting area.  I had an extra bed to place my clothes.  The Wi-Fi was smooth for my computing needs.  The breakfast was delicious with many hot foods to choose.  I really enjoyed my time at this hotel.  My only complaint was around 10:00pm, children were yelling and screaming in the hallway.  I understand this is a Disneyland area and many children will be at the nearby hotels including this one, but I really had to rest to wake up at 3:30am to get ready for a 13.1 mile run.  I'm thinking security came by because it was quiet at 10:30pm.  I
Manager Response: Hi Ben J, Thank you for the awesome review and for your very kind words. We're so happy you really enjoyed your stay and yes, we have our security who walks our hallways making sure every guest  gets a comfortable and quiet stay. We really appreciate your business and we hope you'll plan to stay again the next time you're in the area for your next run.

Summary Heading: Great stay for a family of fiveclose to Disneyland
Summary: This was a great place to stay for a family of five close to Disneyland. The staff was very nice, breakfast was free and it was a 15-20 minute walk to the park. Very safe environment and a safe walk for a family.
Manager Response: Hi volt11, thank you very much for your review on Trip Advisor. We appreciative you letting us know how you were pleased with your stay  with us and liked our location. We look forward to your return when you are in the area, and look forward to exceeding your expectations.

Summary: My brother, his family, myself, and my wife, all stayed together at the Hyatt Place last week for 2 nights while we went to Disneyland.  We picked this hotel because of its vicinity and more importantly being an existing member of the Hyatt rewards.  Another reason we picked this hotel is because of its ability to pack 6 (4 adults + 2 kids) of us in a room.  We stayed at the 1 bedroom suite w/ bunk bed.  Check-in was smooth and I believe it was Scott who helped us check-in was exceptional and provided top notch customer service made us feel very welcoming.  My older nephew was already very tired, but upon seeing the bunk bed he was all smiles - he was never on a bunk bed before and he climbed to the top and had a great sleep.  The hotel and the room is immaculate.  Looks very
Manager Response: Hi Andy C,   Thank you for the wonderful review! Nothing makes us happier than reading that you enjoyed your stay and love our amenities.  We'll be sure to recognize Scott  for a job well done. We hope to welcome you again soon and hope to turn the 4 star rating into a perfect 5!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel but could be better
Summary: Stay here for 3 nights to visit Disneyland. The hotel offered free breakfast which was great. The room was very clean and big. The staff for the most part was ok. The only real negative was no shuttle to Disneyland. The walk is a good 25 minutes not 15 like some people have said. Along the walk, there are people asking for money. Overall a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Hi bobby888,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on Trip Advisor. We are glad that you liked our breakfast and the cleanliness and size of our rooms. I am sorry that we don't offer shuttle to Disneyland but the city offers ART (Anaheim Resort Transit) cost minimal per day. We are approx. .8 miles to Disneyland. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Stayed at the Hyatt Place for several days while attending a convention in Anaheim. I've stayed at other Hyatt Place locations before and highly recommend this chain. The rooms are modern and comfortable and amenities like the gym and pool are great. The complimentary breakfast is also a great value and the 24 hour food offerings were both convenient and delicious.  On my most recent stay I got confused on my check-out date and forgot to check out when I headed to the convention center on my last morning. I ended up checking out a couple hours late but the staff at the front desk was very understanding and pleasant, especially Adilene who made sure I wasn't charged any additional fees. Great customer service, thanks Adilene!!
Manager Response: Hi Daniel S,  Thank you very much for your wonderful review and recommendation on Trip Advisor. We are delighted that you liked all our amenities and our ddelicious complimentary breakfast. We'll sure to recognize Adiline for a job well done. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: The included breakfast is the best part.  Being able to go down and feed your kids makes the start of the day awesome.  Not only is the hotel located very close to Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm, it is also close to the beach and easy access to Los Angeles if you have a car.  They staff is super helpful and the facilities are very clean.  Trust me, I stay at the Hyatt over 25 days/ year and most of the time it is at a Hyatt Place location.  This is the best one in the West that I have stayed in!
Manager Response: Hi Anthony B,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor and giving us the title" Best in the West"! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon

Summary: This Hyatt had just opened a week prior to our arrival. It is a vey nice facility. A lot of the employees are not from the area or new to Hyatt, but they bent over backwards getting an answer if they didn't know it, or arranging transportation to the airport. We didn't check in until 11pm and all employees where very nice! Only negative: breakfast is served 7-10 which shouldn't be a problem, but the hotel guests where all vultures! They kept running out of food in the warmers, coffee, utensils, etc. Cooked food was a little greasy. But there was a wide selection to choose from.
Manager Response: Hi Michelle,   We've been open now for 2 years here at Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort /Convention Center.I think you stayed at our sister property Hyatt House at Anaheim. I will make sure to forward your comment to them.Thank you for staying at  Hyatt family.

Summary: 1. The overall condition of the hotel is good. 2. The staff is nice and helpful. 3. It is not a quiet hotel at night due to some noisy guests. 4. The breakfast is good. 5. Recruit a Chinese cook, your food contains too much sugar and grease.
Manager Response: Hi Jun T,  Thank you for your review on Trip Advisor. I am so happy that overall condition was good and staff was nice and helpful during your stay. I do apologize for the noisy guest, I will address this with our security department.  We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: You could tell the experience was going to be good when all the staff was welcoming and ready to help.  This hotel was extremely clean and well maintained.  The rooms were nice and mine had a sofa seating area that I took advantage of after being at the Convention Center all day.  They have an excellent daily breakfast service with rotating menu items which was well stocked and clean.
Manager Response: Hi Barb H,  Thank you for the wonderful review about our hotel and hotel staff! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience at the hotel  during convention. We look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: What a joke.  There was no High at Hyatt, only lows.
Summary: I already wrote a review but I will write it again.  I requested a room on a high floor and got a room on the first floor with a view of the parking lot.  At check-in I was told the hotel was sold out and that was the only room available.  I told her I made the reservation on 6-20 and checked in on 7-29.  She replied that she "thought" the hotel was sold out on the 20th also.  Within eight feet of the door of the room was an ice machine.  Teenagers were filling up two foot tall trashcans for a good portion of the night.  When I told them to knock it off, they said they were filling up ice chests.  I called the front desk and as far as I know, no one came and stopped them.  The room was a handicap room so you couldn't relax and soak in the tub because it was a stall shower with a
Manager Response: Hi irgrammy,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We always appreciate constructive comment. We have taken your comment seriously and made sure that it is addressed. Room types are request but not guaranteed and it is based on availability. Parking taxes are imposed by city of Anaheim.  Marriott Anaheim charges $25 self parking + tax just FYI. We hope we can prove ourselves to you on your next stay and exceed your expectations.

Summary Heading: Perfect for Disneyland vacation with kids!!
Summary: This hotel was a perfect choice for our family of 5!  Proximity to Disneyland and restaurants was ideal.  We walked to a different restaurant every evening.  Being just a 5-min walk to the complimentary Disneyland shuttle at the Toy Story parking lot made transportation to and from Disneyland very convenient and comfortable.  Hotel staff was super pleasant and helpful.  They seemed to enjoy their jobs.  Our room was immaculate and perfectly situated to comfortably accommodate my husband, three kids (9 and under), and me.  The complimentary breakfast every morning made getting up and out early to the park each day much easier.  We would definitely stay again!

Perfect for business or Disney related trips! Stayed here for 5 nights while attending a conference at the convention centre. The hotel is very comfortable - amazing rooms with extremely comfortable beds, OK amenities (pool,gym, free buffet breakfast) and exceptional customer service. Although all staff were very friendly and helpful, I was particularly impressed by Adilene who went out of her way to help myself and my colleagues- which was REALLY helpful during a busy 4 day conference!
Manager Response: Hi Rosie BTravel,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments during your conference on Trip Advisor.We'll sure recognize Adiline for a job well done. Nothing makes us happier than reading that you enjoyed your stay and got an exceptional customer service. We hope to welcome you and your colleagues back again soon.

Summary: Great place, with a great location - 5 min walk from the disney park. The rooms were clean and  taken care of. The hotel staff was friendly, and gave us great tips on restaurants and things to make sure we did at the park.  The late night food options were great, especially after leaving the park and just wanting to have some food in a quiet atmosphere.   Will be returning on our next visit!
Manager Response: Hi Travelingappa,  Thank you very much for a great review and positive comments on Trip Advisor. We hope you enjoyed the mouse. Nothing make us happier than reading that the cleanliness of our room and the friendliness of our staff was exceptional. The food option / quiet atmosphere was a plus. We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: Family of 4, stayed for 4 nights. Rooms were a great size, well maintained,  housekeeping very good. All staff were helpful and nicely offered my son a pick from the cake selections for his birthday. Nothing was too much trouble and we woukd be happy to stay there again
Manager Response: Hi Peter C, Thank you for your positive review of our hotel on Trip Advisor. I'm happy to hear to your comments on the cleanliness of the hotel, amenities, and of course our friendly and attentive staff. We hope we can turn the 4 star rating into a perfect 5 on your next stay. We hope to be able to welcome you again soon and exceed your expectations.

Summary: A very nice hotel, with great front desk staff. I was in Anaheim for a business trip and this was a really nice place to stay. Breakfast was perfect, the room was clean with a great bed and plenty of hot water for a great shower.  I would recommended this hotel.  Thank Maddie for helping me. Excellent customer service.
Manager Response: Hi Mitchell P,  Thank you for a great recommendation on Trip Advisor. We'll sure to recognize Maddie for a job well done. We are delighted that you enjoyed our breakfast selections, hot water pressure and cleanliness of our room.We look forward for your next stay and exceeding your expectations to earn your perfect 5 rating.

Summary: The hotel was conveniently located near the Convention Center, as well as the Disney parks. It was an easy walk to Disneyland (although, after a long day at the park, my children did not want to walk back to the hotel!) We all loved the comfortable room and the breakfast bar. The pool was small, but my children still enjoyed it. Staff was very courteous  .
Manager Response: Hi Edwart T,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to welcome your family back again soon!

Summary: Nice and clean hotel with modern rooms as you would expect from Hyatt.  There is not a direct shuttle to Disneyland from this location but the ART stop is nearby and easy to use.  Plenty of restaurants nearby.  I would not hesitate to stay again.
Manager Response: Hi Rojo93619,   Thank you for the nice review on Trip Advisor. We are delighted that you liked the proximity of the hotel being near the restaurants. We look forward having you back in the future.

Summary Heading: King Suite for $20 more is Perfect for Disneyland family!
Summary: This place is excellent! I booked the King Suite for my husband and I and two kids. There is a separate room with sliding dividers that has a bunk bed and a really nice sleeper sofa that is extra large and quality. They also have their own tv. The service was exceptional. They even sent up dessert and champagne for our anniversary. The breakfast was out of this world in quality and choices. Would never stay anywhere else. Shuttle takes you to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hi Cristy E,  Thank you for taking the time to review the hotel on Trip Advisor. It is awesome to hear the service was exceptional. We're so glad that your family enjoyed our rooms with bunk bed and thank you for choosing us to celebrate your anniversary. We 'll look forward to your families next visit.

Summary: The customer service at this hotel was exceptional..  Our room was very spacious. We had a sofa bed in our room which accommodated 6 people easily. All the staff had a smile on their faces, and greeted us every time. The included breakfast with our stat was also good.
Manager Response: Hi Eddie S,  Thank you for a great review on Trip Advisor. We appreciate  you letting us know how exceptional our customer service at Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort. We are delighted that you and your family enjoyed our breakfast and liked our spacious room that accommodated your family of six. We look forward to your families return and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: I booked this hotel for the Avenger's half marathon weekend at Disney Land. The room was very spacious, and included a small living room area with a sleeper sofa. While there was a nearby shuttle to the Disney parks, it was no more than a 15 minute walk from the hotel to the park gates. The hotel was also walking distance from several restaurants and stores, which was very convenient.
Manager Response: Hi Erin,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us during the Avenger's half marathon on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and the proximity of the hotel from the park gates, restaurant and stores. We hope to welcome you back again soon on your next marathon in Anaheim!

Summary: Stayed here recently for a convention at the Convention Center and it is an easy walk to the Convention Center and Disneyland.  The hotel is within walking distance of Disneyland (a little less than a mile) but a bus is available to and from Disney if needed.  The breakfast was great albeit a little busy each morning but was filling.  The rooms with the bunk beds were great for my son who had his own television on his side of the room.  This made his stay!  All interactions with the staff were professional and courteous.  I would definitely make a point to stay here again when in Anaheim.  The only downside was the taxes on the final invoice.  There is a parking tax and another tourism parking tax in addition to the parking fee of $16/day.  This is not the hotels issue but six
Manager Response: Hi Kswany, Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed  our amenities and our location. Unfortunately taxes are for City of Anaheim that we enjoy. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: The Hyatt Place in Anaheim was one of the best hotel stays I've had in a long time. The property is convenient, clean, chic and the staff there is fantastic. Always friendly and accommodating even with the food service. Even though the hotel was always busy, the breakfast was plentiful and delicious each day. One the last day my wife lost an earring behind the dresser and the maintenance staff was quick to retrieve it for us. Definitely my first choice when in So Cal.
Manager Response: Hi Steve H,   Thank you for a great review on Trip Advisor and letting us know that we are one of the best hotel stays you had. We appreciate you letting us know how convenient,clean ,chic and most important staff was fantastic, friendly and accommodating. Our staff strives to provide excellent service and it looks like they did a great job. I'll be sure to forward your comment to our team and we hope to be able to welcome you again soon!

Summary: Such a nice, quiet stay at the Hyatt.  Very well-priced and worth it.    Every staff member was professional and went out of their way to say hello.  Free breakfast was bountiful and a nice added touch.  Bravo
Manager Response: Hi John,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you find our hotel quiet, breakfast was bountiful and  very well priced. I will make sure to share this with the staff and we hope you are able to return and stay with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: spacious room, super clean, really comfortable, great value
Summary: my husband and i stayed at this property over the weekend while visiting disneyland. and we LOVED our stay. first off, their parking is super easy to get to and there are plenty of parking spaces. when we checked in, it was quick, the lobby was nice, and we noticed there was an area where they serve free breakfast (yay!). the girl that was checking us in (forgot her name) gave us a quick rundown of all the amenities. our room was REALLY spacious, even had a living room area with a set  of bunk beds which would've been perfect if we had kids. since this is a fairly new property, everything was in great pristine condition. we thoroughly enjoyed our stay and it was great because it was so close to disneyland and the convention center. we unfortunately didn't try breakfast since we
Manager Response: Hi Janekimy,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments and how you loved your stay with us while visiting Disneyland on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us specially our breakfast and all our amenities. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Great stay! Clean room and friendly staff!
Summary: This hotel was fantastic in every area. The rooms were clean, spacious, and modern. The staff was SO friendly and accommodating. I got an early check-in and late check-out without a problem. The included breakfast was great - not like other free breakfasts of pathetic bacon slices and powdered eggs. I would definitely stay here again - am looking forward to it, in fact! Convenient location to the convention center - not too close and not too far.
Manager Response: Hi Kimberley,  Thank you for taking the time to write this wonderful review! We love to read that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel, and I'll be sure to forward your comments to our staff. Again, thank you for the recommendation, and we hope to be able to welcome you again soon!

Summary Heading: Better value than a Disney hotel!
Summary: We've stayed at a number of hotels in Anaheim, including the Grand Californian - The Hyatt Place will be our "go to" hotel from now on.  Close to the theme parks (a short walk or one stop away on ART). Spacious and nicely appointed rooms (our double queen room had a pullout couch) very comfortable for our family of four.  The free breakfast each morning was outstanding, great food, lots of variety - a cheap and easy way to get a meal before heading to the parks!  The staff was polite, professional, engaged, and enthusiastic.  The only negatives; The pool is painfully small and housekeeping waits until the afternoon to make-up stay over rooms which meant for us - not room cleaning for two days. (Our Disneyland strategy is to go early in the morning then return to our room after
Manager Response: Hi GregH85,    Thank you for sharing your wonderful review about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! Next time, housekeepers can do stay over rooms in the morning upon request. We are delighted that you family enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: The security of our floor and room was maintain with efficiency and the restfulness each night was superb!  The room was cleaned each day and the room service lady was kind and presented an attitude of joy in serving her guests!
Manager Response: Hi David W, Thank you for the wonderful review! Nothing makes us happier than reading that you enjoyed your stay. Our staff strives to provide excellent service, and it looks like they did a great job! Guests like you are the reason we love what we do at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort. We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary Heading: It ain't Disney, but it still Dazzles
Summary: Stayed one night on points and paid for 3 extra nights.  Spoke to reservation and asked if this could be a continuous stay so that we did not have to move rooms.  They made notes, but did not follow through.  I asked at reception if this could be done, but unfortunately, the hotel was fully booked and the room I had was not available.  So Jamie, offered to take care of the paper work and swiped my card so that all I had to do the following day was get my room key.  This was not followed through and I had to check in again.  I was not happy as I was at a conference and this was my lunch break.  So I took all my baggage and store it with Jorden.  This process worked out okay, but was a mess this reservation was.  There was simply no follow through right from central reservation to
Manager Response: Hi Kenkik,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! I do apologize for the inconvenience on the room move but I am delighted that it worked out and you enjoyed the view where you could see Disney's fireworks. I will make sure we will do second efforts on our requisitions. We are happy that overall you enjoyed your experience with us and all our amenities. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We were in town for a work convention (at the civic center) / family vacation.  We had stayed at another Hyatt Place and were so impressed we decided to stay here.  In addition, the free breakfast, free wifi, room fridge and queen beds were an upgrade from the Hilton where none of those things exist.  In addition - we stayed 8 nights with a small child so we opted for the family room with a sliding door that separated two sleeping areas.  Worth every penny.    We had a fantastic stay.  We did have an slight issue with the room which is something no one would have noticed or known but it was taken care of promptly, professionally, and we were offered (even though we never asked for it) some manner of compensation for our trouble.    The breakfast was good, they leave out the
Manager Response: Hi Tinleyparktraveler,  Thank you for sharing your wonderful comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor during your work convention and family vacation! We are delighted that you enjoyed all our amenities from our breakfast, free Wi-Fi , room fridge and selections of beds.  We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Great place with very friendly and attentive staff.  Would definitely return.  Parking garage is convenient and breakfast was spot on for a family of 5 with 3 kids.  Front counter accommodated our request for high floor.  The pull out sofa was plenty comfortable.
Manager Response: Hi Fil M,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and specially our breakfast. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Disney trip to start off our California vacation
Summary: The Hyatt place is in a great location. Disney is very close and it's fairly simple to take the shuttle.  The property itself was as expected.  Breakfast was included and was pretty good.  The rooms are great with two queens and a couch to fit the family comfortably.  The pool is small but certainly a nice treat after the parks.  The staff at the hotel was very good but sometimes the front desk was jammed with only one person working.  Would definitely go back, a solid Hyatt place in a great location.
Manager Response: Hi chopocho,    We are delighted you chose Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort / Convention Center when your family visited Disneyland. Thank you for your feedback regarding our pretty good breakfast and our comfy room. We look forward having you back in the future.

Summary: My family stayed here for our trip to Disneyland. it was super nice, the breakfast was really great, and we could see fireworks from our room! My only complaint it that the front desk staff were a little rude and unapproachable, but I wasn't down there for very long anyways-just to get some conditioner.
Manager Response: Hi Lauryn G, Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed the fireworks that you could see from your room. Our staff strives to provide excellent service, and it looks like we fell short. I ensure you this will be brought to the attention of the appropriate department.  We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Just stayed at this wonderful location 4-8 July. We had two adults and three children so we selected the room which held a queen size bed, bunk beds, a pullout couch.  It was really clean and convenient since the queen bedroom could be separated from the kids area via sliding doors.  The location was great‚Ä¶ less than one mile to Disneyland and a few hundred feet to the bus stop that can take you to the parks too.  The complimentary warm breakfast was great and we all had our fill. ;-)  It was also nice that we could order 24/7 from their menu or walk to nearby restaurants.    Also, we‚Äôve had some of the best customer service during our stay here.  We were promptly greeted with a smile and ‚Äúwelcome‚Äù when we first arrived and a ‚Äúwelcome back‚Äù every time we came back from the park.
Manager Response: Hi Alfortb,  Thank you for the wonderful review! Nothing makes us happier than reading that you enjoyed our amenities and your stay.  We'll be sure to recognize Adi Hernandez for a job well done. I will make sure to share this with the staff. We hope to welcome you again soon. It is your home away from home.

Summary: Everything was excellent, my family was very pleased. Breakfast could have had more options, possibly enhance the pool a bit, but those are our only suggestions. We saw a few pools with a slide! That would have been awesome! Overall Jorden was great and we felt very taken care of by the hotel.
Manager Response: Hi Nicole,  Thank you for the wonderful review! Nothing makes us happier than reading that you enjoyed your stay.   We'll be sure to recognize Jorden  for a job well done. We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary Heading: Rooms are comfortable, clean and neat!!!
Summary: I was here with my wife and 2 kids..... After an exhausted day in the theme park (for the parents.......), it's absolutely relaxing getting into their spacious room..... Although no room service but they have a 24 hours cafeteria which serves sandwiches and Starbucks coffee.... Lots of dining options as well... Right in between the 2 famous steakhouse - Mortons and Ruth Chris.
Manager Response: Hi Rajwani J,    Thank you for the wonderful review! I agree with you after a whole day at Disney Park with the kids really exhausting. I am glad that you were able to rest and thank you that you enjoyed our spacious room,hotel amenities and the location of the hotel.  We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: The hotel was very clean from the outside to the inside. Modern decor and an extremely friendly staff. I asked the bar staff for a type of beer and they suggested to try a local which I was really impressed by. Enjoyed the beer! Spa was nice and hot. I was able to enjoy some time to relax. Ill be back again
Manager Response: Hi William, Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: My daughter and I stayed at the Hyatt Place in Anaheim during a volleyball tournament.  The hotel was less than a 5 minute walk to the convention center.  The room was very clean and spacious.  The bed was very comfortable and breakfast had a nice assortment.  The front desk staff was very friendly and even called me to say my room was ready.  Overall, a very nice experience.
Manager Response: Hi Sandra S,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay during the volleyball tournament with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Excellent stay at Hyatt - Desi for any desi who want to stay with family, safe and good exp for family with good food, this is the place to live. clean bed rooms and good break fast.  went to extended stay and paid for remainng two days over there and moved to hyatt as my kids were not comfortable over there.  by a desi.
Manager Response: Hi Nageshwar,   Thank you for the wonderful review "The Place to Live"! Nothing makes us happier than reading that you and your family enjoyed your stay. I'm happy to for your review regarding our good food and clean room. We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: I visited during the Avengers half marathon weekend. We spent a week here, and had a king room with bunkbeds. The hotel was a short walk to Downtown Disney and the parks, which we didn't mind at all. I was a little worried about transportation to the park the morning of the half marathon but chose to walk rather than use public transportation or a taxi - it took me less than 10 minutes and was a good warm up for the run. The room was clean and comfortable, very spacious. It was nice to have the hot breakfast although it can get crowded early in the morning with everyone trying to fuel up before going to the parks. The one thing that we didn't really enjoy was the small pool and no hot tub - which would have been nice to relax those sore muscles after days at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hi jlaba1218,     Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and the proximity of the hotel. I do apologize for the size of the pool but we do have a hot tub. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Will definitely stay here for future Disney visits
Summary: I was so happy about this hotel! We booked it with our Costco package, but I will definitely be staying here whenever I visit Disney. The hotel is beautiful and very very clean. I am someone that is paranoid about germs, and the room was immaculate. Not only was it clean, but very spacious. I loved the comfy beds and couch. I slept very well because there is also "quiet time" and security making sure everything is safe. Because 3 days of walking around Disney made us so tired, we took Uber rides the second and third days from the hotel and back. Each ride was less than $5 so that was nice, but walking is also totally possible! In addition to all of this, the staff here is AMAZING! Cory made our stay more fun as he is very sweet and funny. He was a good person to talk to about
Manager Response: Hi ChelanJessica,   Thank you for sharing your outstanding comments and recommendations with your fellow travelers. We're so glad you had such an all-around great experience...beautiful, clean, spacious, comfortable, convenient, and mostly importantly you felt welcomed and appreciated throughout your stay. We'll be sure to recognize Cory for a job well done. We really DO appreciate you, and your patronage, and we hope you'll come back and see us again sometime soon here at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort /Convention Center.

Summary: Rooms were great for a family of 5, they were clean, the staff was friendly and helpful.  The breakfast buffet was good, it changed daily which was nice and there was something that everybody liked.  Easy to get in and out of the hotel, we would stay at this location again.
Manager Response: Hi Gavin E, Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your family stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that your family enjoyed  our staff's friendliness and helpfulness, variety of  daily breakfast  and the proximity of our hotel that is easy to get in and out. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Can do better for the price.
Summary: Staff is fantastic and the Hotel is very clean. expect to add $16 a night for parking. Breakfast is good but very boring and really does not change at all from day to day. There is no washer and drier at the facility you have to go to hotel next store. Our room did not have a microwave.
Manager Response: Hi Ed H,     Thank you very much for your review on Trip Advisor,. we appreciative you letting us know how fantastic  our staff and clean our hotel. I apologize about the  laundry facility which we don't have and I ensure you about the breakfast that this will be brought to the attention of the appropriate department. Our Goal is to provide every guest with a comfortable and defect free stay. We look forward to your return when you are in the area, and look forward to exceeding your expectations.

Summary Heading: relatively new addition to the hotel options in this great destination
Summary: We were very impressed with this property. Location is great, just an easy walk to Disneyland and next door to Ruth Crist restaurant which is one of our special places in Anaheim. Our room was very comfortable with two Queen beds and a seperate sitting and dining area with a microwave and full size kitchen bench and sink.  We especially liked the complementary buffet breakfast in the area which later in the day became a restful sitting area and bar.  A very good hotel which we recommend without hesitation
Manager Response: Hi FijiFanNZ,   Thank you, for taking the time to write this wonderful review! We love to read that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel, and I'll be sure to forward your comments to our staff. Again, thank you for the recommendation, and we hope to be able to welcome you again soon!

Summary: Room was great, clean and spacious. Breakfast was more than expected (It gets crowded sometimes but there is still plenty to eat). Staff was friendly.  If I ever go back to Anaheim this is were I'm staying.
Manager Response: Hi Adrianna_Arr_L,  Thank you for a wonderful review about our great, clean and spacious room on Trip Advisor. We truly appreciate that you took the time to share about our friendly staff. I will make sure to share this review with them. We look forward to your return here at Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort / Convention Center.

Summary: Highly recommend. Booked a room at the last minute and the staff was willing to work with me.  Ended up getting a room for a day and I enjoyed my stay. Everything was within proximity of he hotel and Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending and sharing your positive comments about your  stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: The rooms were very clean and spacious. The staff was extremely helpful. Free breakfast in the morning was above expectations. About a 10-minute walk to Disneyland . Overall a great place for our family to stay. We would definitely choose the Hyatt Place again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review on Trip Advisor, we appreciative you letting us know how  extremely helpful our staff ,how you mentioned our breakfast- above expectations and recommending us great place for a family to stay. We look forward to your families return when you are in the area, and look forward to exceeding your expectations.

Summary Heading: Hyatt Place Anaheim - Great place to stay!
Summary: I was very impressed with the Hyatt Place. Staff was really friendly, free wi-fi and breakfast, super clean and very close to the convention center and Disney! Really comfortable room at a fair raite.
Manager Response: Hi Robin C, Thank you very much for your wonderful review on Trip Advisor! The staff and I truly appreciate that you took the time to share your experience and views about how clean our rooms, proximity of the hotel to Convention center and Disneyland, comfortable room and friendly staff. I will make sure to share this with the staff and we hope you are able to return and stay with us again in the future. Guests like you are the reason we love what we do at the  Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort /Convention Center.

Summary: Outstanding 'home away from home'. Staff that genuinely cares.   Beds are outstanding.   Plenty of pillows.   Food is prepared on site, very good.   Management takes interest in staff and customers.   Highly recommend it for business trips or pleasure trips (walking distance to Disneyland)
Manager Response: Hi Craig W,  Thank you very much for your wonderful review, recommendation and considering us your "home away from home". The staff and I truly appreciate that you took the time to share your experience and views. I will make sure to share this with the staff and we hope you are able to return and stay with us again in the future. Guests like you are the reason we love what we do at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort / Convention Center.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel for a reasonable price
Summary: I stayed at the Hyatt Place in Anaheim for three days in June while attending a conference. The hotel is newly built and has nice, modern decor. It is very clean and nicely appointed. The bed was a bit hard, but the room was spacious and quiet. The breakfast is convenient, but the quality of the food is moderate at best. However, I was fine to have an ok bagel and coffee each day. The staff is great, very helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Hi joannab786,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed the cleanliness and the modern d√©cor of our hotel.  Thank you for recognizing our staff during your experience with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: If your family is planning a trip to Disneyland the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center is a really good hotel to consider.  The staff are all extremely personable and service is to travelers is what they provide.  The hotel is family/kid friendly.  Instead of renting a car to travel back and forth to Disneyland staff advised us to walk across the street to board the free shuttle at the Toy Story Shuttle Stop (Woody).  Shuttles are handicapped accessible and our many trip to and from the park were much easier than we thought.  There are several good restaurants in the area if you're not interested in eating at the hotel.  Free breakfast is provided daily and there's a variety of food items for all taste buds.  There's also free wifi.  We would definitely stay here
Manager Response: Hi Carolyn J,    We appreciate you taking the time to let other potential guests know about your experience and recommending our hotel at Trip Advisor. We are looking forward for more nights and to consider us your home away from home. Thank you for recognizing our staff here at Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/ Convention center, thank you for being our guest, We look forward to your return.

Summary: The Hyatt Place at the Anaheim Convention Center is a nice property in a great location. Although we only stayed at the hotel one night, we enjoyed our visit. Although small, the hot tub was perfect and the room was clean and comfortable. We didn't get to enjoy breakfast because we had to leave for Disneyland (Magic Morning) before breakfast started. Given the location, I would have thought that management would have considered that many guests attend Magic Morning when setting up the breakfast hours. Also, kudos to the property for finding my son's laptop charging cable that he left in the room. We didn't realize it until the following evening but were able to locate it with a quick phone call and retrieve it from the hotel.
Manager Response: Hi gonzomoon,   Thank you for the wonderful review! Nothing makes us happier than reading that you enjoyed your stay and the room was clean and comfortable.  We hope to welcome you again soon and hope you will stay longer than one day.

Summary Heading: Great Customer Service and nice spacious rooms
Summary: So I ended up booking this hotel 10 minutes before I arrived because I waited two hours at an Embassy Suites that I originally booked since a room was not ready but this was the silver lining to that upsetting situation. When I left the Embassy Suites I called they Hyatt Place just to make sure my reservation went through because I did it through AAA's site. It was there and the woman at the front desk even gave me a free upgrade since they had rooms available.  When I got there to check in the woman was extremely friendly and was asking how our day was just having a conversation while she was checking us in.  The topic of the hotel I left came up because I signed up for their rewards points when she asked because I told my cousin who was with me that I'm never going to a Hilton
Manager Response: Hi JayLim06,    Thank you so much for your wonderful review about our hotel and hotel staff! I am so happy our staff was able to accomodate you for your stay. Our staff strives to provide excellent service, and it looks like they did a great job! We look forward to your next stay, and providing you with all that you need to make your stay enjoyable!

Summary: Overall our stay was good.  The complimentary breakfast was really nice. They also change it slightly each morning which was nice.  My favorite was the biscuit, eggs and gravy my 11 year old enjoyed the waffles the most and 28 year old liked the juice choices, and variety of danishes.    The downsides were:  - the pool is very small with little shaded area, but we were there for Disneyland.   - the couch area with pull out smelled strongly of urine.  We did not pull out due to this and did not use.  I would have changed rooms if I knew, but was not told this was reason till last day, upon inspection when you sat on it you could definitely smell urine.  Again, I'm sure if I would have known to report the Hyatt Place would have accommodated the staff was very nice.
Manager Response: Hi Margaret,     Thank you very much for your review,. we appreciative you letting us know that overall your stay was good but we apologize for the inconvenience  about the couch. Our housekeeping department take daily measure to prevent situations like the one you experienced before the arise and unfortunately we fell short based on your review.    Our goal is to provide every guest with a comfortable and defect free stay and I ensure you this will be brought to the attention of the appropriate department.   We look forward to your return when you are in the area, and look forward to exceeding your expectations.

Summary: Excellent place for families to stay in this Hotel that was conveniently 15mins from Disneyland. The hotel staff were caring, courteous and willing to please. The pool and gym facilities were terrific as was the auto access to their free WiFi - would definitely come back !!!
Manager Response: Hi Mr. Roberto C  Thank you for sharing your positive review and for your feedback. We're so glad you had such an all-around great experience...caring, courteous, and mostly importantly willing to help. We really do appreciate you, and your patronage, and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Lovely Hotel in Lovely area for Disney ... BUT paper Thin Walls
Summary: Lovely hotel, nice staff very accommodating, the lobby always smelt lovely as well! For price excellent, modern and clean and free lovely breakfast every morning what a bonous! Rooms were modern, huge loved the living room area with a corner sofa, I couldn't fault this hotel its proximity to disney is fab about a 15 minute walk or walk over to the toy story parking lot and get the bus to disney for free! BUT the walls were paper thin which was sad, I know loads of people use this hotel for disney as myself but its not a disney hotel I didn't like being waken up by yelling children and loud speaking parents at 6.30 am and the kid banging on the conjoining doors and the parent not even telling it to stop.
Manager Response: Hi Ashlea E,   Thank you for sharing your positive comments regarding  our very accommodating staff, lovely smell of the lobby, modern and clean and our lovely breakfast on Trip Advisor. We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience  specially our proximity to Disney. I do apologize about the noise.  Our security department take daily measure to prevent this situation like the one you experienced before they arise. Our goal is to provide every guest with a comfortable and defect free stay and I ensure you this will be brought to the attention of the appropriate department. We'll look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The Hyatt excelled from check-in to check-out. The room was spacious and included two comfortable queen beds plus two large bureaus to spread out our stuff. Apart from a low hum from nearby, the room was very quiet, permitting good sleep on all three nights. The breakfast included a modest range of cereals and a fine cooked selection. The location meant we had an easy 20 minute walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hi BruceWh,  Thank you for the awesome review and for your very kind words. We're so happy you found the property to be excellent from check in to check out, spacious and comfortable room and very quiet permitting a good sleep. We really appreciate you as our guest and we hope you'll plan to stay with us again the next time you're in the area.

Summary: This is our second stay here and although two blocks from Disney it is still a great location.  We got a cab every day as walking with young children can be tricky, but the cab ride was inexpensive ($5-$10 depending on traffic light stops).  The rooms are spacious and clean.  The breakfast is great before a day in the park and we will definately use this hotel again.
Manager Response: Hi CSillence,  Thank you very much for your wonderful review and staying with us again! The staff and I truly appreciate that you took the time to share your experience and views about our cleanliness and spacious room. Guests like you are the reason we love what we do at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center!

Summary: The stay at this hotel was so wonderful. The staff was great especially lisa and Kristina! We were in close proximity to disneyland and had a fun time! The breakfast was good and hot so no complaints!
Manager Response: Hi Chrissy135usus,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about our staff and our hotel on Trip Advisor. We'll sure to recognize Lisa and Kristina for a job well done.We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience  and the close proximity to Disneyland. we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Overall, this was a great hotel for our family of five.  It was an easy walk to Disneyland and the Garden Walk.  We were able to catch a complimentary shuttle to The Angel's game at the convention center.  The only complaint I have is the breakfast could use a little more variety.
Manager Response: Hi Christine T,     Thank you, for taking the time to write this wonderful review! We love to read that you enjoyed your stay and the easy walk to Disneyland, and I'll be sure to forward your comments to our F&B Department to add little more variety on our breakfast. Again, thank you for the recommendation, and we hope to be able to welcome you again soon!

Summary: This hotel had a very friendly staff and clean room! The room was spacious and our kids had their own room with sliding doors so we could have privacy. The bunk beds were perfect for our kids (age 3 and 6.) The breakfast had many options each day and good food. The parking was a bit expensive...$16 a day. I didn't remember reading about that cost on their website. The walk to Disney was a bit far with our small kids but would be fine for older people (about 15-20 minutes.) There is a shuttle to Disney very near the hotel and the price is good...$12 for two adults and two children and you can get on and off as many times as you want that day.
Manager Response: Hi renro80,   Thank you, for taking the time to write this wonderful review! We love to read that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel, kids having their own room with the bunk beds were perfect and having a lot of options in our breakfast and good food. I made sure our parking rate is posted in all of our website, I do apologize for you not seeing it. Again, We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: We found this hotel to be clean, modern, and comfortable. We were right by the elevators and were worried it might be noisy, but it wasn't too bad. Overall, the staff was friendly and attentive. We called the front desk for a few things and 4 out of the 5 times, they came promptly and solved the problem. My mom, who is very judgmental about hotels, was very happy and that's saying a lot! I would definitely recommend this hotel to others.
Manager Response: Hi Nancy L,   Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Great hotel with great breakfast included in the price, and caring employees, always checking to see if everything is OK. Highly recommend! Room size great, and includes a refrigerator and a safe. Bus to Disney is across the parking lot. Also has family rooms with bunkbeds.Will stay at Hyatt Place every chance I get!!! Also has an outdoor pool and hottub.
Manager Response: Hi Easland,  Thank you very much for your review,. we appreciative you letting us know how you were pleased with your stay  with us and our caring employees. We look forward to your return when you are in the area, and look forward to exceeding your expectations.

Summary Heading: Great customer service upon check in
Summary: Thankful for Jorden who made an early flight into Anaheim bearable with checking us in smoothly and efficiently.  He was very professional and customer focused in finding us two adjoining rooms for early check in before we headed to the park.  Not easy to corral teenagers with all their questions and wishes, but he handled all of our requests beautifully.
Manager Response: Hi Marie B,    Thank you for the wonderful review! Nothing makes us happier than reading that you enjoyed your stay. We'll be sure to recognize Jorden for a job well done. We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: Stayed for 4 nights in May during a family Disneyland trip.  Maddy was great in helping us before and up to arrival... everything from renting a scooter to getting car service from the airport to making sure we had a quiet room. Addy took care of us for most of the rest of our trip... making sure the scooter was fully charged and waiting for us in the morning and assisting in a complicated checkout process that involved points, giftcards, etc. The rooms were clean and comfortable. The maids were all very friendly and respected our privacy when we had the "Do not disturb" signs posted on our doors. We were all very pleased that we chose this hotel for our vacation.
Manager Response: Hi Biggg_Al,   Thank you for the very positive review and for your feedback about your stay with us on Trip Advisor. Nothing makes us happier than reading that you were taken cared of during your  stay. We'll be sure to recognize Adi , Maddy and our friendly housekeeper for a job well done. We hope to welcome you your family back again soon.

Summary: We were very pleased with the appearance and condition of the room. The proximity to Disneyland is good and it is easy to catch the Anaheim Resort Transit to and from the park from the hotel. The stops are not very far away from the hotel. We didn't use many hotel amenities aside from the complimentary breakfast (which was good) so I don't know about things like the pool or gym. The room itself was very good. Would definitely stay here again the next time we visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hi Kelli N,  We appreciate you taking the time to let other potential guests know about your experience on our hotel.  Thank you for sharing your positive comments regarding our appearance and condition of our room on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your breakfasts and the proximity of our hotel. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: The hotel was spotless.  Staff was extremely friendly and helpful.  The continental breakfast was outstanding! It had fresh fruit, a yogurt bar, and tasty hot food including eggs and sausage.  A choice of pancakes or french toast made by the grill with banana compote. 15 minute walk to Disney. Easy.
Manager Response: Hi Matthew M,  Thank you, for taking the time to write this wonderful review! We love to read that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel, and I'll be sure to forward your comments to our staff. Again, thank you for the recommendation, and we hope to be able to welcome you again soon!

Summary: We loved staying here. Walking distance to Disney. They only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is that there is no shuttle to the airport unless you want to uber or pay a fee for the driving service they have. It would have been nice to get a ride to the airport but we used uber. It is very clean and the staff is really friendly. They have computers so that you can print out your Disney tickets no problem. They noise levels were great we had no problems at all. There is a cvs close by that has snacks and drinks. Lots of souvenir places so you don't have to spend a lot of money at Disney. They have a lot of eating places within walking distance to example: bubba bump shrimp, California pizza kitchen, pf changs, & I hop to name a few. I hope this helps!
Manager Response: Hi cupcake0512,   Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us with our friendly staff and our location. We hope to welcome you back again soon and turn the 4 star rating into a perfect 5 based on service!

Summary: We had a great time!  We went to Disneyland.  My nine year old & eleven year old granddaughters & daughter came with me.  We were celebrating my daughter's birthday!  We would definitely come back again! The room was very clean & the bed was very comfortable.
Manager Response: Hi Roselyn S, Thank you very much for your positive review,. we appreciative you letting us know how you, your grand daughters and daughter had a great time during your stay  with us. We look forward to your return and celebrating your grand daughters birthday again.

Summary Heading: Favorite hotel for a Disney Parks visit
Summary: Hyatt Place is my preferred hotel when visiting the Disney Parks.  It's a short walk away - or Uber ride on hot days - from the park entrance and resorts.  Staff is friendly and helpful.  There's always fresh, cold "spa" water (fruit infused) on your way in or out.  Cozy bar and takeout cafe in the lobby, and a decent complimentary hot breakfast is provided before heading to the park for the day.  It's a also an ideal location for the Anaheim Convention Center, just a few steps away.
Manager Response: Hi MykeTV,   Thank you for sharing your positive comments  and being your preferred hotel when Visiting Disney Parks on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Booked 2 queen room suite with dinette and sleeper sofa. I was told on phone that only queen rooms with sleeper sofa was the queen suite room so that is what I booked.  Showed up to check in at 3 pm. Told me only rooms on 1st floor were ready. Disappointed bc wanted higher floor for kids to see Disneyland fireworks!!!  Then to room fraud--- and I said it!!! Queen room was 151 a nt and queen room Suite was 182 a night. I needed the sleeper sofa so I booked the queen suite. Check in guy said we have you for regular queen room not suite--- I was like what the heck!!! This was bait and switch overcharged by 31 a night!!! Unacceptable. Never stay at Hyatt place again. FYI-- horrible pillows as well
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We always appreciate constructive comment. We have taken your comment seriously and made sure that it is addressed.  We hope we can prove ourselves to you on your next stay and if you can please call me directly to make your reservation.

Summary: We stayed here 2 nights for Disneyland and it was ideal - just what we needed. Parking was $16 a day which is standard for around LA. The room was huge with a small living area alongside the main double bed. We were facing the front of the hotel and had no noise wake us up. We were slightly shocked at the cost of a snack from their bakery section. We arrived last on our first night and needed something easy to eat. It cost me $5 for one chocolate cookie. It was very tasty but no cookie is worth that, even when warmed up.  Breakfast was really good, albeit very busy. We tended to head down around 8.20 and you could tell half the hotel had the same idea! Some more seating and food areas would be good. Best part was location; a 10 minute walk to Disneyland tops. Easy to figure out,
Manager Response: Hi Alex C,   Thank you very much for your review, We appreciative you letting us know how you were pleased with your stay  with us and how convenient our location to Disneyland. We look forward to your return when you are in the area, and look forward to exceeding your expectations.

Summary: Large rooms, w pull out sofa. Clean hotel, throughout. Very friendly and helpful staff. Parking - $16/day! Little far walking distance to Disneyland (specially the walk Back). Free breakfast is great - good variety.
Manager Response: Jorge L,  Thank you very much for your wonderful review! The staff and I truly appreciate that you took the time to share your experience and views about our cleanliness through out the hotel. I will make sure to share this with the staff and we hope you are able to return and stay with us again in the future. Guests like you are the reason we love what we do at the  Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/ Convention Center!

Summary: My family of four stayed at the Hyatt for three nights for our Disney stay. The hotel is nice, typical Hyatt. The breakfast has a good variety even offering gluten free bread for toast. The coffee was good and plenty of seating. It gets busy but expect tons of people when in this area because of Disney! We are right across from the toy story parking lot so you can walk in and catch the shuttle that runs constantly from open to close. It is free and convenient.. Saved about $18 per day for parking! The pool is pretty small but my kids enjoyed it for a break from the Disney madness. Overall good experience
Manager Response: Hi Megan_Colorado,   Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay and how our breakfast  has a good variety and even offering gluten free with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you and your family had good experience with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Had a great time at this hotel.  Kids really enjoyed the bunk beds and morning breakfast!!  Staff was friendly, professional, and very courteous.  Parking is underground, secure, and clean.  Will definitely come back again!
Manager Response: Hi Po-Chi L,   Thank you for the wonderful review! Nothing makes us happier than reading that you and your kids enjoyed your stay. We'll be sure to recognize our staff for being friendly, professional and very courteous. I am happy to hear the cleanliness and the secure parking of our hotel. We hope to welcome you and your family  again soon.

Summary: The staff at Hyatt Place really went beyond to provide excellent service.  No request was too big or too small for William.  His attention to detail and customer satisfaction was great.  Christina and Adilene were the most pleasant hosts, who made you feel special.   John went beyond anything I've experienced, reaching out to make my reservation and stay amazing.     Just an FYI:   The rooms were impeccable.    Thank you!!!!
Manager Response: Hi Veronica P,  Thank you for the wonderful review! Nothing makes us happier than reading that you had an excellent service from our staff. We'll be sure to recognize William, Christina, Adiline and John for a job well done. We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: The family suites have two comfortable bunks and a double-sized pull out couch.  It would have been perfect for when we had four kids under, say, age 12.  As it was we had two older teens... the bunks were too short and the sofa bed was too uncomfortable for heavy teens. So, we pulled the mattresses off of the bunks and asked for king size bedding. Voila! A king sized bed for the teens! The only issue was that they had to come through our bedroom to get to the bathroom, and their light switch was on our side of the sliding (thin) door. Like I said, perfect for family with up to four young kids.  However, the breakfast more than made up for it... probably the best hot breakfast we have ever had included with the room cost.  WiFi was decent, too. Parking
Manager Response: Hi Tim A,   Thank you, for taking the time to write this wonderful review! We love to read that you and your teen agers enjoyed your stay despite of the bunk beds and able to work it out at our hotel. I'll be sure to forward your comments to our restaurant staff having the best breakfast. Again, thank you for the recommendation, and we hope to be able to welcome you again soon!

Summary: I am a frequent traveler, and am very shocked that there was an underwear in the corner of the bathroom.  There was hair in the shower drain, and dust still on the headboard.  I normally love the hyatts but this one has really made me reconsider.  Food was salty

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel If You Don't Mind Taking the Bus from the Clarion Hotel Next Door to Disneyland
Summary: This is a very nice Hyatt Place hotel.  The free breakfast was excellent and the rooms were great. BUT...the "Hyatt Shuttle" to Disneyland was really too far away- all the way over in front of the Clarion hotel.  It's actually a city bus, complete with all of the regular filth that you generally find in a "City Pass" bus.  AND you have to purchase tickets for that shuttle bus inside the Clarion hotel as well.  After walking all day, we were wondering why we just didn't stay there?    We had to wait about 15 minutes for the shuttle bus each time, both coming and going.  Then it stops to pick up people at three other hotels before it arrives at Disneyland.  In all, from the time we left the hotel and then entered Disneyland, 45 minutes had passed.   That really makes a difference

Summary Heading: "Wonderful stay at the Hyatt with my two granddaughters.
Summary: We had lots of room in the King, plus bunk beds with sofa.  The beds were comfortable.  The hotel is modern and clean.  I would recommend to others.  The wonderful staff brought me a microwave which was appreciated.  The staff were tip top.

A great place to stay when heading to Disneyland. The hotel itself is conveniently located near the ART bus stops (which was handy after very long days at Disneyland). The room was exceptionally clean, the beds were super comfortable and the room was spacious. The breakfast was ok but limited in what was on offer and the extra room used for breakfast could be set up to make you feel as though you are in an eating area and not a last minute thought in an unused conference room. I think if the hotel introduced some Disney theming it would further enhance the stay - especially when you first walk in. All in all a great stay that was fit for purpose.

The Hyatt was conveniently located about 1/2 mile from Disney.  There was a nice daily breakfast buffet with choices of breads, fruit, yogurt, oatmeal, eggs, juices, etc.  It was nice and a great time saver for us to get a quick breakfast and head to the parks.  The room was clean and the hotel was nicely decorated.  The staff was very friendly, helpful and courteous.  The only downside of our stay was internet connection issues.  The first few days we had trouble connecting to the wifi, which was an issue since my kids were trying to keep up with their school work.  There were computers downstairs that were available for use.  Overall we enjoyed our stay and would recommend this location.

We visited in May with two small kids (3 &1) for a week.  The hotel presented very well.  It was clean and appeared fairly new.  We stayed in the bunk bed suite, but were surprised at how small the space was considering it had a door closure separation between the two sleeping areas.  When researching the room appears large and we were banking on the doors providing privacy for us after the kids went to bed.    If you are considering this room, I would also research the large double queen suite.  For the same price it was twice as big and has a kitchenette and dining area as well as a very large bathroom area.  The doors in our bunk suite were opaque and offered little to no light or sound privacy between the two sleeping areas.  So there was no privacy advantage.  Regardless,

Here for business like most people. Odd when I checked in despite being a Hyatt Gold member they put me on the first floor. The desk person assured me there was a nice view of the lagoon. I guess that was OK though you have to not mind the people walking around the lagoon looking in your window or the noise one night from people outside. It was a corner room but strangely the shads did not connect at the corner so I had to prop several pillows up there to keep it dark.   So, my advice is don't stay on the first floor.   Now, aside from that the room was comfortable, mattress on the softish side, clean, and nicely decorated. FYI no fridge in room but they did have $4.00 bottles of water. Basic internet was included and seemed to work pretty well.   Staff (aside I guess from the

Stayed here for a few nights on a business trip.  Was pleasantly surprised at how very nice everything was.  Stayed at the Hyatt Regency a few blocks away recently and I would have to say that this is much nicer.  High and low points:  1) On-site dining - Breakfast is included and they have more than the usual wide variety of choices and plenty of room to sit.  There is even some space for outdoor dining.  Getting something to eat in the evening is a bit slow but the food choices are good and the charges are competitive with food places around the locale.  2) Check in - Efficient, painless and complete in a few minutes..   3) Room - VERY NICE!  This is the re-designed Hyatt Place room and it is roomy and comfortable.  There is a sitting area separate from the bed area and a

Room was very clean (bath tube shined), staff was very helpful and attentive (other than the person who checked us in).  Our kids loved the bunk beds.  Our bed was a bit too firm for a comfortable sleep for me.    I'm not a breakfast person but my wife and kids are.  My wife did not like the breakfast bar at all.  management needs to work on providing better breakfast bar.  This hotel is very close to Disneyland and there are plenty of restaurants nearby.  Expect extra charges for parking.

Summary Heading: Very clean and new hotel with exceptional service and great value
Summary: I found everything about this hotel to be exceptional. It is convenient to Disneyland and the staff were great! The room was clean and the breakfast quite good.It includes eggs, sausage, cereal, fruit, fruit juice, pastry etc  They recommend that you get there early for breakfast (6:30 am till 9:00 am) as it gets crowded near their closing time. They were quite right. They opened up a nearby meeting room to handle the overflow. The coffee is Starbucks and good. There are free newspapers for guests. The staff are friendly and attentive to guests. The outside pool and hot tub were easy to enjoy. The work out room is modest but effective. Overall, a very good value. I checked the price I paid against a nearby Clarion and it was just 10% higher for a much newer, cleaner and more

Hotel staff very friendly and helpful. Rooms very clean and well kept. Breakfast was good and wonderful location. Close to all attractions and resturants.  I would recommend highly.  Had a wonderful time!

Another newer offering near Disneyland. Has great rooms with bunkbeds and foldout couch. We were easily able to accomodate 4 Kids and 2 Parents in a room with a Kingsized bed, 2 Bunkbeds and a sofabed. The bunkbed part of the room has slidingdoors to seperate off the kid part from the grownup part. 2 seperate LCD TVs and free Internet with good speed. Breakfast is included. Parking is not! But very nice underground garage. Will definitely stay there again.

Summary Heading: Best Hotel I've ever stayed in
Summary: From the reservations, to check in, guest services, parking and check out- great hospitality, room and friendliness. Spacious rooms, nice beds, desk and tv. I have never seen this kind of service/ kindness, without exception.

Attended a conference here. Great staff on site, really responsive. Wish parking was validated but you have to have dined there on the premises to get the parking fee waived, even if you are attending a workshop. Still, everything is easy to find, considering how large the convention center there is. Perhaps if you are a guest, parking is free.

We stayed at this hotel while visiting Disneyland. It was fantastic and we got a great AAA rate. The front desk staff greeted us warmly and asked how are day was every time we walked by. They were so nice. We travel a lot and my entire family agreed that this was the best hotel breakfast we have ever had. There was a good variety and everything was fresh and hot. My son loved the free apples available all day. The room was very modern and clean and big. The best tip I can give is that if you plan on visiting Disneyland don't drive. Walk across the street to the Toy Story parking lot and hop on the Disney bus. There is even an entrance you can walk through to get to the busses. It was a short walk and it saved us $18 day. Also, the hotel is in a very safe area with plenty of

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable and a welcoming staff
Summary: Our large group arrived at 1 a.m., and we were met by a warm and welcoming staff who quickly and efficiently checked 180 of us in.  Even the security guard was super pleasant and helpful in getting our kids to their rooms.   The rooms were clean and spacious, and the beds were very comfy.   Every time we came in to the hotel, we were met with friendliness and professional service.   Terrific hotel!!

Friendly staff that provide great service. Large comfortable rooms. Within short, easy walking distance to DisneyLand. Last but not least, offers buffet style breakfast! Would recommend this hotel without any hesitation.

I took a group of students from my junior high school to Hyatt place at Anaheim for a music trip.  We worked with Reina Garcia, hotel sales manager, who made us feel like VIPs.  She led a staff that showed us friendliness, courtesy and care.  They arranged for our students to eat breakfast in a separate room for the comfort of our students, chaperones and other guests.  Their flexibility and attentiveness gave us the ability to supervise our students and help them enjoy the weekend.  We all loved the rooms, which were spacious enough to accommodate up to five students comfortably.   Thank you Reina and Hyatt Place!

We were in Anaheim to visit Disney with our daughter's family. We reserved two rooms which were ready when we arrived.  The staff was courteous, friendly, and helpful.    The Hyatt Place was a comfortable refuge after visiting Disney. The beds were very comfortable. The rooms were large and the surroundings were quiet the majority of the time. We did have 1 night of hearing people talk loudly through the wall between us.   The breakfast had a variety of cold cereals, juices, coffee, and breads to choose from.  Scrambled eggs and link sausage were also served.  Even though there were many people eating breakfast at once, staff kept bringing more hot food so there was never an empty platter.  I would highly recommend this hotel to my friends and family.

The Hyatt Place was a pleasant surprise while attending the California Dental Association Convention. The lobby was inviting, well designed and check in was super fast with no waiting.  The room was clean, well lit and had all the amenities that I am used to when staying at a Hyatt Hotel. I was able to secure a 30 minute later check out so I could attend a meeting  and the staff was very accommodating. I would definitely stay at a Hyatt Place again based on this first experience.

Very pleasant hotel. About a block or so to far if you are going to Disneyland unless you have older kids. Nice hotel though. Good location as far as places to eat and having 24 hour available food at the hotel is a huge plus. Great coffee in the morning also. Menu is limited but quality makes up for it. Great staff!

This Hyatt is in a great location for consuming all the tourist activities Orange County has to offer, or just conducting business.  The parking is very easy, no more than a 30 second walk to the front door.  Check in was a breeze.  The rooms are very well kept, newer, clean, with comfortable beds.  With the free breakfast, with actual real hot food, it's a plus to every stay there.

Staff were all very pleasant and accommodating, free breakfast was yummy, and the light dinner at the bar the night before was excellent, parking was convenient and walking distance to Disneyland was great!

The hotel was new, clean, and close to the convention center. It was that minimalist chic, not appropriate for small kids, but okay with us we had an 11 year old. We had the kids suite, my niece loved the bunk beds, but we reserved another room, a little crowded for 4 people. The breakfast was good, and plentiful. You had to go to the hotel next door to wash clothes, and use an atm. No valet parking, but parking was plentiful. Staff was young and eager to help. Too far from Disney to walk, went to the Toy Story lot across the street and boarded the free Disney shuttle(an insider tip I learned about on trip advisor).

Matthew\Matt at the front desk was courteous and thoughtful, after driving over 13 hours to Anaheim all we wanted to do was sleep. There were no rooms available but Matt went above an beyond to get us a room.  Thank you Matt!!

We couldn't have been happier with the Hyatt Place! #1 priority: very clean - everywhere. Also, great location: we walked to Disneyland with ease. There were also bus, shuttle, and taxi options ($7.50 + tip taxi ride back from Disney). Sufficient breakfast stocked full even when it was busy with families. Extremely friendly staff - everyone we encountered was so kind (shout out to Jordan and William at the front - both went out of their way to make sure we were doing well - thank you!). Clean pool and hot tub, yes they are in a parking lot, but with the greenery surrounding the fenced in area you could easily forget that. The family room with bunk beds was perfect for our family of four. Only one minor complaint: I wish the bathroom door was not frosted glass - when someone went

If you are looking to stay few blocks away from Disneyland, this is the best hotel you can get for the best price. Staff are very friendly and only hotel in the area that offers free breakfast. This place is filled with lot of families with kids, getting a table for breakfast at peak hours is difficult, plan to be downstairs ahead of time to beet the traffic.

The Hyatt was a great place to stay on our family Disney vacation, the staff was very friendly, and the rooms are very nice, and comfortable. The breakfast that is included in the stay was very good. I will definitely stay here again.

Hyatt Place in Anaheim is an excellent hotel located just 2 blocks from Disneyland and 1 block from the convention center. The service was outstanding. I brought a group of 20 high school students and everyone was super responsive and accommodating to our needs. There was a nice hot tub and pool and a delicious breakfast. Would definitely recommend for anyone going to the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Minnie and Mickey dolls on the bed - available for purchase
Summary: Travelling for work nearby and I accidentally booked this hotel and was so glad I did.  I t was busy, and had lots of families but the amenities were good - workout room, pool, firepit on the roof all were very nice.    I ate at one of the 2 on site restaurants - the one with the bar.  The cheesecake was delicious, highly recommended.  Staff were super friendly and helpful.  I chose to self park, which was easy to do.  The only thing I didn't see at this hotel was laundry facilities, I went across the street to a coin laundromat and took care of my wash.  There were several places to eat within walking distance.  Target is across the street, if you need anything and open late.  All in all a great place to stay, easy to get what you need.

It all went wrong at checkin, we booked a King family room months before and was told at check in it's not available and we could only get a smaller room for the duration of our stay. Unbelievable! And they wanted to charge me the same rate for an inferior room. Cut a long story short I blew my top and miraculously the manager agreed to reduce our rate for the smaller room and the very next night we were moved into the original room we booked.
