Location great for Disney and Cal World, perfect short walk past a bunch of handy shops and restaurants. Breakfast from 6.30 included and great ! fresh, huge variety and changed regularly. Great value and fabulous in every way.  Our second visit to Disney - we stayed at The Disney hotel last time, which is fun but we didn't get early checkin, it was a small room and the extra charge for breakfast wasn't close to what the Hyatt P offered.

We had such a great stay at the Hyatt Place. Our family of 5 stayed for 7 days on a Disney trip and the room was excellent. We had the two beds plus the fold out sleeper so everyone was comfortable and happy. The room was very clean as well.   The breakfast was free and I'm amazed at the variety they had. I was expecting a sub-par breakfast, but everyone walked to the park with happy tummies.  Where this hotel really shines is in it's staff. Every time we walked in the door, we were greeted genuinely and happily. The front desk/coffee bar staff was super helpful on numerous occassions from late night food cravings, to helping with ideas for nearby things. Management has done a really good job training.   My one big piece of advice for management is this: every time an employee

The hotel is excellent. The attitude of the personnel is great. The check out procedure is a mess, a pain, a desaster. For over an hour, there was always a line. I watched the check out line while having breakfast. No end of a lane. Why A employee saw my several atempts to reach the check out desk, and helped me with the checkout in a dif. way. The regular way is: Stand in line and wait.

Even with the $16 a day parking fee, this is a gear place. It's about a 20 minute walk to Disney and the staff is very helpful. Breakfast was great, too. My room was clean and up to date. The only issue I had was that the sheets smelled very heavily of either Chlorine or bleach.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review and comments about your stay at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center.  We are very pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay and that our staff was attentive and courteous.  We will share your comments with Housekeeping to ensure that laundry chemicals are balanced to avoid the smell of chlorine.  Let us know if you plan to visit again soon.  We look forward to the opportunity of welcoming you again soon.  Thanks again!  Hyatt Place Awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: This was our first time staying here. They charge for parking but the free breakfast makes up for it. The staff was very accommodating and friendly. The hotel room was very clean. I will be staying here again in the future. It is nicer than most hotels close to Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments about your stay with us.  We are always pleased to know that our guests are well taken care of by our team of trained hospitality professionals and that our amenities and services offer guests the comfort and satisfaction to help make for a wonderful stay.  When your plans call for another visit to the Anaheim Resort please allow us the opportunity to welcome you again.  Thank you!  Hyatt Place Awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: We were thrilled by the treatment we received from the front desk staff upon arrival. We came in on a red eye flight with 3 kids and little sleep. They got us into our room early, invited us to breakfast and sent us off to a great day at Disneyland. The daily buffet breakfast was great, but the service was even better. The room was clean and quiet. We'll spread the word.
Manager Response: Hi Kathleen B, Thank you for taking time to share your experience.  We are very pleased to know that our Gallery Hosts were attentive, courteous and helpful in making your check-in seamless and quick.  And thank you for spreading the word about the wonderful service and amenities that we offer at the Hyatt Place!  Hurry back!  Hyatt Place Awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at Hyatt Place. The room was clean, comfortable, and quiet.  Bed was comfortable and the room has a large sectional that pulls out into a bed.  Shower is big and clean. The hotel doesn't have a transportation service but you can go to the hotel next door and purchase a bus ticket that takes you straight to Disneyland for $5/person.
Manager Response: Hi Tammy R, Thank you for your "5 STAR" review of the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center.  There are many hotels in the area to choose from so we are quite proud of our hotel knowing that guests staying with us will be very comfortable and well taken care of.  We are equally pleased to know that you found our hotel to be most accommodating and convenient.  And as you mentioned, all of our rooms feature the Cozy Corner Sectional style sofa sleeper.  Truly a nice touch, especially to watch TV, read a book or just chill for a few minutes before heading out. Thanks again for sharing your experience.  Hyatt Place Awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary Heading: New & Beautiful Hotel, Huge Breakfast Buffet
Summary: Customer service at this hotel was exceptional!  They went above and beyond to make us feel like valuable guests.  Upgraded us to a larger room at no additional cost, and gave my daughter a complimentary piece of cheesecake to celebrate her birthday.  Room was spacious and modern.  Parking costs $16, but that's cheaper than parking at Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for your very nice review of the Hyatt Place.  We are pleased to see that your stay with us was enjoyable and that you were very satisfied not only with your choice of hotel, but also the service that you received and the amenities you enjoyed.  And you are correct about parking!!  Plus, our parking offers in and out privileges  and can accommodate your vehicle in our parking garage to keep you car nice and cool (or nice and dry when it rains) Thanks again!  If we can be of service again soon, please let us know.  Hyatt Place Awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary Heading: Near Disney, Great Breakfast Buffet, other food options nearby
Summary: Stayed for close proximity to Disney parks and walking distance to start/finish lines of Disney Star Wars 5k/10k/half marathon.  Modern clean rooms, convenient and fresh breakfast buffet, friendly attentive staff for summoning a taxi and answering questions.  Will stay here again in future.
Manager Response: Hi Brad S, Thanks for sharing your comments about your recent stay at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center.  Happy to see that you enjoyed your visit with us!  If we can be of service again soon, please let us know.  Thanks again!!  Hyatt Place Awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary Heading: Hyat Place...is the place to be for Disneyland!
Summary: If you are going to the Anaheim area/Angels baseball or convention, this hotel is the place to be.  The place is clean and smells great.  The room is very family friendly with a free breakfast.  The check-in staff are very friendly and helpful. AND NO RESORT FEE!!!!

My kids and I had just come back from Disneyland after 11pm, so we were exhausted.  I checked in at that time, and the front desk staff was very accommodating and checked us in very quickly.  I asked where I could buy some bottled water, and they handed me 5 complimentary bottles of water for myself and children. Such a nice gesture! We had literally left another hotel earlier in the evening because it was uninhabitable, so I was over-the moon happy with the Hyatt. The room was not very big, but definitely sufficient for 5 people.  We stayed in a Family Suite, with a King bed and two bunk beds.  The bottom bunk was larger than a twin- maybe a double.  The layout of the room was a little weird.  I felt like the bunks should have been in the room where the King bed was,and the

Perfect hotel for families visiting Disneyland.  Our room had a king bed, bunk beds, & sofa sleeper.  We were all comfortable with enough space to move around.  Free wi-fi & breakfast also family-friendly features!

We had a great visit with magical treatment from check in to check out! Thank you!! The staff was attentive and available. Everyone truly treated us with compassion and care. The room was large and clean and the beds were very comfortable.

Convenient walk to Disneyland. Warm continental breakfast. Clean and modern room/bathroom. Spacious room with separate sofa. Quiet rooms.  Staff courteous and helpful. Convenient parking.Definitely worth recommending and staying again.

Summary Heading: Best place for family near Disneyland
Summary: Best place for family to stay near Disneyland.  New hotel very close to parks. Nice rooms, and great service.. Excellent breakfast... Hope they keep this hotel like this.. Would be nice if they had a free shuttle to and from the Parks.

Really nice hotel, all new furniture and appliances, clean. Breakfast is great. 24 hours restaurant service, we used it for dinner once- good food and affordable prices. Walking distance to Disneyland.

The staff  provided excellent customer service! They were extremely friendly and genuine. Our "host" (Ada) made some great  recommendations for dining and activities (points of interest). The hotel was clean and conveniently located to the convention center.

We stayed here for 3 days and everything was fabulous... the staff were amazing, everyone of them were helpful and courteous at all times...they made our stay really enjoyable.. specially Adi, Jorden, matt, scott, and the valet parking guy Mark...also the house keeping staff were tremendous... the room price could have been a bit better... a really comfortable safe place to stay with the family... we sure will be back

We were given Hyatt gift cards and wanted to use them to take our kids to Disney. We are used to staying at Disney Hotels but figured this was worth a try.  We got a great rate which was half the price of the least expensive Disney hotel. This was a huge plus. The walk to Disney was .8 mile (we clocked it with our Garmin), which took our family 15-20 minutes with our stroller. It was honestly not much farther than when we stayed at Paradise Pier...but it felt longer since we weren't distracted by the fun of Downtown Disney while we walked. I'm not sure this would have worked very well at the end of he day with tired kids who had to walk. Our 5 year old definitely needed the stroller for the distance.  As far as the hotel goes, it was pleasant. Very, very friendly and helpful

Summary Heading: Great staff makes the visit even better
Summary: Just returned from 3 days at this property (visiting Disneyland) It's a fantastic location (make sure you walk across the street to catch the Disneyland shuttle on the way TO the park, though, the stop that's easiest to see is the first stop, so you'll ride all around the short route, passing your hotel again RIGHT before arriving at the park.)  Super thoughtful staff made our stay more comfortable. Great for families with kids.  Ample space in the room with a bunk bed suite for a 2 year old (in a borrowed portacrib) a 3 year old, parents, and me, the tag-along auntie.   Strong wifi, warm but small-ish swimming pool. Perfect for kids, but not for lap swimming. Oh, and a hot tub.   Hotel next door has a little gift shop for stuff I forgot, and CVS at the end of the veeeerrrry

Well laid out room for a family of 4 - spacious and very comfortable. Great breakfast selection. The staff were awesome. Nice and close to Disneyland - easy walking distance. One of the nicest hotels we have stayed at ever. Will be back for sure!

I recently stayed at this hotel for a solo trip to Disneyland and Disney's California Adventure.  It is about a 5-minute walk from the ART shuttle to the parks, and sells both shuttle and park tickets at the front desk.  The room was large, with 2 queen beds and a small sitting space with sofa bed.  The included breakfast is very good, with a variety of breads/pastries, fruit, yogurt, hot egg dishes and some of the best breakfast sausages I've had. Other food options were limited and not always good.  You could get grab-and-go sandwiches and salads, or order flatbreads, etc.  There was no food menu in the room, and they had very few even at the bar.  I ordered a flatbread one evening and they forgot to take my room number to call me when it was ready.   When I finally called, it

Staff were extremely pleasant at all hours (24 reception/welcome desk). Food and beverages also available 24hrs, perfect after a long busy day at Disneyland/California Adventure Park. Rooms were immaculate and everything was available -just ask! Everything was within walking distance - Disney parks, shopping, eateries and the convention center.

Friendly staff. Clean room. Excellent location, only 15 minutes from Disney Parks. There are a lot of conveninece stores nearby. Stayed with my wife and two boys, 14 & 11 yrs. In spite of presence a lot of children at the Hotel, it was quiet.

This hotel was within walking distance of Disneyland though a shuttle pass was available for purchase. The staff were friendly and efficient and definitely wanted to make sure that all of my needs were met. The breakfast buffet was very extensive and quite tasty, a definite way to start the day.  Overall, a great experience and I would stay here again and again.

Courteous, friendly, and helpful Staff, clean hotel, well appointed rooms with two beds and sitting area with pull-out bed, free breakfast with good choices, small cafe with limited items yet food was good and reasonable priced. Close to Disneyland, Convention Center, and local restaurants.

There is nothing wrong with this hotel, but it serves its purpose of being a place to sleep while visiting Disneyland.  To sum up my assessment of this hotel:  it's adequate.  Most days, we left early in the morning and didn't return until almost midnight. The pool area was very small but adequate.  The morning breakfast was decent and convenient.  The location was walking distance (to us anyway) to Disneyland.  The room was good.  We had a corner room, which I think is probably quieter than other rooms.  The room rate was adequate/reasonable.  The bar in the hotel was teeny-tiny.  Again, we came here to go to Disneyland, not to hang out at the bar, but if that's important to you, you won't find it here.  I'm not sure if I'll stay here again.  Again, nothing wrong with this

We had a great experience at the Hyatt Place. The service was wonderful. The Family king suite has pocket doors to separate the rooms, allowing for kids to go to sleep earlier. Also the hot tub was a hit with my family, after a long day of walking the parks! Close walk to the ART shuttle too.

Summary Heading: A great option for families visiting Disneyland
Summary: For our three night Disneyland visit we felt the Disney hotels were totally overpriced for what they offer - so based on Tripadvisor reviews we chose Hyatt Place. It's a great choice if you simply need a modern and new comfortable room with two queen beds to collapse into with tired kids after a day at the parks. The beds are really comfy and the room was big with lots of TV channels on a good LG digital flatscreen for when the kids need entertaining before bed. There is no mini bar for snacks and drinks but the fridge is handy and a 24/7 CVS Pharmacy nearby means you can stock up. The bathroom is fine but the complimentary soaps and shampoos are meagre if that's an issue. However the complimentary WiFi works really well and the breakfast buffet is part of the price and offers a

Summary Heading: First, but definitely not last stay at Hyatt Place
Summary: We're now convinced, we're Hyatt people. It's the right mix of price and quality hotel. Room was perfect. Loved the bunks for the kids, the two TVs, the couch, the complimentary breakfast...great great great!

We decided on a last minute trip to Disney. We wound up with this place and was impressed. The room had 2 couches and a bed with a small side wall. Breakfast was decent as well. We were able to walk to Disney in about 20 minutes! They even allowed us to stay parked in the lot after we checked out so we could go to Disney and shop one more time!  Can't wait to go back!    PS they sell tickets for Disney on site so you can go right up to the gate.
Manager Response: Hi Jerome R., Thanks for sharing your review and comments regarding your recent stay with the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort.  We are pleased to see that your stay was enjoyable and that our staff was most accommodating.  Should your plans call for another visit to the Anaheim Resort, please let us know. Thanks again!  John  Hyatt Place Awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: Very good hotel, very clean, really friendly staff, excellent breakfast...but of course with many hotels their quality of WiFi needs improvement.  The strength and speed need to be improved.  Other than that, it is a good place to stay.

Summary Heading: It's too bad this property has thin walls.
Summary: Having stayed at other Hyatt Places, I would have to say that this one isn't as nice. Mainly because the walls and floors seem to be really thin. One night, the adjacent room's occupants came back to their room late and were conversing very loudly - so much so that my husband called down to the front desk to complain (it was past the hotel's quiet hours of 10pm-8am.) In doing so, I think the other occupants heard my husband and quieted down. Another day, the room above us appeared to have a young child as there sounded like a lot of stomping going on. While it was during the late afternoon and it wasn't an issue, I'm just surprised that we could hear this toddler jumping up and down. I don't recall other hotels having quiet hours posted, so I assume that the hotel knows that
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for sharing your comments about your recent stay.  Knowing that the sleeping habits of our guests may vary, as a courtesy to others we do place Quiet Signs to remind guests to respect the privacy of others.  We do appreciate your input and thank you for bringing some of the details of your stay to our attention.  Our housekeeping and maintenance teams are quick to handle daily tasks to ensure that all guest rooms and public areas are sparkling clean and in proper form.  Thanks again for sharing your experience with us.  Best, John  Hyatt Place Awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: We got a specialty 2-Queen Room suite with a AAA discount, so it was really reasonable per night.  My 10-year old son preferred to sleep on the sleeper sofa in his own little area so he had a little privacy.  My husband, myself, and our 4-year old daughter shared the 2 queen beds in the main room.  Overall, the hotel was great and we had a really good experience.  The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 were because of a few little things. Pros: Free breakfast buffet included (this was great every morning before we hit the parks); liked the overall space of our room, including a mini kitchen area; everything seemed new and clean; was a close walk to the ART Shuttle or toy story parking lot shuttle. Cons: The suite area we had was really nice, but I wish we would have
Manager Response: Hi Ramahjoy, Thank you for sharing your comments regarding your recent stay with us.  Please let us know if we can welcome you back again soon.  Best, John  Hyatt Place Awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: Enjoyable hotel, close enough to walk to Disneyland but we took the $9 cab option which was good too. Good brekky buffet provided, with cold and hot foods on offer, not a big range of items, but enough to get you going in the morning. Good coffee. The bedrooms with lounging areas were comfortable, clean and welcoming. No view to speak of from our room, but then we didn¬¥t have much time in the room. Parking was $16, which seemed steep. The hotel is a few blocks walk to Disneyland, or in a taxi we paid $9 each way. Very polite and helpful young staff, happy to assist with any queries, and happy to mind our bags before we were in our rooms.

Best breakfast arounand undergroud parking with elevators straight goint to the room floors. Good location not to busy even its close to disneyland and I-5 freeway. Nice couch that can be used as another bed for kid.

Loved this hotel. The staff was amazing and the breakfast was way above the norm. The room easily accommodated 5 people. Great location to the Disneyland Park and price was well worth it. We will totally stay here again. Great hotel! Loved it!

The hotel was conveniently located to Disneyland and the staff were very pleasant.There were fantastic eateries close by that would fit all tastes and budgets. The free breakfast at the hotel was average, but the staff kept the options stocked. I did not appreciate paying 16.00 per night to park at the hotel, but it seems to be the trend in resort/tourist areas.

The location great walked to the park everyday and the taxi ride back after a long day is only $10.  The rooms are clean and the best part the staff is super friendly.  I stay there every time I attend the park.

Clean, modern, convenient hotel, ~15min walk to Disneyland.   Complimentary breakfast items were fresh and quality, and staff handled morning rush efficiently.   On site parking with in/out was reasonable, and fitness gym was good (several treadmills, elliptical, free weights)  Sofa sleeper in double room with a divider was nice touch

Summary Heading: Relaxing Family Holiday + Mickey's Halloween Party + Universal
Summary: After 2 gruelling weeks on the road with the kids (11 & 13) 2 countries, 2 conferences we enjoyed 4 days in Anaheim.  We booked the King Family Room with sofa bed and it was the first best decision.  We hired a car even though we could have walked to Disneyland but we learnt from last time and saved heaps of money on taxis.  Booked the Mickey's Halloween Party early from Australia.  There were some online issues and had to get our office in Colorado to buy the tickets for us.  The room was spacious and clean with lots of room for the kids to stretch out.  TV's in 2 areas and a fridge that was standard in the room.  Nice quiet nights sleep with child friendly areas and delicious complimentary breakfast buffet.  Lots of handing parking for the hire car and just a block or two away

Summary Heading: Great place for families going to the amusement parks
Summary: Four kids makes traveling hard for most families. Staying at a spacious hotel room with the 2 queen sized beds, definitely made it so much more enjoyable! Free breakfast buffet saved us from dragging everyone out to a restaurant or paying crazy prices at the amusement parks. Room was great, lots of room for the kiddos, 2 beds, and a sofa. Nice TV. Clean. Loved our time there. Definitely recommend for families!!

This hotel may not stand out in a row of so many big hotels, but that is what makes it cool in my opinion. The rooms are gorgeous and has the sitting area separated from the bed. That makes it feel like a suite. The staff at front desk were all so warm, and helpful. The breakfast is great, the available computers to use and free WiFi makes this a great value. It is not cheap but it is worth it. The only thing I personally don not like here is that you need a key to use the elevators. I understand it from a security standpoint, but I like to have my friends come and hang out with me when i visit  and i had to keep letting them in and out.

We stayed three nights at the Hyatt Place using Hyatt points and I will definitely be back! We arrived late at night on day one and tried the chips and dip and two types of flat bread pizza. All the items were good and saved me from going out and looking for food after midnight. We spent two days in the Disney parks and walked both days to and from the parks. Starting off each day with a tasty and filling breakfast saved our family money and allowed us to eat lunch later in the day. The hotel is brand new and the room was clean with comfortable beds. I highly recommend the Hyatt Place for your next Disneyland vacation!

Walkable distance to the park, especially before the exertion of the park. Took the tram back. Nice room. Comfortable beds. Friendly staff. The best 'free' breakfast in a very nice dining room. I believe it is a top value in the area.
Manager Response: Dear erictheeagle, Thank you for sharing your comments about your wonderful stay at the Hyatt Place.  We are very pleased to see that you most satisfied with your stay and that you enjoyed our very nice and free hot breakfast.  Not only is it delicious with many great items to choose from, its a real money saver, too!  Thanks again and best wishes for a Happy New Year!!  Hyatt Place Awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary Heading: Excellent complimentary breakfast, walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: The best complimentary hotel breakfast ever. Very kids friendly hotel near Disneyland. There was a shuttle but we chose to walk since it is just 3 blocks away.  Parking was 16 USD a day, but it is near Disneyland so I guess this is not a bad deal.  Overall, excellent hotel for a family with kids.

Wonderful interiors, very good service and some excellent dining too, must recommend the Hyatt Place Very reasonably priced too. The free breakfast was great, plenty of options. The exercise room has plenty of machines.

Summary Heading: So much better than Paradise Pier
Summary: We love Hyatt. We got a much better experience for half the price we payed to put mom and the kids at the Paradise Pier. The rooms are awesome and spacious. My family would rather hang out at my room when we had down time from the park.
Manager Response: Dear Joannie H, So nice to see that you had a wonderful stay with us.  Hyatt Place is a wonderful,  new hotel in the Anaheim Resort and so close to the Disneyland Parks.  We are pleased to see that you found our hotel to your liking and as you mentioned at a wonderful price.  Please let us know when you plan to visit again! Happy New Year!!  Hyatt Place Awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: One year old property. Still very clean with helpful and attentive staff. Good breakfast with real food was included in my rate. Tip for business travelers:  eat before the Disney families invade around 8 am.
Manager Response: Dear Laurabelle927, Thank you for your review of the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center, the closest Hyatt hotel to the Disneyland Resort Parks.  We are pleased to see that your stay with us was enjoyable and that you enjoyed our free hot breakfast as well as  being appreciative of our attentive staff.  If we can be of service again please be sure to give us a call. Thanks again and Happy New Year!!   Hyatt Place Awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: Hotel and staff were great.  Extremely helpful and knowledgable about the area, and went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable with the room, the hotel, and the area.  Bus to disneyland fairly convenient.
Manager Response: Dear Bob S, Thank you very much for your 5 STAR review of the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center.  Glad to see that your stay was excellent and that everything was to your liking.  If we can be of service again in the near future, please let us know.  Thanks again, Bob.  Happy New Year!!  Awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary Heading: Excellence from Check in to Check out.
Summary: Great property and great staff.  Very well priced and comfortable...with a few extra luxury's.  Great place for a Disney trip and other venues.  Loved the 24-hour coffee bar.  Breakfast was hot and fresh.
Manager Response: Dear robertjY2046DP, Thank you so much for your 5 STAR review of the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center.  We are very pleased to see that your stay with us was most enjoyable and comfortable.  Nice to see that you enjoyed our 24/7 Coffee to Cocktails Bar, also.  A nice touch to have for those times when craving a quick bite or beverage hits any time of day.  Thanks again and best wishes for a Happy New Year!  Hyatt Place Awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: I have stayed at regular Hyatts and Hyatt Regencies before. This was my first Hyatt Place. It exceeded all expectations for a 3-star hotel. It was clean, modern, affordable, and convenient. Easy proximity to Anaheim convention center if you cut through the parking lot.  Only bad thing about hotel was very limited parking underground with tight spaces.  The free breakfast in the morning was on par with what you get at Hilton Garden Inn or doubletree. It was better than Best Western and Holiday Inn Express.  Gym was excellent and superior to most in a hotel of this caliber.  I would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Manager Response: Hi Gerard R, Thanks for your 5 STAR review.  We are quite pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and enjoyed our new hotel.  Let us know when you plan to visit again so we can welcome you back.   Thanks again!  Hyatt Place awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: We loved the Hyatt.. We have stayed at lots of hotels at Disneyland.  We wil stay here again.. The ART was very convenient..  even better than the free shuttle at other hotels...  Maybe a  little far to walk but you could if you are so inclined...

Had a marvelous stay at the Hyatt Place in Anaheim.   Great rooms, great location, great morning breakfast.   made for an all around enjoyable stay.   Recommend this location and hotel if you have need to visit the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Very friendly, Clean, Comfortable, Easy Access to Disneyland, Great Breakfast
Summary: We loved our stay!! Comfortable and clean! The breakfast was great! Everyone was happy. It was easy to catch the shuttle to Disneyland.  We have stayed at a couple of hotels around Disneyland.  This is one of the best, but Shhhh..don't tell everyone!
Manager Response: Dear Cindy H, Thank you for rating us 5 Circles (STARS).  We appreciate your comments and are very pleased to know that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us.  Please keep us in mind should you plans call for another visit to the Anaheim Resort.  Happy New Year!  Hyatt Place Awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: Close to Disney, Clean and Modern. Manager very professional and personable. Some of the younger staff not as knowledgable and gave bad info on area transportation. But overall a GREAT value, We will stay again.

Easy access to the many attractions in the immediate area. Very clean and very modern rooms.  There were a couple of glitches: Too firm pillows and too thin walls. But, the included breakfast was great with a nice variety.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your stay with us. We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your visit and that you enjoyed the free hot breakfast buffet.  Thanks again!

Summary: We are pleased with the hotel.  It is clean and fits our need as a family with young kids.  We are staying for 6 days, and requested a room with a view to the fireworks.  The answer we received was that he will try his best to get you a room close to the view, but the position of the building makes it hard to see.  He really could've just told us all the rooms were taken instead of giving us false hope.  Unfortunately, as the fireworks started we realized our room is facing the OPPOSITE side.  This is too bad, as it was something I was looking forward to.  We are celebrating my son's birthday and our wedding anniversary. It would've made it that much more special.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thanks for sharing your view and comments.  I can assure you that there was an honest effort made to try and accommodate your request.  We do our best to try and accommodate as many special requests as we can and will continue to do so to ensure that our guests are comfortable and well taken care of during their stay. Thanks again!!  Hyatt Place awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: This is a great hotel that's close to the convention center and Disneyland. Both are easy walks plus there are convenient services nearby (eating establishments, Target, etc). The rooms were perfect and the staff friendly. Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your 5 STAR rating.  We are pleased to see that your stay was very enjoyable and that you found everything you could ask for to be close to the hotel and easily accessible.  And thank you for recognizing our team of professionals who are always working very hard to ensure that every one of our guests are comfortable and well taken care of.  Let us know when you plan to return.    Thanks again  Hyatt Place awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: this is a great hotel! nice and clean very nice staff went out of there way to help with anything we ask like can we walk to the park and yes you can, it only takes 15 mins so you don't need a bus or drive . And very good Breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thanks for your 5 STAR review.  We are very pleased see that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff was attentive to your needs.  And yes, our free hot buffet breakfast is a much appreciated favorite by so many of our guests.  Glad you enjoyed it!!   Thanks again!  Hyatt Place awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary Heading: Comfortable room, great breakfast, close to Disney!
Summary: I stayed here with my two children for a visit to Disneyland. The room was lovely and quite comfortable. Having the couch in the room made for a comfortable visiting space (and pillows to make a fort). Having a refrigerator in the room was very helpful. Do note that it does not have a freezer section if that's important to you. (Obviously there is ice available on each floor).  The staff was very helpful at all times. We had a stroller delivered via City Stroller Rentals and the hotel staff was helpful in getting it up to our room and taking it upon check-out.   The breakfast was really good - much better than the average hotel breakfasts. Coffee, tea,juice, milk, toast (including a gluten free option - ask which one it is), bagels, english muffin, some other small pastries
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your 5 STAR rating.  We are pleased to see that your stay was most enjoyable and that your entire family was comfortable and well taken care of.  And thanks for sharing so many nice details about our hotel and how it made your stay just that much more fun and enjoyable.    Please let us know when your plans call for another visit to the Anaheim Resort. Thanks again!  Hyatt Place awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: My family and I stayed at this hotel whilst visiting Disneyland.  The hotel is very clean has comfortable beds and convenient parking.  The breakfast was busy but the selection and variety of foods was anazing.  Most people staying at the hotel were also visiting Disneyland, it extended the whole Disney experience. Thank you we had a wonderful time.
Manager Response: Dear LIttlekillas, Thanks for your comments about your recent stay at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center.  Very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you especially enjoyed our very nice and free a.m. Kitchen Skillet hot breakfast.  We are the nearest Hyatt hotel to the Disneyland Resort Parks and are pleased to welcome families from all around the world that come here to enjoy the original Disneyland Park known as the "Happiest Place on Earth".  Glad to know that you and your family had a wonderful time.  Thanks again!  Hyatt Place awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: amazing stay.  we liked the hotel a lot.  people were friendly and the hotel clean.  the walk to Disney was long but that's ok.  My children had a great time too.  We will be back in the near future.  Oh, I did not like the parking charge but they explained it very well.  Thank you Hyatt Place.

I was extremely impressed with your manager on duty Scott Young who took it upon himself to resolve my upset with the lack of sleep during my stay at your hotel. His decision to resolve my complaint was satisfactory. I felt heard and understood. I would def. recommend this hotel to others.
Manager Response: Dear jessicarE3228PO, Thank you for your 5 STAR review of the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center hotel.  Glad that Scott was able to assist you and that you were pleased with his efforts.  Scott is an eager team member who makes it his top priority to ensure that guests are comfortable and well taken care of.   Thanks again for your review.  Hyatt Place awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: This hotel was excellent.. the staff were amazingly helpful and cheery. The breakfast was fresh, changed a little every day, and never ran out... even after 10am. Everything was nice and new and clean and house keeping was great. We stayed in a family suite which suited us well to have the extra space and the bunk beds. The pull out sofa was not the most comfortable but liveable. The outdoor pool is small but very few guests using it so not an issue. good parking ($16/night), good security, and just across the street from the disneyland park and ride toy story shuttle. The walk to disney would be about 20 mins so the shuttle was ideal.  The only reason i didn't give it 5 stars is because of the in room bathroom and sliding french doors. The doors are glass thus a light on in any
Manager Response: Hello Buberry203, Thank you for the nearly 5 STAR review of the Hyatt Place Anaheim.  Glad that your stay was enjoyable and that you enjoyed the free a.m. Kitchen Skillet hot breakfast.  Your comments about the glass doors are currently being addressed with a resolve to be implemented soon.  It is commentary such as yours that helps us to better understand exactly what our guests experience and we appreciate this feedback.  Thanks again for your review and complimentary comments about our team members who work hard to ensure that all of our guests are welcome and comfortable.  Hyatt Place awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary Heading: Great place for a family Disneyland trip
Summary: The whole experience was terrific.   The staff was very friendly and helpful.  The underground parking was clean and very convenient to the hotel elevators.  The security was excellent.  Rooms were extremely clean and large.  Could not have asked for a better stay and will definetly stay here again for either business or pleasure.
Manager Response: Hello harrysD3351FE, Thanks for your review and comments about the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center.  Nice to see you found our exceptionally clean and spacious hotel rooms AND underground parking to your liking.    Should you plans call for another visit to the Anaheim Resort, please let us know.  We shall look forward to welcoming you again soon.  Hyatt Place awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: I stayed here while visiting Disneyland.  The hotel is new and clean.  It is very quiet and peaceful, we never even heard any other guests while we were in our room.  Beds were comfortable, except for the sofa bed, but then what do you expect?  Breakfast was great.  We were able to walk to Disneyland.  It was a little far after a long day, but completely do-able.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi Beth S, Thank you for your 5 STAR rating of the new Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center.  Nice to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you found everything to your liking.  Let us know if we can be of service again.  Thanks again!  Hyatt Place awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: My boyfriend and I just returned from a stay here while we were in town celebrating his birthday and our anniversary. Loved how comfortable we felt as soon as we arrived. The entire process went smooth and the staff was beyond friendly. We both agreed that when we do return for Disneyland, we would come back and stay here. Thank you for everything!
Manager Response: Hi  Toxichotgirl84, Thanks for your 5 STAR review of the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center.  Glad to see that you both had a wonderful time.  A visit to Disneyland is always a great Birthday gift and I am sure your boyfriend will remember this one for a long time.  Be sure to let us know when your plans call for another visit to the Anaheim Resort.  Thanks again!  Hyatt Place awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary Heading: Great price, close to Disneyland & California Adventure
Summary: I was at this hotel for business and a running race.  The rooms are spacious and clean.  The food offerings had a nice selection and the quality was good.  The staff was friendly and professional at all times, very helpful with any requests.  I walked to Disneyland & California Adventure multiple times and it only took about 15 minutes.  It is in a good area for restaurants and convenience stores if desired/needed.  I will absolutely be staying at this hotel again in the future.
Manager Response: H Anthony H, Thanks for you comments and review regarding your recent stay at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort.  Very happy to see that your stay was most enjoyable.  Glad to know that you found our staff to be professional and friendly.  Our location in the Anaheim Resort is a definite plus as you mention, being so close to the Disneyland Resort Parks, restaurants and shopping.  Hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon. Thanks again!

Summary: Hotel Room was clean & spacious.  1 x King & Single bunk beds with a fold out couch was perfect configuration for our stay.  So hard to find a hotel with all good qualities and to keep kids happy. Hotel was fantastic for Family (6 & 9 year old children), Good Value overall and the breakfasts were perfect ! Highly recommended for  families looking for a hotel to compliment their Disneyland adventure.

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay by Disneyland
Summary: The hotel was very nice.  Free breakfast and not overly crowded.  Good breakfast selection and beverages.  Close to bus service to Disneyland and picks up every 20 minutes for a $5 per day. The only downside for us was $16/day to park.

With some many hotels to choose from near Disneyland, We were skeptical  at first but in the end we were very happy we chose the Hyatt Customer service was excellent !! But are first priority is cleanliness and again was excellent very clean , modern room.Breakfast is pretty basic hot and cold items but staff was constantly refilling items . Noticed ALL employees working hard and always being polite the young lady at the desk that printed are Disney tickets over heard it was my sons 3 bday and upon return from Disney my son had treats , a toy and card left for him saying happy bday again basic but much appreciated ! So if we were to have 1 gripe it would be that the 16 $$ parking was JUST built in to the cost but since the hotel is definitely in walking distance to Disney it
Manager Response: Dear Andrew M, Thank you for taking the time to share your review of the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort.  Its always nice to see that our team effort is recognized by our guests and is a true testament to the teams dedication and hard work that they exhibit each day to care for our guests and our guests comfort and satisfaction.  Thanks again!  Hyatt Place awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: Hotel staff was friendly with the exception of a prickly manager.  I suggested a private office to voice my concerns over a statement overcharge.  I was told that the office he came out of wasn't available and was directed to stand in the traffic of the front lobby.  I had to redirect manager to a quieter space in the hotel.  I felt like I had to supervise the manager. The $150.00 overcharge was a hotel mistake and was reversed.  Elevators constantly malfunctioned.  We would like to thank the the staffing that provide the breakfast skillets and housekeeping.
Manager Response: Dear Joseph C., Thank you for your comments.  The manager mentioned in your review did provide a debriefing of the mutual interaction regarding your concerns.  With respect to elevators, our elevators are maintained by dedicated elevator technicians  and dispatched to the hotel as quickly as possible.  The elevator issue you experienced is now operating normally.  Please accept our apologies for any misunderstanding and for allowing us the opportunity to address your concerns. Thanks again!

Summary: These rooms are quite modern and use the space efficiently. Breakfast is great. I thoroughly enjoyed hanging out in the hot tub during the chilly winter California night. The bed was comfortable and the bathroom was actually quite hip. Had a very enjoyable time.
Manager Response: Dear Oilerblue, Thank you for your review and comments about your recent stay with us at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort.  We are most happy to see that your stay was very enjoyable and that you had a great time.  If we can have the pleasure of welcoming you back, please let us know.  Thank you again.  Hyatt Place awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: The check in area looks nice but when you get to your room, it looks like and old motel remodeled with 2 beds. The thermostat didn't work for all three nights.  We were so cold and couldn't  turn it off. One of our key didn't work and the bathtub was one of the really old tub  that leaks water on the floor when we shower even though we pulled the curtain tight.  We paid a price higher than Priceline and Expedia even though we were Hyatt members. We stayed at the Hyatt Regency down the street last time when we were in LA and that was nicer. At least it was worth the money we paid for.
Manager Response: Dear Ant662014, Let‚Äôs just say we are very surprised to see this review.  Being that the hotel is just one year old; we like to think that our rooms are very nice, new, modern and outfitted with comfortable Hyatt Grand Beds, very nice L-shaped sofa sleeper, modern furniture, 42 inch flat panel TV, and modern bathrooms with tub/shower combination and built in ducted air conditioning.  Each room has its own thermostat to turn the heating/cooling system either on or off, and controls to adjust the temperature.  We wish that we had been given the opportunity to assist you during your stay and regret that we were not contacted during your stay to discuss the issues you mentioned.   I did send you a message requesting more information but have not heard back from you as yet.   Perhaps we will have another opportunity to welcome you again soon and will see to it that your stay is nothing less that enjoyable.

Summary: This was literally the best hotel we stayed at during our month visit to the US. It is new, fairly modern with large rooms and bed. Location is also superb if you want to be close to Disneyland - it is only a 10 minute walk. They also provide you with a decent complimentary breakfast with lots of varieties of food (and changes each day as well). Staff are also quite friendly and humorous and probably the only hotel we stayed at in the US where they looked like they were happy to work there. The hotel is so much better than what its 3 star rating suggests - it should really be bumped up to 4 and even then, it is one of the better ones and would give the high chain Hiltons and Marriots a run for their money. Based on price and bang for buck, it is definitely an outstanding hotel
Manager Response: Dear KTFromAus, Thank you so much for your very nice 5 star review about the new Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort.  We are very pleased to see that your stay was thoroughly enjoyable.  Our team is dedicated to ensuring that our guests are well taken care of and your comments suggest just that.  Your comments are also indicative of many others who have also found the Hyatt Place brand to be just the perfect combination of comfort, excellent customer service and value.  Thanks again for your review and comments.  Should your plans call for another visit to Anaheim soon, please let us know.  Hyatt Place awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: Suite type rooms are soacious with kichenette and dining tables, great fir families.  But due to that, many families with snall kids and babies stay here so My neighboring rooms were super noisy families, disruptive, esoecially in the morning and at night.
Manager Response: Hello Amy Y, Thanks for your comments about your recent stay.  Please accept our apologies for the noise you experienced.  We do remind guests of our quiet hours in an attempt to ensure that all guests privacy and comfort is respected.  Thanks again for taking the time to share your comments.   Hyatt Place awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary Heading: Great stay for family near Disneyland
Summary: Cannot fault this hotel - excellent value for money, really friendly staff throughout, complimentary breakfast was great (can get busy though), and surprisingly close to Disneyland (contra to some reviews I had read pre trip) - would definitely consider again on return to Anaheim
Manager Response: Dear Mani P, Very happy to see that you enjoyed your stay at the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort.  Recognizing that you traveled quite a distance to visit the Anaheim Resort, its quite nice to see that the Hyatt Place was your welcome sanctuary after busy days of sightseeing and Disneyland.  Our team is committed to doing everything possible to ensure that all of our guests are welcomed to the hotel and kept comfortable during their stay.  And happy to know that you experienced their efforts.   Thanks again!!  Hyatt Place awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: Took our 4 and 2 year old for a first visit to Disneyland.  Stayed in family room with bunks.  Room was clean, functional.  Kids loved the bunk beds.  Breakfast was decent.  The coffee bar was very nice and staff couldn't have been nicer.  Front desk is very friendly and personable.
Manager Response: Hey there Mark M., Thanks for your 5 star review of the new Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center.  Very nice to see that you were very comfortable and that you enjoyed all of our services and amenities.  Our free breakfast buffet is certainly a welcome treasure and a huge money saver as well!!  And yes, kids' love our bunk beds!  Glad your kids and family enjoyed the bunk bed room!  Thanks again.  Let us know if you plan another visit.  Hyatt Place awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: I really love staying at Hyatt Place with my family. This is the first time we were able to book the KING room with a sectional sofa and a bunk bed for the kids. They loved the room, and so did my husband and I. Being it was near Disneyland it was about a $100 more a night than what we usually pay at Hyatt Places but we were ok with that.
Manager Response: Hello jamesbA6669EL, Thank you for your 5 star review of the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center in Anaheim.  Very happy to see that you and your family had a wonderful stay.  And thank you for staying with Hyatt Place.  We are growing and you will see more and more of us in the months ahead. Thanks again, james...  Hyatt Place awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: My family was very pleased with the Hyatt Place and customer service as well. We will definitely consider staying here again in our future travels. It's very convenient as far as location and all the places we need to go to was near by.
Manager Response: Hi janasard, Thank you for your very nice 5 STAR review of the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort hotel in the Anaheim Resort.  We are most pleased to see that your stay was very enjoyable.  Please do let us know when your plans call for another stay.  Did you know that we have Hyatt Place hotels in Wailea and Waikiki Beach on the island of Oahu?    Thanks for your review and comments.  Will look forward to seeing you again soon.  Hyatt Place awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel in the heart of Anaheim.
Summary: I am currently staying in the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center. Located about 10 minutes walk to Disneyland, the Hyatt Place is a beautifully presented and stylish hotel. Featuring free wifii and buffet breakfast. The rooms are spacious and clean.  A fantastic range in the buffet breakfast is on offer.  The Hyatt also has famous restauraunts close by, like Dennys and Tony Roma.  Major department stores such as Macys, Sears, Walmart and JC Penny are about 15-20 mins drive away.   Tips:  *The buffet breakfast restauraunt does not have a lot of dining space so I recommend you get there as early as possible. Most people get there around 8-9am.  * This hotel does not have a coin operated laundry. The hotel directly next door does.   To Management at Hyatt, coin

Our stay at the Hyatt was very comfortable.  The staff was very friendly and helpful. The morning breakfast was very good. The room was very clean and comfortable. The daily room service was excellent. We stayed here for a leisure trip for three days and enjoined every minute of it. We would stay here again and recommend it to anyone.

The Hyatt may be somewhat smaller than the hotels in the neighborhood, but offers excellent amenities, including a free hot breakfast, and some very friendly hotel staff. The rooms are spacious, and at least the one I stayed in was pretty quiet,

Summary Heading: Awesome stay for a family of 5!
Summary: This hotel was perfect for our family.  We used our Hyatt points for a 6 night stay and were upgraded to a family suite.  Was perfect for us...bring a night light with you though...lights in the bathroom are bright for those early risers and the bathroom door is windowed.     We had breakfast every morning at 6:30am to beat the rush before heading to Disneyland.  Wonderful choices every morning - fresh fruit, cottage cheese, eggs, meat, yogurt, cereal, granola, toast, juices and coffee!  They also have fresh fruit and ice water out all day for snacking.    We took Uber XL to Disneyland from the Hyatt Place each morning...cost was about $12...Uber X was about $5, but only takes 4 passengers.  We walked back in the afternoon, about 20 minute walk and took advantage of the pool and

The hotel was clean, the staff was helpful, and the breakfast was great! I almost booked another hotel down the street which was comparable in price but I read so many positive comments about the breakfast that I chose this one. I really wanted to have a hot meal before going to Disneyland each day. The buffet was great-they even changed it a bit everyday so that their guests had some variety. We'll be staying here again the next time we come to Disneyland!

We booked the bunkbed room and the kids loved it.  They had bunkbeds , their own couch and TV.  Sliding doors separate from the rest of the room with a king sized comfortable bed.  There is a free breakfast (it's OK but not great).  Very clean.

Staff was friendly and very helpful.  Good breakfast provided with stay. Travelled with the family and would definitely stay again Note: taxi dropped my family off st wrong Hyatt! Not a problem for the Hyatt, they simply grabbed their own shuttle, loaded us up and took us up the street to the right Hyatt! Thanks Hyatt. Great service

I came for business and enjoyed the peacefulness of my room but had an excellent time when I went down for a glass of wine. I enjoyed the service and the atmosphere. I would most definitely book there again.

I booked this room through Costco Travel. It was a king room, with bunk beds and sofa. The sleeping arrangements were perfect for our family of 5. The breakfast offerings provided enough selections that everyone could easily be satisfied. Our only complaint was the temperature of the room. It was very cold, even after switching from air conditioning to heat. Even in the heat setting, there was only cold air blowing. We finally just switched it completely off, but the children were uncomfortable. O

Stayed at the Hyatt to celebrate a birthday at Disneyland. It was conveniently close. While they did not offer a shuttle, Lyft/Uber was about a $5 ride so it was perfect. Nice breakfast, rooms were very comfortable and modern. Great spot

Great place, Clean, neat hotel with very comfortable rooms and beds. Free Breakfast was excellent!! Big range and high quality. Located in a perfect spot, $10/15 taxi to Honda Center/Train Station and only a short walk to Disneyland and restaurants.  Highly recommended

Summary Heading: Very nice, clean hotel with great breakfast
Summary: We came here last minute after leaving a nearby hotel that we just checked into that we discovered was not clean. This hotel, like other Hyatt Place hotels that we've stayed at did not disappoint. The room was comfortable, clean and the staff were friendly. The breakfast buffet was a great start to the day, saved us money and kept us full from 7am until the late afternoon at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Lurelee G, Thank you for your review.  We are pleased to know that your are a frequent Hyatt Place guest and happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We are especially happy to see that you enjoyed our free buffet breakfast buffet and recognized the value that it offers. Next time you plan a visit to Anaheim please let us know.  Thanks again!  Hyatt Place Awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: We just got back from 5 days in Disneyland and were really impressed by the Hyatt. The staff was super friendly, helpful and knowledgeable. The room was clean and modern. We had heard that hotels on the main strip can be loud but I was impressed by how quiet our room was. The housekeeper did a great job everyday we were there, we can be quite messy, sure was nice to come back to a clean room with freshly made beds after a long day at the park. We ate at the breakfast everyday and liked how it was always a bit different. It was well organized and the food was great. The location was good, about a 15 min. walk from the main gates. There are lots of restaurants within walking distance as well. We went to the beach one day and the guy at the front printed me out maps and told me how
Manager Response: Dear Tree C, Thank you very much for such a nice review of the Hyatt Place in Anaheim.  We appreciate your comments and the time you took to share your experience.  We are pleased to know that your stay was thoroughly enjoyable and that our team helped to make your stay with us most enjoyable.  Thank you for your recommendation.  We look forward to seeing again at Hyatt Place.  Hyatt Place Awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: A popular choice though Westjet Vacations (seemed like 80% of the guests were Canadian) Be ready for a bit of a hike to Disney - although there are several creative ways to catch a ride on the way back...
Manager Response: Dear arvol2015, Thanks so much for sharing your comments about your stay at the Hyatt Place.  We appreciate your comments.  We have a lot of Westjetters that stay with us and like you and your family, most find our hotel to be very accommodating and enjoyable. Also happy to see that you were able to get around the Resort easily.  There are quite a few ways to move about now and that certainly brings everything so close together for sure.  Thanks again for your review!  Hyatt Place Awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: My sister (24) and I (27) were in town from FL for The Avenger's Half-Marathon. We are WDW passholders so being a the park with so few hotel options was weird. Luckily we found the Hyatt Place and loved every minute! Our room was on the 3rd floor and faced the street but there was very little noise or disruption.   The breakfast was very good, especially being included in the hotel stay, and was exactly what a pair of hungry runners wanted in the morning. The hotel is very accessible to Disneyland and the shopping mall off of Katella. The staff were very nice when we interacted with them and we have zero complaints about our stay.  The housekeeping staff was amazing! When we left our rooms at 4:00 am for the run, it was a bit of a disaster since we were rushing to pack and
Manager Response: Hi Heather D, Thanks so much for your taking the time to share you experience at the Hyatt Place.  We appreciate it very much.  Happy to see that your stay was quite enjoyable.   I will be sure to pass along to the housekeeping team your comments.  Housekeeping is a monumental task at any hotel and the fact that you recognized their outstanding service is a testament to the care and dedication it takes to ensure that every guest room is tidied up nicely for when our guests return.  If we can ever be of service again to you and your family please let us know.  Thanks again!!  Hyatt Place Awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: One word. Amazing! We went for a trip to Disneyland (its a short walk away from the park). We will book this hotel every time we come back to visit Disneyland and I will tell my friends to do the same! Staff was amazing. Room was big and comfortable for my family of 4. Breakfast was better than most complimentary breakfasts. Overall, awesome!
Manager Response: Dear Gina_jew, Thank you so much for your comments and review.  We are very pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay with us.  And we appreciate the 7 stars you gave us.  :)  Hyatt Place is an exceptional hotel brand and you will find all of our hotels to be very welcoming and comfortable.  Should your plans call for another visit the Anaheim Resort, please let us know.  Thanks again for your review.  Hyatt Place Awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: Stayed 5 nights in November. Had a double room. The location first of all is good. It's about a 15 minute walk to Disneyland, or the bus stop is about a 5 minute walk if you wish to use the bus. The rooms were modern and spacious. The beds firm but comfortable. My only two concerns were noise related. Firstly the AC seemed very noisy which was a little annoying. And secondly the floors/walls must be a little thin because we could hear kids running outside or upstairs from the room, which was also a tiny bit annoying. Especially at 10:30 at night when we're were trying to sleep after a huge day. Otherwise everything else here was great. Breakfast is fine. The usual offerings that get you going in the morning. Great for a quick bite before heading out. Staff were all super
Manager Response: Hello Kelly G, Thanks for your review of the Hyatt Place in Anaheim.  Always pleased to know that our guests enjoyed their visit and enjoyed our services and amenities.  Thanks again for your nice review.  Hyatt Place Awarded "Highest in Guest Satisfaction Among Upscale Hotel Chains" by J.D. Power in 2015

Summary: The people were very pleasant and helpful! The room was very clean and spacious. The breakfast had a good selection, Good seating and the ladies working there keep it very clean and stocked. It was within walking distance of great resturants and .8 miles from Disneyland! I would highly recommend this place to stay and bring my family!

great hotel near disneyland with lots of extras for your money! there is free in room internet, mini fridge in room, flat screen 40" tv in room with directtv, free breakfast buffet and the hotel is only 2 years young.

I travel a lot, and Hyatt Place Anaheim is comfortable, secure and feels like a home away from home!  The staff is efficient, friendly and professional.  The breakfast is amazing and meets multiple needs.  The location is within walking distance to great restaurants, and of course, Disneyland.

This hotel is an excellent choice for families and any one visiting the Anaheim area.  You can walk to the Disneyland resorts and the convention center.  The hotel is clean and the staff is very pleasant.  The breakfast is really good also.

Summary Heading: Awesome hotel and close to Disneyland!
Summary: We stayed at this Hyatt Oct 8-13th, 2015.  Family of 5, we chose the 2 bed specialty suite.  It suited us perfectly, with 2 queen beds, an L shaped pull out sofa, kitchenette and table for 4.  It had a large bathroom with 2 sinks, making it easy to get ready each day.  The property was very clean, our room as well.  The staff were all exceptionally friendly and helpful.  The included free breakfast was very nice, with a lot of seating but it can get very busy.  Plan accordingly.  They also offer a small menu for lunch and dinner which you can order and eat in the restaurant or take to your room.  There is a bar for drinks.  The pool area is small and the pool is not heated but it was very hot when we were there and it was nice.  There is also a decent sized hot tub.    There is

Summary Heading: Great balance of location, price and service!
Summary: We stayed in a specialist room with bunk beds and a dividing door and it was perfect for our family, with our son being able to go to sleep earlier and the adults staying up later. Even with our current horrid exchange rate with the US, the room was very affordable and the free hot breakfast was a huge bonus. The styling of the rooms was high end and never felt anything less than clean and shiny. The beds were really comfy and we slept much better than in most more expensive hotels!  Breakfast was just what we needed, with 4 varying hot options each day as well as plenty of other cold options and things to toast, and good tea and coffee choices. We never got bored with the food choices in the 6 days we had there, with pancakes, waffles, sausages, biscuits and gravy, breakfast

We stayed at this hotel and went to Disneyland. The park is just a fifteen minute walk away so no need to pay for parking. The hotel staff were very accommodating and the breakfast was great. I would recommend for anyone.

Our experience was awesome they have great customer service the Dining Service was amazing it was different that you had to pick up your food from the lobby downstairs but the service was still amazing. Our food was made fresh and was ready by the time we came downstairs. The convenience of the parking and location was nice the walk isn't bad but hey my husband and I love walking. The rooms were nice and spacious they even had a little cozy corner couch which was nice and comfortable and great to put on luggage on. I would stay here again :)

Summary Heading: New hotel at very convenient location
Summary: This place is new although I didn't try out the fitness room or the breakfast but because it's new and reasonably prices and have a very convenient and easy to use underground parking and within walking distance to Disneyland this is a 5 star stay.  But beware because it's close to Disneyland you can hear the fireworks at 9:00pm.

This is the second time we have stayed here and love it.  We will return in the near future!  It's a great proximity to Disneyland (we do a quick uber ride.)  The staff is fantastic, the hotel is quiet and very secure.

Summary Heading: Nice and close to convention centre
Summary: Stayed here for 5 days during the vidcon convention and enjoyed my stay here. Breakfast had basic selection but I could find something to eat. The room were slightly dated, but quite comfortable. The aircon in my room was a massive brown box that threw cold air on my head all night. A bit weird. The gym was a bit basic, but totally enough for my needs.  The hotel is located 300 meters from Anaheim convention center, which is super useful.

Summary Heading: Reasonable Cost Within walking distance of DL
Summary: Breakfast is excellent. Hotel staff are very courteous and pleasant. Very clean.  Within walking distance of Disneyland. We timed it at 18 minutes pushing our stroller.  Felt safe walking to and from hotel after dark.

Summary Heading: Great hotel stop for Disneyland visit
Summary: Great staff, good breakfast included, comfortable rooms. Staff made an extra effort for my daughter's birthday which made it special. Only negative was fee for shuttle to Disneyland - wish it was complimentary.

I loved the hotel. It was especially convenient to have a third bed in the pull out couch. The breakfast was great. The staff were wonderful and my six year old even commented on how much he would miss the hotel. It was a great, comfortable, safe place to come back to after a long day at Disneyland. The parking garage is awesome, and the distance to the Toy Story lot is perfect.

Extremely pleased with this hotel, from the pleasant staff to the room to the free breakfast. With 3 young boys we found the proximity to Disney and the availability of close public transport a blessing. Would come back anytime.
Manager Response: Hi Geoff W, Thanks for your review and comments.  Very happy to know that your stay was enjoyable.  Please do let us know when you plan to return.

Summary: The service at the Hyatt Place was very good. The people were helpful, and wanted to make sure you had all the information you needed. The place was very clean. Our room was beautiful and very comfortable. The beds are like you are at home, or better. We would recommend the Hyatt Place.
Manager Response: Hi Michele H, Thank you for taking the time to post your comments about our Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center.  We are pleased to know that your stay was very pleasant and that your found everything to your satisfaction.  If we can be of service again, please let us know. Thanks again!

Summary: We had an excellent stay here. The staff is attentive, and the rooms are spacious, comfortable and clean.  The free breakfast is decent and has good variety.  Literally a two minute walk to the Disneyland Toy Story parking lot.   Two queen beds and sleeper sofa can sleep 6 in one room!
Manager Response: Hello Alex B, Thank you for your review of the Hyatt Place Anaheim.  We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our breakfast very satisfying and our staff members to be courteous and helpful.  Let us know if we can be of service again soon.  Thanks again!

Summary: I stayed here on a business trip and it was EXCELLENT! Friendly staff, clean accommodations, good internet speed, comfy bed and close to the convention center.  The price was decent to compared to the other near by hotels which didn't have any freebies!
Manager Response: Dear Eureka R, Thank you for posting your review and comments about your stay.  We appreciate the time you have taken to share your experience.  We are quite pleased to know that you found our hotel to be most accommodating and enjoyable.  And yes, the free breakfast buffet is a nice touch and a great way to start the day.    Thanks again.

Summary: Newer property that offered free breakfast, bar, and 24/7 food.  Good wifi connection (also free), great location near convention center.  Walking distance to convention center, CVS, many restaurants, and Disney if your kids aren't too tired.  Would highly recommend!

Thank you for taking great care of me so I could take care of business.  I was able to walk to and from the convention center, safely.  I appreciated the 24/7 food service ... would have liked a bit more variety.    This hotel  is the epitome of the Hyatt Place brand, exhibiting wonderful customer service from check-in to the final good-bye.  I will be back!!!

I have stayed at plenty of hotels and this one fits me perfectly. Clean Good Breakfast Good room size Good location I am from the south and I always hear about southern hospitality. We don't hold a candle to how this hotel treated me. Extremely friendly.

This new hotel is in great shape, the rooms are spacious and clean as you would expect and the staff is very nice. Food is available at all hours and is pretty good and decently priced. The hotel is exactly a 15 minute walk to the main gates of Disneyland Resort.

The Hyatt Convention center is very pleasing. The pace is less hectic and it is more sedate than the other large hotels near the convention center. You'll enjoy the easy parking and laid back atmosphere. The rooms have been freshened up recently, and the staff is first rate.

I was in town for a convention and found this through my client. I was thrilled with the location, cleanliness, and service. My room was very large and had a couch area. The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful. Highly recommend!

Attended convention on my own dime and chose Hyatt Place for its location and significantly lower price that big hotels closer to Conv. Ctr. I was pleasantly surprised at the value, great customer service with a smile, diverse breakfast and room comfort. Would book it again in a minute.

The hotel staff was amazing, the breakfast bar exceeded our expectations.  The room was comfortable and spacious and very clean.   Wish we had been staying longer!  We will stay here again when in the area.  Great stay!

My family and I have enjoyed our stay at the Hyatt Place in Anaheim. Although we only stayed 2nights and 3 days. we enjoyed every minute of it. The staff was exceptional in helping and advising us on certain things. We plan on staying at the Hyatt Place our next time in Anaheim.

This hotel is new, clean and modern.  Breakfast and Wi-Fi are included and it's close to Disneyland.  It's fairly quiet and the employees are friendly, and helpful.  Overall we enjoyed our four night stay, but wish the beds weren't so firm and that the bathroom light didn't shine through the door when in use at night.

Staff was very attentive & pleasing. Accommodations were clean and comfortable. Complimentary buffet breakfast was much larger then expected and delicious! Location & parking was convenient and it was nice that parking was complimentary with no unexpected charges.

Five women decided to take a girl's trip to LA and we chose the Hyatt Place at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center.  We booked a family room and had a king size bed, 2 bunk beds and a sofa sleeper.  The room was very clean, the staff was super friendly and helpful, and the free breakfast was extremely good and varied.  The wi-fi was also free and seemed to be pretty fast as no one was complaining!  We were right next to the elevator but was never bothered by it.  The hotel is close to the Disney parks and Downtown Disney.  We walked to Downtown Disney one evening and took a cab other times.  The cab fares seemed to vary, but the most we paid was under $10 and was easier than driving or taking the bus.  Everyone really enjoyed their stay and we all agreed we'd stay at a Hyatt Place

Stayed at 5 different hotels over our 3 week trip, this was by far the best. The room was clean, quiet and large, the free breakfast was really lovely with a decent selection, the staff were friendly and very helpful and the ring/book/collect your dinner service was efficient and fast - just what you need after a 12 hour day at Disneyland!

Summary Heading: Fantastic modern and very clean hotel 5 mins from Disneyland
Summary: My wife and I just completed a 2 night stay at this property while visiting Disneyland.  It was a perfect location with only a 10 minute walk (<1 mile) to the front gates.  The rooms are spacious and very clean.  I would definitely recommend staying here.  One ore thing....their free breakfast is suburb as well....plenty of options!

This hotel is a great choice if you're looking for convenient access to Disneyland / California Adventure (15 minute walk).  Hotel is clean and modern with comfortable rooms and friendly, helpful staff.  I'd have a hard time finding something bad to say!

My husband had business in this area, so we stayed for two nights. The rooms were clean and comfortable. The free breakfast was decent, breads, eggs, cereals, yogurt, fruit, juice and coffe. They have a small bar and some additional food that you can purchase. I had a salad one day and it was good.  The pool is small but clean.  The gym is small, 3 treadmills, an eliptical and a bike and some weights. My only complaint the gym could have been cleaner. The floor had dust/hair at 8:30 am, also they should provide cleaner to wipe down the equipment. It is close to Disney.

The staff at this hotel was great.  Very courteous and helpful.  My room was very comfortable and the hotel is conveniently located within walking distance to the convention center.  Nice reasonably priced place to stay in Anaheim.  The only slight disappointment was service at the bar/restaurant area was a bit inconsistent.  Other than that the place was great and I would stay there again.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel, Great Location, Super Services
Summary: We spent four days using Hyatt Place as our base while visiting the Disneyland Resort. The rooms are spacious and well maintained. The WiFi worked well everywhere. The Breakfast Buffet is one of the best we have ever experienced. There is lot's of variety including foods for various cultures. The staff keeps everything well stocked even during the busiest times. The Hotel has food available at all hours and it is all fresh and very tasty.  An ARTS bus stop is right around the corner which makes it very easy to get to the Disneyland Resort.  The staff was friendly and always helpful.

Exceptionally friendly, attentive and professional staff.  Well appointed and clean rooms.  Good services overall.  Great location!  Would definitely stay here again. Had one small billing issue at the end that was quickly resolved without questions.

This hotel was neat and clean great breakfast. Quiet, close to disney, and restaurants.  I would highly recommend for families, kid friendly. Close enough to walk to Disney.  The pool is small. was the only negative. Great breakfast.  Friendly customer service reps.
